[\[40b.3\]]so/_/sku'i 'od kyis mnar med pa'i bar gyi sems can bde ba'i tshor ba myong bar 'gyur te/_de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la 'khrul pa med ces bya'o/_/yang shA ri'i bu gang gi phyir ngag 'khrul pa gang las byis pa'am/_mkhas pa chos dang 'thun pas rgol bar byed pa'i ngag gi 'khrul 
[\[40b.4\]]pa de bzhin gshegs pa la med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni dus su smra ba/_yang dag par smra ba/_bden par smra ba/_tshigs su smra ba/_ji skad smra ba de bzhin du byed pa'o/_/shin tu nges pa'i tshig go_/sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa'i tshig go_/mi 
[\[40b.5\]]zlos pa'i tshig go_/don dang yi ges shin tu brgyan pa'i tshig go_/skad cig brjod pas sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa tshim par byed pa ste/_de'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ngag gi las 'khrul pa med ces bya'o/_/yang shA ri'i bu sems 'khrul pa gang las byis pa'am/_mkhas pa chos 
[\[40b.6\]]dang 'thun pas rgol bar byed pa'i sems kyi 'khrul pa de bzhin gshegs pa la med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni mnyam par gzhag pa'i dngos po mi 'dor zhing sangs rgyas kyi bya ba thams cad byed kyang sems der mi gtong zhing chos thams cad la de'i chags 
[\[40b.7\]]pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug ste/_de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la sems 'khrul pa med ces bya'o/_/ji ltar de'i sems 'khrul pa med pa de ltar sems can rnams kyi sems 'khrul pa spang ba'i phyir chos ston te 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang po'o/_/gzhan yang shA 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]ri'i bu ca co gang las bdud dam/_bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu 'am/_gzhan mu stegs can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ba'i ca co de bzhin gshegs pa la med do/_/yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa la ca co 'am/_rjes su ca co 'byin pa med de/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[41a.2\]]pa ni rjes su chags pa dang /_khong khro ba dang bral ba ste/_de sems can thams cad kyis bkur sti byas kyang mthos par mi sems/_sems can thams cad kyis bkur sti ma byas kyang 'khrug pa med do/_/de gang las 'gyod pa'am/_rjes su ca co 'byin par 'gyur ba'i bya ba mchog gam/_
[\[41a.3\]]mthar phyin pa ci yang de bzhin gshegs pa la med de/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'jig rten dang mi rtsod pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la ca co med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa ste/_nga'i ba med/_'dzin pa med/_len pa med/_mdud pa thams 
[\[41a.4\]]cad dang bral ba ste/_de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la ca co med do/_/ji ltar de la ca co med pa de ltar sems can thams cad kyi ca co thams cad spang ba'i phyir chos ston te 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa gnyis pa'o/_/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu bsnyel ba gang las chos gang la yang rmongs 
[\[41a.5\]]par 'gyur ba'i bsnyel ba de bzhin gshegs pa la med de/_bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa la thogs pa med cing sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dang /_g.yo ba la rnam par lta ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la rmongs 
[\[41a.6\]]pa med do/_/so sor ci rigs par chos ston pa'i phyir kun tu nyams pa med do/_/'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i phyir don dang /_chos dang /_nges pa'i tshig dang /_spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa la kun tu nyams pa med do/_/ji ltar bdag 
[\[41a.7\]]kun tu nyams pa med cing 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba de ltar sems can thams cad brjed ngas par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston te/_'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa gsum pa'o/_/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa la/_
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems mi dmigs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'chag gam/_bzhengs sam/_bzhugs sam/_mnal tam/_bshos gsol lam/_gsung ngam/_cang mi gsung bar gyur kyang rung ste/_rtag tu mnyam par gzhag cing ting nge 'dzin zab mo dam 
[\[41b.2\]]pa'i mthar phyin pa/_sgrib pa med pa'i bsam gtan la bsam gtan byed pa ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs ma gtogs par sems can gyi ris na sems can gang mnyam par bzhag kyang rung /_mnyam par ma bzhag kyang rung ste/_su yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems 
[\[41b.3\]]la lta bar nus pa med do/_/ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa de ltar ting nge 'dzin la lta bas sems can rnams la chos ston te/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bzhi pa'o/_/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de tha dad pa'i 'du shes 
[\[41b.4\]]gang las sems mi mnyam par gnas par 'gyur ba'i tha dad pa'i 'du shes de bzhin gshegs pa la med de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nam mkha' bzhin du zhing mi zad pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la zhing tha dad pa'i 'du shes med do/_/rang bzhin gyis tha dad pa med pa'i phyir de bzhin 
[\[41b.5\]]gshegs pa la sems can tha dad pa'i 'du shes med do/_/chos kyi dbyings dbyer med cing /_mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa'i 'du shes med do/_/'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la chos tha dad pa'i 
[\[41b.6\]]'du shes med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i sems can la yang rjes su chags pa med/_tshul khrims 'chal pa la yang khong khro ba med/_phan par gyur pa la yang lan du phan 'dogs pa med/_gnod par gyur pa la yang gnod par byed pa med/_'dul bar 
[\[41b.7\]]'os pa la yang mnyam pa nyid du ma yin/_log par nges pa'i sems can la yang dmod pa ma yin gyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos thams cad la mnyam par gnas te/_de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la tha dad pa'i 'du shes med ces bya'o/_/ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la tha dad 
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]pa'i 'du shes med pa de ltar sems can thams cad kyi tha dad pa'i 'du shes spang ba'i phyir chos ston te/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa lnga pa'o/_/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa la so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms med do/_/
[\[42a.2\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni lam bsgoms pa'i yin te/_lam ma bsgoms pa'i ma yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni sems bsgoms pa dang /_tshul khrims bsgoms pa dang /_shes rab bsgoms pa'i yin te/_shes rab ma bsgoms pa'i 
[\[42a.3\]]ma yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni ye shes dang ldan pa'i yin te/_gti mug dang ldan pa'i ma yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yin gyi 'jig rten pa'i rnam par lhung ba ma yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni 
[\[42a.4\]]'phags pa'i nges par 'byung ba yin la 'phags pa'i ma yin pa nges par mi 'byung ba ma yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor ba ste/_sems can la snying rje dang bral ba ni ma yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni rang gi ngang gis grub 
[\[42a.5\]]pa ste/_gnyen po'i rjes su song ba ni ma yin no/_/yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms de ni mtho ba yang ma yin/_dma' ba yang ma yin te/_mtho dma' med par gnas pa mi g.yo bar gyur pa/_gnyis dang bral ba/_rtog pa dang sel ba las shin tu 'das pa dus la lta ba dus 
[\[42a.6\]]las ma yol ba/_mi g.yo ba/_rlom sems med pa/_ma brtags pa/_rnam par ma brtags pa/_ma bsgoms pa/_bstan du med pa/_yang dag pa/_de kho na/_de bzhin nyid/_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid/_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid de/_shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni de lta bu'i btang 
[\[42a.7\]]snyoms phun sum tshogs pas sems can thams cad btang snyoms yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos ston te/_shA ri'i bu 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa drug pa'o/_/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dun pa nyams pa med do/_/de la 'dun pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa'o/_/de yang gang zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa la 'dun pa nyams pa med do/_/snying rje chen po la 'dun pa nyams pa med do/_/chos ston pa la 'dun pa nyams pa med do/_/sems can 'dul ba la 'dun pa nyams pa med do/_/rab tu dben pa la 'dun pa 
[\[42b.2\]]nyams pa med do/_/byang chub sems dpar yang dag par 'dzud pa la 'dun pa nyams pa med do/_/dkon mchog gsum rgyun mi gcod pa la 'dun pa nyams pa med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dun pas 'gro ba ma yin gyi/_ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'dun 
[\[42b.3\]]pa'o/_/sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i thams cad mkhyen par 'dun pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos ston te/_'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bdun pa'o/_/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i brtson 'grus nyams pa med do/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[42b.4\]]brtson 'grus ni 'di lta ste/_'dul ba'i sems can yal bar mi 'dor ba'i brtson 'grus dang /_chos nyan pa la brnyas pa med pa'i brtson 'grus so/_/gal te de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi snod chos nyan pa gang bskal par nyan kyang skyo bar mi 'gyur ba de lta bu brnyes na/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[42b.5\]]pa yang chos ston cing zhal zas dang bral ba'i rgyud kyis bskal par yang mi bzhengs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sems can la lta bas tha na gang na sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can gcig gi phyir yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'da' zhing bzhud de/_de bzhin 
[\[42b.6\]]gshegs pa la lus ngal ba'am/_ngag ngal ba'am/_sems ngal ba med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pa'o/_/brtson 'grus brtsams pa'o/_/brtson 'grus kyi bsngags pa gsung ba ste/_brtson 'grus kyis yang dag par rab tu sbyor ba gang 
[\[42b.7\]]gis sems can 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba thob par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus de sems can rnams la bsngags par mdzad de/_/shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad pa'o/_/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams 
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]cad kyi thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du dran pa nyams pa med cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i dran pa ni bsnyel ba med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ma thag tu 
[\[43a.2\]]'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar gyi sems can gyi sems kyi rgyud la rnam par bltas kyang de la de bzhin gshegs pa la phyis shin tu dran pa bsnyel ba med do/_/sems can gyi spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes kyang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes phyis gtang bar bya ba med do/_/
[\[43a.3\]]phung po gsum du rnam par gzhag pa dang /_sems can gyi dbang po la 'jug pa dang /_sems can gyi bsam pa la 'jug pa dang /_sems can gyi spyod pa rnam par lta bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dran pa la yongs su nyams pa med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dran pa ni dran par bya ba dang /_
[\[43a.4\]]bsam par bya ba dang brtag par bya ba med kyang sems can rnams la chos ston pa 'bri bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de'i dran pa la nyams pa med do/_/de ji ltar dran pas bdag dran zhing mi brjed pa de bzhin du sems can rnams la chos ston te/_'di ni de bzhin 
[\[43a.5\]]gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dgu pa'o/_/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med do/_/gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin de ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid de/_chos thams cad mi mnyam pa ma yin no/_/chos thams cad ni 
[\[43a.6\]]ji lta ba bzhin pa'o/_/ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin las mi nyams zhe na/_de bzhin nyid gang dang mnyam pa ting nge 'dzin kyang de dang mnyam mo/_/ting nge 'dzin gang dang mnyam pa de bzhin nyid kyang de dang mnyam ste/_mnyam pa nyid de la zhugs pas de'i 
[\[43a.7\]]phyir mnyam pa zhes bya'o/_/'dod chags kyi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa 'dod chags med pa'i mtha' yang de dang mnyam mo/_/zhe sdang gi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa zhe sdang med pa'i mtha' yang de dang mnyam mo/_gti mug gi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa gti mug med pa'i mtha' yang de dang mnyam mo/_/'dus 
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]byas kyi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa 'dus ma byas kyi mtha' yang de dang mnyam mo/_/'khor ba'i mtha' gang dang mnyam pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' yang de dang mnyam mo/_/mnyam pa nyid de la snyoms par zhugs pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med ces bya'o/_/de 
[\[43b.2\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_mnyam pa nyid mi nyams/_yongs su mi nyams so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin de yang mig dang ldan pa ma yin/_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid dang ldan pa ma yin mod kyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po ma tshang ba yang ma yin no/_/ting nge 'dzin ni 
[\[43b.3\]]sa'i khams la mi gnas/_chu dang /_me dang /_rlung gi khams la mi gnas/_'dod pa dang /_gzugs dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams la mi gnas 'jig rten pha rol la mi gnas te/_mi gnas pas na nyams pa med do/_/de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med de/_
[\[43b.4\]]sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnyed par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu pa'o/_/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab nyams pa med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes 
[\[43b.5\]]rab gang zhe na/_gang chos thams cad rab tu shes pa ste/_gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i shes pa'o/_/sems can gzhan rnams dang /_gang zag gzhan dag la chos go bar byed pa'i shes pa'o/_/so so yang dag par rig pa mi zad pa la mkhas pa'i shes pa'o/_/tshig thams cad rab tu 
[\[43b.6\]]dbye ba shes pa'o/_/tshig gcig la 'jug pas bskal pa brgya stong du mi chad par ston pa shes pa'o/_/ji lta bu ci 'dra zhes dris pa ji lta ba bzhin du the tshom gcod pa'i shes pa'o/_/thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i shes pa'o/_/theg pa gsum rnam par dgod pa bstan pa shes pa'o/_/sems 
[\[43b.7\]]can gyi sems kyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong yongs su shes pa'i shes pa'o/_/chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong ci rigs par yang dag par rab tu ston pa shes pa'o/_/'di ni shes rab mi zad pa bstan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab mtha' yas mu med zad mi shes pa'o/_/gang gi 
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab nyams pa med pa de bzhin du sems can rnams kyi shes rab kyang mi zad par bya ba'i phyir chos ston te/_/shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu gcig pa'o/_/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs 
[\[44a.2\]]pa'i rnam par grol ba nyams pa med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba gang zhe na/_nyan thos rnams kyi rnam par grol ba ni sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba'o/_/rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam par grol ba ni rkyen khong du chud pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par grol ba ni 
[\[44a.3\]]chags pa dang /_gnyis su 'dzin pa thams cad dang bral bas rnam par grol ba zhes bya ste/_sngon gyi mthar yang ma bcings/_phyi ma'i mthar yang mi 'pho/_da ltar byung ba la yang mi gnas te/_mig dang gzugs la gnyis su 'dzin pa las rnam par grol ba'o/_/de bzhin 
[\[44a.4\]]du rna ba dang /_sgra dang /_sna dang /_dri dang /_lce dang /_ro dang /_lus dang /_reg bya la gnyis su 'dzin pa las rnam par grol ba ste/_mi 'dzin/_mngon par mi chags par gnas pa'i rnam par grol ba'o/_/sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba de bzhin du shes pas de de'i phyir sems 
[\[44a.5\]]kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/_/ji ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams la chos ston te/_shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs 
[\[44a.6\]]pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu gnyis pa'o/_/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo /_/lus kyi las de dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs pas kyang sems can 'dul/_
[\[44a.7\]]gsung bas kyang sems can 'dul/_cang mi gsung bas kyang sems can 'dul/_bshos gsol bas kyang sems can 'dul/_spyod lam gyis kyang sems can 'dul/_mtshan gyis kyang sems can 'dul/_dpe byad bzang pos kyang sems can 'dul/_gtsug tor bltar mi snang ba dang /_
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]bltas pa tsam dang /_'od gtong ba dang /_gom pa 'dor ba dang /_'jog pa dang /_grong khyer du 'jug pa dang /_'byung bas kyang sems can 'dul te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyod lam gang gis kyang sems can 'dul bar mi 'gyur ba med do/_/de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs 
[\[44b.2\]]pa'i lus kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ste/_shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu gsum pa'o/_/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngag gi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes 
[\[44b.3\]]kyi rjes su 'brang ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni 'bras bu yod pa'i chos ston pa'o/_/phyad par lung ston pa'o/_/shin tu nges pa'i tshig smra ba'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngag de yang kun shes par byed pa/_rnam par shes par byed pa/_mi mtho ba/_mi dma' 
[\[44b.4\]]ba/_ma yo ba/_'dar 'dar po ma yin pa/_gya gyu med pa/_mi brlang ba/_mi rtsub pa/_gzing gzing ba ma yin pa/_mnyen pa/_yid du 'ong ba/_ma 'chal ba/_lag log med pa/_mi 'tshe ba/_mi myur ba/_rab tu myur ba ma yin pa/_shin tu rnam par phye ba/_shin tu nges pa'i tshig_/_rab tu mnyen 
[\[44b.5\]]pa/_shin tu snyan pa/_dbyangs snyan pa/_rab tu gsal ba/_bsgrags pa/_des pa/_'jam pa/_phan pa dang bcas pa/_dga' bar 'gyur ba/_mchod par 'gyur ba/_mdzes pa/_rdul med pa rdul dang bral ba/_tha ba med pa/_dri ma med pa/_ma rmongs pa/_gsal ba/_thogs pa med pa/_yang 
[\[44b.6\]]dag par sbyor ba/_'od gsal ba/_drang ba/_'jungs pa ma yin pa/_dum bu ma yin pa/_dig dig po ma yin pa/_bde ba skyed pa/_lus sim par byed pa/_sems tshim par byed pa/_'dod chags zhi bar byed pa/_zhe sdang zhi bar byed pa/_gti mug sel ba/_bdud 'jom pa/_sdig pa sel ba/_
[\[44b.7\]]rgol ba 'dul ba/_go bar byed pa/_rnga'i sgra mkhas pa dga' bar byed pa/_ka la ping ka'i sgra dbyangs/_dbang po'i sgra/_tshangs pa'i sgra/_rgya mtsho'i rlabs kyi sgra/_sprin gyi sgra/_sa'i sgra dbyangs/_khrung khrung gi sgra/_rma bya'i sgra skad/_khu byug gi sgra/_shang shang te'u'i sgra/_ngang pa'i sgra skad/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]kyi rgyal po'i sgra/_khong hu dang /_pi bang dang /_'khar rnga dang /_dung dang /_sil snyan rab tu bsgrags pa'i sgra/_kun shes par 'gyur ba/_rnam par shes par 'gyur ba/_zur phyin pa/_yid du 'ong ba/_mnyan par 'os pa/_zab pa/_lkugs shing dig pa ma yin pa/_bde ba/_dge ba'i rtsa 
[\[45a.2\]]bskyed pa/_tshig dang yi ge ma nyams pa/_shin tu nges par smra ba/_tshig 'bru dang /_don gyi tshig dang ldan pa/_chos kyi tshig dang ldan pa/_dus dang ldan pa/_tshod dang ldan pa/_dus las mi 'da' ba/_dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pas bstan pa/_sbyin pas brgyan pa/_tshul khrims kyis sbyang pa/_bzod 
[\[45a.3\]]pas bsgrubs pa/_brtson 'grus kyis 'bar bar byas pa/_bsam gtan gyis yid du 'ong bar byas pa/_shes rab kyis nges par brtags pa/_byams pas shin tu bsags pa/_snying rjes mi skyo ba/_dga' bas 'od gsal ba/_btang snyoms kyis nges par brtags pa/_theg pa gsum rnam 
[\[45a.4\]]par 'jog pa/_dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi gcod pa/_phung po gsum 'jog pa/_rnam par thar pa gsum sbyong ba/_bden pa yongs su bsgoms pa/_ye shes yongs su bsgoms pa/_mkhas pas ma smad pa/_'phags pas bstod pa/_nam mkha' tshad med pa'i rjes su song ba/_rnam 
[\[45a.5\]]pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngag ni de 'dra ste/_de lta bur de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngag gi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ste/_shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[45a.6\]]ma 'dres pa bcu bzhi pa'o/_/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems kyis brjod pa ma yin/_yid kyis ma yin/_rnam par shes pas ma yin 
[\[45a.7\]]gyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni ye shes kyis rab tu phye ba ste/_ye shes kyi dbang du gyur pa'o/_/gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes de yang sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rjes su song ba'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi yid kyi rjes su 'jug pa'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi rnam 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]par shes pa las rab tu dben pa'o/_/chos thams cad la nges par sems pa'o/_/ting nge 'dzin thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'o/_/dmigs pa las shin tu 'das pa'o/_/rkyen las skye ba dang bral ba'o/_/srid pa gsum gyi 'gro ba sel ba'o/_/nga rgyal gyi rnam 
[\[45b.2\]]pa thams cad las shin tu 'das pa'o/_/bdud kyi las thams cad las nges par grol ba'o/_/sgyu dang g.yo thams cad dang bral ba'o/_/ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin pa spangs pa'o/_/ma rig pa dang gti mug gi mun pa dang /_ling tog med pa'o/_/lam gyi yan lag 
[\[45b.3\]]shin tu yongs su bsgoms pa'o/_/nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing rnam par mi rtog pa'o/_/chos kyi dbyings dang dbyer med pa ste/_shA ri'i bu de lta bu ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes sngon du 'gro ba'i yid kyi las so/_/shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres 
[\[45b.4\]]pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa'o/_/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu 'das pa'i dus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug go_/ji ltar 'jug ce na/_'di la shA ri'i bu 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing byung ba dang /_ma byung ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bgrang ba'i tshul gyis 
[\[45b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par mkhyen to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed pa de'i rtswa dang /_shing gel ba dang /_sman dang /_nags tshal byung ba de dag thams cad rab tu mkhyen to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed pa de'i sems can gyi tshogs sems can du gtogs pa byung ba de dag thams 
[\[45b.6\]]cad rab tu mkhyen to/_/de dag na sems can sna tshogs byung ba ji snyed pa gzugs tha dad pa la sogs pa rgyas par bya ste/_sangs rgyas byung ba ji snyed pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa re res chos bstan cing brjod pa ji snyed pa yang gong ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/sems can ji snyed cig nyan thos 
[\[45b.7\]]kyi theg pas btul ba dang /_ji snyed cig rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas btul ba yang gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par phye ba yang rab tu mkhyen to/_/dge slong gi dge 'dun rnam par phye ba dang /_tshe'i tshad rnam par phye ba yang rab tu mkhyen to/_/chos gnas pa rnam 
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]par phye ba yang rab tu mkhyen to/_/dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba yang rab tu mkhyen to/_/zas kyi mchog gi longs spyod kyang rab tu mkhyen to/_/sems can thams cad kyi 'das pa'i rnam pa dang /_shi 'pho ba dang /_skye ba yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/_/
[\[46a.2\]]dbang po tha dad pa dang /_spyod pa tha dad pa dang /_bsam pa tha dad pa'ang rab tu mkhyen to/_/sems kyi rgyud kyang rab tu mkhyen to/_/sems gang gi 'og tu sems gang 'byung ba de dag thams cad kyang bgrang ba'i tshul gyis mngon sum du ye shes dang /_rjes su 'gro ba'i ye shes kyis rab tu 
[\[46a.3\]]mkhyen te/_de bzhin gshegs pa la 'das par gtong ba'i sems kyi rgyud kyang mi dmigs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pas sems can gyi bsam pa la nyams pa med par chos ston te/_shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres 
[\[46a.4\]]pa bcu drug pa'o/_/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu ma 'ongs pa'i dus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug go_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa gang dag 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_'byung bar mi 'gyur ba tha dad pa 
[\[46a.5\]]de dag kyang rab tu mkhyen to/_/bskal pa mes tshig par 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang /_chus sdud par 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang /_rlung gis sdud par 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gnas par 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sa'i khams ji snyed pa dang /_rdul 
[\[46a.6\]]phra rab ji snyed pa dang /_rtswa dang /_shing gel pa dang /_sman dang /_nags tshal ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_skar ma'i gzugs ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byam re re na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_rang sangs rgyas 
[\[46a.7\]]ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_nyan thos ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_zas kyi longs spyod dang /_dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba dang /_'chag pa dang /_'dug pa dang /_spyod lam ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin 
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]gshegs pa rab 'byam re re las sems can ji snyed nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas rnam par thar par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can ji snyed theg pa chen pos rnam par thar par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/_/
[\[46b.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byam re re na sems can skye ba'i gnas ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_sems dang sems las byung ba skye ba dang /_skye bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/_/de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen 
[\[46b.3\]]kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'ongs pa'i sems kyi rgyud bskal par 'gyur ba ma yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ma 'ongs pa la gzigs pas sems can rnams la chos ston te/_shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu bdun pa'o/_/gzhan yang 
[\[46b.4\]]shA ri'i bu da ltar gyi dus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug go_/ji ltar 'jug ce na/_'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar gyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad bgrang ba'i tshul rnam pa gsum gyis rab tu mkhyen to/_/da ltar 
[\[46b.5\]]gyi chos thams cad kyang rab tu mkhyen to/_/da ltar gyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_de bzhin du da ltar gyi nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang rab tu mkhyen to/_/da ltar gyi skar ma'i gzugs thams cad kyang rab tu mkhyen to/_/da ltar gyi rtswa dang /_shing gel ba 
[\[46b.6\]]dang /_sman dang /_nags tshal thams cad kyang rab tu mkhyen to/_/da ltar gyi phyogs bcu'i sa'i khams rdul phra rab kyi rdul gyi char brlags pa thams cad kyang bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu mkhyen to/_/phyogs bcu'i chu'i khams skra'i rtse mos blangs pa'i thigs pa thams cad kyang bgrang ba'i 
[\[46b.7\]]tshul gyis rab tu mkhyen to/_/phyogs bcu'i me'i khams kyi 'od 'phro ba/_skyes pa dang /_'gags pa thams cad kyang bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu mkhyen to/_/phyogs bcu'i rlung gi khams thams cad kyang gzugs kyi khams sgrub pa bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu mkhyen to/_/phyogs 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]bcu'i nam mkha'i khams thams cad skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyis bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu mkhyen to/_/da ltar gyi sems can gyi khams rnam pa gsum yang rab tu mkhyen to/_/da ltar gyi sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can gyi khams kyang rab tu mkhyen to/_/
[\[47a.2\]]de'i skye ba'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to/_/ldang ba'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to/_/da ltar gyi dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can gyi khams kyang rab tu mkhyen to/_/de'i skye ba'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to/_/ldang ba'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to/_/da ltar gyi gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i 
[\[47a.3\]]sems can gyi khams kyang rab tu mkhyen to/_/de'i skye ba'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to/_/ldang ba'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to/_/da ltar gyi mi'i sems can gyi khams kyang rab tu mkhyen to/_/de'i skye ba'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to/_/da ltar gyi lha'i sems can gyi khams kyang rab tu 
[\[47a.4\]]mkhyen to/_/de'i skye ba'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to/_/da ltar gyi sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud kyang rab tu mkhyen to/_/de dag gi nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa 'ang rab tu mkhyen to/_/nyon mongs pa dang bral ba yang rab tu mkhyen to/_/da ltar gyi sems can thams cad kyi 
[\[47a.5\]]'dul ba'i dbang po yang rab tu mkhyen to/_/'dul ba ma yin pa'i dbang po yang rab tu mkhyen to/_/de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la gnyis kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam par shes pa med de/_gnyis su med pa la zhugs pa'i phyir/_sems can 
[\[47a.6\]]rnams la chos ston te/_shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad po de dag dang ldan pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam ma lus pa thams 
[\[47a.7\]]cad du 'khor gyi nang du gzi brjid dang /_grags pa dang /_dpal dang /_ngo mtshar dang /_rmad du byung ba'i chos nyid kyis 'khor rnams zil gyis mnan nas/_lam me/_lhan ne/_lhang nge'o/_/de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad mtha' yas mu 
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]med do/_/'di lta ste/_shA ri'i bu nam mkha' mtha' yas mu med pa de bzhin du/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yang mtha' yas mu med do/_/gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi mtha' 'dod pa de ni nam mkha'i 
[\[47b.2\]]mtha' 'dod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag thos nas mngon par dad/_yid ches/_rab tu rtog_/som nyi med/_the tshom mi za/_rgya cher dga' mgu ste/_rangs pa rnyed cing nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis 
[\[47b.3\]]mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes skyed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pas don 'di bka' stsal nas/_ston pa yang 'di skad gsung ngo /_/'dren pa la ni 'khrul pa yong med de/_/lus dang ngag rnams dang ni sems mi g.yo/_/de bzhin srog chags 
[\[47b.4\]]rnams la chos ston te/_/de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/_/khengs par mi 'gyur 'dud par mi 'gyur te/_/khong khro rjes su chags las mngon par 'das/_/nyon mongs med la gnas shing nyon mongs grol/_/de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/_/'dren pa la ni dran pa 
[\[47b.5\]]bsnyel ba med/_/rnam thar spyod yul chos ni mngon par mkhyen/_/so so yang dag rig pa bsnyel med de/_/de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/_/mnyam par gzhag pas bzhugs shing bshos kyang gsol/_/'chag dang mnal ba na yang mnyam par gzhag_/g.yeng ba med 
[\[47b.6\]]cing sems can 'du shes med/_/de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/_/rgyal ba dang ni zhing dang sems can la/_/tha dad 'du shes bde bar gshegs la med/_/bsam pa chen po mnyam pa nyid la gnas/_/de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/_/de dag la ni ma brtags btang 
[\[47b.7\]]snyoms med/_/shin tu nges pa'i lam ni rab bsgoms pas/_/de la rtog dang rnam par rtog med de/_/de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/_/dge ba la ni 'dun pa nyams pa med/_/ston pa rtag tu snying rje rab sbyor zhing /_/sems can rgya chen dpag tu med pa 'dul/_/de ni rgyal 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/_/nam yang brtson 'grus la ni nyams pa med/_/'dul ba mtha' dang pha rol med mthong nas/_/lus dang ngag rnams dang ni yid kyis 'dul/_/de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/_/byang chub snying por sangs rgyas byang chub par/_/
[\[48a.2\]]de yis dran pa rnam par chud mi za/_/gang chos rtogs pa de ni rtogs bya min/_/de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/_/rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog med par/_/rang byung ting nge 'dzin la mnyam gnas te/_/chos rnams kun la mi gnas bsam gtan byed/_/de ni rgyal 
[\[48a.3\]]ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/_/'dren pa'i shes rab kyis ni rab ston cing /_/sems can kun gyi spyod pa rab mkhyen te/_/de dag la ni bsam bzhin chos kyang 'chad/_/de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/_/nyan thos rnams kyi rnam grol sgra phyir 'gro/_/rang rgyal gyi ni rkyen 
[\[48a.4\]]gyi 'du shes te/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi btang snyoms bsam mi khyab/_/chags las rab 'das dri med nam mkha' bzhin/_/sems kyi rgyud 'di rang bzhin rnam grol te/_/sems ni sngon nas bcings par gyur pa med/_/ji ltar rnam grol de ltar chos ston te/_/de ni 
[\[48a.5\]]rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/_/gshegs dang bzhugs dang grong khyer 'jug pa dang /_/spyod lam dag ni mthong na mig kyang 'phrog_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi dpe byad bzang po dang /_/mtshan dang 'od rnams thams cad 'dul bar zhugs/_/sems can snying po nam zhig 
[\[48a.6\]]'od gtong tshe/_/srog chags bye ba mang por bder 'gyur te/_/'od kyis reg pa dag ni 'dul bar 'gyur/_/de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/_/rang byung ba ni gsung gcig brjod pas na/_/sems can bsam pa bzhin du gsung thos te/_/brag cha lta bu de'i gsung 
[\[48a.7\]]yang thos/_/de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/_/ye shes kyis ni 'dren pa'i las byas te/_/bde bar gshegs la sems las cung zad med/_/sems can bsam la ye shes rjes su zhugs/_/de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/_/ting 'dzin bsam gtan dang ni rab 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]ldan te/_/spros pa thams cad kyi yang rgyu ba med/_/nam mkha' lta bur mnyam pa nyid du gnas/_/de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/_/'das pa'i dus la de yi ye shes zhugs/_/'gro ba sna tshogs rnam 'byed shes pa yi/_/chos rnams kun la sgrib pa med 
[\[48b.2\]]par 'jug_/de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/_/ma 'ongs dus na gang dag 'jig rten du/_/'byung bar 'gyur dang 'byung bar mi 'gyur dang /_/sems can zhing dang rgyal ba bshad pa dang /_/de dag thams cad sangs rgyas ma lus mkhyen/_/ma 'ongs de la rjes su 
[\[48b.3\]]rab lta zhing /_/de bzhin sems can rnams kyi chos kyang mkhyen/_/de yi sems ni g.yeng bar mi 'gyur te/_/de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/_/da ltar lam gang 'jug par 'gyur ba dag_/thams cad rgyal bas chags med rab tu mkhyen/_/'dren pa'i spyod yul nam 
[\[48b.4\]]mkha' lta bu ste/_/de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos ni ma 'dres pa/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad gsungs pa bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' 'dra bar ni/_/dad mkhas byang chub sems dpa' dad par byed/_/shA ri'i bu 'di dag ni sangs 
[\[48b.5\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad de/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor gyi nang du gshegs na seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog cing khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'che ste/_dge sbyong 
[\[48b.6\]]ngam/_bram ze 'am/_lha 'am/_bdud dam/_sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang 'thun par ma bskor ba'i tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor to/_/shA ri'i bu de ltar dad pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di bcus de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par dad/_yid 
[\[48b.7\]]ches/_rab tu rtog_/som nyi mi byed/_the tshom mi za/_rgya cher dga' mgu ste/_rangs pa rnyed cing /_ngo mtshar dang /_rmad du 'du shes skyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//bam po brgyad pa/_gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de ltar 
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]dad pa la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi snod du rig_/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi snod du rig_/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du rig nas/_de'i drung du gshegs te byang chub sems dpa'i lam yang dag 
[\[49a.2\]]par rab tu ston to/_/de lta bas na shA ri'i bu rnam grangs 'dis kyang /_de ltar dad pa la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis snod du rig_/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi snod du rig_/sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[49a.3\]]chos rnams kyi snod du rig nas/_de'i drung du gshegs te/_byang chub kyi lam yang dag par rab tu ston pa de ltar rig par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa bas kyang tshes grangs med pa/_yangs pa tshad med pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa de'i 
[\[49a.4\]]tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phung po chen po zhes bya ba/_rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs 
[\[49a.5\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/_gang 'di lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang /_bdud du bcas pa dang /_tshangs par bcas pa dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten rang gi mngon par shes pas 
[\[49a.6\]]mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas gnas so/_/de chos ston te/_tshangs par spyod pa/_thog mar dge ba/_bar du dge ba/_tha mar dge ba/_don bzang po/_tshig 'bru bzang po/_ma 'dres pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_yongs su dag pa/_yongs su byang ba yang dag par rab tu ston to/_/
[\[49a.7\]]shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phung po chen po'i nyan thos khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi nyan thos kyi tshogs chen po byung ste/_thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa/_nyon mongs pa med pa/_sems thams cad 
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]kyi dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag go_/shA ri'i bu de'i dus na rgyal po tshe rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba chos can chos kyi rgyal po zhig byung ngo /_/yang shA ri'i bu rgyal po tshe rnam par rgyal ba'i grong khyer rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/_rgyal po'i gnas 'byor pa mod pa/_
[\[49b.2\]]bde ba/_lo legs pa/_dga' ba 'gro ba mang po dang /_mis gang ba zhig yod de/_yang shA ri'i bu rgyal po tshe rnam par rgyal ba'i khye'u gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod pa zhes bya ba sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa/_sngon gyi sangs rgyas la bya ba byas pa/_sngon gyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 
[\[49b.3\]]brgya stong la bsnyen bkur byas pa/_gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_mdog bzang zhing rgyas pa'i mchog dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/_yang shA ri'i bu de'i dus na gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod btsun mo'i 'khor dang lhan cig tu skyed mos tshal gyi sar byung bar gyur to/_/
[\[49b.4\]]de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phung po chen pos e ma'o gzhon nu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi snod do/_/e ma'o gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod do zhes de ltar rig 
[\[49b.5\]]nas skyed mos tshal gyi sa ga la ba dang /_gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod ga la ba der song ste phyin nas steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/_gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod la byang chub kyi lam yang dag par rab tu ston to/_/de la byang chub kyi lam gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can thams 
[\[49b.6\]]cad la byams pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson pa dang /_bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams kyi rjes su 'jug pa ste/_de ni byang chub kyi lam zhes bya'o/_/de la sems can thams cad la byams pa gang zhe na/_'di la gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can gyi khams ji tsam 
[\[49b.7\]]pa de tsam du byams pas khyab par byed do/_/sems can gyi khams ji tsam zhe na/_nam mkha'i khams ji tsam pa sems can gyi khams kyang de tsam mo/_/gzhon nu 'di lta ste/_dper na nam mkha'i khams 'dis khyab par ma gyur pa gang yang med do/_/gzhon nu de bzhin du byang chub 
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]sems dpa'i byams pa 'dis sems can gyi ris na gang khyab par ma gyur pa'i sems can de gang yang med do/_/'di lta ste gzhon nu sems can gyi khams dpag tu med pa de bzhin du gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa bsgom pa yang dpag tu med do/_/
[\[50a.2\]]gzhon nu de ltar na nam mkha' mtha' yas pas sems can mtha' yas sems can mtha' yas pas byams pa mtha' yas so/_/gzhon nu yang sems can gyi khams ni ches mang gi sa'i khams dang /_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams ni de lta ma yin 
[\[50a.3\]]mod kyi/_'on kyang gzhon nu sems can gyi khams tshad med pa ji tsam pa de'i don shes par bya ba'i phyir dpe bstan to/_gzhon nu 'di lta ste/_dper na shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang /_lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_de bzhin du 
[\[50a.4\]]phyogs mtshams dang /_phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa de dag thams cad chus yongs su gang ba'i rgya mtshor gyur pa'i rgya mtsho chen po gcig tu gyur pa la yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/_de la sems can gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 
[\[50a.5\]]'dus nas/_brgyar btsal ba'i skra'i rtse mos chu'i thigs pa gcig blangs/_gzhan yang sems can gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'dus nas brgyar btsal ba'i skra'i rtsa mos chu'i thigs pa gnyis blangs/_gzhan yang sems can gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'dus nas/_brgyar btsal 
[\[50a.6\]]ba'i skra'i rtse mos chu'i thigs pa gsum blangs nas gzhon nu yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/_de lta bu'i thabs kyis chu'i phung po chen po de zad par gyur kyang sems can gyi khams ni tshad dang mtha' med de/_gzhon nu sems can gyi khams de ltar dpag tu med cing de ltar mtha' yas pa de 
[\[50a.7\]]thams cad la byang chub sems dpa'i byams pas khyab par byed do/_/gzhon nu de ji snyam du sems/_gang de ltar dpag tu med par byams pa bsgom pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i tshad gzung bar nus sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma 
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]lags so/_/gzhon nu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byams pa chen po bsgom pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ni dpag tu med pa yin te/_gzhon nu de'i byams pa ni bdag srung ba yin/_gzhan la phan par gnas pa yin/_mchog tu gnod sems med pa/_khro ba dang 
[\[50b.2\]]gnod sems kyi thab dang bral ba/_nyes pa 'joms pa rjes su chags pa'i kun nas ldang ba dang bral ba/_dad pa kun tu ston pa 'khrul pa thams cad la nyes par lta ba/_yongs su gdung ba med pa/_lus dang /_ngag dang /_sems bde ba skyed pa/_gzhan gyi gnod par bya ba thams cad 
[\[50b.3\]]du ma lhung ba/_'jigs pa thams cad dang bral ba 'phags pa'i lam dang 'thun pa/_gshe ba dang khros pa la dang bskyed pa/_g.yul thams cad las sgrol ba/_dbyig pa dang mtshon cha mi thogs pa/_sems can rab tu thar bar bya ba la dga' ba/_khong khro ba thams cad dang bral 
[\[50b.4\]]ba/_tshul 'chos pa dang /_kha gsag dang /_'drid pa dang /_gzhogs slong thams cad dang bral ba/_rang gi rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pas nye bar 'tsho ba/_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pas phyag byas pa/_rang gi gzi brjid kyis brgyan pa/_mkhas pas bstod pa/_
[\[50b.5\]]byis pa thams cad rjes su srung ba/_tshangs pa'i lam dang 'thun pa/_'dod pa'i khams dang ma 'dres pa/_thar pa'i lam gyi gtso bor gyur pa/_theg pa thams cad kyis yang dag par bzung ba/_zang zing med pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa/_rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i 
[\[50b.6\]]dngos po thams cad kyi zil gyis mi non pa/_mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang pos yang dag par brgyan pa/_dbang po nyams shing ma tshang ba thams cad spangs pa/_bde 'gro dang /_mya ngan las 'da' ba'i lam thams cad du 'gro ba/_ngan song thams cad dang /_mi khom pa 
[\[50b.7\]]brgyad las zlog pa/_chos kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing mos pa/_'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad dang /_dbang po dang /_rgyal srid la mngon par mi dga' ba dang /_sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems kyis/_sbyin pa rab tu sbyor ba/_tha dad pa'i 'du shes dang bral ba/_tshul 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]khrims dang bslab pa thams cad kyi sgo dang lam/_tshul khrims 'chal pa thams cad kyi skyabs/_bzod pa'i stobs kun tu ston pa/_nga rgyal dang /_rgyags pa dang /_dregs pa thams cad dang bral ba/_mi 'khrugs pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa/_yang dag par sbyor ba'i 
[\[51a.2\]]bya ba sgrol ba/_bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa'i rtsa ba/_nyon mongs pa las byung ba/_sems nges par rtogs pa/_thos pa 'dzin pa/_shes rab kyi rgyu skyed pa'i byams pa/_bdag gi phyogs dang gzhan gyi phyogs 'joms pa/_bdud dang 
[\[51a.3\]]nyon mongs pa'i phyogs sel ba/_'grogs na bde ba/_ldang ba dang /_slong ba dang /_'dug pa dang /_nyal ba'i spyod lam srung bar byed pa/_rgod pa'i rang bzhin yid la byed pa thams cad sel ba/_dri zhim pos byugs pa/_khrel yod pa dang ngo tsha shes pas byugs pa/_mi khom pa dang /_nyon mongs 
[\[51a.4\]]pa dang /_ngan 'gro thams cad sel ba'i byams pa/_'gro ba thams cad skyob pa'i byams pa chen po/_bdag gi bde ba btang ba dang /_sems can thams cad la bde ba rab tu sbyin pa ste/_gzhon nu nyan thos rnams kyi byams pa ni bdag skyob pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams 
[\[51a.5\]]pa ni sems can thams cad la skyob pa'o/_/yang gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa rnams kyi byams pa ni sems can la dmigs pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi byams pa ni chos la dmigs pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa 
[\[51a.6\]]rab tu thob pa rnams kyi byams pa ni dmigs pa med pa'o/_/gzhon nu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byams pa zhes bya ste/_/byang chub sems dpa' byams pa de la rab tu gnas pas sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed do/_/de la gzhon nu byang chub 
[\[51a.7\]]sems dpa'i snying rje chen po gang zhe na/_gzhon nu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa'i sngon du 'gro ba ni snying rje chen po'o/_/'di lta ste/_dper na gzhon nu skyes bu'i srog gi dbang po'i sngon du 'gro ba ni dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa'o/_/
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]gzhon nu de bzhin du theg pa chen po yang dag par sgrub pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sngon du 'gro ba ni snying rje chen po'o/_/'di lta ste/_dper na gzhon nu 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i rin po che thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba ni 'khor lo rin po che yin no/_/gzhon nu de bzhin du byang chub 
[\[51b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba ni snying rje chen po yin te/_snying rje chen po de yang sems can thams cad rjes su mi gtong ba'o/_/gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po sems can thams cad la ji ltar 'jug ce na/_
[\[51b.3\]]gzhon nu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'jig tshogs la lta bas bcings shing lta bar gyur pa rnam pa mang po la chags pa'i sems can mthong na/_de dag gi 'jig tshogs la lta bas bcings pa spang ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[51b.4\]]snying rje chen po 'jug go_/gzhan yang gzhon nu byang chub sems dpas sems can yang dag pa ma yin pa phyin ci log gi gnas la gnas te/_mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes pa dang /_bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa 
[\[51b.5\]]dang /_mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa mthong na/_de dag gis yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyin ci log spang ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go_/gzhan yang gzhon nu byang chub sems dpas phyin ci log gi 'dod 
[\[51b.6\]]pa la sred pa'i sems can de dag ma la yang g.yem pa dang /_sring mo la yang g.yem pa mthong na/_byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa 'di dag ni 'phags pa ma yin pa 'dus pa ste/_mu cor smra bas yongs su gang zhing ngo tsha mi shes 
[\[51b.7\]]pas yongs su gang ngo /_/'di ltar ma'i rum mngal gyi mal na 'dug 'dug ste/_de nyid kyi mngal gyi sgo nas byung la de nyid dang yang lhan cig tu 'dod pa sten par byed pa lta ga la srid/_mngal gcig na lhan cig tu 'dug 'dug pa'i sring mo dang 'du zhing 'khrig pa byed pa lta ga la 
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]srid de/_kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni brlag go_/rnam par brlag go_/rab tu brlag go_/'dod chags kyis g.yen spyo'o/_/zhe sdang gis g.yen spyo'o/_/gti mug gis g.yen spyo'o/_/mi shes pas g.yen spyo'o/_/chos las nyams shing chos ma 
[\[52a.2\]]yin pa la gnas so/_/mi 'thun pa'i chos la rab tu spyod do/_/sems can dmyal ba'i spyod yul pa'o/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi spyod yul pa'o/_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi spyod yul pa'o/_/log pa'i lam la spyod yul pa'o snyam mo/_/gzhon nu 'di lta ste dper na wa dur khrod kyi 
[\[52a.3\]]mthar g.yang sa chen po dang nye ba zhig na mtshan mo khyis gtses nas g.yang sa chen po nas lhung ba de bzhin du gzhon nu sems can 'di dag kyang wa dang 'dra'o/_/gzhon nu 'di lta ste/_dper na dmus long khyis gtses nas g.yang sa chen po dang nye bar gyur pa de bzhin du/_kye ma'o 
[\[52a.4\]]gzhon nu sems can 'di dag kyang dmus long dang 'dra'o/_/gzhon nu 'di lta ste/_dper na phag ni mi gtsang ba za zhing mi gtsang ba la spyod yul pa ste/_gzhon nu kye ma'o de bzhin du sems can 'di dag kyang phag dang 'dra ste/_de nyid ma yin/_de nyid sring mo yin na/_de chung mar bya ba 
[\[52a.5\]]lta ga la srid snyam ste/_sems can nyon mongs pas g.yen spyo ba dang /_bdud kyi phyogs kyi spyod yul pa dang /_bdud kyi zhags pas bcings pa dang /_'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba de dag gi 'dod pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir chos bstan to/_/zhes sems can rnams la byang chub 
[\[52a.6\]]sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go_/gzhon nu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas sgrib pa lngas bsgribs pa'i sems can 'dod pa'i zug rngus zug pa mthong na/_skye mched drug la chags shing zhen pa/_mig gis gzugs mthong na/_mtshan mar 'dzin par 'gyur zhing mngon rtags su 
[\[52a.7\]]'dzin pa dang /_rna bas sgra/_snas dri/_lces ro/_lus kyis reg pa la reg na mtshan mar 'dzin cing mngon rtags su 'dzin par 'gyur te/_kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni khong khro ba mang zhing phan tshun mi mdza' ste/_de dag don rnyed pa'i phyir ni mdza' bor yang mi shes/_gnod par 
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]'gyur ba'i phyir ni gcig la gcig gsod do/_/kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni gnyid dang rmugs pa mang ba ste/_zhen cing spong ba mi shes pa'i ling tog gis khebs shing mi dge ba'o/_/kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni 'gyod pas kun nas bskor ba ste/_blo bur gyi nyon 
[\[52b.2\]]mongs pas sems kun nas nyon mongs pa'o/_/kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni the tshom gyis yongs su dkris pa chos zab mo la nges par ma gyur pa ste/_de dag gi sgrib pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 
[\[52b.3\]]'jug go_/gzhon nu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems can nga rgyal gyis non pa/_che ba'i nga rgyal gyis non pa/_nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal gyis non pa/_nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal gyis non pa/_mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis non pa/_cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal gyis non pa/_log 
[\[52b.4\]]pa'i nga rgyal gyis non pa/_dma' ba bas bdag mtho bar sems pa/_mtshungs pa bas kyang bdag ches lhag par lta ba de dag gzugs la bdag ces khas len pa nas/_rnam par shes pa'i bar la bdag ces khas len pa/_khong du ma chud par khong du chud snyam du shes pa/_gus par smra 
[\[52b.5\]]bar 'os pa la gus par mi smra ba/_phyag bya bar 'os pa la phyag mi 'tshal ba/_rgan pa dang /_gzhon pa la mi 'dud pa/_bla ma la rim gro mi byed pa/_mkhas pa la dge ba gang /_mi dge ba gang /_bsten par bya ba gang /_bsten par mi bya ba gang /_bya ba gang /_mi bya ba gang /_
[\[52b.6\]]kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang /_kha na ma tho ba med pa gang /_lam gang /_ting nge 'dzin gang /_rnam par grol ba gang zhes mi 'dri ba dang /_bdag nyid la bdag nyid ni gtso bo'o/_/bdag ni mchog go snyam du rlom sems su byed pa mthong na 'di ltar nga rgyal gyi rnam pa thams 
[\[52b.7\]]cad spang ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go_/gzhon nu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas sred pa'i bcing bas bcings pa/_sred pas 'khol ba/_chung ma dang /_bu pho dang /_bu mos zin pa/_gnod bas zin pa/_
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]don med pas zin pa/_'khor ba'i gtan zin pa/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyis zin pa/_srid pa'i bcing bas zin pa/_rang nyam med pa/_rang dbang med pa'i sems can mthong na/_de dag 
[\[53a.2\]]rang nyam dang /_rang dbang dang /_gang du dga' bar 'gro ba dang /_mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go_/gzhon nu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas dge ba'i bshes gnyen 
[\[53a.3\]]dang bral ba/_sdig pa'i grogs pos 'khol ba de dag sdig pa'i grogs pos non pas mi dge ba'i las la chags pa 'di lta ste/_srog gcod pa dang /_ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pa la log par g.yem pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_phra ma dang /_ngag rtsub po dang /_tshig 
[\[53a.4\]]kyal ba dang /_brnab sems dang /_gnod sems dang /_log par lta ba'i sems can mthong na 'di ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsdu ba dang /_mi dge ba'i las las bzlog pa dang /_dge ba'i bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par bzung ste/_spyod par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to 
[\[53a.5\]]zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go_/gzhon nu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas gti mug gis bsgribs pa/_ma rig pa'i mun pa mun nag gi ling tog gis kun tu bsgribs pa/_bdag dang /_sems can dang /_srog dang /_skye ba po dang /_
[\[53a.6\]]shed las skyes pa dang /_shed bu dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag dang /_byed pa po dang /_tshor ba po dang /_ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin pa la mngon par chags pa'i sems can mthong na de dag 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi mig rnam par sbyangs zhing lta bar gyur pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir 
[\[53a.7\]]chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go_/gzhon nu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can mthong na de dag phung po lnga'i gshed ma las rab tu thar bar bya ba dang /_'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa las rab tu 
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]bzla ba dang /_khams gsum thams cad las gdon pa'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go_/gzhon nu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas sems can 'khrugs par gyur pa/_rtswa mun dza dang /_bal ba dza lta bu mi drang ba 
[\[53b.2\]]drang ba ltar 'chos pa/_'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol du/_'jig rten pha rol nas 'jig rten 'dir kun tu rgyug cing 'khor ba/_'gro ba lngar 'gro ba la phyogs pa/_mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba la phyir bltas pa mthong na de dag gi mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sgo dbye ba'i phyir chos 
[\[53b.3\]]bstan to zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go_/gzhon nu de ltar byang chub sems dpas sems can gyi khams mthong na rnam pa bcu po 'di dag gis snying rje chen po 'jug go_/bsam pa las byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de yang g.yo ba 
[\[53b.4\]]med par 'jug go_/lhag pa'i bsam pa las shin tu byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de yang mnyam par 'jug go_/lam las byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de yang drang po bcos ma ma yin par 'jug go_/sems gya gyu med pa'i sems las shin tu gnas pa las byung 
[\[53b.5\]]ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de yang gya gyu med par 'jug go_/'di lta ste/_sems can thams cad la 'dud pa dang /_phyag 'tshal ba las shin tu byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de yang bdag gi bde ba gtong bar 'jug go_/'di lta ste/_bdag gi sems yongs su dag 
[\[53b.6\]]pa las byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de yang pha rol rjes su srung bar 'jug go_/'di lta ste/_g.yo zhing 'gul ba'i sems dang bral ba rab tu gnas pa'i sems las byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de yang shes rab brtan par 'jug go_/'di lta ste/_pha rol la bde ba sbyin pa 
[\[53b.7\]]las rab tu byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de yang bdag gi bde ba gtong bar 'jug go_/brtson 'grus brtan pa las byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de yang sems can thams cad kyi khur khyer bar 'jug ste/_gzhon nu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po ni rnam pa 'di dag 
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]dang gzhan yang rnam pa bcus 'jug go_/gzhon nu'i 'di ltar gang la la theg pa chen pos nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang snying rje chen pos 'byung ste/_de'i phyir snying rje chen po zhes bya'o/_/sbyin pa byed pa dang /_tshul khrims byed pa 
[\[54a.2\]]dang /_bzod pa byed pa dang /_brtson 'grus byed pa dang /_bsam gtan byed pa dang /_shes rab byed pa ni snying rje chen po zhes bya ste/_de'i phyir snying rje chen po zhes bya'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa byed pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba byed pas snying rje chen po'o/_/dbang po dang /_
[\[54a.3\]]stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam dang /_mchog tu dga' bar bya ba'i las dang /_mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang /_tshig de dag thams cad kyang rgyas par bya'o/_/snying rje chen po ni rang byung gi ye shes sgrub par byed pas na 
[\[54a.4\]]de'i phyir snying rje chen po zhes bya'o/_/rang gi bya ba dang /_legs par byed pa'i bya ba dang /_mi 'gyur ba'i bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad la bya ba ci yod snyam pa ste/_de'i snying rje chen po de yang sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par byed pas 
[\[54a.5\]]'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying rje chen po zhes bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje de dang ldan pas sems can 'di 'dra ba'i gnas thob pa mthong na de dag la snying brtse ba dang snying rje'i sems skyed do/_/de la byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba 
[\[54a.6\]]gang zhe na/_gang dge ba'i chos rnams dran pa dang /_rjes su dran pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_dad pa dang /_rab tu dga' ba dang /_dge ba'i chos la mi zhum pa dang /_mi 'gong ba dang /_yongs su mi skyo ba dang /_mi dga' ba thams cad spong ba dang /_chos thams cad la dga' bar 
[\[54a.7\]]gnas pa dang /_sems rab tu dga' ba dang /_lus rab tu sim pa dang /_blo rab tu dga' ba dang /_yid rab tu mgu ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la mngon par dga' zhing mos pa dang /_mtshan dang /_dpe byad bzang po'i rgyan kun tu tshol ba la dga' ba dang /_chos nyan pas 
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]yongs su mi skyo zhing dga' ba dang /_chos kyi phyir 'brang ba'i nan tan la rab tu dga' ba dang /_rab tu dga' ba'i chos la mgu ba dang /_sems can rnams la khong khro ba med pa dang /_byang chub la dga' ba dang /_chos rgya chen po la mos pa dang /_nyi tshe ba'i theg pa sel bar 
[\[54b.2\]]sems bskyed pa dang /_ser sna tshar gcod pa dang /_slong ba la dga' ba dang /_gtong ba la rab tu dga' ba dang /_tshul khrims 'chal pa dag sdud cing byams pa dang /_tshul khrims dang ldan pa la rtag tu dad pa dang /_bdag gi tshul khrims yongs su dag pas ngan 'gro dang /_
[\[54b.3\]]'jigs pa thams cad las rab tu 'da' bar dbugs 'byin pa la rab tu dga' ba dang /_pha rol ngan du zer ba dang /_ngan par brjod pa'i tshig gi lam bzod cing rab tu dga' ba dang /_lag pa dang /_rkang pa dang /_mig dang mgo bcad kyang bzod par nus te/_sems mi nyams 
[\[54b.4\]]shing rab tu dga' ba dang /_rgan rabs la 'dud cing zhes byed pa la dga' ba dang /_rtag tu bzhin 'dzum pa la dga' ba dang /_khro gnyer med cing gsong por smra ba la dga' ba dang /_tshul 'chos pa dang /_kha gsag dang /_gzhogs slong med pa la rab tu dga' ba dang /_
[\[54b.5\]]snying po dang ldan pa'i chos la 'jug par rab tu dga' ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' la ston pa bzhin du phangs pa dang /_chos la bdag bzhin du phangs pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la srog bzhin du phangs pa dang bla ma la pha ma bzhin du phangs pa dang /_sems can thams 
[\[54b.6\]]cad la bu bzhin du phangs pa dang /_slob dpon la mig bzhin du phangs pa dang /_nan tan la yan lag gi dam pa mgo bzhin du phangs pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa la lag pa dang /_rkang pa bzhin du phangs pa dang /_chos smra ba la rin po che thams cad bzhin du phangs pa dang /_
[\[54b.7\]]chos yongs su tshol ba la sman bzhin du phangs pa dang /_skul zhing dran par byed pa la sman pa bzhin du phangs par sems pa'o/_/gzhon nu 'di ni dga' ba zhes bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' ba de la rab tu gnas nas rtag tu chos tshol ba la dga' bar 
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa la mi skyo'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi btang snyoms gang zhe na/_btang snyoms rnam pa gsum ste/_rnam pa gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nyon mongs pa la btang snyoms pa dang /_bdag 
[\[55a.2\]]dang gzhan rjes su srung ba'i btang snyoms pa dang /_dus dang dus ma yin par btang snyoms pa'o/_/de la nyon mongs pa'i btang snyoms pa gang zhe na/_gang bkur sti byas kyang mthor mi sems pa dang /_bkur sti ma byas kyang dma' bar mi sems pa dang /_rnyed pas snyems pa 
[\[55a.3\]]med pa dang /_ma rnyed pas yi mi 'chad pa dang /_tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang /_tshul khrims 'chal pa la blo mnyam pa dang /_grags pa la dga' ba med pa dang /_ma grags pa la zhum pa med pa dang /_smad pa la yi mi gsod pa dang /_bstod pa la chos nyid du shin tu gnas 
[\[55a.4\]]pa dang /_sdug bsngal la so sor rtog pa'i stobs dang /_bde ba la mi rtag par rtog pa'i stobs dang /_rjes su chags pa 'dor ba dang /_khong khro ba spong ba dang /_mdza' ba dang mi mdza' ba la sems mnyam pa dang /_legs par byas pa dang /_nyes par byas pa la gnyis su 
[\[55a.5\]]mi 'byed pa dang /_sdug pa dang mi sdug pa la mi lta ba dang /_bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_bsnyen bkur mi byed pa la dga' ba dang mi dga' bar bya ba med pa dang /_snyan par smra ba dang /_mi snyan par smra ba la rjes su chags pa dang /_khong khro ba med pa dang /_kun myang ba'i nyes pa la mtshungs par 
[\[55a.6\]]yongs su 'jal ba dang /_bdag dang sems can gzhan la bsam pa mnyam pa dang /_lus dang srog la mi lta ba dang /_sems can rab 'bring tha ma la 'od zer mnyam pa dang /_bsngags pa dang ma bsngags pa la chos nyid mnyam pa dang /_bden pa dang /_mi bden pa la 
[\[55a.7\]]bdag gi bden pa yongs su dag pa ste/_gzhon nu 'di ltar gang bdag la gnod par byed pa de la byang chub sems dpa' btang snyoms pa yin no/_/de la bdag dang gzhan rjes su srung ba'i btang snyoms gang zhe na/_gang yan lag dang nying lag gi sha bcad kyang btang snyoms pa 
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]yin no/_/yan lag dang nying lag gi sha bcad kyang /_'dod pa med cing tshol ba med de btang snyoms pa yin no/_/lus kyang mi 'gyur/_ngag kyang mi 'gyur te/_gnyi ga bzod pas de'i phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o/_/mig gi rnam pas ma yin/_gzugs kyi 
[\[55b.2\]]rnam pas ma yin te/_gnyi gas kyang rma mi phyin pa nas/_yid kyi rnam pa dang /_chos kyi rnam pa'i bar gyis rma mi phyin pas de'i phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o/_/rma mi phyin cing snang ba med pas de'i phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o/_/rma phyung ba la rma mi 'byin pas de'i phyir 
[\[55b.3\]]btang snyoms zhes bya'o/_/bdag dang pha rol gnyi ga las bzod pas de'i phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o/_/phan par byed pa dang /_phan par mi byed pa la mnyam par sbyor bas de'i phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o/_/btang snyoms ni rtsod pa med pa lhur byed pa'o/_/btang snyoms 
[\[55b.4\]]ni rang gi sems nges par rtog pa'o/_/btang snyoms ni bdag la so sor rtog pa'o/_/btang snyoms ni gzhan la gnod pa med pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi btang snyoms ni mnyam par gzhag pa'i dngos po ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byang chub 
[\[55b.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la btang snyoms pa gnang bar mi mdzad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpas rtag tu 'bad par bya'o/_/rtag par rgyun mi 'chad par dge ba yongs su btsal ba la brtson par bya ste/_dus dus su btang snyoms bsgom par bya'o/_/
[\[55b.6\]]de la dus dus su btang snyoms bsgom pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_snod ma yin pa'i sems can la btang snyoms pa dang /_bsnyen bkur mi byed pa la btang snyoms pa dang /_ma rnyed pa dang /_smad pa dang /_ma grags pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba la btang snyoms pa dang /_nyan 
[\[55b.7\]]thos kyi theg par nges par 'gyur ba la zhugs pa rnams la btang snyoms pa dang /_sbyin pa'i dus na tshul khrims nye bar bsgrub pa btang snyoms pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi dus na sbyin pa nye bar bsgrub pa btang snyoms pa dang /_bzod pa'i dus na sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_brtson 
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]'grus nye bar bsgrub pa btang snyoms pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi dus na tshul khrims kyi rjes su 'jug pa btang snyoms pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi dus na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar bsgrub pa btang snyoms pa dang /_shes rab dus na pha rol tu phyin pa lnga la 
[\[56a.2\]]dmigs pa nye bar bsgrub pa btang snyoms pa ste/_'di ni dus dus su btang snyoms pa zhes bya'o/_/de ltar gang mi bya ba'i chos mi byed pa 'di ni btang snyoms zhes bya ste/_de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni mi dge ba'i phyogs thams cad la btang snyoms su byed do/_/gzhon nu 'di 
[\[56a.3\]]ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad la byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms zhes bya'o/_/de ltar shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phung po chen po des gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod la byams pa dang /_snying 
[\[56a.4\]]rje dang dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms mdor bstan pa dang bcas/_rgyas par bstan pa dang bcas te/_rgya cher yang dag par bstan to/_/gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod des de thos nas pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson 'grus brtsams par gyur to/_/byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' 
[\[56a.5\]]ba dang /_btang snyoms kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//de la shA ri'i bu pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson pa gang zhe na/_shA ri'i bu pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag nyid yin te/_gang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni byang 
[\[56a.6\]]chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do/_/drug gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi 
[\[56a.7\]]pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug rnams so/_/de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/_shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_phongs pa rnams kyi sbyin bdag yin te/_'di lta ste/_zas kyis phongs pa la zas/_skom gyis 
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]phongs pa la skom/_bzhon pa dang /_gos dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_gnas dang /_yo byad dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_mar me dang /_sil snyan dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_gser dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_/bai dUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_
[\[56b.2\]]man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_rin po che thams cad dang /_rta dang /_glang po che dang /_shing rta dang /_skyed mos tshal dang /_dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang /_bu dang /_bu mo dang /_chung ma dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_mdzod dang /_bang ba dang /_gling bzhi'i rgyal po'i longs spyod 
[\[56b.3\]]kyi bde ba thams cad dang /_rtse ba dang /_dga' ba thams cad dang /_lag pa dang /_rkang pa dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_mig dang /_mgo dang /_sha dang /_khrag dang /_rkang dang /_rus pa dang /_'jig rten gyi yo byad gang yang slong ba la yongs su mi gtong ba med do/_/sbyin pa de rnam 
[\[56b.4\]]pa bcus yongs su dag par sbyin par byed de/_bcu gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mi 'thun pa'i longs spyod yongs su tshol zhing sbyin pa med/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sems can la gnod pa'i sbyin pa med/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'jigs shing 
[\[56b.5\]]skrag nas sbyin pa med/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yongs su ma btang ba la 'gron du gnyer ba'i sbyin pa med/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdong du lta zhing sbyin pa med/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sems can la tha dad par sbyin pa med/_byang chub sems 
[\[56b.6\]]dpa' rnams la mdza' bas sbyin pa med/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sdang bas sbyin pa med/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la zhing tshol zhing sbyin pa med/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sems can thams cad la sbyin gnas ma yin zhes brnyas shing sbyin pa med de/_sha 
[\[56b.7\]]ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa de rnam pa de bcus yongs su dag par sbyin par byed do/_/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa de gzhan rnam pa bcus yongs su dag par sbyin par byed de/_bcu gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la las kyi rnam 
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]par smin pa 'dod cing sbyin pa med/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bsam pa log par sbyin pa med/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yongs su skyo ba'i sbyin pa med/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la nye bar bstan nas sbyin pa med/_byang chub sems 
[\[57a.2\]]dpa' rnams la rjes su mi dga' ba'i sbyin pa med/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'gyod pa'i sbyin pa med/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la tshul khrims dang ldan pa la bkur te sbyin pa med/_tshul khrims 'chal pa la brnyas te sbyin pa med/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[57a.3\]]rnams la rnam par smin pa re ba'i sbyin pa med de/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa de rnam pa de bcus yongs su dag par sbyin par byed do/_/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa de gzhan rnam pa bcus yongs su dag par sbyin par byed de/_bcu gang zhe na/_
[\[57a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams la smad nas sbyin pa med/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gzhan du phyogs nas sbyin pa med/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la nyon mongs shing sbyin pa med/_khro ba dang /_phrag dog dang /_gnod sems ston cing sbyin pa med/_ri mor mi 
[\[57a.5\]]byed par sbyin pa med/_rang gi lag nas ma yin par sbyin pa med/_ci tsam dpags pa las dbri zhing sbyin pa med/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams skye ba 'dod cing sbyin pa med de/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa de rnam pa de bcus yongs su dag par sbyin par byed 
[\[57a.6\]]do/_/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa de gzhan rnam pa bcus yongs su dag par sbyin par byed de/_bcu gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mi brtan par sbyin pa med/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la tshod 'dzin cing sbyin pa med/_yongs su 
[\[57a.7\]]chad par sbyin pa med/_gzhan gyi dring 'jog ste sbyin pa med/_nyung zhes cung zad tsam sbyin pa med/_gzugs dang /_longs spyod dang /_dbang phyug la mngon par dga' ba'i sbyin pa med/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten 
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]skyong ba dang /_lhar skye ba thams cad 'dod pa'i sbyin pa med/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar bsngo zhing sbyin pa med/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mkhas pas smad pa'i sbyin pa med/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la thams 
[\[57b.2\]]cad mkhyen par ma bsngos pa'i sbyin pa med de/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa de rnam pa de bcus yongs su dag par sbyin par byed do/_/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa de gzhan rnam pa bcus yongs su dag par sbyin par byed de/_bcu gang zhe 
[\[57b.3\]]na/_ji tsam 'dus byas las nges par 'byung ba dang /_'dus ma byas thob par bya ba'i phyir de ltar sbyin pa byin na/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i phan yon bcu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/bcu gang zhe na/_bza' ba byin pas tshe dang /_spobs pa dang /_bde ba 
[\[57b.4\]]dang /_stobs dang /_kha dog phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/_/btung ba byin pas nyon mongs pa dang /_sred pa thams cad bsal ba phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/_/bzhon pa byin pas bde ba thams cad kyi dngos po phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/_/bgo ba byin 
[\[57b.5\]]pas khrel yod pa dang /_ngo tsha shes pa dang /_gser ltar kha dog yongs su dag pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/_spos dang phreng ba byin pas tshul khrims dang /_thos pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi dri dang /_byug pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/_/dri rab tu 
[\[57b.6\]]zhim pa'i spos dang /_phye ma dang /_byug pa byin pas lus kyi nan tan gyi dri zhim po phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/_/ro byin pas ro bro ba'i nang na mchog gi ro bro ba'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/_/gnas byin pas sems can thams cad 
[\[57b.7\]]kyi gnas dang /_rten dang /_gling dang /_skyabs dang /_dpung gnyen phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/_nad pa la sman byin pas mi rga mi 'chi shi ba med pa'i bde ba yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/_/yo byad sna tshogs byin pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi 
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]chos kyi yo byad yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob ste/_shwa ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' byang chub 'dod pas de ltar sbyin pa byin na sbyin pa'i phan yon bcu po de dag yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[58a.2\]]phan yon gzhan bcu rab tu 'thob bo/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mar me byin pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan lnga yongs su dag pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/_/sil snyan byin pas lha'i rna ba yongs su dag pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/_/gser dang /_
[\[58a.3\]]nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_rin po che thams cad byin pas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/_/rin po che tha dad pa sna tshogs dang /_me tog sna tshogs 
[\[58a.4\]]byin pas dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/_/rta dang /_glang po che dang /_shing rta byin pas rgyas pa dang /_yangs pa dang che ba phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/_/skyed mos tshal dang /_dka' thub kyi nags tshal byin pas 
[\[58a.5\]]bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/_/nor dang /_'bru dang /_mdzod dang /_bang ba byin pas chos rin po che thams cad kyi mdzod yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum 
[\[58a.6\]]tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/_/bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_las byed pa'i mi byin pas rang nyam dang /_rang dbang dang /_rang byung gi ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/_/bu pho dang /_bu mo byin pas mdza' ba dang /_sdug pa dang /_'dod pa'i 
[\[58a.7\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/_/gling bzhi'i rgyal po'i longs spyod thams cad byin pas byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs 
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]pa rab tu 'thob ste/_sha ri'i bu phan yon bcu po de dag yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' byang chub 'dod pas de ltar sbyin pa byin na phan yon gzhan yang bcu 'thob bo/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'dod pa'i yon tan lnga byin pas tshul khrims dang /_
[\[58b.2\]]ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yongs su dag pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/_/dga' ba'i rtsed mo thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pas dam pa'i chos kyi dga' ba dang /_rtse ba yongs su 
[\[58b.3\]]dag pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/_/rkang pa byin pas chos kyi don gyi rkang pa byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/_/lag pa byin pas sems can thams cad la chos kyi lag pa rab tu sbyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa phun 
[\[58b.4\]]sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/_/rna ba dang /_sna byin pas dbang po ma tshang ba med cing yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/_/yan lag dang nying lag byin pas kha na ma tho ba med cing mdzes pa'i yan lag sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su rdzogs pa phun 
[\[58b.5\]]sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/_/mig byin pas sems can thams cad la chos kyi mig mi sgrib pa yongs su dag pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/_/sha dang khrag byin pas sems can thams cad kyi lus dang srog snying po med pa las snying po len pas nye bar 'tsho ba la 
[\[58b.6\]]mkhas pa phun sum tshogs par rab tu 'thob bo/_/rkang byin pas rdo rje ltar mi shigs pa'i lus 'thob pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/_/yan lag gi dam pa mgo byin pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gsum gyi mchog bla na med cing ltag na med 
[\[58b.7\]]pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes khong du chud pa yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob ste/_shwa ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' byang chub 'dod pas de ltar sbyin pa byin na 'di lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs pa'i phan yon de dag yongs su gzung bar 'gyur 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]ro/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa zab pa shes rab kyi snang ba ni 'jig rten gyi zang zing gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod/_bdud rtsi 'dod/_snying po 'dod/_byang chub 'dod de/_yang shA ri'i bu mya ngan las 'das pa 
[\[59a.2\]]'dod pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas te/_'jig rten gyi zang zing sbyin pa na 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba gang yang med do/_/'di lta ste/_shA ri'i bu khyim bdag chun pa zhing skams la gnas nas ba lang dang /_
[\[59a.3\]]gnam sdong ma yin pa'i zhing gi rmo brko rdzogs par byas te/_sa bon btab nas rnam grangs 'dis gshol gyis 'tsho bas gser dang /_dngul yang 'grub bo/_/dngos po sna tshogs gzhan yang 'grub bo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu 'bru dang mtshungs pa'i nor med do/_/
[\[59a.4\]]shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi zang zing la gnas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i dus dang tshod yod do/_/'di lta ste/_shA ri'i bu bas rtswa skam po dang /_gsher ba 
[\[59a.5\]]zos pa dang /_chu grang mo dang /_dron mo 'thungs pa de las 'o ma 'grub ste/_zho dang /_mar sar pa dang /_mar gyi snying po yang 'grub bo/_shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas te/_
[\[59a.6\]]'jig rten gyi zang zing sbyin pa na/_de mi 'dod kyang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yang yongs su 'grub bo/_/brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa yang 'grub bo/_/gnas de gsum yongs su grub nas byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yongs su 'grub bo/_/de bzhin 
[\[59a.7\]]gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi yang yongs su 'grub bo/_/las stong gis 'grub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad rnams kyang yongs su 'grub bo/_/las stong gis 'grub pa'i rnam pa drug cu dang ldan pa'i dbyangs phun sum tshogs 
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]pa yang yongs su 'grub bo/_las brgyas 'grub pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gcig yongs su 'grub bo/_/las nyis brgyas 'grub pa'i gtsug tor spyi bor 'grub bo/_/rnam pa dang yon tan brgyas yongs su rdzogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dung 
[\[59b.2\]]chen po yang 'grub bo/_/rnam pa bye ba dang /_yon tan brgya phrag stong dang ldan pa'i tshems kyi phreng ba thags bzang ba/_phrag med pa snyoms shing dkar ba yang yongs su 'grub ste/_de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi 'bras 
[\[59b.3\]]bu rnam par smin pas mngon par 'grub bo/_/yang shA ri'i bu gang byams pa'i sems [(]bskyad [,]bskyed [)]nas slong ba la sbyin pa byin pa de ni gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sems bskyed pas sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin rgyun mi 'chad pa gcig 'grub ste/_ting nge 'dzin de la gnas nas de 
[\[59b.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ba spu'i bu ga re re nas ting nge 'dzin brgya gang gA'i rgyun ltar mngon par sprul pa mdzad de/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba thams cad la dbang thob pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu gang 'di lta 
[\[59b.5\]]bu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na 'jig rten gyi zang zing gi sbyin pas yongs su bzung ba yin no/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' mi 'chi ba 'dod pa dang /_byang chub 'dod pa dang /_/mya ngan las 'das pa 
[\[59b.6\]]'dod pa ni 'jig rten gyi zang zing sbyin par byed do/_/shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi zang zing la gnas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar rig par gyis shig_/shA ri'i bu sngon byung ba 'das 
[\[59b.7\]]pa'i dus kyi bskal pa grangs med pa shin tu grangs med pa tshad med pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang byung ba de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos mos zhes bya ba/_rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig 
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/yang shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos mos kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo stong phrag bcur gyur to/_/yang shA ri'i 
[\[60a.2\]]bu de bzhin gshegs pa chos mos de'i dge slong stong phrag brgya ni dgra bcom pa/_nyon mongs pa med pa/_dbang dang ldan par gyur pa nas/_sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa'i bar du ste/_dgra bcom pa sha stag gi 'dus pa chen po byung ngo /_/shA ri'i bu de'i tshe thag 
[\[60a.3\]]pa zhes bya ba thags 'thag pa/_gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_mdog bzang zhing rgyas pa'i mchog dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/_de de bzhin gshegs pa chos mos gang na bzhugs pa'i sa phyogs de nas ha cang yang mi ring ba'i sa phyogs zhig na rang gi las byed do/_/
[\[60a.4\]]de nyin par las byas nas nub kar khyim du 'gro ba'i tshe rtag tu dus thams cad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos mos de'i drung du 'ongs nas ras kyi kha tshar gcig 'bul cing 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bsdu ba'i gnas kyis bdag bcom ldan 'das la ras kyi 
[\[60a.5\]]kha tshar phul ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bsdu ba thams cad dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces des rim gyis ras kyi kha tshar stong lnga brgya phul te/_des bskal pa bye ba phrag bco lngar ngan 'gro log par 
[\[60a.6\]]ltung bar ma song ngo /_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bye ba phrag stong myong ngo /_/de dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis brgya byin gyi bdag po bye ba phrag stong myong ngo /_/dge ba'i rtsa ba 'jam pa yid du 'ong ba dang po pa'i las de nyid kyis sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong mnyes par byas te/_
[\[60a.7\]]des thams cad la me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_chos gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_gos dang /_zhal zas dang /_mal cha dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad kyis bsti stang du byas/_
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]bla mar byas/_ri mor byas nas mchod do/_/de phyir bskal pa grangs med pa zhig na bla na med pa yang dag par byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_rab tu bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung ba nas/_
[\[60b.2\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_de lo bye ba phrag nyi shu'i bar du gnas so/_/de'i dgra bcom pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag nyi shu zag pa zad pa/_nyon mongs pa med pa/_dbang dang ldan par gyur pa nas/_sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa'i bar
