[\[60b.3\]]gyi nyan thos 'dus pa chen po byung ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag lnga yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod do/_/des chos bstan te sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa'i don byas nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/der bcom ldan 'das de yongs su 
[\[60b.4\]]mya ngan las 'das nas/_lo stong gi bar du dam pa'i chos gnas so/_/de'i sku gdung yang rgyas par gyur te/_'di lta ste/_dper na shA ri'i bu nga da yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba bzhin no/_/shA ri'i bu ras kyi kha tshar phul ba dang /_sems bskyed pas kyang mthar gyis 
[\[60b.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs pa la ltos/_shA ri'i bu sems ni rgya che ba'i sbyin pa ni ma yin no/_/shA ri'i bu gal te sbyin pa rgya che la sems kyis ma yin na ni sbyin bdag rtsub mo zhes bya ba ltar 'gyur te/_des sbyin pa de snyed byin yang sems yongs su ma sbyangs so/_/shA ri'i 
[\[60b.6\]]bu 'jig rten gyi zang zing la gnas te/_thams cad yongs su thob par gyur pa la ltos/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa ni sbyin pa nyung ngu yang mang por byed do/_/ye shes kyi stobs kyis lhag par byed do/_/shes rab kyi stobs kyis rgyas par byed do/_/bsngo ba'i stobs 
[\[60b.7\]]kyis dpag tu med par byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher rab tu bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/gzugs 'dod phyir ni sbyin pa sbyin mi byed/_/longs spyod mtho ris 'dod phyir ma yin gyi/_/bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas mchog 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]'dod phyir/_/de phyir sbyin pa chung yang du mar 'gyur/_/grags dang brjod pa dag dang sgra dag dang /_/g.yog dang bde ba nam yang mi 'dod cing /_/'chi 'pho skye ba kun kyang mi 'dod de/_/de phyir sbyin nyung 'bras bu chen por 'gyur/_/zas dang skom dang chos 
[\[61a.2\]]gos gang sbyin pa/_/srid pa'i 'gro ba 'dod phyir ma yin te/_/sbyin pas 'chi ba med pa'i sgo btsal phyir/_/de ni skra rtse tsam yang sbyin pa sbyin/_/'phyar ba med cing khengs pa med par 'gyur/_/g.yo dang ser sna dag ni thams cad spong /_/de dag le lo nam yang yod min te/_de 
[\[61a.3\]]ltar de dag 'jig rten phan phyir spro/_/rgyal po'i srid dang nor dang 'bru srog gtong /_/de dag sems ni gzhan du mi 'gyur te/_/byin nas dga' chen po rnyed par 'gyur/_/sbyin zhing gtong la byang chub rnyed mi dka'/_/pha dang ma dang bu ni sdug pa ltar/_/slong dang 'jig rten 
[\[61a.4\]]kun la de bzhin te/_/gang gis byang chub spyod mchog spyad pa rnams/_/sbyin tshe rtag tu phrag dog med par 'gyur/_/de dag mthong na mi khro ste/_/ji ltar sngon gyi bzhin du smra/_/mi mdza' dag dang rtag mdza' zhing /_/skrag pa rnams la 'jigs med sbyin/_/de la dngos po 
[\[61a.5\]]gang yod pa/_/slong ba la ni sri ba med/_/chos 'dod par ni rtag 'gyur te/_/rgyal srid 'dod par mi 'gyur ro/_/'byung bar rtag tu smra byed cing /_/chos kyi sbyin pa'ang sbyin par byed/_'dod la brkam pa ma gtogs par/_/su zhig rgyal srid 'dod par 'gyur/_/'dod pa'i 
[\[61a.6\]]rgyal srid mi 'dod cing /_/mtho ris bde ba 'dod ma yin/_/sangs rgyas byang chub yongs tshol zhing /_/grags pa chen po sbyin pa sbyin/_bdag dang nor rdzas gzhan dag kyang /_/mang po myur du gtong ba ni/_/de dag byang chub dam pa'i mchog_/nam yang gtong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[61a.7\]]mkhas pa gzugs ni mi 'dod de/_/longs spyod dag kyang 'dod ma yin/_/mtho ris dag kyang de mi 'dod/_/mya ngan 'da' ba'ang 'dod ma yin/_/lam shes lam la mkhas pa dag_/gang dag bshes par gyur pa la/_/brten pa dag tu mi byed de/_/srid pa med pa 'dod par 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]'gyur/_/shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_de la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod do/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//_//bam po dgu pa/_de la 
[\[61b.2\]]gang la brtson pas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/_shA ri'i bu 'di gsum ni/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi legs par spyod pa ste/_gsum gang zhe na/_lus kyis 
[\[61b.3\]]legs par spyod pa dang /_ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang /_yid kyis legs par spyod pa'o/_/de la lus kyis legs par spyod pa gang zhe na/_'di la shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i ni/_srog gcod pa spangs pa yin/_ma byin par len pa spangs pa yin/_'dod pa la log 
[\[61b.4\]]par g.yem pa spangs pa yin te/_'di ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba spangs pa yin/_phra ma dang ngag rtsub po dang /_tshig kyal pa spangs pa yin te/_'di ni ngag gis legs par spyod pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[61b.5\]]gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni/_brnab sems med/_gnod sems med cing /_yang dag par lta ba yin te/_'di ni yid kyis legs par spyod pa zhes bya'o/_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_lus kyis legs par spyod pa gang /_ngag gis legs par spyod pa gang /_
[\[61b.6\]]yid kyis legs par spyod pa gang yin snyam mo/_/de yang 'di snyam du sems te/_lus kyi las gang /_srog gcod pa dang /_ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pa la log par g.yem pa ma byas pa de ni/_lus kyis legs par spyod pa zhes bya'o snyam mo/_/de la ngag gis legs 
[\[61b.7\]]par spyod pa gang zhe na/_de 'di snyam du sems te/_ngag gi las gang [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_phra ma dang /_ngag rtsub po dang /_tshig kyal pa ma smras pa de ni/_ngag gis legs par spyod pa zhes bya'o snyam mo/_/de la yid kyis legs par spyod pa gang zhe na/_de 'di snyam du sems te/_
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]yid kyi las gang /_brnab sems dang /_gnod sems dang /_log par lta ba ma byas pa de ni yid kyis legs par spyod pa zhes bya'o snyam mo/_/de 'di ltar tshul bzhin so sor rtog ste/_/las gang lus kyis ma byas pa dang /_las gang ngag dang /_yid 
[\[62a.2\]]kyis ma byas pa de ci gdags par nus sam/_de 'di ltar tshul bzhin gyis/_rtog pa na 'di snyam du sems te/_las gang lus kyis ma byas pa dang /_las gang ngag dang yid kyis ma byas pa de sngon po 'am/_ser po 'am/_dmar po 'am/_dkar po 'am/_leb rgan nam/_
[\[62a.3\]]shel gyi kha dog tu gdags par mi nus te/_mig gis shes par bya ba ma yin/_rna bas shes par bya ba ma yin/_snas shes par bya ba ma yin/_lces shes par bya ba ma yin/_lus kyis shes par bya ba ma yin/_yid kyis shes par bya ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[62a.4\]]'di ltar de ni skyes pa ma yin/_bskyed pa ma yin/_byung ba ma yin/_zin pa ma yin te/_de ni las gang gis kyang shes par bya ba ma yin no/_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_tshul khrims de ni/_gang mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o/_/gang mngon par 'du mi byed pa de la gdags 
[\[62a.5\]]pa gang yang med do/_/gang gdags pa med pa/_de la bdag mngon par chags par mi bya'o snyam nas/_de 'di ltar legs par spyad pa'i tshul khrims kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_gang gi tshul khrims de dang /_tshul khrims de gang du bsngo ba/_de yang yang 
[\[62a.6\]]dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de de ltar mthong bas/_'jig tshogs la lta ba gang gis/_tshul khrims sam/_'chal pa'i tshul khrims la/_so sor rtog par 'gyur ba'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba mi slong ngo /_de de ltar mthong bas sdom pa dang /_cho ga dang /_spyod pa dang /_
[\[62a.7\]]spyod yul shes bzhin du spyod par 'gyur te/_shes bzhin du spyod pas tshul khrims dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/de bdag tu dmigs shing mi spyod/_pha rol tu dmigs shing mi spyod de/_de tshul khrims ma nyams pa dang /_tshul khrims mchog tu mi 'dzin pa yin no/_/bdag tu 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]dmigs na tshul khrims su dmigs par 'gyur gyi/_gang bdag tu mi dmigs pa de ni tshul khrims su mi dmigs so/_/gang tshul khrims su mi dmigs pa de ni bslab pa nyams par mi byed do/_/gang slab pa nyams par mi byed pa de tshul khrims nyams par mi byed de/_tshul 
[\[62b.2\]]khrims mchog tu mi 'dzin to/_/ci'i phyir mchog tu mi 'dzin ce na/_des gzhan las chos thams cad shes so/_/gzhan gang yin pa de la bdag med do/_/gang bdag med pa de la ci zhig yongs su gzung bar bya/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag 
[\[62b.3\]]gsungs so/_/lus kyis dag cing ngag gis dag pa dang /_/yid kyis dag cing rtag tu spyod pa dag_/dag pa'i brtul zhugs la ni rtag gnas pa/_/de ni byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims ldan/_/shin tu bzang po'i las lam bcu po 'di/_/gang dag srung ba byang chub sems 
[\[62b.4\]]dpa' mkhas/_/lus dang ngag dang yid kyis gang ma byas/_/de ni mkhas pa tshul khrims ldan zhes bya/_/gang dag ma byas ma bskyed mi len pa/_/de la kha dog med cing dbyibs kyang med/_/gang la kha dog med cing dbyibs med pa/_/de la gdags pa nam yang mi dmigs so/_/
[\[62b.5\]]rtag tu tshul khrims ma byas 'dus ma byas/_/de ni mig gis blta bar mi nus te/_/rna ba sna dang lce yis shes ma yin/_/lus dang yid kyis shes par bya ma yin/_/gang de dbang pos shes par mi nus pa/_/de la snying rje 'jug pa nus ma yin/_/de ltar tshul khrims yang dag mthong 
[\[62b.6\]]ba de/_/nam yang tshul khrims dmigs par mi gnas so/_/tshul khrims ldan zhes yid kyis mi snyems shing /_/bdag tu 'dzin pas tshul khrims mi srung ste/_/tshul khrims srung yang tshul khrims 'du shes med/_/de ni khrims ldan byang chub spyad spyod pa/_/'jig tshogs la ni 
[\[62b.7\]]lta ba gang sel ba/_/de ni lta bar nam du'ang mi 'gyur ro/_/gang la lta med de la gnas med de/_/tshul khrims 'chal dang tshul khrims de mi snyems/_/chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa kun srung ba/_/de yi cho ga bsam du med par 'gyur/_/rab tu 'byung zhing rab tu bsrungs pa ni/_/
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]tshul khrims ldan te gzhan la rtsod mi byed/_/bdag med 'du shes tshul khrims mi dmigs te/_/bdag med de la tshul khrims dmigs pa'ang med/_/bdag dang de bzhin tshul khrims gang snyems pa/_/rtag tu 'jig pa'i mtha' zhes ngas bshad do/_/bdag 
[\[63a.2\]]med smra ba tshul khrims mi sems te/_/bdag med smra ba tshul khrims gnas ma yin/_/bdag med smra ba tshul khrims mi sems te/_/bdag med smra ba tshul khrims rtog ma yin/_/tshul khrims ma nyams tshul khrims skyon med pa/_/bdag ni tshul khrims ldan zhes mi slong ngo /_/
[\[63a.3\]]bdag la bdag med tshul khrims 'du shes med/_/shes rab zab mo byang chub spyad pa spyod/_/'jigs med gang dag tshul khrims 'di 'dra ba/_/nam yang tshul khrims 'chal par de mi 'gyur/_/thams cad chos ni gang dag mi dmigs pa/_/de yi tshul khrims de ni 'phags pas 
[\[63a.4\]]bsngags/_/byis pa gang dag bdag tu lta gnas te/_/bdag ni tshul khrims ldan zhes khrims srung zhing /_/bsrungs nas tshul khrims 'bras bu myong ba de/_/ngan 'gro gsum po kun las mi thar to/_/gang dag bdag tu lta ba kun spangs pa/_/de ni nga dang nga zhes bya mi 'byung /_/
[\[63a.5\]]tshul khrims ldan pa de la lta med de/_/de ni phyir yang log ltung mi 'jigs so/_/'di 'dra ba yi tshul khrims gang shes pa/_/de la 'chal pa'i tshul khrims blta mi nus/_/srid pa gsum na de bdag mi mthong na/_/khrims dang tshul 'chal ma thong 'gyur smos ci dgos/_/shA 
[\[63a.6\]]ri'i bu de ltar tshul khrims spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa'i chos bcu 'dus par 'gyur ro/_/bcu gang zhe na/_dad pa'i bsam pa 'dus par 'gyur ba dang /_brtson 'grus kyi bsam pa 'dus par 'gyur ba dang /_rab tu 'dun pa dang /_las kyi rnam par smin pa rgya 
[\[63a.7\]]chen po la dad pa dang /_'phags pa la ldang ba byed pa dang /_bla ma la rim gro byed pa dang /_slob dpon la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_chos tshol ba la 'jug par byed pa dang /_byang chub yongs su tshol zhing lus dang srog la mi lta bar byed pa ste/_shA ri'i bu de ltar tshul khrims spyod 
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa chos bcu po de dag 'dus par 'gyur ro/_/de chos bcu po de dag la rab tu gnas nas dge ba'i chos rnams yang dag par sgrub bo/_/dge ba'i chos gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_legs par spyod pa gsum po 'di dag nyid de lus dang ngag dang yid kyis 
[\[63b.2\]]legs par spyod pa'o/_/legs par spyod pa gsum po de dag la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni de'i byang chub gang dang 'brel pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su tshol lo/_/'di la de'i chos nyid ni 'di yin te/_de la 'di 
[\[63b.3\]]skad ces bya'o/_/sangs rgyas dag gis bsngags pa yi/_/dge ba'i las rnams lus kyis byed/_gang las thos pa rnyed 'gyur ba'i/_/slob dpon la yang rim gro byed/_/sems can thams cad don gyi phyir/_/byams pa'i sems ldan phrag dog med/_/chos las brtsams te gang 
[\[63b.4\]]zag la/_/ri mo dag ni rab tu byed/_/ngag ni shin tu sdom gyur te/_/de ni mi snyan tshig mi smra/_/'di ni 'dun dang ldan pa'i mtshan/_/nam du'ang ngag rtsub mi smra'o/_/yid ni dge ba'i yid du 'gyur/_/nam du'ang sdig pa mi 'dod do/_/byams sems gus dang bcas pa yi/_/bsam pa 
[\[63b.5\]]nyid kyis rtag tu lta/_/rgyal bas bstan pa thos gyur nas/_/chos 'di la ni gus dang bcas/_/chos la gus par byas pas na/_/myur du byang chub rnam 'tshang rgya/_/chos bcu po de dag la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos yongs su 
[\[63b.6\]]tshol bas slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed de/_tha na chu rdza gang tsam yang 'bul lo/_/gzhan yang shwa ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed pa bcu bskyed de/_bcu gang zhe na/_kye ma'o lus 'di ni na ba ste/_khams ni sbrul gdug pa bzhin du rtag par phan tshun mi 'phrod pa'o/_/
[\[63b.7\]]sdug bsngal mang ba'o/_/nyes pa mang ba'o/_/smyo ba dang /_'bras dang /_phol mig dang /_me dbal dang /_g.yan pa dang /_rlung dang /_mkhris pa dang /_bad kan gyis gang ste/_nad dang 'dra/_phol mig dang 'dra/_zug rngu dang 'dra/_chu bo dang 'dra/_gnod pa dang 'dra/_g.yo ba/_
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]'jig pa/_snying po med pa/_nyam chung ba/_shig shig po/_yun thung ba/_skad cig pa/_dur khrod du 'jig pa ste/_snying po med pas lus las snying po blang ngo snyam du sems bskyed pa dang po de bskyed nas/_byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod yongs su tshol 
[\[64a.2\]]bas slob dpon la rim gro dang /_bsnyen bkur byed de/_tha na chu phor gang tsam yang 'bul lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs te/_bde bar gshegs pas de skad bka' stsal nas ston pa yang 'di skad gsung ngo /_/khams ni sbrul gdug ma rung pa/_/bzhi po gcig la 
[\[64a.3\]]gcig brten te/_/re re yang ni 'khrugs pa las/_/nad po che ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/mig nad dang ni rna nad dang /_/sna nad dang ni de bzhin du/_/so nad dang ni mchu nad rnams/_/gzhan yang lus las 'byung bar 'gyur/_/smyo dang 'bras dang phol mig dang /_/me dbal 
[\[64a.4\]]g.yan pa rnams dang ni/_/nad gzhan rnam pa mang po dag_/lus las su ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/lus 'di nad dang mtshungs pa ste/_/lus ni 'brum bu 'dra ba'o/_/lus 'di gnod pa 'dra ba ste/_/yun thung skad cig 'dus pa'o/_/dur khrod du ni 'gro zhing 'jig_/mi rtag mi 
[\[64a.5\]]brtan g.yo ba ste/_/rab tu 'jig cing na ba dang /_/lus 'di rnag gis gang ba ste/_/shig shig po dang yun thung ba/_/rnag gis gang ba'i lus 'di yis/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni sku yi phyir/_/dge ba'i las rnams bsgrub par bya/_/thams cad du ni rab zag pa/_/rnag gis 
[\[64a.6\]]gang ba'i lus 'di yis/_/chos sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni sku 'grub bo//_//gang na gzhan gyis thob med pa/_/de 'dra'i lus ni thob par bya/_/tsha ba dag kyang gang sgrib dang /_/bsil ba dag kyang rab srung ba/_/lus 'di yang ni dga' ba dang /_/'chi bdag 
[\[64a.7\]]gis gzhom par 'gyur/_/gang dag grang dang tsha bzod pa/_/lus kyis su ni thams cad du/_/skyes bu'i bya ba byed pa yis/_/mchog gi lus ni thob par 'gyur/_/'jig rten grags pa'i bla ma la/_rim gro dag ni rab bya ste/_/snying po med pa'i lus las su/_/snying po dag ni 
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]blang bar 'gyur/_/shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa dang po 'di bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su tshol bas slob dpon la rim gro dang /_bsnyen bkur byed de/_tha na chu rdza gang tsam yang 'bul lo/_/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub 
[\[64b.2\]]sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/_kye ma'o lus 'di ni snying po med pa ste/_rtag tu dril ba dang /_bkru ba dang /_mnye ba dang /_'jig pa dang /_'gyes pa dang /_'bral ba'i chos can no/_/shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/_dper na ji tsam du rdza mkhan gyis bum pa chung tshad dang /_che 
[\[64b.3\]]tshad byas pa thams cad kyang mthar 'jig go_/de bzhin du kye ma'o lus 'di yang snying po med pa so ma btang ba'i snod bzhin te/_mthar 'jig pa'o_/shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/_dper na shing gi yal ga'i 'dab ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu ji snyed pa de thams cad kyang mthar ltung 
[\[64b.4\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin du kye ma'o lus 'di ni snying po med de/_'bras bu smin pa bzhin du ltung ba'i chos can no/_/shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/_dper na rtswa'i rtse mo'i zil[(]pa'i [,]ba'i [)]thigs pa ji snyed pa de thams cad kyang nyi mas phog na ring por mi gnas so/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin du kye ma'o lus 
[\[64b.5\]]'di ni snying po med pa ste/_zil pa'i thigs pa bzhin du ring por mi gnas pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/_dper na rgya mtsho chen po dang /_'bab chu dang /_'bab chu'i rgyun la dbu ba rdos pa yod pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang snying po med de rang bzhin gyis nyam chung ba'o/_/shA 
[\[64b.6\]]ri'i bu de bzhin du kye ma'o lus 'di ni snying po med pa ste/_dbu ba rdos pa ltar rang bzhin gyis nyam chung ba'o/_/sha ri'i bu 'di lta ste/_dper na char bab pa'i chu'i chu bur gzhan skye zhing gzhan 'gag go_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin du kye ma'o lus 'di ni snying po med pa ste/_chu'i chu bur ltar rang 
[\[64b.7\]]bzhin gyis nyam chung ba'o/_/de ltar snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blang ngo snyam du sems bskyed pa gnyis pa de bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su tshol bas slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher rab tu bstan pa'i phyir/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/ji ltar rdza ma'i mkhan po yis/_/sa[(]la [,]las [)]snod rnams byas pa dag_/de dag thams cad mthar 'jig ste/_/sems can srog kyang de dang 'dra/_/ji ltar shing 
[\[65a.2\]]gi yal ga yi/_/lo ma me tog 'bras bu rnams/_/thams cad ltung ba'i chos can te/_/mi yi srog kyang de bzhin no/_/rtswa mchog dag gi zil pa'i thigs/_/nyi mas yongs su bab pa na/_yid tsam gyis ni med 'gyur te/_/mi yi srog kyang de bzhin no/_/ji ltar 'bab chu'i rgyun 
[\[65a.3\]]rnams kyi/_/dbu ba rdos pa nyam chung ltar/_/de ltar lus ni nyam chung ste/_/snying po med pa dbu ba 'dra/_/ji ltar char pa bab pa yi/_/chu yi chu bur skyes pa yang /_/skad cig gis ni de 'jig 'gyur/_/de bzhin lus kyang snying po med/_/snying po ma yin snying por shes/_/snying po snying 
[\[65a.4\]]po ma yin 'dzin/_/de dag log rtog spyod yul te/_/snying po khong du chud ma yin/_/snying po med la snying med pa/_/snying po snying por shes pa ni/_/de dag yang dag rtog pa'i yul/_/snying po khong du chud pa yin/_/snying po 'du shes byas gyur te/_/rdza gang tsam gyi chu 'bul ba/_/snying 
[\[65a.5\]]po med pa'i lus las ni/_/snying po dag ni len par 'gyur/_/shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa gnyis pa 'di bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su tshol bas slob dpon la rim gro dang /_bsnyen bkur byed de/_tha na chu phor gang tsam yang 
[\[65a.6\]]'bul lo/_/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/_bdag yun ring por dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi dbang du song ste/_le lo can/_brtson 'grus nyams pa/_snyom las can/_blun pa/_log par lta ba ste/_
[\[65a.7\]]mchod sbyin yang med/_sbyin sreg kyang med/_legs byas dang /_nyes byas kyi las rnams byas pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa bsags pa yang med par lta ba dang /_'dod pa'i zil gyis non te/_bdag gis mi dge ba'i las mang po mngon par 'dus byas te/_mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par 
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]smin pa des 'di lta ste/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul du sbyin gnas thams cad gsob ma yin pa 'jigs su rung ba'i lus thob ste/_'di lta bu'i sbyin gnas mnyes par ma byas pas de ni bdag [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su gyur te/_lo mang po/_lo stong phrag mang po/_lo brgya stong phrag mang por me ma mur za 
[\[65b.2\]]zhing chu'i sgra yang mi thos na/_lus kyi lta ga la zhig reg ste/_bdag gis ni da ltar mnyes par byas pas bdag dge ba'i lus thob kyis sbyin gnas thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho bar bya zhing /_lus dang srog la mi lta bar byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su 
[\[65b.3\]]btsal ba'i phyir slob dpon la rim gro bya'o snyam du sems bskyed pa gsum pa 'di dag bskyed nas/_byang chub sems dpa' slob dpon la rim gro dang /_bsnyen bkur byed de/_tha na chu rdza gang tsam yang 'bul lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/
[\[65b.4\]]ji ltar grogs po bsten pa dang /_/ji ltar nye bar bsten pa ltar/_/de dag yang dang yang bsnyen pas/_/de yang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur/_/sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang song nas/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnam par spangs/_/le lo che zhing brtson 'grus nyams/_/g.yo dang phrag dog 
[\[65b.5\]]ser sna can/_/byis pa yod par gang lta ba/_/thams cad du ni rnam spangs pas/_/bdag ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]skye gnas su/_/'jigs su rung ba'i lus thob bo/_/yun ring dus su 'khor ba yi/_/mun nag phung po 'jigs pa na/_bkres pa dang ni skom pas gzir/_/sdug bsngal mang 
[\[65b.6\]]po rjes su myong /_/sbyin gnas rnams ni ma mthong zhing /_/bdag gis 'di 'dra dal ma thob/_/lo ni mang po stong rnams su/_/chu yi sgra yang yong ma thos/_/da ltar bdag gis 'jig rten na/_/shin tu dkon pa rab rnyed de/_/bdag gis slob dpon mnyes byas pas/_/dal ba 
[\[65b.7\]]'byor pa bdag gis thob/_/sdig pa'i grogs po rnam spangs pas/_/bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed/_/byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir/_/lus dang srog la mi blta'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub phyir/_/slob dpon bla ma mchod gnas la/_/rnam par dad pa'i sems kyis su/_/
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]bsti stang gus par rab tu bya/_/shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa gsum pa 'di bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su tshol bas slob dpon la rim gro dang /_bsnyen bkur byed de/_tha na chu phor gang tsam yang 'bul lo/_/
[\[66a.2\]]gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/_bdag yun ring por dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing sdig pa'i grogs pos zin pas le lo can/_brtson 'grus nyams pa/_snyom las can/_blun pas sems can la khu tshur dang /_thal mos brdegs 
[\[66a.3\]]shing gtses nas bsdus shing cho nge bton te/_de'i gzhi las sdig pa yang med/_de'i gzhi las sdig pa 'byung ba yang med do/_/zhes de ltar lta ba dang /_de ltar bzod pa dang /_de ltar mos shing zhe sdang gi zil gyis non pas mi dge ba'i las rnams mngon par 'dus byas te/_mi dge 
[\[66a.4\]]ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa des 'di lta ste dud 'gro'i skye gnas su/_sbyin gnas thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba ma yin pa/_'jigs su rung ba'i lus thob ste/_'di lta bu'i sbyin gnas mgu bar ma byas pas/_des na bdag rnga mo dang /_ba lang dang /_bong bur gyur te/_rtswa za zhing dbyig 
[\[66a.5\]]pas bsdigs/_'jigs pas bsdigs nas/_mi 'dod bzhin du khal bkal to/_/bdag gis ni da ltar mnyes par byas te/_dge ba'i lus thob kyis lus dang srog la mi blta bar slob dpon la ni rim gro dang /_bsnyen bkur bya'o zhes/_shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa bzhi pa de bskyed 
[\[66a.6\]]nas byang chub sems dpa' slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed de/_tha na chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'bul lo/_/'di'i chos nyid ni 'di yin te/_de la 'di skad ces bya'o/_/yun ring por ni 'phags pa'i lam/_/ma rig par ni gnas pas na/_/rnga mo dag dang bong bur gyur/_/
[\[66a.7\]]sdug bsngal mang po rjes su myong /_/mir gyur pa yang bdag gis rnyed/_/gang gis byang chub reg 'gyur ba'i/_/bzang po yi ni las bya ste/_/de ni mkhas pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/sangs rgyas chos la rab gnas shing /_/gus pa dang ni ldan par bya/_/byang chub phyir ni slob dpon la/_/
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]rim gro dang ni bsti stang bya/_/'das pa'i dus kyi bskal pa bsam med nas/_/'khor ba'i 'khor lor yongs su 'khyams pa na/_/skye mched dag ni don med 'das gyur te/_/sbyin gnas dag ni nye bar 'tsho ba min/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su spangs gyur nas/_/rtag tu 
[\[66b.2\]]sdig pa'i grogs po rab bsten te/_/de dag gis ni bstan pa'i rjes 'jug cing /_/rgyun mi 'chad par ngan song sa la gnas/_/gtse ba dang ni bcing zhing brdeg pa rnams/_/byed du bcug cing gzhan la spyos byas nas/_/de yi 'bras bu ngan song skye gnas 'gro/_/sdig pa'i 
[\[66b.3\]]las kyis sdug bsngal rjes su myong /_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni ma bsten pas/_/rnga mo ba lang de bzhin bong bu yi/_/ngan pa'i mtshams kyi skye mched bzung gyur nas/_/dbyug pa dag gis brdegs shing khal kyang bkal/_/mir 'gyur ba ni shin tu rnyed dka' dang /_/
[\[66b.4\]]'thun pa'i yul dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed/_/shin tu yun ring dal ba rnyed gyur te/_/dka' ba'i las kyi bu gar chud pa bzhin/_/lus dang ngag ni shin tu bsdams gyur nas/_/zhen pa med pa'i sems kyis brtson 'grus brtsams/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag la 
[\[66b.5\]]g.yo med pas/_/bdag gi lus ni nye bar 'tsho bar bya/_/bdag gi slob dpon bla ma gang dag dang /_/gang dag bdag gi byang chub sems bskyed pa/_/byang chub dam pa mchog gi lam ston la/_/ston pa bzhin du dga' bas bsnyen bkur bya/_/rnam pa sna tshogs dag gi byug pa 
[\[66b.6\]]dang /_/dri dang phye ma rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_/gos dang me tog dag gi chun po yis/_/rkang gnyis dam pa la ni mchod par bya/_/phyogs bcu dag na sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa/_/sems can don la brtson zhing don dam gzigs/_/gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od mdzes pa/_/
[\[66b.7\]]kha dog mtha' yas pa la mchod par bya/_/sangs rgyas mi yi kha lo sgyur rnams la/_/'jig rten spyod dang mchod pa cher byas pas/_/gang gis byang chub snying por bdag 'gro ba'i/_/byang chub lam ni shin tu sbyangs par 'gyur/_/shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa bzhi pa 'di bskyed nas/_/
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su tshol bas slob dpon la rim gro dang /_bsnyen bkur byed de/_tha na chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'dul lo/_/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/_
[\[67a.2\]]bdag yun ring por dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing sdig pa'i grogs pos zin pa/_le lo can/_brtson 'grus nyams pa/_snyom las can/_blun pas/_'di lta bu'i lta ba dang /_'di lta bu'i 'dod pas sems can thams cad dang /_srog chags thams cad kyi sha gcig tu 
[\[67a.3\]]spungs shing sha gcig tu bcer te/_bsod nams ma yin pa'i las byed kyang /_de'i gzhi las sdig pa med/_de'i gzhi las sdig pa'i rnam pa med do/_/rgya mtsho'i tshu rol gyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad sbyin pas tshim par byas kyang /_de'i gzhi las bsod nams med/_
[\[67a.4\]]de'i gzhi las bsod nams kyi rnam pa med do/_/rgya mtsho'i pha rol gyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bsad cing gtub kyang de'i gzhi las sdig pa med/_de'i gzhi las sdig pa'i rnam pa med do snyam pas de ltar byas kyang bsod nams dang sdig pa yongs su shes par ma nus te/_
[\[67a.5\]]sdig pa'i lta ba bsnyen pa dang /_gti mug gi zil gyis non pas bdag gis sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mang po mngon par 'dus byas te/_mi dge ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas 'di lta ste/_sems can dmyal bar dman pa 'jigs su rung ba'i lus thob ste/_de la 'di lta bu'i sbyin 
[\[67a.6\]]gnas mnyes par ma byas pas des na bdag ni sems can dmyal ba par gyur pas lcags kyi thu lum bsregs pa za zhing gcig tu sdug bsngal ba rtsub pa/_mi bzad pa/_'tshogs pa/_'chi ba'i mthar khrid pa myong zhing lo stong phrag mang po'i bar du bde ba'i sgra yang mi thos na/_lus 
[\[67a.7\]]kyis lta ga la zhig reg ste/_bdag gis ni da ltar mnyes par byas pas/_dge ba'i lus thob kyis/_sbyin gnas rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho bar bya zhing lus dang srog la mi lta bar slob dpon la rim gro dang /_bsnyen bkur bya'o zhes/_shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa lnga pa de bskyed nas byang 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su tshol bas slob dpon la rim gro dang /_bsnyen bkur byed de/_tha na chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'bul lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/sdig pa'i 
[\[67b.2\]]grogs po bsnyen pa dang /_/sdig pa'i sems kyis bslus pas na/_/sdig par lta la bsten gyur te/_/bdag gis sdig pa'i las byas so/_/rgya mtsho yi ni tshu rol na/_/sems can gnas pa ji snyed pa/_/zas dang skom gyis tshim byas kyang /_/bsod nams dag gi 'byung 
[\[67b.3\]]gnas med/_/rgya mtsho yi ni pha rol na/_/sems can gnas pa ji snyed pa/_/thams cad bsad cing bcom gyur kyang /_/sdig pa'i 'byung gnas med do zhes/_/sdig par lta ba 'di lta bu/_/yang dang yang du bsten pas na/_/gcig tu mi bzad ma rungs pa'i/_/sems can 
[\[67b.4\]]dmyal bar ring du dengs/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi/_/yongs su 'dren pa ma mthong bas/_/bdag gi lus ni stong rnams kyang /_/ngan 'gro dag ni gsum du dengs/_/'di ni 'jig rten dge ba ste/_/de yi sgra ni thos gyur nas/_/bdag gis mi yi dngos thob kyis/_/
[\[67b.5\]]bzang po yi ni las bya'o/_/mir 'gyur ba ni dka' ba ste/_/mi srog thob pa'ang dka' ba yin/_/dam pa'i chos thos dka' ba ste/_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba'ang dka' ba yin/_/bdag gis mir skye dka' ba yi/_/tshe thob pa ni g.yo zhing 'gyur/_/bdag gis sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang /_/
[\[67b.6\]]rgyal ba kun mkhyen bstan pa rnyed/_/lus kyi las dang ngag gi las/_/yid kyi las kyang sdig pa can/_/mi 'dod mi zad 'bras bur 'gyur/_/phyin cad spyad par mi bya'o/_/bsam pa rnam par dag pa yi/_/lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis/_/'jig rten rab tu dka' spyod pa/_/
[\[67b.7\]]bzang po dag gi las bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub phyir/_/bdag gi bla mar gang grags pa'i/_/bka' las 'da' bar mi bya ste/_/bsnyen bkur dag ni rab tu bya/_/lam ni drang po zhes bya ba/_/g.yo med pas ni rab bstan te/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub phyir/_/sgyu mar 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]'gyur bar mi bya'o/_/thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yi/_/byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa/_/de lta bur ni sems bskyed nas/_/snod gang tsam gyi chu yang 'bul/_/shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa lnga pa 'di bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems 
[\[68a.2\]]dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su tshol bas slob dpon la rim gro dang /_bsnyen bkur byed de/_tha na chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'bul lo/_/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/_bdag yun ring por dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral 
[\[68a.3\]]zhing sdig pa'i grogs pos zin pas/_'dud pa dang /_rab tu 'dud pa dang /_gus par smra ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_ldang ba dang /_thal mo sbyar ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa med do/_/zhes de ltar mos pa'i bar gyis nga rgyal gyi zil gyis non pas sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mang po 
[\[68a.4\]]mngon par 'dus byas te/_mi dge ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/_'di lta ste/_mi'i nang du sbyin gnas thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba ma yin pa smad pa'i lus thob ste/_'di lta bu'i sbyin gnas mnyes par ma byas pas na der bdag mir gyur pa na/_mi bkren pa dang /_mi dbul po dang /_bran 
[\[68a.5\]]du gyur pa dang /_gzhan gyi dbang du song ba dang /_'dod pa la zhen pa'i sems can rnams dang /_'dod pa la chags pa rnams dang /_mi rigs pa'i spyod pa la gnas pa rnams dang /_log par lta ba rnams dang /_tshul khrims log par zhugs pa rnams dang /_lta ba log par zhugs pa 
[\[68a.6\]]rnams dang /_mi dge ba'i rtsa ba gsum la rab tu gnas pa rnams dang /_'gro bar bya ba ma yin pa'i 'gro ba bzhi la 'gro bar zhugs pa rnams dang /_sgrib pa lngas bsgribs pa rnams dang /_bla ma drug la gus par mi gnas pa rnams dang /_dam pa'i chos ma yin pa bdun la 'jug 
[\[68a.7\]]pa rnams dang /_log pa brgyad la log par nges pa rnams dang /_gnod pa dgu'i dngos pos gnod par gyur pa rnams dang /_mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la lam ngan par zhugs pa rnams dang /_sems can dmyal ba'i lam la mngon par phyogs pa rnams dang /_mtho ris kyi lam 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]la ma phyogs pa rnams dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral ba rnams dang /_sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu song ba rnams dang /_bdud kyi dbang du song ba rnams dang /_dge ba'i chos yongs su spangs pa rnams dang /_mi dge ba'i chos la spyod pa rnams kyi dbyug pas bsdigs/_
[\[68b.2\]]'jigs pas bsdigs nas mi 'dod bzhin du byed cing rim gro dang /_bsnyen bkur byed par gyur te/_bdag gis ni da ltar de dag mnyes par byas pas dge ba'i lus thob kyis sbyin gnas thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar bya'o/_/lus dang srog la mi lta bar slob dpon la rim gro dang /_bsnyen bkur 
[\[68b.3\]]bya'o zhes/_shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa drug pa de bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa' slob dpon la rim gro dang /_bsnyen bkur byed de/_tha na chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'bul lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher rab tu rtog tu gzhug pa'i phyir/_de'i tshe tshigs su 
[\[68b.4\]]bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/sdig pa'i grogs ni nga rgyal rgyags 'phel ba/_/bskul pa mang po rgya mtshor bsten pas na/_/mi yi nang du skyes kyang bran du 'gyur/_/'khor ba'i rgyun tu yun ring dus su 'khor/_/mi lus rab tu rnyed par dka' ba yang /_/de ni bdag gis dka' bas thob 
[\[68b.5\]]gyur te/_/gnas pa'i yul ni 'thun pa bzang po dang /_/sangs rgyas 'byung dang dal 'byor de bzhin no/_/grogs po gang dag mchog tu rab bzang ba/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod dang lam ston cing /_/byang chub sems ni rin chen 'phel byed pa/_/de dag bskal pa bye ba mang pos 
[\[68b.6\]]rnyed/_/lus ni nyam chung mi rtag mi brtan te/_/dbu ba rdos dang chu yi chu bur 'dra/_/sgyu ma lta bu gar la lta dang mtshungs/_/rmi lam mthong dang 'drid par smra ba bzhin/_/srog ni yun thung tshe yang zad par 'gyur/_/ji ltar sprin dang glog ni mi gnas ltar/_/skad cig tu ni de bzhin 
[\[68b.7\]]srog kyang 'gyur/_/snying po med las snying po len par byed/_/gang gis 'das pa'i dus kyi bskal pa yang /_/rgya mtsho brgya phrag bsam yas bslus gyur pa/_/nga rgyal ri bo man dar gzhom pa yi/_/dus dang tshod dang man ni nyer gnas kyis/_/lus la sdug pa thams cad rab spangs nas//
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]srog la chags pa med pa'i yid kyis ni/_/nga dang rgyags dang dregs pa spangs gyur nas/_/yon tan ldan la gus bcas rim gro bya/_/nga dang rgyags dang dregs pa spangs gyur nas/_/pha dang ma dang bu pho rnams dang ni/_/'jig rten bla ma mchog tu gang grags la/_/gus 
[\[69a.2\]]dang bcas shing mchog gi rim gro bya/_/byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mchog zhugs pa/_/gang dag bdag dang byang chub 'thun spyod la/_/dga' dang gus pa brtan pa bskyed bya ste/_rim gro bya ba'i phyir ni brtson par bya/_/skye dgu nga rgyal ldan pa nga rgyal spangs/_/mi mkhas nga 
[\[69a.3\]]rgyal gcad cing gdul ba'i phyir/_/ye shes rdo rje dag gis bcom byas nas/_/rgyags dang nga rgyal ri ni bsnyil bar bya/_/byang chub spyod pa yongs su rdzogs byas te/_/byang chub snying po mchog la gnas gyur nas/_/bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rtsod pa rnams btul te/_/chu bo bzhi las srog chags 
[\[69a.4\]]bsgral bar bya/_/phyogs bcu dag na mi gang na ba rnams/_/rang gi mi gtsang bar lhung smad pa la/_/byams pa dang ni snying rje'i yid kyis su/_/mgon dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen 'gyur bar bya/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa'i dus la bab/_/sangs rgyas yon tan bslab pa bslab nus 
[\[69a.5\]]shes/_/bzod pa bsgom par bya ba phun sum tshogs/_/mdud pa med pa'i brtson 'grus brtsom par bya/_/bsam gtan pha rol phyin thob phun sum tshogs/_/sems gdul ba yi dus ni nye bar gnas/_/thabs dang shes rab mkhas la gnas gyur te/_/bla ma thams cad la ni bskor 
[\[69a.6\]]ba bya/_/de ltar bsod nams stobs dang gzi brjid spel/_/shes rab ye shes mkhas pa bsam mi khyab/_rang dbang dam pa dag gis mngon 'phags te/_/byur bur yongs su bkang ba'i snod byin no/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa drug pa 'di bskyed nas byang 
[\[69a.7\]]chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod yongs su tshol bas slob dpon la rim gro dang /_bsnyen bkur byed de/_tha na chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'bul lo/_/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/_bdag yun ring por dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]zhing sdig pa'i grogs po dang phrad pas le lo can/_brtson 'grus nyams pa/_snyom las can/_blun pa/_lkug par gyur te/_las nag po dang /_nag po'i rnam par smin pa'ang med/_las dkar po dang /_dkar po'i rnam par smin pa'ang med/_las dkar gnag dang /_dkar 
[\[69b.2\]]gnag gi rnam par smin pa'ang med/_mi gnag cing dkar ba'i las dang /_mi gnag cing dkar ba'i rnam par smin pa yang med do/_/zhes de ltar lta/_de ltar bzod/_de ltar mos pas/_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze la/_btsun pa dag dge ba gang /_mi dge ba gang /_kha na ma tho ba 
[\[69b.3\]]dang bcas pa gang /_kha na ma tho ba med pa gang /_bsten par bya ba gang /_bsten par mi bya ba gang /_bya ba'i rigs pa gang /_bya ba'i mi rigs pa gang /_ci byas na yun ring por gnod pa dang /_mi phan pa dang /_sdug bsngal bar 'gyur/_ci byas na don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde 
[\[69b.4\]]bar 'gyur/_zhes mi 'dri ba dang /_nga rgyal gyi zil gyis non pas sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'dus byas te/_mi dge ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas 'di lta ste/_sbyin gnas thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba ma yin pa/_dbang po ma tshang ba'i mir gyur nas 'di lta bu'i sbyin gnas mnyes par 
[\[69b.5\]]ma byas pas/_bdag mir gyur pa na yang long ba/_lkug pa/_blun pa/_rgur ba/_dig pa/_rmongs pa/_'on par gyur te/_legs par bshad pa dang /_nyes par bshad pa'i don shes par mi nus so/_/bdag gis ni da ltar ma nyes par byas pas 'di lta ste/_dbang po tshang ba dge ba'i lus thob 
[\[69b.6\]]kyis/_sbyin gnas thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho bar bya/_lus dang srog la mi blta bar bya/_legs par bshad pa dang /_nyes par bshad pa'i don kun shes pa'i mthu yod par bya/_slob dpon la btsun pa dge ba gang /_mi dge ba gang /_kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang /_kha na ma tho ba med 
[\[69b.7\]]pa gang /_bsten pa gang /_mi bsten pa gang /_bya ba gang /_mi bya ba gang /_ci byas na nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos mngon du 'gyur/_ci byas na byang chub sems dpa'i chos mngon du 'gyur zhes 'dri zhing byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi don gyi phyir slob dpon la 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]rim gro dang /_bsnyen bkur byed de/_'di ltar snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blang ngo snyam nas/_tha na chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'bul lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs te/_bde bar gshegs pas de skad bka' stsal nas/_ston pa yang 'di skad 
[\[70a.2\]]gsung ngo /_/phan pa 'dod phyir bskal pa brgya mang por/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su spangs gyur nas/_/dge dang mi dge kha na ma tho dang /_/kha na ma tho med byas 'bras mi 'dri/_/lhag pa'i nga rgyal dbang du song ba ni/_/sems dmyal dud 'gro gshin rje'i dbang du song /_/sdig 
[\[70a.3\]]sems grogs po bsten par byas pas na/_/bskal pa brgya mang gis ni ngan 'gror 'phos/_/mi yi 'jig rten dbang po ma tshang gyur/_/bskal pa stong phrag mang por 'khyams pa'i lus/_/dge dang mi dge kha na ma tho dang /_/kha na ma tho med byas 'bras mi shes/_/ru sbal mgrin 
[\[70a.4\]]pa shing mig chud 'dra bar/_/mi yi lus ni shin tu dka' bar thob/_/dbang po dag ni tshang zhing skye mched dge/_/mi dal yongs su spangs nas dal ba rnyed/_/'jig rten sgron ma mdzad pa mnyes byas nas/_/rgyal bas bstan chos 'dod chags bral ba thob/_/dge dang mi dge bya ba'i 
[\[70a.5\]]'bras bu dag_/'jig rten gtso la bdag 'dri dus la bab/_/'gro bar ser sna'i mir 'gyur ji lta bu/_/ji ltar sbyin bdag ser sna med par 'gyur/_/ji ltar g.yo ngan brkam pa tshul khrims 'chal/_/tshul khrims nor kun srung ba ji lta bu/_/mi ni khro dang 'khrug par ji ltar 
[\[70a.6\]]'gyur/_/khro med bzod pa'i stobs su ji ltar 'gyur/_/ji ltar le lo can dang g.yeng yid 'gyur/_/brtson 'phags bsam gtan dga' ba ji lta bu/_/ji ltar 'chal pa'i shes rab blun lkug 'gyur/_/ji ltar shes rab ldan zhing bden gtam dga'/_/ji ltar byang chub spyod pa 
[\[70a.7\]]gcig sems pas/_/spyod pa bzang po thams cad tshol bar 'gyur/_/ji ltar 'gro ba kun la byams pa bgyid/_/ji ltar ngan song song ba'i sems can 'dren/_/ji ltar chos kyi dga' bas mi ngoms yid/_/byang chub spyod pa sde snod yongs su tshol/_/phyogs dang phyogs 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\](]'tshams [,]mtshams [)]rab [(]'byam [,]'byams [)]zhing rnams na/_/'jig rten bla ma bzhugs par ji ltar 'gro/_/phyag 'tshal bsod nams byed pa ji lta bu/_/kun tu bzang po spyod pa ci 'dra 'dri/_/slob dpon bla ma dag la bdag 'dri ba/_/de yi dus ni [{]di ring [,]de ring [}]nyer gnas te/_/bla ma'i gnas su gnas 
[\[70b.2\]]las nyan dga' ste/_/slob dpon yid mgu byed pa ji lta bu/_/sangs rgyas sras kyi sems ni bskyed gyur nas/_/stobs dang bsod nams yangs pa'i blo gros can/_/nges par mchog gi ye shes stobs ldan pas/_/dga' ba'i yid kyis snod gang chu yang 'bul/_/shA ri'i bu sems 
[\[70b.3\]]bskyed pa bdun pa 'di bskyed nas/_byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi don gyi phyir slob dpon la ni rim gro dang /_bsnyen bkur byed de/_tha na chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'bul lo/_/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/_bdag yun 
[\[70b.4\]]ring por dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing sdig pa'i grogs pos zin pas le lo can/_brtson 'grus nyams pa/_snyom las can/_lkug pas gsang tshig dang /_yi ge dang /_don dang /_tshig tu ldan pa dang /_chos dang tshig tu ldan pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa dang /_'dod 
[\[70b.5\]]chags dang bral ba dang ldan pa dang /_'gog pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa dang /_thams cad la bya ste/_de dag spangs nas don dang tshig tu mi ldan pa dang /_chos kyi tshig dang mi ldan pa nas/_mya ngan 
[\[70b.6\]]las 'das pa dang mi ldan pa'i bar gyi tshig dang /_yi ge de dag 'dzin pa dang /_len pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa ni 'di lta ste/_stobs med/_brtson 'grus med/_skyes bu'i stobs med/_skyes bu'i mthu med/_skyes bu'i brtul ba med/_spyod pa med/_rtul ba 
[\[70b.7\]]med/_/spyod pa la mthu med/_rgyu med/_rkyen med de/_sems can kun nas nyon mongs pa yang rgyu med rkyen med par sems can kun nas nyon mongs par gyur te/_rgyu med do/_/rkyen med do/_/sems can rnams rnam par dag pa yang rgyu med/_rkyen med par sems can rnam par dag go_/
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]zhes 'di ltar rgyu med par lta ba la gnas nas/_bdag gis mi dge ba'i las mang po mngon par 'dus byas te/_las de'i rnam par smin pas 'di lta ste/_mi'i nang du sbyin gnas thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba ma yin pa/_dbang po ma tshang pa'i mi'i lus thob ste/_de na 
[\[71a.2\]]bdag glen pa g.yeng ba/_dig pa lkugs pa/_rmongs pa/_blun pa/_long ba/_'on par gyur pas/_gang tshig dang /_yi ge dang /_don du ldan pa nas/_mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i bar du de dag 'dzin pa dang /_len pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa'i mthu med pas 'di lta bu'i sbyin 
[\[71a.3\]]gnas mnyes par ma byas so/_/bdag gis ni da ltar sbyin gnas mnyes par byas kyis/_lus dang srog la mi lta ba'i bar du byas te/_gang tshig dang /_yi ge dang /_don du ldan pa nas mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems 
[\[71a.4\]]dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid gzung ba nas/_kun chub par bya ba'i bar du nus kyis/_'o na da bdag gis brtson 'grus brtsams te/_'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid blang ba'i phyir lus kyis slob dpon la rim gro dang /_bsnyen 
[\[71a.5\]]bkur bya'o/_/'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kha ton dang /_bsnyen bkur byas te/_snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blangs par 'gyur/_bsod nams dang ye shes kyi stobs kyis nye bar brtan par byas par 'gyur te/_bsod nams dang /_ye shes kyi stobs des nye bar brtan 
[\[71a.6\]]pas byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod 'di dang nye bar 'gyur ro snyam nas ched du bsams te/_slob dpon la rim gro dang /_bsnyen bkur byed de/_tha na chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'bul lo/_/'di la de'i chos nyid ni 'di yin te/_de la 'di skad ces bya'o/_/chos gang don dang ldan 
[\[71a.7\]]pa dang /_/lam gyi yan lag lam sgom dang /_/'gog pa mngon du byed pa dang /_/mya ngan 'das lam snying po can/_/chos de dag ni yongs spangs nas/_/gang chos phan pa med pa dang /_/don dang tshig tu mi ldan pa/_/chos de dag ni bdag gis bsnyen/_/brtson 'grus dang ni 
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]stobs med de/_/skyes bu yi ni mthu yang med/_/shin tu rtul ba mchog rnams dang /_/de dag thams cad mi dmigs so/_/sangs rgyas dang ni chos kyang med/_/pha ma med pa de bzhin du/_/dkar po dang ni nag po'i las/_/rnam par smin pa kun med ces/_/'di 'dra'i 
[\[71b.2\]]sdig par lta ba dag_/yang dang yang du bsten pas na/_/gcig tu mi bzad ma rungs pa/_/sems can dmyal bar yun ring gnas/_/de bzhin dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten sdig can te/_/nam tshe'ang mir ni skyes gyur kyang /_/blun zhing lce ni med par 
[\[71b.3\]]'gyur/_/g.yeng ba dang ni 'on par 'gyur/_/dig pa lkugs pa rmongs par 'gyur/_/yun ring sems dmyal ma rungs par/_/mi shes pas ni rab tu ltung /_/dbang po thams cad phun tshogs shing /_/bdag gi lus 'di rab mdzes pa/_/yun ring dus na bdag gis thog_/
[\[71b.4\]]'di ni bdag brtson bya ba'i dus/_/chos gang don dang ldan pa dang /_/mya ngan 'da' ba'i grogs byed pa/_/byang chub lam dang byang chub la/_/bdag ni 'bad par bya ba'i dus/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ni/_/zab mo'i don dang ldan pa ste/_/bskal pa stong phrag bye bar yang /_/
[\[71b.5\]]de ni shin tu thos par dka'/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub phyir/_/sangs rgyas chos mang 'di dang ni/_/gzhan yang bsam gyis mi khyab la/_/rab tu 'jug cing gzung bar bya/_/slob dpon la ni gus bcas shing /_/bsnyen bkur dag ni byas pas na/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems 
[\[71b.6\]]dpa' rnams/_/thos pa de ni rnyed par 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa/_/thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yi/_/'di lta bur ni sems bskyed nas/_/rdza gang tsam gyi chu yang 'bul/_/shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa brgyad pa 'di bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub 
[\[71b.7\]]sems dpa'i sde snod kyi phyir slob dpon la rim gro dang /_bsnyen bkur byed de/_tha na chu rdza gang tsam yang 'bul lo/_/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/_kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni don med pas yongs su bskor ba/_lus dang srog la lta ba'o/_/
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]don gyis yongs su bskor ba ni lus dang srog la mi lta ba'o/_/don med pas yongs su bskor ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lus dang srog la lta'i/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la mi lta zhing nga yir 'dzin pa sngon du 'gro bas bdag sba ba dang /_dril ba dang /_mnye 
[\[72a.2\]]ba dang /_bkru ba dang /_brdzi bas yongs su bskor ba de ni don med pas yongs su bskor ba zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang don med pas yongs su bskor ba ni 'di lta ste/_lus dang srog la lta zhing nga yi ra 'dzin pa sngon du 'gro bas chung ma dang /_bu pho dang /_bu mo dang /_mdza' bo dang /_nye du 
[\[72a.3\]]dang /_snag gi gnyen mtshams sbed pa dang /_dril ba nas yo byad dang /_longs spyod thams cad kyi bar gyis yongs su bskor ba de ni don med pas yongs su bskor ba zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang nga yir 'dzin pa sngon du 'gro ba nas/_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_las byed pa'i mi sbed pa 
[\[72a.4\]]dang /_mngag pa dang /_kun tu srung ba de ni don med pas yongs su bskor ba zhes bya'o/_/de la don gyis yongs su bskor ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lus dang srog la mi lta'i/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la lta zhing byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba'i lus kyi las dang /_ngag gi las 
[\[72a.5\]]dang /_yid kyi las kyis yongs su bskor ba de ni don gyis yongs su bskor ba zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang don gyis yongs su bskor ba ni/_'di lta ste/_lus dang srog la mi lta'i/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la lta zhing byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub 
[\[72a.6\]]pa nas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub pa'i bar gyis yongs su bskor ba de ni don gyis yongs su bskor ba zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang don gyis yongs su bskor ba ni lus dang srog la mi lta'i/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la lta zhing byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba'i sbyin pa dang /_
[\[72a.7\]]snyan par smra ba dang /_don bya ba dang /_don 'thun pas sems can thams cad sdud pas yongs su bskor ba de ni don gyis yongs su bskor ba zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang don gyis yongs su bskor ba ni 'di lta ste/_lus dang srog la mi lta'i/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la lta zhing 
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam bsgom pas yongs su bskor ba de ni don gyis yongs su bskor ba zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang 
[\[72b.2\]]don gyis yongs su bskor ba ni 'di lta ste/_lus dang srog la mi lta'i/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la lta zhing /_byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba'i pha ma dang /_slob dpon la rim gro byed cing bla ma'i gnas la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_'dud pa dang /_rab tu 'dud pa dang /_
[\[72b.3\]]gus par smra ba dang /_phyag 'tshal ba dang /_ldang ba dang /_thal mo sbyor ba'i las kyis yongs su bskor ba de ni don gyis yongs su bskor ba zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang don gyis yongs su bskor ba ni 'di lta ste/_lus dang srog la mi lta'i/_byang chub phyogs kyi chos la lta 
[\[72b.4\]]zhing byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba'i dkon mchog gsum gyi zhal tu byas pas yongs su bskor ba'o/_/de ltar kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni don med pas yongs su bskor ba/_lus dang srog la lta ba'o/_/kye ma'o bdag ni don gyis yongs su bskor bas yongs su bskor gyi 
[\[72b.5\]]bdag da brtson 'grus brtsams la slob dpon la lus kyis rim gro dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ste/_de ltar na snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blangs pa dang /_bsod nams dang /_ye shes kyi stobs kyis nye bar brtan par byas par 'gyur te/_bsod nams dang ye shes kyi stobs des nye bar 
[\[72b.6\]]brtan pas byang chub kyi snying po dang nye bar 'gyur ro snyam pa de ni shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa dgu pa 'di bskyed nas slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed de/_tha na chu rdza gang tsam yang 'bul lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di 
[\[72b.7\]]dag gsungs so/_/byis pa so so'i skye bo kun/_/lus dang srog la lta ldan zhing /_/byang chub phyogs la mi lta ste/_/rnam pa sna tshogs las kyang byed/_/so so'i skye bo de dag ni/_/bdag gi don dang chung ma'i don/_/bu pho dang ni bu mo'i phyir/_/don med pa la chags par 'gyur/_/
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]bran dang las byed mngag pa dag_/mi mkhas pas ni kun tu mngags/_/rkang bzhi pa dag gso byed de/_/de dag don med chags par 'gyur/_/nor dang 'bru rnams rab sogs shing /_/sbyin pa mi byed mi spyod de/_/don med chags pa de dag ni/_/gter 
[\[73a.2\]]gyi srungs mar brjod pa yin/_/'di ni don med chags pa ste/_/so so'i skye bo de la chags/_/byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan ni/_/don la chags shing brtson par byed/_/lus dang srog la mi lta yi/_/byang chub phyogs la lta byed cing /_/rnam pa sna tshogs las byed pa/_/
[\[73a.3\]]don la yongs su chags shes bya/_/sbyin dang tshul khrims brtson 'grus bzod/_/bsam gtan shes rab de bzhin du/_/thabs dang rab tu ldan pa ni/_/don la yongs su chags zhes bya/_/pha dang ma la bsnyen bkur byed/_/bla ma rgan rabs rjes su bskyangs/_/dkon mchog 
[\[73a.4\]]gsum gyi zhal ta byed/_/don la yongs su chags zhes bya/_/chos kun yang dag bsdus pa yi/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod 'di/_/klog cing rab tu ston pa ni/_/don la yongs su chags zhes bya/_/don la chags pa de dag ni/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags 
[\[73a.5\]]pa ste/_/de la brtson dang ldan pa ni/_/rgyal sras 'jigs pa med pa'o/_/de lta bu yi sems bskyed nas/_/rab tu dad pa'i sems kyis ni/_/bla ma rnams la bsnyen bkur byed/_/snod gang tsam gyi chu yang 'bul/_/shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa dgu pa 'di bskyed nas byang chub 
[\[73a.6\]]sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi phyir slob dpon la rim gro dang /_bsnyen bkur byed de/_tha na chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'bul lo/_/gzhan yang sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i 'di ltar sems bskyed de/_kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni bka' blo mi bde ba ste/_
[\[73a.7\]]slob dpon gyi rjes su bstan pa dang mi 'thun par 'dzin pas de dag khong du mi chud do/_/ci khong du mi chud ce na 'di lta ste/_slob dpon gyi nor khong du mi chud do/_/slob dpon gyi nor gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dad pa'i nor dang /_tshul khrims kyi nor dang /_thos pa'i nor dang /_khrel yod 
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]pa'i nor dang /_ngo tsha shes pa'i nor dang /_gtong ba'i nor dang /_shes rab kyi nor te/_de dag ni slob dpon gyi nor zhes bya ste/_de dag khong du ma chud pas na rab tu dbul ba zhes bya'o/_/bdag ni bka' blo bde zhing slob dpon gyi rjes su bstan pa dang 'thun par bya'o/_/de ci'i 
[\[73b.2\]]phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' ni shin tu bka' blo bde ba ste/_slob dpon gyi rjes su bstan pa dang 'thun par 'dzin cing khong du chud par byed do/_/ci khong du chud ce na/_'di lta ste/_slob dpon gyi nor ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i slob dpon gyi nor gang zhe na/_'di 
[\[73b.3\]]lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs so/_/slob dpon gyis byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa thams cad du bka' blo bde bar rig nas byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs rgya cher ston to/_/rab tu ston to/_/rab tu 'chad do/_/rab tu 
[\[73b.4\]]gzhog go_/rnam par 'grel to/_/rnam par 'byed do/_/gsal por go bar byed do/_/yang dag par rab tu ston to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dbul ba yongs su chad pa khong du chud par 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_bla na med 
[\[73b.5\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo/_/de de ltar sems bskyed de bka' blo bde zhing slob dpon gyi bstan pa dang 'thun par 'dzin pa ni snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blangs par 'gyur ro snyam nas slob dpon la rim gro dang /_bsnyen bkur byed de/_tha na chu rdza gang tsam yang 
[\[73b.6\]]'bul lo/_/shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa bcu pa 'di bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod yongs su tshol bas slob dpon la bsnyen bkur dang /_rim gro byed de/_tha na chu rdza gang tsam yang 'bul lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs te/_bde 
[\[73b.7\]]bar gshegs pas de skad bka' stsal nas ston pa yang 'di skad gsung ngo /_/bka' blo mi bde sems can gang /_/mi drang sgyu dang g.yo ngan cing /_/bla ma rnams dang mi 'thun pa/_/tshig bzhin du ni byed mi 'gyur/_/bstan pa dang ni mi 'thun zhing /_/bka' blo mi bde shes gyur nas/_/
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]drang srong nor ni gang yin pa/_/de ni de la mi ston to/_/dad pa'i nor dang tshul khrims nor/_/khrel yod ngo tsha shes pa'i nor/_/thos pa'i nor dang gtong nor dang /_/shes rab nyid ni nor bdun pa/_/nor gyi rnam pa 'di dag ni/_/mi zad pa yi gter bdun te/_/
[\[74a.2\]]snod ma yin par rig nas ni/_/de ni de la mi ston to/_/sems can gang dag rnam pa kun/_/sangs rgyas chos kyi snod gyur cing /_/g.yo med tshig 'jam sgyu med la/_/bka' blo bde zhing rab 'thun pa/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub phyir/_/lus dang srog la mi lta bar/_/gus dang 
[\[74a.3\]]bcas pa'i chos 'dod cing /_/brtson 'grus rtsom pa bar tu sems/_/tshul 'di 'dzin par 'gyur ba yi/_/snod du rung bar rig gyur nas/_/chos kyi dbyings ni dbyer med pa/_/'dren pas yang dag rab tu ston/_/gang la byang chub gnas pa yi/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi snying po'i nor/_/
[\[74a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ni/_/rgyas par rab tu ston par byed/_/chos rnams thams cad bdag med de/_/mtshan med stong pa'i mtshan nyid can/_/srog kyang med cing 'gyur ba med/_/spros pa med de kun gzhi med/_/chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis/_/ma skyes shing 
[\[74a.5\]]ni mtshan nyid med/_/byung ba med cing grub pa med/_/mtshan ma med pas phye ba ste/_mi gang bka' blo bde zhing mi 'gal ba/_/bstan pa la ni rjes su 'thun 'dzin pa/_/de dag la yang rgyal ba rang byung rnams/_/thar sgo slobs zhes rang gi spyod yul ston/_/dad nor tshul khrims 
[\[74a.6\]]nor dang bral yod dang /_/ngo tsha shes dang thos gtong shes rab dang /_/de la nor 'di rnams ni kun 'ged cing /_/bdun po mi zad chos kyi mdzod kyang 'byed/_/mi 'ga' bka' blo bde zhing rjes su 'thun/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen snyam du rtag bsams nas/_/bla na med pa'i byang chub 
[\[74a.7\]]tshol ba'i phyir/_/bla ma dag la bdag gis rim gro bya/_/de lta bu yi sems ni bskyed byas la/_/snying rje dga' brgya cher rab bskyed de/_/kham snod dang ba'i chu yis bkang ba yang /_/skom pa dag la nye bar sbyin par bya/_/shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa bcu pa 'di bskyed nas byang chub 
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]sems dpa'i sde snod yongs su tshol bas slob dpon la lus kyis bsnyen bkur dang rim gro byed de/_tha na chu rdza gang tsam yang 'bul lo/_/de dge ba'i rtsa ba des chos bzhi thob par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_myur du dge ba'i chos la 'jug pa dang /_slob dpon gyi bsngags pa brjod 
[\[74b.2\]]par 'gyur ba dang /_nan tan gyis sgrub kyi log pa'i nan tan gyis ma yin pa dang /_chos kyi phyir sdug bsngal gyi gzhan du phyogs par mi 'gyur ba ste/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' mir gyur pa na chos bzhi po de dag thob par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang chos bzhi thob par 
[\[74b.3\]]'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_skye bo mang po'i rjes su bslabs nas dkar po'i chos la gnas pa dang /_sbas shing bzhag pa'i gnas skye bo mang po mgu ba dang /_rab tu dga' bar byed pa myur du 'thob pa dang /_sems dga' bzhin du nyin mtshan zad par 'gyur ba dang /_kun nas 
[\[74b.4\]]ldang ba med par 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bde 'gro mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ba ste/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag thob par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar gyur pa na chos bzhi po thob par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_lha'i 'khor gyi stan mchog rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /_lha'i 
[\[74b.5\]]'khor thams cad de'i gdong du lta zhing ci bshad pa de dag thos nas shes par bya'o snyam du sems par 'gyur ba dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_de bzhin du lha'i bu gzhan yang de'i drung du 'ong gis/_de lha'i bu gzhan gyi drung du the tshom yongs su 'dri zhing gcad pa'i phyir 'gro ba ma yin pa 
[\[74b.6\]]dang /_de'i longs spyod kyi phyir gzhal med khang chen por 'byung ba ste/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag thob par 'gyur te/_lhar gyur pa dang /_mir gyur pa na chos kyi sgo brgya stong phrag dpag tu med pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 
[\[74b.7\]]tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/de yi stan ni mthon por 'gyur/_/lha yis mngon par phyag byas nas/_/gang dag chos 'di 'chad pa la/_/lha rnams de la lta bar 'gyur/_/mkhas pa ser sna bral ba la/_/kun gyi bsti stang byas par 'gyur/_/brgya byin de gan 
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]'drir 'ong zhing /_/gzhal med khang yang yid 'ong bzang /_/lha yi 'jig rten gnas 'phos te/_/mi yi srid par 'ongs gyur nas/_/'khor los sgyur ba ser sna med/_/rgyal po rdzu 'phrul chen por 'gyur/_/mi yi 'jig rten 'phos nas kyang /_/lha yi 
[\[75a.2\]]nang du yang 'gro ste/_/bla ma dag la gus byas pas/_/nam yang sdug bsngal mi 'gyur ro/_/zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis su/_/bla ma dag la gus byas pas/_/gnas bzhi po ni de dag rnams/_/rgya cher rtag tu rnyed par 'gyur/_/dga' ba dang ni gus pa yis/_/snod 
[\[75a.3\]]gang tsam gyi chu byin na/_/lha dang mi dang klu rnams kyis/_/mchod pa dag tu 'os pa yin//_//bam po bcu pa/_de ltar gyur na gzhan yang chos bzhi 'thob par 'gyur te/_chos bzhi gang zhe na/_sngon gyi las mngon par 'dus byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang 
[\[75a.4\]]gis skyes pa rab tu shes pa dang /_de na dge ba'i chos rnams yongs su 'dri ba yang rab tu shes pa dang /_de nas shi 'phos nas gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de yang rab tu shes pa dang /_lha'i 'khor la chos kyi gtam yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs 
[\[75a.5\]]bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas nas lha'i 'jig rten nas 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur ba ste/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi 'thob par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_de 
[\[75a.6\]]lha'i gnas nas/_shi 'phos nas mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye ba dang /_de mir gyur na btsun par byed pa lnga 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_de rigs btsun par skye bar 'gyur ba dang /_gzugs btsun par 'gyur ba dang /_tshul khrims btsun par 'gyur 
[\[75a.7\]]ba dang /_de'i 'khor btsun par 'gyur ba dang /_de'i sems can btsun pa rnams la byams pa sgom par 'gyur ba ste/_shA ri'i bu btsun par byed pa'i chos lnga po de dag 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang mi phyed par byed pa'i chos lnga 'thob par 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]ste/_de'i mdza' bo mi phyed pa dang /_lus myur du 'jig par mi 'gyur ba dang /_de'i longs spyod yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang /_byang chub kyi sems dang 'bral bar mi nus pa dang /_chos kyi mu ge 'byung ba na de la chos kyi lo legs par 'gyur te/_shA ri'i bu 
[\[75b.2\]]mi phyed par byed pa'i chos lnga po de dag 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang ngo mtshar yongs su rdzogs pa'i chos lnga 'thob par 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gang snod stong pa gsog bzhag par gyur pa rnams su de'i lag pa gang du bcug pa de dag thams cad rin 
[\[75b.3\]]po ches yongs su gang bar 'gyur te/_ngo mtshar yongs su rdzogs pa dang po 'di 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de skom par gyur na yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu'i rdzing bu 'byung ste/_ngo mtshar yongs su rdzogs pa gnyis pa 'di 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang de'i lus la 
[\[75b.4\]]gzhan gyis gnod par bya bar mi 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_dug dang /_mtshon dang /_me dang /_chu dang /_mdangs 'phrog pa'i gnod sbyin gyis gtse ba med pa ste/_ngo mtshar yongs su rdzogs pa gsum pa 'di 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang mtshon gyi bskal pa bar ma byung ba 
[\[75b.5\]]'am/_nad kyi bskal pa bar ma byung ba'am/_mu ge'i bskal pa bar ma byung ba'am/_me'i bskal pa bar ma byung ba 'am/_chu'i bskal pa bar ma byung ba 'am/_rlung gi bskal pa bar ma byung ba'am/_skom pa'i bskal pa bar ma 'am/_kun du gdung ba'i bskal pa bar 
[\[75b.6\]]ma'am/_gnod sbyin gyi bskal pa bar ma byung ba na 'dzam bu'i gling du skye bar mi 'gyur gyi/_de lhar skye ste/_de bde ba dang /_mthu dang ldan par 'gyur zhing bde ba dang /_mthu mang bar 'gyur te/_ngo mtshar yongs su rdzogs pa bzhi po 'di 
[\[75b.7\]]'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis mi dal bar mi skye/_ngan 'gror mi skye/_sems la 'gyod pas kun tu dkri bar mi nus shing nges par 'byung ba myur du mthong bar 'gyur te/_ngo mtshar yongs su rdzogs pa lnga pa 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]'di 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i ngo mtshar yongs su rdzogs pa lnga po 'di dag 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis chos bzhi dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_byang chub 
[\[76a.2\]]sems dpa'i sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams mthong ma thag tu snying rje chen po 'thob pa dang /_de la de'i bu dang bu mo gus pa dang bcas shing zhes byed par 'gyur ba dang /_rga bas bcom yang brnyas par mi 'gyur ba dang /_de las kyi mtha' gang byed pa de dag kyang nyis 'gyur 
[\[76a.3\]]sum 'gyur du 'thob par 'gyur ba ste/_chos bzhi po de dag dang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang ldan pas chos gsum gyis mi 'phrogs te/_gsum gang zhe na/_chags pas mi 'phrogs pa dang /_
[\[76a.4\]]zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gis mi 'phrogs pa ste/_chos gsum po de dag gis mi 'phrogs so/_/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang ldan pas nad med par byed pa'i chos bzhi 'thob par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_nad rgyun ring po med pa 
[\[76a.5\]]dang /_yan lag skam par mi 'gyur ba dang /_longs spyod nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang /_rgyal po 'am/_rkun po'am/_de ma yin pa'i sems can 'tshe bar byed pa gzhan gyis sdug bsngal ba dang gnod par bya bar mi 'gyur te/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' nad med par 
[\[76a.6\]]byed pa'i chos bzhi po de dag 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang ldan pas bla ma'i gnas bzhi 'thob par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal zhing chos can chos kyi rgyal po 
[\[76a.7\]]rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/_de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di rnams yin no/_/'di lta ste/_'khor lo rin po che dang /_glang po rin po che dang /_rta rin po che dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_bud med rin po che dang /_khyim bdag rin po che dang /_blon po rin po che ste/_bdun po de 
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]dag go_/de'i bu dpa' ba/_rtul phod pa/_yan lag mchog gi gzugs can/_pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong tham par 'gyur ro/_/gling bzhi pa yang de'i rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur/_de la gus pa byed par 'gyur/_skar mkhan dang /_blon po chen po dang /_sgo 
[\[76b.2\]]ba dang /_'khor dang /_grong rdal gyi mi dang /_ljongs kyi mi dag dang /_khams kyi rgyal po thams cad kyis kyang gus par byed par 'gyur te/_bla ma'i gnas dang po 'di 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la chags par mi 'gyur 
[\[76b.3\]]te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mig gis shes par bya ba'i gzugs dang /_rna bas shes par bya ba'i sgra dang /_snas shes par bya ba'i dri dang /_lces shes par bya ba'i ro dang /_lus kyis shes par bya ba'i reg rnams te/_de ltar 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po la chags par mi 'gyur 
[\[76b.4\]]gyi/_dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/_myur du mngon par shes pa lnga 'thob par 'gyur zhing /_de la mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams gus par byed par 'gyur te/_bla ma'i gnas gnyis pa 'di rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang dang gang 
[\[76b.5\]]du skyes pa thams cad du blos mchog tu 'gyur/_shes rab kyis mchog tu 'gyur/_spobs pas mchog tu 'gyur/_de rgyal por grags par 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste/_'das pa'i dus na sman chen po zhes bya ba zhig byung ba de bzhin du de rgyal po'i pho brang gi stan mchog 'thob ste/_de la 
[\[76b.6\]]rgyal po dang /_gang de ma yin pa gzhan skar mkhan dang /_blon po chen po dang /_sgo ba dang /_'khor dang /_grong rdal gyi mi dang /_yul gyi mi rnams gus pa byed par 'gyur te/_bla ma'i gnas gsum pa 'di rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems 
[\[76b.7\]]dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi 
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]mchog tu 'gyur/_mngon par 'phags par 'gyur/_tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas mngon par 'phags par 'gyur/_tshul khrims rnam par 'phel bas mngon par 
[\[77a.2\]]'phags par 'gyur/_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba rnam par 'phel bas mngon par 'phags par 'gyur te/_bla ma'i gnas bzhi pa de 'thob par 'gyur te/_bla ma'i gnas bzhi po de dag 'thob par 'gyur 
[\[77a.3\]]ro/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpas 'di lta ste/_chos 'dod pa'i phyir mkhan po dang /_slob dpon la chu bum pa gang tsam phul na de lta bu'i yon tan gyi chos tshad med pa len par 'gyur ro/_/tshur shog ces byas na yang 'ong zhing ji ltar smras pa las 'gal bar mi byed pa'i dge 
[\[77a.4\]]ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis de yo byad bzhi thob par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_skye bo ma rabs kyi yo byad ma yin gyi rgyal po'i yo byad 'thob par 'gyur/_drang srong gi yo byad 'thob par 'gyur te/_'dod pa spong ba la 'dzud pa 'di lta ste/_dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ba 
[\[77a.5\]]de ni chos kyi yo byad ces bya'o/_/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gang dang gang du skyes pa na skye ba thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyur te/_de skye ba dran pas skye ba de dang de dag tu byang chub kyi sems brjed par mi 'gyur ba de ni dran pa'i yo byad ces bya'o/_/gzhan yang shA ri'i 
[\[77a.6\]]bu byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'khor bzhis bskor cing /_mdun du bdar bar 'gyur/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 
[\[77a.7\]]'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pas kun nas bskor cing mdun du bdar bar 'gyur te/_yo byad bzhi po de dag 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' slob dpon gang dang gang las tshig bzhi ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rnyed cing 'dzin par 'gyur te/_de 
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]tshur shog ces bsgo na yang de 'ong /_song shig ces bsgo na yang de 'gro ba dang /_'di ni dge ba/_'di ni mi dge ba/_'di ni kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa 'di ni kha na ma tho ba med pa/_'di ni bsten par bya ba/_'di ni bsten par bya ba ma yin pa zhes bya ba nas gong ma bzhin du sbyar te bya 
[\[77b.2\]]ba 'di ni gnod pa/_phan pa med pa/_sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro/_/'di byas na yun ring po'i don dang phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes ji ltar bsgo ba bzhin du mi dge ba mi byed cing dge ba la sten te/_slar mi zlog cing mi mthun par mi byed pa de dge ba'i rtsa ba de dang ldan 
[\[77b.3\]]pas mthon por byed pa'i chos bzhi 'thob par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_tshul khrims mthon por byed pa'i chos 'thob par 'gyur/_lus mthon por byed pa'i chos 'thob par 'gyur te/_de'i lus ring zhing lus thams cad rgyas par 'gyur/_shes rab che bar 'gyur te/_
[\[77b.4\]]shes rab mtho ba/_shes rab rgya che ba/_shes rab yangs pa/_shes rab mgyogs pa/_shes rab rno ba/_shes rab myur ba/_shes rab zab pa/_shes rab nges par rtogs par 'gyur/_lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur te/_mthon por byed 
[\[77b.5\]]pa'i chos bzhi po de dag 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid ldan pas bltar mi snang bar byed pa'i chos bzhi 'thob par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'doms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa 'thob ste/_'di ni bltar mi snang bar 
[\[77b.6\]]byed pa'i chos 'thob par 'gyur ba dang po'o/_/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' skyes nas pha dang ma dang /_gzhan nye du rnams dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_dri za dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_nam 
[\[77b.7\]]mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyis dang ba'i sems kyis kyang rung /_ma dang ba'i sems kyis kyang rung ste/_sems can gang gis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyi gtsug mthong bar mi nus te/_'di ni bltar mi snang bar 
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]byed pa'i chos 'thob par 'gyur ba gnyis pa'o/_/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang ldan pas skyes pa nas rgyas par byas te/_pha ma nas mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar gyis dang ba'i sems kyis kyang rung /_ma dang ba'i sems kyis kyang rung ste/_
[\[78a.2\]]gang gis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i kha'i byi dor byed mi nus te/_de kha'i byi dor bya'o snyam pa dang /_rkang pa gnyis la kha'i sgo 'byung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu skyes bu dam pa de dag 'di lta bu'i ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos dang ldan zhing skyes bu dam pa'i ngag mchog dang ldan par 'gyur 
[\[78a.3\]]te/_'di bltar mi snang bar byed pa'i chos gsum pa'o/_/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' skyes ma thag tu gzhan gyis ma gzung bar sa la 'dug nas phyogs bzhir rnam par lta ste/_de ye shes 'bar ba rnyed do/_/de 
[\[78a.4\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' des sngon g.yo med par thos pa btsal bas g.yo med pa'i mig thob ste/_byang chub sems dpa' g.yo med pa'i mig de dang ldan pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad lha'i mig 
[\[78a.5\]]rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas mthong ngo /_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' myur ba'i cha dang ldan pa'i ye shes chen po 'thob ste/_byang chub sems dpa' ye shes chen po de dang ldan pas sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum gyi sems kyi tshul rab tu shes so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di 
[\[78a.6\]]ltar byang chub sems dpa' des sngon don du gnyer bar byas/_yid la byas/_sems thams cad kyis bsam shing ri mor byas nas chos la sman du 'du shes pa dang /_rin po cher 'du shes pa dang /_dkon par 'du shes pa dang /_ji lta ba bzhin du 'du shes bskyed de thos pa yongs su bzung ngo /_/
[\[78a.7\]]de bas na byang chub sems dpa' myur du rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i ye shes rnyed do/_/rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i ye shes de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi tshul khrims la yongs su 'jal ba nas thos pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par 
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i bar la yongs su 'jal lo/_/tshul khrims kyi spyir yongs su 'jal ba nas/_thos pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i bar gyi spyir yongs su 'jal 
[\[78b.2\]]lo/_/sems can thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyu 'thun pa la yongs su 'jal ba nas/_thos pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i rgyu 'thun pa'i bar la yongs su 'jal lo/_/gang sems can 
[\[78b.3\]]thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyu 'thun pa las shin tu lhag par yongs su 'jal ba nas/_thos pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i rgyu 'thun pa las shin tu lhag pa'i bar la yongs su 'jal lo/_/
[\[78b.4\]]sems can thams cad kyi spyod lam dang /_spyod pa dang /_nan tan dang /_rtul ba la yongs su 'jal lo/_/sems can thams cad phan tshun btsal na gang sems can thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang thos pa nas/_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i bar dang /_sems can 
[\[78b.5\]]thams cad kyi spyi'i tshul khrims nas/_spyi'i thos pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i bar dang /_gang sems can thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyu 'thun pa las shin tu lhag pa nas/_thos pa dang /_
[\[78b.6\]]ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i bar gyi rgyu 'dra ba dang /_gang sems can thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyu 'thun pa las shin tu lhag pa nas/_thos pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par 
[\[78b.7\]]grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i rgyu 'thun pa las shin tu lhag pa'i bar dang /_gang sems can thams cad kyi spyod lam dang /_spyod pa dang /_rtul ba de dag thams cad dang /_bdag gis bsod nams dang bsgrun cing yongs su btsal na bdag dang mtshungs shing 
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]mnyam pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de yang sems can thams cad kyi rtsa ba la lhag par gnas pa yongs su tshol te/_des thams cad yongs su btsal na bdag dang mtshungs shing mnyam pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de ltar shA ri'i bu byang chub 
[\[79a.2\]]sems dpa' myur du de'i skad cig nyid la las kyi rnam par smin pas grub pa'i ye shes skye ste/_des se gol gtogs pa srid kyis sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rnam pa stong rab tu shes te/_des thams cad yongs su btsal na bdag dang mtshungs shing mnyam pa yang dag 
[\[79a.3\]]par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/bdag bla ma'i gnas la gnas par shes shing ma bzung bar seng ge dang /_glang po che'i 'gros lta bus sa la gom pa bdun bor te/_de byang chub kyi snying po gang na ba der las kyi rnam par smin pa mdun du byas nas gnas te/_bdag ni 'jig rten gyi gtso bo/_/
[\[79a.4\]]bdag ni 'jig rten gyi mchog ste/_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_/'chab mthar bya'o/_/sems can skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi bas gzir ba rnams thar bar bya'o/_/chos bzang po bstan par bya'o zhes smras te/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpas tshig de smras 
[\[79a.5\]]ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dbyangs kyis go bar byas par 'gyur/_sa g.yo bas 'jigs shing spu zing zhes byed pa yang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/lha'i rnga yang rgyun mi 'chad par rdung ngo /_/sa phyogs gang na byang chub sems dpa' gnas par 
[\[79a.6\]]'gyur ba'i sa phyogs der 'khor lo tsam zhig mi g.yo'o/_/chu'i phung po gang la gnas pa'i chu'i phung po de rlung gis bskyod par mi 'gyur ro/_/des thams cad du bltas na bdag snang bar gyur cing gnas par mthong ngo /_/de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs 
[\[79a.7\]]par sangs rgyas na de la sems can thams cad kyi blta bar mi nus so/_/'di ni bltar mi snang bar byed pa'i chos 'thob par byed pa bzhi pa ste/_shA ri'i bu bltar mi snang bar byed pa'i chos bzhi po de dag 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ji ltar slob dpon gyis tshur shog shig ces byas 
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]na yang 'ong /_song shig ces byas na yang 'gro ba'i phyir ro/_/de dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang ldan pas yang ba bzhi 'thob par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bstan pa mtshan nyid ma tshang ba med cing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[79b.2\]]rnams kyi chos bstan pa 'bras bu yod pa yang ba dang po 'di thob bo/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pas dge slong tshur shog ces gsung bar 'gyur te/_dge slong tshur shog ces byas na skra bregs par 'gyur/_ngur smrig gyon cing lhung bzed thogs par 
[\[79b.3\]]'gyur te/_yang ba gnyis pa 'di 'thob bo/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pas sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum gyi sems rab tu mkhyen te/_yang ba gsum pa 'di 'thob bo/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa sems can 
[\[79b.4\]]thams cad kyi sman ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen te/_yang ba bzhi pa 'di 'thob bo/_/de dag ni yang ba bzhi ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ltar de legs par zhugs pas slob dpon dang mkhan po la tha na chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'bul ba'i phyir ro/_/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems 
[\[79b.5\]]dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang ldan pas gzhan gyis mi tshugs pa'i chos bzhi 'thob par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la me dang /_mtshon dang /_dug gis tshugs pa ni gnas ma yin zhing skabs med pa dang /_pha rol gyi gnod pa byas pas 
[\[79b.6\]]'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas med do/_/pha rol gyis mi tshugs pa'i chos bzhi po de dag 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de yang pha rol gyis mi tshugs pa'i chos bzhi 'thob par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_shA ri'i bu sems can thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pas 
[\[79b.7\]]ma gsan pa'i chos tha na chos kyi tshig gcig tsam yang thos par byed nus pa gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/_de lta bu'i gnas med do/_/sems can thams cad kyis tha na sems bskyed pa gcig tsam yang mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems rnyed par 'gyur ba'i bar du de lta bu'i 
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]gnas med do/_/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni byams pa la gnas/_snying rje la gnas/_dga' ba gnas/_btang snyoms la gnas so/_/shA ri'i bu sems can thams cad 
[\[80a.2\]]kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus sam/_gzugs la mtshan mar 'dzin nus pa ni gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/_de lta bu'i gnas med do/_/gzhan gyis mi tshugs par byed pa'i chos bzhi po de dag 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu 'di lnga ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshad med 
[\[80a.3\]]par byed pa'i chos so/_/lnga gang zhe na/_shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims tshad med pa dang /_shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i thos pa tshad med pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i 
[\[80a.4\]]ye shes mthong ba tshad med pa ste/_shA ri'i bu lnga po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshad med par byed pa'i chos so/_/tshur shog ces byas na yang 'ong ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang ldan pas thogs pa med pa'i ye shes bzhi 'thob par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[80a.5\]]ldan 'das rnams 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma 
[\[80a.6\]]chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems mnyam par bsgrub pa ste/_sems mnyam par bsgrub pa des de bzhin gshegs pa'i dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /_yang dag pa'i ye shes dang ldan no/_/yang dag pa'i ye 
[\[80a.7\]]shes des gzhan la rag ma las/_gzhan gyi khar ma las par chos thams cad shes te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes de dang ldan pas rlung dang /_char rab tu mkhyen te/_rjes su 'thun pa zhes bya ba'i rlung ldang ste/_sems 
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]can ji snyed pas cung zad so sor rjes su myong bar 'gyur te/_rlung de'i 'phang du rgyang grags gsum mo/_/de'i steng gi bar snang la rlung sprin ces bya ba'i rlung ldang ste/_de'i 'phang du rgyang grags lnga'o/_de'i steng gi bar snang la 'dzoms pa zhes bya ba'i rlung ldang ste/_rlung de'i dkyil 'khor 
[\[80b.2\]]gyi 'phang du dpag tshad bcu'o/_/de'i steng gi bar snang la skye bral zhes bya ba'i rlung ldang ste/_rlung gi dkyil 'khor de'i 'phang du dpag tshad sum cu'o/_/de'i steng gi bar snang la de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i rlung ldang ste/_rlung gi dkyil 'khor de'i 'phang du dpag tshad bzhi bcu'o/_/
[\[80b.3\]]shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni shes rab la rton pa ste/_rlung gi dkyil 'khor bye ba stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad rab tu mkhyen to/_/de la tha ma'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor kun tu khyab ces bya ste/_gang la sa chen po gnas pa'i chu'i phung po 
[\[80b.4\]]'phang du dpag tshad stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad yod de/_sa chen po'i 'phang du yang dpag tshad stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad do/_/de ltar shA ri'i bu grangs dang /_bgrang ba bstan pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams te/_de na phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs
