[\[121b.3\]]rus sha med pa/_khrag gis 'bags pa blangs nas de srang gi sgo na gnas te/_kha chus gos pa de 'cha' ba las de nas rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dang /_bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu dang /_khyim bdag shing sA la chen po lta bu khyi ltogs pa de logs su 'ong ba khyi des 
[\[121b.4\]]rgyang ma nas 'ong ba mthong ba nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ni bdag gi kha zas ro zhim po 'di 'phrog pa zhig go snyam nas de shin tu zugs shing mig tshugs su lta la/_drang bsnyer te/_skad cher zugs na/_shA ri'i bu de ji snyam du sems/_skyes bu de keng rus sha med pa khrag gis 
[\[121b.5\]]'bags pa de 'dod pa yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de ma lags so/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyi de ci'i phyir shin tu zugs shing mig tshugs su lta la drang bsnyer te/_/_skad cher zugs/
[\[121b.6\]]gsol pa/_de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi zas ro zhim po 'di 'phrog pa zhig go snyam ste/_shin tu zugs shing mig tshugs su lta la drang bsnyer te/_skad cher zugs so/_/bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu de bzhin du gang khyim gyi ser sna la brtson pa/_bshang ba 
[\[121b.7\]]dang /_gci bas kun tu bskor ba la chags pa'i dge slong dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_'di lta bu'i dal ba phun sum tshogs pa rnyed nas des chud zos par byed pa de dag ni ngas khyi dang 'dra'o zhes brjod de/_de dag 'ba' zhig gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa 'di lta bu'i brjod 
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]pa'i gnas byed pa ma yin gyi/_yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi ye shes tshol ba de dag ni bdag gi sha yang yongs su gtong na gzhan gyi khyim la rtog cing bsnyen 
[\[122a.2\]]pa'i phyir phrag dog dang ser sna byed par mi 'gyur ba lta ci smos/_yang shA ri'i bu skyes bu gti mug de dag 'tsho ba'i phyir zang zing dang /_bran dang 'jig rten gyi zang zing lhur byed cing zas dang /_srog la lhur byed pa/_rtog cing bsnyen pa'i phyir gzhan gyi khyim la phrag dog dang /_ser sna 
[\[122a.3\]]skyed par 'gyur te/_shA ri'i bu de ltar brtson pa'i dge slong mthong na/_phrag dog dang /_ser sna skyed de bdag ni sngon chad 'dir shes na phyi ma 'di ga las 'ongs pa zhig_/'di ni sngon bdag dang 'thams pa yin na phyi ma 'di ga las 'ongs pa zhig ces zer zhing gal te de'i khyim bdag 
[\[122a.4\]]de dag gis lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dam bcas par gyur pa dang /_mal stan dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad khas blangs par gyur pa rnams sngon ni bdag dang dam bcas par gyur mod kyi phyis 'ongs nas sbyin par mi 'gyur grang snyam nas de de la 
[\[122a.5\]]nyes pa gsum skyed de/_gsum gang zhe na/_gnas la nyes pa skyed de/_gnas de nas 'gro'o snyam sems pa dang /_shes par bya ba ma yin pa shes shing /_shes par bya ba mi shes la/_gang cung zad sten pa yang mi brten pa dang /_de khyim pa la nyes pa bskyed pa ste/_de dge 
[\[122a.6\]]slong de gnas gsum rjod par byed do/_/gsum gang zhe na/_gnas kyi nyes pa brjod pa dang /_nyams mi dga' ba rjod cing khyim gtong bar byed pa dang /_mi bden pa'i gtam zer zhing skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa 'di dag g.yo byed do zhes yid rton pa'i sbyor bas dam bca' bar bya 
[\[122a.7\]]ba'i chos yang dag par rab tu ston pa ste/_shA ri'i bu de ltar na khyim la ser sna byed pa chos dkar po yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba'o/_/shA ri'i bu khyim la ser sna byed pa la gnas pa skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa de dag gis sdom pa dang /_sdom pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]dpa' yongs su btang bar 'gyur te/_sdom pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su slob par mi 'gyur ro//_//bam po bcu bzhi pa/_/shA ri'i bu de bas na rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar shes par bya ste/_shA ri'i bu sngon byung ba 
[\[122b.2\]]'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa/_yangs pa/_tshad med pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_rig 
[\[122b.3\]]pa dang /_zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de lo bye ba phrag dgu bcu'i bar du bzhugs so/_/de'i nyan thos kyang bye ba khrag 
[\[122b.4\]]khrig phrag dgu bcu'i nyan thos rnams kyi nyan thos 'dus pa chen po byung ste/_thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa/_nyon mongs pa med pa/_dbang dang ldan par gyur pa nas sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag gi bar du'o/_/yang de'i 
[\[122b.5\]]tshe khyim bdag rab tu rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba phyug cing nor che ba/_longs spyod che zhing longs spyod mang ba/_bdag dbang ba mang ba/_nor dang yo byad mang po dang ldan zhing 'gron bu dang /_gser dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_baidUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_
[\[122b.6\]]byi ru dang /_dngul dang /_sa le sbram mang po dang ldan pa/_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_las byed pa dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba mang zhing glang po che dang /_rta dang /_ra lug mang ba/_nor dang /_'bru dang /_mdzod dang /_bang ba mang po dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/_de'i khye'u de 
[\[122b.7\]]gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_kha dog bzang po rgyas pa'i mchog dang ldan pa sdom pa zhes bya ba dang /_sdom pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba gnyis byung ste/_de gnyis dus gzhan zhig na khang tog tu dong bar gyur to/_/shA ri'i bu de nas bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags pa de snga dro'i dus kyi tshe chos gos dang sham thabs mnabs/_lhung bzed bsnams te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis bskor cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du 
[\[123a.2\]]bdar nas bsod snyoms kyi phyir grong khyer der gshegs pa dang /_mdzes pa dga' bar 'gyur ba/_dbang po zhi ba/_yid zhi ba/_/mchog tu dul ba dang /_zhi gnas kyi mchog thob pa/_shin tu dul zhing zhi gnas thob pa/_dbang po dul cing sbas pa glang po ltar rab tu dul ba/_
[\[123a.3\]]mtsho ltar dang zhing rnyog pa med la gsal ba/_gser gyi mchod sdong lta bu/_sa le sbram gyi ri lta bu/_rin po ches yongs su gang ba'i mtsho lta bu/_lhas kun nas bskor ba'i brgya byin lta bu/_yid rab tu zhi ba'i tshangs pa lta bu'i bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[123a.4\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags mdzes shing dga' bar 'gyur ba de rgyang ma nas byon pa khye'u de gnyis kyis mthong ngo /_/shA ri'i bu de na gang sdom pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i gzhon nu des dang po nyid du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[123a.5\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags sngar mthong nas des nu bo de la smras pa/_sems can gyi rgyal po 'di lta bu mdzes pa nu bo khyod kyis sngon nam yang res 'ga' mthong ngam/_des phu bo la phu bo sems can gyi rgyal po mdzes pa 'di lta bu bdag gis sngon lan 
[\[123a.6\]]'ga' yang ma mthong ngo zhes de skad smras pa dang /_des nu bo nga ni 'di dang 'dra ba nyid du 'gyur bar bya'o zhes de skad smras so/_/shA ri'i bu de nas khye'u sdom pa la gnas pas khye'u sdom pa la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/sdom pa ji ltar mthong ba bzhin/_/de 'dra bar ni 
[\[123a.7\]]bdag bsgyur te/_/bdag ni de bas mang ba yi/_/dge slong dge 'dun bsdu bar bya/_/byang chub kyi ni lam gyi phyir/_zas dang skom ni mi bza'o/_/sdom pa 'di ni rgyal ba ste/_/bdag ni khyim 'dir dga' ba med/_/sems can kun gyi mchog 'di ni/_/skar mang dbus na zla 
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]ba bzhin/_/mthong nas dad par su mi 'gyur/_/khyim nas mi 'byung su zhig yod/_/shA ri'i bu de nas khye'u sdom pas khye'u sdom pa la gnas pa la slar tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/tshig tu byas pas mi 'gyur gyis/_/sgra bo che ni ma 'byin cig_/nga ni tshig tu mi smra ste/_/'tshang rgya 
[\[123b.2\]]gang myur shes par bya/_/shA ri'i bu de nas khye'u sdom pa la gnas pas khye'u sdom pa la slar tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/bdag nyid ser sna sems pa dang /_/zhum pa dag gi lam min te/_/mi mchog sangs rgyas 'gyur ro zhes/_/bzang po'i sgra ni bdag gis 
[\[123b.3\]]bsgrag_/bdag nor shes par mi 'gyur ba/_/ser sna can gyi rtags yin no/_/bdag ni mi smra mi bya ste/_/bdag gtong nor lta ga la zhig_/khyim 'di dag ni khyod kyi'o/_/nga ni byang chub lam phyir 'gro/_/khyim dang nor ni khyod kyi ste/_/bdag ni sangs rgyas dga' ba'o/_/
[\[123b.4\]]sum cu rtsa gnyis mchog gi mtshan/_/'di 'dra bdag mthong gyur na/_/lta ba nyams pa ma gtogs par/_/byang chub mchog ni su mi tshol/_/khyim dag dang ni nor rnams dang /_/pha dang ma dang gnyen rnams dang /_/bdag gis de dag kun spangs te/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[123b.5\]]drung du 'gro bar bya/_/'jig rten mgon po 'od mdzad pa'i/_/'jig rten snang mdzad rab tu dkon/_/bskal pa bye ba stong du yang /_/de ni thos par shin tu dkon/_/nam mkha' dag pa'i zla ba ni/_/sa la lam mer 'dug pa ltar/_/rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor zhugs nas/_/
[\[123b.6\]]dge slong dge 'dun mdun du byas/_/'od zer stong pa'i nyi ma ni/_/bar snang gnas na lhang nge ba/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas sras dbus na/_/kun nas rab tu mdzes par snang /_/ri yi rgyal po ri rab ni/_/rin chen bdag nyid mdzes par snang /_/de bzhin sangs rgyas mdzes 
[\[123b.7\]]pa yang /_/dge slong dge 'dun mdun du byas/_/sku yi gzi brjid 'bar ba ni/_/'gro ba 'di dag rnams la snang /_/gzi brjid phung po'i gzugs can te/_/rkang gnyis dam pa de mdzes so/_/lha dang klu dang mi rnams ni/_/rdzu 'phrul dag gis rab sdud cing /_/
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor zhugs nas/_/cho 'phrul dag ni rnam par ston/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis bsod nams dam mchog mtshan/_/chos kyi bdag po 'di 'dra mthong nas ni/_/byis pa ma bslabs pa dag ma gtogs par/_/theg pa dman la su zhig 'jug par 
[\[124a.2\]]'gyur/_/shin tu dkon pa rab tu mdzes byung ba/_/mi mchog 'di ni bdag gis mthong bas na/_/byang chub phyir ni mngon par zhugs gyur nas/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i drung du nye bar 'gro/_/shA ri'i bu de nas khye'u sdom pas khye'u sdom pa la gnas pa la tshigs su bcad pa 
[\[124a.3\]]'di dag smras so/_/bdag ni le lo'i lam dag nas/_/sangs rgyas drung du mi 'gro ste/_/khang tog 'di nas phyi rol du/_/bdag gis lus ni mchong bar bya/_/bdag tu 'du shes bsal gyur nas/_/srog la blta bar mi bya ste/_/ye shes mchog ni yongs bcol zhing /_/
[\[124a.4\]]sangs rgyas drung du 'gro bar bya/_/pha la chags dang ma la chags/_/khyim la chags pa mi bzad pa/_/de dag thams cad rnam spangs nas/_/sangs rgyas drung du 'gro bar bya/_/'di 'drar 'gyur bar gang 'dod pa/_/de ni sangs rgyas dga' ba yin/_/rin po che ni kun 
[\[124a.5\]]spangs nas/_/khyim med par ni rab tu 'byung /_/de ltar shA ri'i bu khye'u sdom pa la gnas pa ni khyim gyi skas las babs te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags ga la ba der song ngo /_/yang shA ri'i bu 
[\[124a.6\]]khye'u sdom pa ni khang tog de nas mchongs nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags ga la ba der shin tu myur du song ngo /_/khye'u sdom pa la gnas pa ni phyi nas song ngo /_/shA ri'i bu de nas khye'u sdom pas bcom ldan 'das de la na bza' srang bye ba ri ba phul te/_
[\[124a.7\]]de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/bdag ni gzugs rnams tshol ba'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas na bza' 'bul ma lags/_/mi mchog dag ni ci 'dra ba/_/de 'dra bar ni 'gyur bar bgyi/_/ye shes phung po ldan pa dang /_/brtson 'grus stobs la rab gnas shing /_/
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' ba/_/rkang gnyis dam par gyur par shog_/stobs bcu rnams dang ldan gyur cing /_/mi 'jigs pa la rab gnas pa/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ci 'dra bar/_/de 'dra bar ni 'gyur bar shog_/khyod kyis chos gang mkhyen pa dang /_/gang la bzhugs 
[\[124b.2\]]par lhang nge bar/_/byang chub dam pa sangs rgyas nas/_/bdag ni chos de ston par shog_/bdag ni gzugs rnams mngon par tshol ba'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas na bza' mchog 'bul ma lags/_/lhar bcas 'jig rten rnams la phan pa'i phyir/_/byang chub mchog gi zhi ba 
[\[124b.3\]]mngon par tshol/_/gnyis su med pa'i chos mchog der gnas shing /_/pha rol rgol ba kun gyis mi g.yos pa/_/chos de nyid ni mngon par 'tshal ba'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas la ni na bza' mchog 'bul lo/_/lhar bcas 'jig rten dag la sman pa'i phyir/_/gang na skye rga na 
[\[124b.4\]]'chi ma mchis shing /_/mya ngan dang ni smre sngags ma mchis pa/_/zhi ba'i chos de bdag ni ston par shog_/gang na 'dod chags zhe sdang ma mchis shing /_/gti mug ma mchis sred pa ma mchis pa/_/bsil dngos bdud rtsi 'dus ma bgyis pa de/_/bdag ni byang chub sangs rgyas 
[\[124b.5\]]ston par shog_/gang la khyod bzhugs sems can lha klu dang /_/de bzhin mi dang sems med dngos po dang /_/de ltar sems dang ldan pa rab 'dud pa/_/bdag ni zhi ba'i chos de ston par shog_/gar gnas sangs rgyas zhing du snang ba dang /_/phyogs bzhi dag na kun du snang ba 
[\[124b.6\]]dang /_/mun pa chen por 'od zer phung lta bu'i/_/bsil dngos bdud rtsi de la reg par shog_/'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams dag dang /_/de bzhin gzugs med khams la rtag mi gnas/_/dga' dang mi dga' thams cad rab dben pa'i/_/chos kyi dam pa de ni 
[\[124b.7\]]bdag ston shog_/shA ri'i bu de nas khye'u sdom pa la gnas pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags pa de la shing lham sar pa zung cig phul lo/_/phul nas kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]sems can rnams kyi gnas rten dang /_/dpung gnyan mgon du gyur par shog_/ngan pa'i lam du mi mchi zhing /_/rtag tu lam rnams ston par shog_/byis pa rnams kyi spyod yul 'di/_/'dod pa nam yang sten ma gyur/_'dus byas dag kyang rnam spangs 
[\[125a.2\]]nas/_/rtag tu sangs rgyas 'byung rnyed gyur/_/'jig rten snang mdzad mthong nas kyang /_/rkang gnyis dam pa mchod par gyur/_/srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/byang chub dam pa yongs su bcol/_/srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/me tog phreng ba spos rnams dang /_/
[\[125a.3\]]rgyal mtshan dag dang gdugs rnams kyis/_/glang po chen po bkur sti bgyi/_/srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/chos gos dag dang bsod snyoms dang /_/mal stan rnams dang gding ba yis/_/sangs rgyas rnams la mchod par bgyi/_/srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/
[\[125a.4\]]rnga dang dung dang rnga chen dang /_/sil snyan dag dang [(]pi bang [,]wang [)]gis/_/'jig rten snang mdzad mchod par shog_/bza' ba dang ni bca' ba dang /_/dus kyis ma phye bza' ba rnams/_/de dag gis ni 'jig rten mgon/_/skyob pa bdag gis mchod pa bgyi/_/srog chags kun la phan 
[\[125a.5\]]pa'i phyir/_/mchod pa rgya chen bgyis gyur nas/_/de nyid du ni rab byung ste/_/tshangs par spyod pa bdag gis spyad/_/srog chags kun gyi mgon du bdag gyur cig_/bdag ni lam gol nam yang 'gro ma gyur/_/yan lag brgyad ldan lam mchog rab gnas nas/_/bdag gis srog 
[\[125a.6\]]chags bye ba de nyid dgrol/_/dman la 'phags min mchog tu smad pa yi/_/'dod la bdag ni nam yang sten ma 'gyur/_/bag med thams cad yongs su spangs gyur nas/_/bdag ni rtag tu bag yod gyur par shog_/mi khom brgyad lam nam yang skye ma 'gyur/_/rtag tu dang 
[\[125a.7\]]ba'i rigs su skyes gyur cing /_/skyes par gyur nas mi mchog rnams mthong la/_/mthong nas de la bdag ni dad par shog_/'di 'dra'i ye shes de ni btsal ba'i phyir/_/dang ba'i sems kyis me tog phreng ba dang /_/byug pa dag dang rdza rnga rnga chen dang /_/rnga dang gling bu dag gis ri mor 
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]bgyi/_/bskal pa bye mang rnam pa sna tshogs kyi/_/mchod pa chen po dag ni bgyis gyur nas/_/myur du 'dod pa spangs te rab byung la/_/tshangs par spyad pa bdag ni spyod par shog_/de dag sa phyogs gang du 'dug ste/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[125b.2\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po de la tshigs su bcad pa'i glu'i dbyangs kyis bstod pa'i sa phyogs der tsan dan dmar po las byas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug lag khang rgyar dpag tshad bzhi/_'phang du dpag tshad phyed pa byas te/_de dag 
[\[125b.3\]]gis gtsug lag khang de byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa la phul lo/_/phul nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/gnas pa gang la khyod ni bzhugs gyur pas/_/sngon gyi rgyal bas bzhi po 
[\[125b.4\]]gang bsngags pa/_/gnas pa de ni btsal bar bgyi ba'i phyir/_/gtsug lag khang 'di bde bar gshegs la 'bul/_/gnas pa dag ni gang la rtag bzhugs na/_/'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar byung ba yi/_/sems ni srog chags bye bas mi 'tshal ba'i/_/spyod pa de ni bdag 
[\[125b.5\]]gis btsal bar bgyi/_/spyod pa gang dag pha rol son pa ni/_/yang dag spong dang de bzhin rdzu 'phrul rkang /_/mchog bzhi rnams kyi so sor yang dag rig_/spyod pa de dag bdag gis btsal bar bgyi/_/de dag gis gtsug lag khang de nyid du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[125b.6\]]pa mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po de de dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun du bcas pa la zla ba phyed kyi bar du bsti stang du byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod par byed de/_de dag gis gtsug lag khang der de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun du bcas pa la bsti stang du 
[\[125b.7\]]byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid kyi drung du skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/_dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas dge ba'i chos tshol ba la brtson par gyur te/_dge ba'i chos tshol ba la yid 
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]brtson par gyur to/_/de nas gcig gis smras pa/_'jig rten mgon po 'od byed par/_/bdag ni dang por sngar gyur cig_/cig shos kyis smras pa/_ded dpon mi yi gtso bor yang /_/bdag ni dang por sngar gyur cig_/de na shA ri'i bu gang sdom 
[\[126a.2\]]pa zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po de'i spyan sngar 'dug nas yid ma bcas pa/_stan dag la yang mi 'dug cing /_/bdag ni mal du mi nyal lo/_/srog chags rnams kyi don 'tshal 
[\[126a.3\]]phyir/_/bdag gis byang chub lam btsal lo/_/bdag nyid kyi yang lus dang ni/_/srog kyang yongs su spangs bgyis te/_/le lo dag ni kun spangs nas/_/byang chub dam pa btsal bar bgyi/_/sha rnams dang ni de bzhin khrag rnams dang /_/pags pa dang ni rgyus skams srog bor 
[\[126a.4\]]te/_/le lo thams cad yongs su spangs bgyis nas/_/byang chub mchog phyir brtson 'grus brtsam par bgyi/_/shA ri'i bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdom pa la gnas pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdom pa la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras 
[\[126a.5\]]so/_/bdag cag gnyis ni 'dus gyur nas/_/srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/byang chub spyod pa rnams spyad cing /_/brtson 'grus dam pa brtsam par bya/_/lus rnams dang ni de bzhin srog bor te/_/sha dang khrag ni rtag tu skams gyur kyang /_/srid pa stong du khyod kyi rjes 
[\[126a.6\]]slob cing /_/byang chub mchog phyir brtson 'grus brtsam par bya/_/gang du chos kyi bdag po bzhugs mdzes pa'i/_/ye shes dam pa yongs su btsal bya zhing /_/dgon pa'i gnas kyi ri dang chu drung du/_/the tshom med par brtson 'grus brtsam bya/_/shA ri'i bu de nas byang chub sems 
[\[126a.7\]]dpa' sdom pa dang /_sdom pa la gnas pa lo stong du lan 'ga' yang tha na se gol gtogs pa srid du yang rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non par ma gyur to/_/lo stong du lan 'ga' yang nyal lo snyam du nyal ba'i sems ma bskyed do/_/lo stong du lan 'ga' yang 'dug go snyam du stan 'dod 
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]par ma gyur to/_/de gnyis bshad pa dang /_gci ba'i tshe ma gtogs par lo stong du tha na lan 'ga' yang tsog tsog por ma 'dug go_/nam kha zas za ba na yang 'greng bzhin du [(]kham [,]khams [)]gsum gsum tsam za zhing chu phor gang tsam 'thung ngo /_/de gnyis kyis lo stong du lan 'ga' yang 
[\[126b.2\]]kha zas 'dod pa'am/_bkres na myur du kha zas rnyed par dga' ba ma bskyed do/_/de gnyis kyis lo stong du lan 'ga' yang kha zas de las lhag par ma zos so/_/de gnyis kyis lo stong du kha zas za ba na lan 'ga' yang kha zas la mngar ba dang /_skyur ba dang /_bro ba dang /_tsha 
[\[126b.3\]]ba dang /_kha ba dang /_bska bar tha na sems bskyed pa gcig tsam yang 'du shes ma bskyed do/_/de gnyis kyis lo stong du bsod snyoms bsgrub pa la nged la bsod snyoms sbyin pa 'di bud med ma/_skyes pa'am/_khye'u 'am/_bu mo'am/_su zhig ces lan 'ga' yang 
[\[126b.4\]]gdong du ma bltas so/_/de gnyis kyis lo stong du shing gang gi drung na gnas pa shing de la gyen du lan 'ga' yang ma bltas so/_/de gnyis kyis lo stong du lan 'ga' yang chos gos gnyis su ma brjes so/_/de gnyis kyis lo stong du lan 'ga' yang tha na sems bskyed pa gcig 
[\[126b.5\]]kyang 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa ma brtags/_gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa ma brtags/_'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa ma brtags so/_/de gnyis kyis lo stong du lan 'ga' yang tha na sems bskyed pa gcig kyang zla ba la song ba'am/_nyi ma la song ba'am/_pha la song ba 
[\[126b.6\]]'am/_ma la song ba'am/_spun la song ba'am/_sring mo la song ba'am/_nye du la song ba'i rnam par rtog pa ma bskyed do/_/de gnyis kyis lo stong 'das kyi bar du lan 'ga' yang tha na sems bskyed pa gcig kyang khyim la gnas pa'i rnam par rtog pa ma brtags so/_/de 
[\[126b.7\]]gnyis kyis lo stong du lan 'ga' yang zla ba'am/_nyi ma 'am/_skar ma'i gzugs sam/_bar snang la gyen du ma bltas so/_/de gnyis kyis lo stong du lan 'ga' yang rtsig pa'am/_shing la ma bsnyes so/_/de gnyis kyis lo stong du lan 'ga' yang mar ram/_'bru 
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]mar gyis lus ma bskus so/_/de gnyis kyis lo stong du lan 'ga' yang tha na sems bskyed pa gcig kyang mar dang ldan pa'i sems ma bskyed do/_/de gnyis kyis lan 'ga' yang tha na sems bskyed pa gcig kyang lus la skyo ba ma bskyed do/_/de gnyis kyis 
[\[127a.2\]]lo stong du lan 'ga' yang tha na sems bskyed pa gcig kyang bdag cag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus shes lus ngal ba ma bskyed do/_/de gnyis lo stong du lan 'ga' yang lus na ba'am/_sems na bar ma gyur to/_/
[\[127a.3\]]de dag gis lo stong 'das kyi bar du nam yang skra breg par sems ma bskyed do/_/gzhan du na rgyal po chen po bzhi 'ongs nas mgo la byugs te skra khyer nas phyir 'dong ngo /_/de dag skra khyer nas mchod rten btsugs so/_/de dag gis lo stong gi bar du rgyal po chen po de dag 'ongs pa 
[\[127a.4\]]dang /_song ba la nam yang 'ong ba dang /_'gro ba'i sems ma bskyed do/_/de gnyis kyis lo stong du grib ma bab pa na nyi ma dang /_nyi mas phog na grib ma'i sems ma bskyed do/_/de gnyis kyis lo stong du grang ba'i dus na yang lan 'ga' yang lus la g.yog pa'i 'du shes ma 
[\[127a.5\]]bskyed do/_/de gnyis kyis lo stong du lan 'ga' yang 'jig rten gyi tshig ma smras so/_/yang shA ri'i bu de'i dus na dran pa rmongs byed ces bya ba'i bdud cig byung ste/_'di lta ste/_dper na da ltar gyi nga'i bdud sdig can bzhin no/_/shA ri'i bu bdud dran pa rmongs byed kyis byang 
[\[127a.6\]]chub sems dpa' sdom pa'i 'chag sar ral gri'i so gtams pa byas par gyur pa dang /_des ral gri'i so de la ral gri'i sor 'du shes bskyed nas des bdag ni bag med pa la gnas so/_/bdag ni bag med pa la gnas so zhes sgra phyung ba dang /_sgra des stong gsum gyi stong chen 
[\[127a.7\]]po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar gyur to/_/de ltar shA ri'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar byas pa dang /_de nas steng gi bar snang las bdud kyi ris kyi lha bye ba brgya phrag stong gis kye ma'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' shi 'phos 
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]su ma gyur to/_/shi 'phos su ma gyur to/_/zhes sgra phyung ngo /_/shA ri'i bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa de ltar 'chag pas sems bskyed pa de'i rjes su zhugs te/_yang shA ri'i bu lha dang bcas pa'i sgra gnyis pa phyung ba de byang chub sems dpa' sdom pas ma thos so/_/
[\[127b.2\]]gang lha'i sgra dang /_gang sdom pa'i sgra de gnyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa la gnas pas ma thos te shA ri'i bu skyes bu dam pa de gnyis spyod lam de lta bu dang /_spyod pa de lta bu dang /_nan tan de lta bu dang /_/snying rje chen po de lta bu dang /_rtul ba de lta bu dang ldan par gyur te/_de 
[\[127b.3\]]gnyis kyis lo stong du sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgoms so/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang /_de nas lha zhig 'ongs nas rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das 
[\[127b.4\]]so zhes sbran te/_de gnyis kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das so zhes thos nas bcom ldan 'das de'i khri gang na yod pa der song ste/_'greng bzhin du thal mo sbyar nas nyi ma bdun gyi bar du mig mi 'dzums par lta ste/_byams pa dang ldan zhing 'gran zla med pas gus pas rjes su dran 
[\[127b.5\]]par byas te/_de dag gis brtson 'grus ma btang bas 'greng bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byas so/_/de dag de nas shi 'phos nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes so/_/de gnyis tshangs par gyur nas slar log ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[127b.6\]]sangs rgyas de'i mchod rten byas nas lo bzhi khri'i bar du mchod rten gyi yo byad kyi las byas so/_/de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi gdugs btsugs zin par shes nas lo bdun khri'i bar du 'greng bzhin du thal mo sbyar te gnas nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod 
[\[127b.7\]]rten de la phyag byed do/_/de dag tshe'i mthar phyin te shi 'phos nas yang 'dzam bu'i gling nyid du skyes te/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs su ma'i mngal du mtshe mar skyes so/_/de gnyis skyes ma thag tu gcig gis gcig dran nas bdag cag bag yod pa la gnas par bya'o/_/bdag 
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]cag bag yod pa'i mchog bsgom par bya'o zhes smras nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/'byor dang rgyas shing rtag tu lo legs pa'i/_/yid 'ong rgyal po'i rigs su bdag cag skyes/_/bag med rgyags pa rab tu spang bya ste/_/byang chub dam 
[\[128a.2\]]pa rab tu bsgrub par bya/_/'dod dang longs spyod de bzhin rgyal po'i srid/_/yid brtan mi rung ring por mi thogs te/_/byang chub dam pa yongs su tshol ba na/_/mkhas pa de la 'dod pa mi skyed do/_/srog chags phan phyir byang chub gang zhugs pa/_/'dod dang longs spyod la ni 
[\[128a.3\]]'dod mi skyed/_/myur du 'dod pa spangs shing rab byung nas/_/tshangs par spyod pa dam pa mchog spyad do/_/sngon 'das dus ni shin tu rgyas pa nas/_/lha rdzas dag dang mi yi bzang po dang /_/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dag bsten gyur kyang /_/de la nam yang ngoms pa ma rnyed do/_/
[\[128a.4\]]de phyir rgyal srid rgyas dang gnyen tshogs dang /_/'dod pa'i yon tan 'di dag spang bya ste/_/lus skyes nas ni myur du rab byung la/_/byang chub phyir ni brtson 'grus brtsam par bya/_/de gnyis skyes nas lo bcu drug lon pa dang 'dra bar gyur nas skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur 
[\[128a.5\]]smrig bgos nas dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/_lo nyi khri'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/_/de nas shi 'phos nas slar yang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes so/_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos nas slar yang 'dzam bu'i gling du skyes so/_/yang shA ri'i 
[\[128a.6\]]bu de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri mchog ces bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs 
[\[128a.7\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa de de gnyis kyis mnyes par byas te/_de gnyis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i drung du skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/_dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo /_/de gnyis rab tu byung 
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]nas lo bye ba tshang bar tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/_/shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des sangs rgyas khri mnyes par byas te/_byang chub sems dpa' sdom pas thams cad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa la gnas pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi drung 
[\[128b.2\]]du tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/_/de la shA ri'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa zhes bya ba de sngar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brtson 'grus 'bar 
[\[128b.3\]]ba zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/_de lo bye ba phrag dgu bcu'i bar du gnas so/_/
[\[128b.4\]]de'i nyan thos kyang bye ba khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu'i nyan thos kyi 'dus pa chen po byung ngo /_/shA ri'i bu de la gang byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa la gnas zhes bya ba de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus 'bar ba byang chub thob pa de'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 
[\[128b.5\]]gyur te/_des de bzhin gshegs pa de dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun du bcas pa la zla ba gsum gyi bar du na bza' dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_mal stan dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyis bsti stang du byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod par 
[\[128b.6\]]byas so/_/de nas shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brtson 'grus 'bar ba des rgyal po de 'ongs par mkhyen nas rgyal po la bskul ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/sangs rgyas chos 
[\[128b.7\]]rnams thob pa la/_/brtson 'grus dam pa mchog yin te/_/'dod la brkam pa'i sems can rnams/_/sems can don byed shin tu dkon/_/'dod la brkam pa'i don rnams gang /_/de ni mkhas pa'i don ma yin/_/khyod ni don med gnas pa ste/_/mchog gi don 
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]tshol ma yin/_/nga nyid dang ni khyod nyid du/_/sngon ni spun du gyur pa ste/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas myur grub ces/_/de na bdag cag dam bcas so/_/ngas ni byang chub thob gyur te/_/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor ba ltos/_/khyod ni khyim dang chung ma dag_/
[\[129a.2\]]rtag tu srung zhing gnas pa yin/_/mkhas pa rnams ni 'di la yid mi rton/_/'dod pa 'di dag ngan ces rgyal bas gsungs/_/skye bo dag ni bag med don spyod de/_/de phyir don min rtag tu rnam par spongs/_/blo gros ngan pa don med khur khyer te/_/khyod ni don med pa la rab tu 
[\[129a.3\]]gnas/_/'phags pa dag gis 'byung ba rab tu bsngags/_/'dod yon sdug bsngal 'thob byed mi shes so/_/bcom ldan 'das des tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis de bskul ba dang /_de bu la ma bltas/_chung ma la yang ma bltas/_tshong dpon dang /_blon po dang /_
[\[129a.4\]]pha dang /_ma dang /_mkhar gyi rgyal po dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_rgyal srid thams cad la yang ma bltas/_nor gyi phung po thams cad la yang ma chags par stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar 'dug nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag 
[\[129a.5\]]smras so/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub phyir/_/bdag gi sha yang bskam par bgyi/_/khyim kun kyang ni spang bar bgyi/_/dgon par mchis nas 'gum par bgyi/_/srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/khyim med par ni rab byung nas/_/dgon pa rab dgon sten bgyid 
[\[129a.6\]]cing /_/phyir yang brtson 'grus brtsam par bgyi/_/byis pa smra ba sdig pa yi/_/'dod pa'i phyir yang mi sten te/_/de la gnas par gyur pas na/_/bdag ni rgyab kyis phyogs par gyur/_/'dod dang longs spyod rgyal srid dang /_/thams cad rnam par spangs gyur te/_/
[\[129a.7\]]'jig rten mgon gyi bstan pa la/_/deng nyid bdag ni rab tu 'byung /_/byang chub phyir ni spyad pa spyod byed na/_/mkhas pas su zhig 'dus byas yid rton byed/_/gang du bdag ni 'dod la zhugs gyur pas/_/brtson 'grus brtsams kyang byang chub reg ma gyur/_/de bas 'dod pa'i 
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]yon tan bdag spangs te/_/longs spyod bde dang rgyal srid ba de spangs nas/_/rgyal ba'i bstan la ched du rab byung la/_/byang chub mchog phyir brtson 'grus brtsam par bgyi/_/des tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi drung du skra dang kha spu bregs te/_
[\[129b.2\]]gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo /_/rgyal po mngon par byung zhing rab tu byung bar shes nas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo /_/des bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan 
[\[129b.3\]]las 'das pa'i ring bsrel la mchod pa byas nas de nas shi 'phos ma thag tu dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i rgyal por skyes so/_/de dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas bskal pa de nyid la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_
[\[129b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas legs spyod ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_de lo bye ba tshang bar gnas so/_/de'i nyan thos kyang bye ba 
[\[129b.5\]]khrag khrig tshang ba'i nyan thos chen po 'dus par gyur te/_thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa nas sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol du son pa sha stag gi bar du'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgya phrag stong yang bla na med pa yang 
[\[129b.6\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i bar du bkod do/_/chos bstan nas sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i don byas te/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dam pa'i chos ni bskal pa las lhag par gnas par gyur to/_/
[\[129b.7\]]de'i ring bsrel yang rgyas par gyur te/_'di lta ste dper na ngad yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas ring bsrel rgyas par 'gyur ba bzhin no/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa la gnas pa'i rjes su byang chub sems dpa' bslab 
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]cing brtson 'grus mnyams par brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyad par bya ba'i sems can keng rus la gnas pa dang /_ser sna la gnas pa dag gi rjes su bslab par mi bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang la la byang chub 'dod la gzhan gyi khyim la 
[\[130a.2\]]ser sna skyed na/_de'i tshe de la 'jigs pa gsum 'byung bar shes par bya'o/_/gsum gang zhe na/_gzhan gyi khyim dag tu kha zas kyi phyir smra/_kun tu smra ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i dge slong gzhan mthong na/_phrag dog dang /_ser sna skyed cing /_khong khro ba'i sems gcig tsam 
[\[130a.3\]]gyis kyang mi 'thun par byed na/_des sems can dmyal ba'i lam yongs su gzung bar 'gyur/_dmus long gi sa bon btab par 'gyur/_mtha' 'khob tu skye ba'i gnas yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu gang la las 'phags pa'i dge slong mthong na khro ba'i zil 
[\[130a.4\]]gyis non te/_khros pa'i sems kyis mi smra zhing ser sna skyed de/_khong khro ba'i sems gcig tsam gyis kyang mi 'thun par byed na/_des sems can dmyal ba'i lam yongs su gzung bar 'gyur/_dmus long gi sa bon btab par 'gyur/_mir skyes na yang mtha' 'khob kyi mi'i 
[\[130a.5\]]yul phyogs su skye ba'i gnas yongs su gzung bar 'gyur/_khong khro ba mang bar 'gyur/_dmus long du 'gyur/_gzhan gyi dring 'jog cing skur pa mang bar 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi khyim la phrag dog dang /_ser sna skye ba de'i tshe de dag 
[\[130a.6\]]'jigs pa 'di gsum yid la bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la de ltar rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[130a.7\]]pas khyim gyi ser sna las byung ba 'di lta bu bshad pa ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag nyan thos rnams la yang khyim gyi ser sna las 'byung ba legs par rab tu bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang sems can dmyal ba las thar bar 'tshal ba 
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]lags kyi bdag cag dmus long 'tshal ba ma lags so/_/bdag cag gcugs ma mchis pa'i 'khon mi 'tshal te/_bdag cag kyang skur pa 'debs par 'tshal ba ma lags so/_/bdag cag mtha' 'khob kyi gnas 'tshal ba ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni 
[\[130b.2\]]yul gyi dbus kyi phyogs 'tshal te/_bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_chos mnyan pa yongs su ma btang ngo /_/de skad ces gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu khyod 'di ltar gnam zhing 
[\[130b.3\]]drang bar gyur te/_gang khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni legs so legs so/_/ngo mtshar to/_/de bas na shA ri'i bu gang 'jig rten na sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa la slob par 'dod pa de dag gi phyir bshad par bya'o/_/
[\[130b.4\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu ma bslabs na 'thab pa'i rtsa ba rtsod par 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni dad pa dang dang ba mang zhing sems can rnams kyi skyabs kyi phyir yun ring por lta ba dang /_
[\[130b.5\]]dus ring por lta bar 'gyur zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du song nas yongs su 'dri bar byed de des 'di lta bu'i chos 'di thos nas dga' ba dang /_dad pa dang mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po thob par 'gyur te/_nan tan gyis kyang sgrub mod/_shA ri'i bu gang lhag pa'i bsam 
[\[130b.6\]]pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa 'dod pa'i sems can de dag ni nyung bar 'gyur te/_phal cher dngos po gsum la gnas so/_/gsum gang zhe na/_rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pa tshol ba dang /_mdza' bo'i khyim dang /_slong ba'i khyim tshol ba 
[\[130b.7\]]dang /_gnas yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyug pa tshol te/_/dngos po gsum po 'di dag la gnas so/_/de bas na gang dngos po 'di gsum la gnas pa de dag ni ngan song gsum las yongs su mi thar to/_/de dag sems can dmyal ba las thar ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas 
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten las thar bar bya ba la spro ba chung zhing de dag mtho ris zad par 'gyur ba dang /_gleng ba dang /_'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'breg pa dang /_'gyed pa la brtson zhing lta bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag ma dad par gyur pas mdza' ba 
[\[131a.2\]]mang pos yongs su zin nas dgon par gnas pa spong ba rjes su 'thob par 'gyur te/_de dag la khyim pa dag tshe dang ldan pa khyod nged kyi gnas dang nye bar gnas par gyis shig dang /_nged kyis chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_mal stan dang /_na ba'i gsos sman 
[\[131a.3\]]dang /_yo byad kyis bsnyen bkur bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa dgon pa la gnas na nged kyis kyang khyod mi mthong /_khyod kyis kyang nged mi mthong ngo zhes de skad zer zhing de dag phan tshun smra ba mang bas gnas la chags nas mngon par dga' ba skyed de/_de dag gnas la sred pa skyed par 
[\[131a.4\]]'gyur/_ring du gnas par 'gyur/_mdza' bo'i khyim dang /_slong ba sbyin pa'i khyim mang bar 'gyur te/_de dag phyi phyir zhing mthong na gcig la gcig sred par 'gyur te/_de la gang dge slong thor bur 'ongs pa de dag la bsngags pa ma yin pa smra bar 'gyur te/_mang du 
[\[131a.5\]]thos pa ma yin no/_/rgyun du zhugs pa ma yin no zhes smra bar byed/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba ma yin no zhes smra bar byed/_dgra bcom pa ma yin no zhes smra bar byed de/_gzhan la bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod par bya ba la spro bar byed do/_/shA ri'i bu de la khyim pa de dag gang 
[\[131a.6\]]dge slong thor bur 'ongs pa de dag ni bdag cag gi drung na yun ring du gnas pa ma yin gyi/_gang dge slong 'khod pa dag ni bdag cag gcig gi gcig don gyi pho nya yin no zhes de snyam du sems te/_de dag gcig la gcig ser sna byed par 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu de la kha cig 
[\[131a.7\]]ni chos 'di lta bu khong du chud par ma gyur/_khong du ma chud/_khong du chud par mi 'gyur te/_de dag thams cad mdo sde 'di lta bu dag spong bar gyur/_spong bar byed/_spong bar 'gyur ro/_/yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu'i tshig dang 
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]'bru'i rnam grangs thos nas thos ma thag tu mos par mi byed kyi sems can gang ngan song du 'gro ba'i sems can de lta bu dag ni smod par byed par 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus ma nyams pa ni ser sna dang /_phrag dog gi gzhi 'di lta bu ngan song du 
[\[131b.2\]]'gro ba'i las thos nas khyim gyi ser sna ma byas pa yang mi byed/_khyim gyi ser sna byas pa yang 'chags par 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus ma nyams pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu brtson 'grus 
[\[131b.3\]]ma nyams pa'i byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na sems can thams cad la nad par 'du shes bskyed de/_sems can de dag thams cad ni gdung ba'i nad 'di gsum gyis rtag tu gdungs so/_/gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'dod 
[\[131b.4\]]chags kyi gdung ba dang /_zhe sdang gi gdung ba dang /_gti mug gi gdung ba'o/_/sman dang rtsis bsku ba'i sbyor ba gang gis sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang /_zhe sdang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang /_gti mug rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba de 'dra 
[\[131b.5\]]ba'i chos kyi sman dang /_rtsis bsku ba'i sbyor ba bdag gis bsdu bar bya'o zhes de ltar sems shing de chos kyi sman dang /_rtsis bsku ba'i sbyor ba gang gis sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang /_zhe sdang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang /_gti mug rab 
[\[131b.6\]]tu zhi bar 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i chos kyi sman dang /_rtsis bsku ba'i sbyin pa sdud par byed do/_/de ni byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus ma nyams pa/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu sems can thams cad ni gdung 
[\[131b.7\]]ba'i nad gsum gyis rtag tu gdungs nas na ba ste/_'di lta ste/_'dod chags kyi gdung ba dang /_zhe sdang gi gdung ba dang /_gti mug gi gdung ba'o/_/sems can gang sems can dmyal bar skye ba de dag kyang gdung ba 'di gsum gyis rtag tu gdungs te/_'dod 
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]chags kyi gdung ba dang /_zhe sdang gi gdung ba dang /_gti mug gi gdung ba'o/_/gang dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang /_gang gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa dang /_gang mi'i 'jig rten pa dang /_gang lhar skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang 'dod chags kyi gdung ba 
[\[132a.2\]]dang /_zhe sdang gi gdung ba dang /_gti mug gi gdung ba 'di gsum gyis rtag tu gdungs te/_gang sems can de dag gi sman pa gso bar byed pa de dag kyang 'dod chags kyi gdung ba dang /_zhe sdang gi gdung ba dang /_gti mug gi gdung ba'i gdung ba 'di gsum gyis rtag tu 
[\[132a.3\]]gdungs te/_de la sman pa gzhan dang /_sman gzhan bsku ba'i sbyor bas sems can de dag gi 'dod chags kyi gdung ba dang /_zhe sdang gi gdung ba dang /_gti mug gi gdung ba rab tu zhi bar bya mi nus kyi/_gzhan du na de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i sman pa'i rgyal po 
[\[132a.4\]]chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi sku thob pas bdag nyid sman du gyur par byin gyis brlabs nas sems can de dag gi 'dod chags kyi gdung ba dang /_zhe sdang gi gdung ba dang /_gti mug gi gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed nus so/_/de bas na 
[\[132a.5\]]shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/_gang sman pa phal dang /_sman gyis bsku ba'i sbyor ba phal gyis sems can de dag gi 'dod chags kyi gdung ba dang /_zhe sdang gi gdung ba dang /_gti mug gi gdung ba rab tu zhi bar nus par sla ba ma yin gyi/_gzhan du na 
[\[132a.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i sman pa'i rgyal po chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi sku thob pas sems can de dag gi 'dod chags kyi gdung ba dang /_zhe sdang gi gdung ba dang /_gti mug gi gdung ba rab tu zhi bar nus par rig par bya'o/_/
[\[132a.7\]]shA ri'i bu de ji snyam du sems/_sems can gyi khams rab tu mang ngam gsol pa/_ji ltar na bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal te/_sems can gyi khams ni rab tu mang gi_/sa'i khams ni de lta ma lags so/_/chu'i khams ni de lta ma lags/_
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]me'i khams ni de lta ma lags/_rlung gi khams ni de lta ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_de de bzhin no/_/shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/_shA ri'i bu sems can gyi khams ni rab tu mang gi_/sa'i khams ni de lta ma yin/_chu'i khams ni de lta ma yin/_me'i khams ni de 
[\[132b.2\]]lta ma yin/_rlung gi khams ni de lta ma yin no/_/yang shA ri'i bu sems can skal ba mnyam par gyur pa 'di las phyi rol gyi drang srong gi lha'i mig la snang bar ma gyur pa/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi lha'i mig la snang bar ma gyur pa yod do/_shA ri'i bu gang shing 
[\[132b.3\]]rta'i 'khor lo tsam gyi khyon la de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i spyan la snang bar gyur pa de ni rab tu mang ste/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye dgu ni de lta ma yin te/_de ltar sems can gyi khams dpag tu med do/_/shA ri'i bu ji 
[\[132b.4\]]tsam du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can sgo nga las skye ba'am/_mngal nas skye ba'am/_drod gsher las skye ba'am/_rdzus te skye ba'am/_gzugs can nam/_gzugs med pa'am/_'du shes can nam/_'du shes med pa'am/_
[\[132b.5\]]'du shes med 'du shes med min nam/_snang ba'am/_mi snang ba'am/_ji tsam sems can gyi khams su btags pa de dag thams cad yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/_skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/_de dag thams cad mir 
[\[132b.6\]]gyur nas kyang sman par gyur te/_tshe'i tshad kyang bskal par gnas par gyur nas yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/_slob dpon khams gso ba la mkhas pa 'di lta ste/_/shA ri'i bu da ltar gyi sman pa'i rgyal po gso byed lta bu de dag thams cad 'dus nas sems can gcig gi 'dod 
[\[132b.7\]]chags kyi gdung ba rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /_zhe sdang gi gdung ba dang /_gti mug gi gdung ba rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir 'bad cing sman pa re res kyang bsil ba'i yan lag gi sman ri rab tsam gyi phung po bsdus nas de dag thams cad sems can gcig gi 'dod chags kyi gdung ba 
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bsil ba'i yan lag gi sman gyi phung po btags te/_bskus par gyur kyang shA ri'i bu sman pa tshe'i tshad bskal par gnas pa thams cad skyo bar gyur la/_bsil ba'i yan lag gi sman gyi phung po de dag thams cad yongs su 'gribs 
[\[133a.2\]]shing zad par gyur kyang sems can gcig gi 'dod chags kyi gdung ba dang /_zhe sdang gi gdung ba dang /_gti mug gi gdung ba de rab tu zhi bar mi nus/_de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas mi sdug pa'i chos kyi sman dang /_rtsis bsku ba'i sbyor bas ni sems can du ma sems 
[\[133a.3\]]can brgya phrag du ma/_sems can stong phrag du ma/_sems can brgya stong phrag du ma/_sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong du ma/_sems can khrag khrig dkrigs phrag du ma/_sems can gtams phrag du ma nas brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar gyi 
[\[133a.4\]]sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags kyi gdung ba mi sdug pa'i sman dang /_rtsis bsku ba'i sbyor bas rab tu zhi bar byed do/_byams pa'i chos kyi sman dang /_rtsis bsku ba'i sbyor bas sems can du ma'i zhe sdang gi gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed de/_brjod du med pa'i yang 
[\[133a.5\]]brjod du med pa'i bar gyi sems can rnams kyi zhe sdang gi gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed do/_/rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i sman dang /_rtsis bsku ba'i sbyor bas sems can du ma'i gti mug gi gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed de/_brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar 
[\[133a.6\]]gyi sems can rnams kyi gti mug gi gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi sku thob pas kyang bdag nyid chos kyi sman du gyur par byin gyis brlabs nas sems can du ma'i 'dod chags kyi gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed/_zhe sdang gi gdung 
[\[133a.7\]]ba rab tu zhi bar byed/_gti mug gi gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed do/_/sems can brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar gyi 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed do/_/de bas na shA ri'i bu rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig 
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]par bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos kyi sku la gnas nas bdag nyid chos kyi sman du gyur par byin gyis brlabs nas sems can du ma nas sems can brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar gyi 'dod chags kyi gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed/_zhe sdang 
[\[133b.2\]]gi gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed/_gti mug gi gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed do/_/shA ri'i bu ngas mngon par shes pa bskal pa grangs med pa de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/_de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[133b.3\]]'das zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad des/_nga la gzhon nu khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[133b.4\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/_/yang shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan ma thag tu ngas chos kyi sku thob par gyur te/_nga chos kyi sku dang 
[\[133b.5\]]ldan par gyur nas/_mar me mdzad kyi 'og tu lha'i dbang po brgya byin mig mdzes zhes bya ba sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi bdag po rdzu 'phrul che ba/_mthu che ba/_dbang che bar grags par gyur to/_/yang de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir grong khyer chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong 
[\[133b.6\]]phrag bzhi byung ngo /_/grong dang /_tshong 'dus dang /_ri khrod stong phrag mang po byung ste/_grong khyer chen po dang /_tshong 'dus dang /_ri khrod stong phrag mang po de dag thams cad kyang srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong mang pos gang bar gyur to/_/yang 
[\[133b.7\]]de'i tshe nad chen po'i bskal pa bar ma byung ste/_sems can phal cher lus rma can du gyur te/_lus rul ba dang /_wa ba dang /_'bras dang /_me dbal dang /_g.yan pa dang /_rlung dang /_mkhris pa dang /_bad kan gyis rgyas par gyur to/_/de na sman pa 
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]brgya stong phrag mang po sems can de dag gi nad rab tu zhi bar bya ba la brtson par byed do/_/shA ri'i bu de nas sems can de dag gso ba ma rnyed de/_mgon med skyabs med nas sgra chen po phyung ba/_lha dag dang ni klu rnams dang /_/gnod sbyin dri za srin 
[\[134a.2\]]po dang /_/mi dang mi ma yin pa dag_/bdag cag nad las thar byed gang /_/bdag cag sdug bsngal thar byed la/_/nor rnams thams cad sbyin par bya/_/de yi bka' yi rjes su 'jug_/byas pa dang dag kyang gzo bar bya//_//bam po [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa/_
[\[134a.3\]]yang shA ri'i bu ngas mi'i las 'das pa'i lha'i mig rnam par dag pas sems can de dag nad kyis gzir te/_de dag phal cher lus rma can du gyur te/_lus rul ba dang /_wa ba dang /_'bras da nga /_me dbal dang /_g.yan pa dang /_rlung dang /_mkhris pa dang /_
[\[134a.4\]]bad kan gyis rgyas pa mthong /_mi'i las 'das pa lha'i rna ba rnam par dag pas sems can de dag gis sgra cher phyung ba thos te/_mthong zhing thos nas sems can de dag la snying rje chen po skyes te/_de dag la ngas 'di snyam du bsams so/_/nga sems can 'di dag gi gnas 
[\[134a.5\]]su gyur cig_/sems can skyabs med pa rnams kyi skyabs su gyur cig_/sems can rten med pa rnams kyi rten du gyur cig_/sems can gso ba med pa rnams gso ba sbyar bar bya'o snyam ste/_shA ri'i bu ngas brgya byin gyi lus chen po mi snang bar byas nas grong khyer chen po 
[\[134a.6\]]ku ru nas shin tu mi ring ba zhig tu des pa zhes bya ba'i srog chags zhig tu brdzus te skyes nas steng gi bar snang la 'dug ste/_'dzam bu'i gling gi skye bo'i tshogs thams cad la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bskul to/_/grong khyer ku ru nas ni mi ring na/_/des pa zhes bya'i srog 
[\[134a.7\]]chags rnam pa yod/_/gang dag de yi sha la yongs za ba/_/de kun nad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur/_/'jigs shing skrag pa dag tu ma byed par/_/de yi sha ni ji ltar 'dod dgar long /_/de ni gnod par mi sems khro gshe med/_/de ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi rtsi yin no/_/
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]de ltar shA ri'i bu grong khyer chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong phrag bzhi po de dag dang /_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_tshong 'dus dang /_ri khrod stong po de dag na sems can na ba ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyis sgra de thos nas grong khyer chen po ku ru zhes bya ba ga la ba dang /_srog 
[\[134b.2\]]chags kyi rnam pa des pa gang na yod pa der song ste/_phyin nas srog chags des pa zhes bya ba'i lus las sha bcad cing bcad cing khyer yang de'i lus las sha yongs su zad par ma gyur te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di byung ngo /_/gang phyir bden pas byang chub reg 'gyur 
[\[134b.3\]]zhing /_/ye shes phung po de zad mi 'gyur te/_/nga yi tshig de bden par 'gyur zhe na/_/lus la sha ni nam yang zad ma gyur/_/de ltar shA ri'i bu 'dzam bu'i gling kun gyi skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyis des pa zhes bya ba'i srog chags kyi sha bcad cing bcad cing khyer yang de'i 
[\[134b.4\]]lus bri ba'am/_gang bar yang mi mngon te/_sha yang yang bcad kyang slar de bzhin du skye'o/_/yang shA ri'i bu gang sems can na ba rnams kyis des pa zhes bya ba'i srog chags kyi sha zos na de dag gi nad thams cad byang ste/_nad med cing bde ba las mi 'gyur bar 
[\[134b.5\]]gyur to/_/de bzhin du mthar gyis 'dzam bu'i gling nan ba thams cad kyi nad sna tshogs byang ste/_nad med par byas nas bde zhing gyur pa med do/_/de nas 'dzam bu'i gling gi skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo dang /_mi thams cad 'di snyam du sems 
[\[134b.6\]]te/_des pa zhes bya ba'i srog chags des bdag cag nad las yongs su thar te bde zhing gyur pa med par byas na/_bdag cag gis de la mchod pa dang /_bkur sti ci zhig bya snyam ste/_de dag thams cad gcig tu 'dus so/_/'dus nas des pa zhes bya ba'i srog 
[\[134b.7\]]chags ga la ba der song ste/_phyin nas srog chags des pa la khor yug tu bskor te slar tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/_/khyod ni gnas dang skyabs lags te/_/khyod ni sman pa khyod nyid sman/_/khyod la mchod pa ci bgyi ba/_/bdag cag la ni bka' stsol cig_/
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]sha ri'i bu e ma'o skye bo'i tshogs rnams 'dun par gyur to snyam du ngas shes nas lus chen po de mi snang bar byas te/_rang gi brgya byin gyi cha byad du 'dug nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag la smras pa/_kye grogs po dag nga la grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_
[\[135a.2\]]grong rdal dang /_yul dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor mi dgos so/_/grogs po dag nga la zhing gi dngos po dang /_khyim gyi dngos po dang /_tshong 'dus kyi dngos po dang /_'gron bu dang /_gser dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man 
[\[135a.3\]]shel dang /_byi ru rnams mi dgos so/_/grogs po dag nga la glang po che dang /_rta dang /_rnga mo dang /_ba lang dang /_bong bu dang /_lug dang /_khyim bya dang /_phag rnams mi dgos so/_/skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo dang /_bran pho dang /_
[\[135a.4\]]bran mo dang /_las byed pa dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams kyang mi dgos so/_/bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_mal cha dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad dang /_skyed mos tshal dang /_dka' thub kyi nags tshal gyi longs spyod rnams kyang mi dgos so/_/
[\[135a.5\]]kye grogs po dag khyed kyis srog gcod pa spongs la srog gcod pa las slar ldog par gyis shig_/ma byin par len pa spongs la/_ma byin par len pa las slar ldog par gyis shig_/'dod pas log par g.yem pa spongs la/_'dod pas log par g.yem pa las 
[\[135a.6\]]slar ldog par gyis shig_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba spongs la/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba las slar ldog par gyis shig_/phra ma spongs la/_phra ma las slar ldog par gyis shig_/de bzhin du sbyar te ngag rtsub po dang /_tshig kyal pa dang /_brnab sems dang /_gnod sems dang /_
[\[135a.7\]]log par lta ba'i bar du spongs la/_log par lta ba las slar ldog par gyis shig_/de'i tshe skye bo'i tshogs chen po la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/nga la 'gron bu bye ba mi dgos te/_/gser phung ri rab tsam yang dgos pa med/_/bud med lha mo 'dra ba mi 
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]dgos te/_/bza' dang btung dang kha zas zas mi dgos/_/des pa'i srog chags la ni mchod 'dod na/_/las kyi lam ni rab dag bcu po 'di/_/thams cad 'dus nas de dag bsrung bar gyis/_/phan tshun du yang byams pa'i yid kyis ltos/_/las lam bcu po 
[\[135b.2\]]rdzogs pa 'di dag rnams/_/thams cad gcig tu 'dus te srungs shig dang /_/de tshe nga la mchod pa byas par 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa' nor dang 'bru mi tshol/_/nga la nor rnams dgos pa ma yin te/_/bza' btung dag dang dbyig nor 'bru mi dgos/_/rta 
[\[135b.3\]]dang glang chen shing rta mi dgos te/_/bud med mchog dang rin chen gos mi dgos/_/phan tshun du ni byams sems dag pa dang /_phan pa'i dngos po dag gi sems bskyed la/_/thams cad kun kyang gcig tu 'dus gyur la/_/dge bcu'i las lam dag rdzogs bsrung 
[\[135b.4\]]bar gyis/_/dbang pos mi rnams de dag rab bskul ba/_/tshig de dag ni thos par gyur pa dang /_/dge ba bcu yi las lam rnam dag pa/_/dge ba rnams ni yang dag rab tu len/_/shA ri'i bu ngas skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag la chos kyi gtam kun bstan/_yang 
[\[135b.5\]]dag par 'dzin du btsud/_yang dag par gzengs stod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur pa de ni nga yin no/_/shA ri'i bu ngas mngon par shes te 'dzam bu'i gling gi skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo dang /_mi de snyed 
[\[135b.6\]]thams cad kyis srog chags des pa zhes bya ba'i sha zos pa las tha na sems can gcig kyang de nas 'chi ba'i dus byas te/_shi 'phos nas log par ltung bar song bar ma gyur te/_de dag thams cad de nas shi 'phos 'chi ba'i dus byas nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha 
[\[135b.7\]]rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes so/_/shA ri'i bu ngas de dag la chos kyi gtam kun bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs stod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas nas de dag thams cad nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas 
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]kyi theg pa dang /_bla na med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang /_theg pa gsum la nges par gyur te/_de la la la ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das/_la la ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu ngas de ltar lus gcig yongs 
[\[136a.2\]]su btang bas sems can de snyed theg pa gsum dag la yongs su smin par byas so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi sku la gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po ci 'dra ba dang /_mthu chen po ci 'dra ba dang /_dbang che bar grags pa ci 'dra ba la ltos/_de skad ces 
[\[136a.3\]]bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sku de ci 'dra/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sku ni brtan pa/_sra 
[\[136a.4\]]ba/_mi shigs pa/_rdo rje'i sku/_'chi 'pho med pa/_mi skye ba ste/_de ni sku tha dad pas 'dul ba sems can rnams kyi 'dul ba'i dbang gis tha dad du 'gyur yang mes mi 'tshig_/mtshon gyis mi tshugs te/_rdo rje lta bur brtan pa/_mi shigs pa yin no/_/shA ri'i 
[\[136a.5\]]bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sku la gnas pa/_brtson 'grus ma nyams pa/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la lhun gyis grub par spyod cing lus kyis sems can yongs su smin par byed kyang sems pa med/_yongs su rtog pa med de/_lus dben pa'i 
[\[136a.6\]]mtshan nyid du rab tu shes so/_/lus dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyis kyang chos thams cad dben pa'i mtshan nyid rjes su shes la/_lus dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyis chos thams cad dben pa'i mtshan nyid la gnyis su yang mi byed de/_mtshan nyid gang lus dben pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i mtshan 
[\[136a.7\]]nyid de ni chos thams cad dben pa'i mtshan nyid de dben pa'i mtshan nyid gcig gis rjes su 'jug go_/nang gi chos mi dmigs pa'i phyir rang gi lus dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyis kyang sems can thams cad kyi lus dben pa'i mtshan nyid du mnyam par byed do/_/
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]des sems can thams cad kyi lus dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyis rjes su shes/_chos kyi dbyings dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyang chos thams cad dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyis rjes su slob ste/_de rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis sems 
[\[136b.2\]]can gyi lus kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so/_/de sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so/_/rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so/_/chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyis rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid rjes 
[\[136b.3\]]su shes so/_/rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyis rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so/_/rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i 
[\[136b.4\]]de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so/_/'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes te/_'das pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis kyang ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'gal bar mi byed/_'das pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis 
[\[136b.5\]]kyang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid 'gal bar mi byed/_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis kyang 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid 'gal bar mi byed/_ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis kyang 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid 'gal bar mi byed/_'das pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis kyang ma 'ongs pa'i de 
[\[136b.6\]]bzhin nyid 'gal bar mi byed/_ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis kyang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid 'gal bar mi byed/_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis kyang ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'gal bar mi byed/_ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis kyang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid 
[\[136b.7\]]'gal bar mi byed/_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis kyang 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid 'gal bar mi byed/_'das pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis kyang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid 'gal bar mi byed de/_yang 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid 
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]gang yin pa de nyid phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched kyi de bzhin nyid do/_/phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de nyid kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'i de bzhin nyid do/_/kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam 
[\[137a.2\]]par byang ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de nyid mya ngan las 'das pa dang 'khor ba'i de bzhin nyid do/_/'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de nyid mngon par 'du byed pa'i de bzhin nyid do/_/mngon par 'du byed pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa 'du byed thams cad 
[\[137a.3\]]kyi de bzhin nyid kyang de bzhin nyid yin te/_yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin nyid ces bya ba ni de kho na'o/_/de bzhin nyid do/_/gzhan ma yin pa nyid do/_/bral ba med pa'o/_/lus med pa'o/_/de bzhin nyid la ni lus gang yang med de/_lus med pa'i de bzhin nyid do/_/de bas na de bzhin gshegs 
[\[137a.4\]]pa'i lus zhes bya'o/_/de'i phyir 'di ni de bzhin nyid kyi lus te/_de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus zhes bya'o/_/lus de lta bu ni lus thams cad de/_de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' lus thams cad kyang ston la de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus kyang mi byed de/_lus 
[\[137a.5\]]med pa rtsod pa med pas gzugs kyi lus thams cad kyang ston la de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus kyang 'khrugs par mi byed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la so sor rtog ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mnyam pa nyid kyis kyang rang gi lus 
[\[137a.6\]]mnyam pa nyid so sor rtog go_/rang gi lus mnyam pa nyid kyis lus dang /_lus med pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid so sor rtog go_/lus dang lus med pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis shin tu lus med pa'i lus su mthong ngo /_/lus thams cad rten cing 'brel te byung bar 
[\[137a.7\]]yang shes so/_/shes nas kyang chos kyi sku mngon par sgrub bo/_/de chos kyi sku mngon par bsgrubs nas/_chos kyi sku nyid yin gyi/_phung po dang khams dang /_skye mched lus ni ma yin no/_/de chos kyi skus rab tu phye bas mthong bas kyang sems can rnams 'dul lo/_/
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]thos pas kyang sems can rnams 'dul lo/_/reg pas kyang sems can rnams 'dul lo/_/sems can rnams kyi don byed do/_/shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na sman pa'i rgyal po gso byed kyis rtsi thams cad bsdus nas rtsi'i shing mang po sbyar ba las bu mo gzugs bzang ba/_
[\[137b.2\]]mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_kha dog bzang po rgyas pa'i mchog dang ldan pa/_shin tu rdzogs par zin pa/_phyi bdar byas pa zhig byas nas der 'ong ba dang /_'gro ba dang /_'greng ba dang /_'dug pa dang /_nyal bar byed kyang mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog mod kyi bya ba de dag 
[\[137b.3\]]kyang ston to/_/de na rgyal po 'am/_rgyal bu 'am/_rgyal po'i blon po chen po'am/_tshong dpon nam/_khyim bdag gam/_mkhar gyi rgyal po 'ang rung ste/_gang na ba chen po che ba de dag 'ongs na de dag la sman pa'i rgyal po gso byed kyis/_sman gyi bu mo de dang sprad pa dang /_
[\[137b.4\]]phrad ma thag tu nad thams cad thub par 'gyur/_mi na bar 'gyur te/_gyur pa med cing bde bar 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu de ltar sman pa'i rgyal po gso byed 'jig rten gyi nad gso ba shes pa de ltar sman pa gzhan dag la med do/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chos 
[\[137b.5\]]kyi skus phye ba yang 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i lus la skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo sems can ji snyed 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gis gdungs pa rnams kyis reg na de dag reg ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' de'i sngon gyi 
[\[137b.6\]]smon lam shin tu yongs su dag pas nad thams cad byang zhing gdung ba yang med par 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu yang byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi lus can gyi lus ni zas dang skom gyis gso ba ma yin/_zas kham gyis za bas lus gso ba ma yin gyi de kha zas thams cad yongs 
[\[137b.7\]]su shes pas sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i phyir zas za'o/_/de zas za yang gtong bar mi byed do/_/zas za yang lus kyi nang du gtong bar mi byed do/_/chos kyi sku'i stobs las kyang mi nyams/_yongs su mi nyams so/_/shA ri'i bu yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]chos kyi lus can la tshe dang 'chi 'pho dang skye ba yang med la/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'chi 'pho dang skye ba yang ston to/_de 'chi 'pho yang chos thams cad 'chi 'pho med pa dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa ma yin rab tu shes so/_/
[\[138a.2\]]skye yang chos thams cad 'pho ba med par rab tu shes so/_/'byung yang chos thams cad skye ba med pas rab tu shes so/_/de chos kyi lus dang /_chos kyi zas dang /_chos kyi stobs dang /_chos la ston pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sngon gyi smon lam 
[\[138a.3\]]lhun gyis grub pas brtson 'grus ma nyams par brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/de dag lus ni rdo rje lta bur mi shigs pa/_'dul ba'i 
[\[138a.4\]]dus shes nas ni tha dad ston par 'gyur/_/mtshon gyis mi tshugs mes ni tshig pa ma yin yang /_/'dul ba'i sems can mthong nas tshugs shing mes tshig 'gyur/_/sems can na ba mthong nas sman rnams su yang 'gyur/_/de bzhin bkres pa rnams la zas dang skom 
[\[138a.5\]]du 'gyur/_/'on kyang chos kyi dbyings la rnam rtog ci yang med/_/chos kyi sku dang lus med tshul gcig rab tu 'jug_/shed las skyes dang gso dang shed can yod min te/_/chos so cog ni rten cing 'brel te byung bar shes/_/gang de'i rkyen yod pa na sdug bsngal 
[\[138a.6\]]lam 'byung ste/_/rkyen med pan sdug bsngal lam ni 'chad par 'gyur/_/gzugs 'di dbu ba rdos pa 'dra ste snying po med/_/tshor ba chu yi chu bur mtshungs shing 'dra bar sems/_/'du shes dpyid kyi dus kyi smig rgyu rgyu ba 'dra/_/'du byed rnams ni chu skyes shing dang 
[\[138a.7\]]'dra bar lta/_/ji ltar gar la lta bar sgyu ma bslabs pa rnams/_/skad cig gis ni gzugs rnams sna tshogs ston byed pa/_/mi bden byed pa de ltar rnam shes shes gyur nas/_/mkhas pa de dag thams cad du yang smon pa med/_/longs spyod rnams ni ri gzar chu dang mtshungs shing 
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]'dra/_/glog dang mkha' sprin phung po lta bur byung nas med/_/longs spyod 'gyur ba gzhu drag 'phangs pa'i mda' ltar shes/_/mkhas pa rnams ni kun tu longs spyod smon pa med/_/lha yi 'jig rten lha rdzas bde ba ma myong ba/_/'jig rten gsum po dag na sems can gang yang 
[\[138b.2\]]med/_/slar yang sems dmyal sdug bsngal myong ba mthong gyur nas/_/bde gshegs sras pos de mthong mtho ris 'gro mi byed/_/yid ni nam mkha' 'dra ba de dag gnas med de/_/gnas dang bral ba rnams la 'byung ba srid ma yin/_/'byung ba med rnams skye dang 'chi 'pho 
[\[138b.3\]]med par 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa' che ba mi rga mi 'chi 'thob/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus ma nyams pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na 'di ltar slob ste/_kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni gang 'dod chags nad chen por rab tu 
[\[138b.4\]]mi shes/_zhe sdang nad chen por rab tu mi shes/_gti mug nad chen por rab tu mi shes te/_gsum po 'di dag nad chen por rab tu mi shes pa'i sman pa mi mkhas pa sha stag gis yongs su gang /_sman pa mi shes pa sha stag gis yongs su gang nas nad chen po gsum po de dag 
[\[138b.5\]]gi sman gsum mi shes te/_'dod chags kyi nad chen po'i sman chen po mi gtsang ba yin par rab tu mi shes/_zhe sdang gi nad chen po'i sman chen po byams pa yin par rab tu mi shes/_gti mug gi nad chen po'i sman chen po rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba yin par rab tu mi shes te/_kye ma'o 
[\[138b.6\]]sman pa de dag ni nad gzhan dang /_gzhan dag gso nus kyi/_nad thams cad ni gso bar mi nus so/_/kye ma'o sman pa de dag gi sman de ni re shig gso nus pa yin gyi/_gtan du gso bar byed pa ma yin no/_/de bas na bdag cag gis ni sman pa de dag gi rjes su bslab par mi 
[\[138b.7\]]bya'i bdag cag gis ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/_chos thams cad la mkhas pa bla na med pa/_sman pa'i rgyal po chen po/_/nad thams cad gso bar byed pa'i rjes su bslab par bya'o/_/bdag cag gis ni nad thams cad gso bar bya'i nad gzhan dang gzhan dag gso 
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]bar mi bya/_bdag cag gis re shig gso bar mi bya ste/_bdag cag gis gtan du gso bar byed pa bya'o/_/gang gi sgra thos par 'dod chags kyi nad chen po rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang /_zhe sdang gi nad chen po rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang /_gti mug gi 
[\[139a.2\]]nad chen po rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos kyi sman dang /_rtsi byug pa'i sbyor ba bsdu bar bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus ma nyams pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na de bzhin gshegs pa sman pa'i rgyal po 
[\[139a.3\]]bla na med pa chos thams cad la mkhas pa ma gtogs par gang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad la med pa de 'dra ba'i chos kyi sman dang rtsis bsku ba'i sbyor ba sdud par byed de/_chos kyi sman dang /_rtsis bsku ba'i sbyor ba des chos kyi dung chen po la bskus nas yongs su 
[\[139a.4\]]sgrog ste/_de'i sgras stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di mngon par go bar byed do/_/de nas sems can du ma/_sems can brgya phrag du ma/_sems can stong phrag du ma/_sems can brgya stong phrag du ma/_sems can bye ba phrag du ma/_sems can bye ba 
[\[139a.5\]]brgya phrag du ma/_sems can bye ba stong phrag du ma/_sems can bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma/_sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma/_sems can dkrigs phrag du ma nas de bzhin du sbyar te/_brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar gyi sems can rnams kyi 
[\[139a.6\]]'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi nad chen po rab tu zhi bar 'gyur te/_shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na gangs kyi ri'i rgyal po la sman gyi rgyal po chen po 'bral bar byed pa zhes bya zhig yod de/_de'i dris dug gi drag shul thams cad las rab tu thar par 'gyur te/_
[\[139a.7\]]dpag tshad brgya tsam na 'khod pa dag kyang dug med par 'gyur ro/_shA ri'i bu gal te dud dam rdal sman gyi rgyal po chen po 'bral bar byed pas bskus te bus sam/_brdungs na sems can dug 'thungs pa 'am/_zos pa 'am/_bskus pas zug par gyur pa ji snyed pa de dag 
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]thams cad de'i sgra thos nas ni dug med par 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu gang sman gyi rgyal po 'bral bar byed pa/_de lta bu de ni sman pa'i rgyal po gso byed ma gtogs par sman pa thams cad kyis mi shes so/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang de 
[\[139b.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad la mkhas pa sman pa'i rgyal po chen po sems can thams cad kyi nad thams cad bsal pa ma gtogs par gang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad la med pa de 'dra ba'i chos kyi sman dang /_/rtsis bsku ba'i sbyor ba sdud par byed de/_
[\[139b.3\]]chos kyi sman dang rtsi bsku ba'i sbyor ba des chos kyi dung chen po la bskus nas yongs su sgrog ste/_de'i sgras stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di mngon par go bar byed do/_/de nas sems can du mas de thos nas 'dod chags kyi nad chen po rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/_
[\[139b.4\]]zhe sdang dang /_/gti mug gi nad chen po rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/_sems can du ma/_sems can brgya phrag du ma/_sems can stong phrag du ma/_sems can brgya stong phrag du ma/_/sems can bye ba phrag du ma/_/sems can bye ba brgya phrag du ma/_/sems can bye ba 
[\[139b.5\]]stong phrag du ma/_sems can bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma/_sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma/_sems can dkrigs phrag du mas nas de bzhin du sbyar te/_brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar gyi sems can rnams kyi sgra de thos nas 'dod chags kyi nad chen po 
[\[139b.6\]]rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi nad chen po rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/de gang nas sdud par byed ce na/_gang du byang chub sems dpa' de'i nor bzhag pa nas so/_/byang chub sems dpa' de'i nor gang du bzhag ce na/_byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi 
[\[139b.7\]]chos kyi rnam grangs las gud na ma yin no/_/shA ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus ma nyams pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa na/_byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs rab tu nyan to/_/'dzin to/_/'chang ngo /_/
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]klog go_/kun chub par byed do/_/gzhan la yang 'chad cing rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston to/_/shA ri'i bu de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus ma nyams pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_byang chub 
[\[140a.2\]]sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs shin tu nyan par byed/_'dzin par byed/_'chang bar byed/_klog par byed/_kun chub par byed/_gzhan dag la yang 'chad cing rgya cher yang dag par rab ston to/_/shA ri'i bu de bas na rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par 
[\[140a.3\]]bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang brtson 'grus ma nyams pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs nyan par byed/_'dzin par byed/_'chang bar byed/_klog par byed/_kun chub par 
[\[140a.4\]]byed/_gzhan dag la yang 'chad cing rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par byed do/_/yang shA ri'i bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal ba grangs med pa bas kyang ches grangs med pa/_yangs pa/_dpag tu med pa'i pha rol gyi yang shin tu pha rol tu gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus 
[\[140a.5\]]na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i bla ma zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i bla 
[\[140a.6\]]ma de 'di lta ste/_nyan thos bye ba phrag brgyad cu'i nyan thos 'dus pa chen po gcig tu byung ste/_thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa/_nyon mongs pa med pa/_dbang dang ldan par gyur pa nas sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag go_/
[\[140a.7\]]shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i bla ma de'i tshe'i tshad ni lo brgyad khri thub par gyur to/_/shA ri'i bu pad ma'i bla ma yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'i chos lo lnga brgya'i bar du gnas so/_/lo lnga brgya'i bar du yang dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs 
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]brnyan gnas so/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i bla ma yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel yang rgyas par gyur te/_de 'di lta ste dper na dang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel rgyas par 'gyur 
[\[140b.2\]]ba bzhin no/_/shA ri'i bu de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i bla ma de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya lon pa na byang chub sems dpa' gcig cig 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan zhig nas shi 'phos te/_de'i gsung rab la rgyal rigs su skyes par 
[\[140b.3\]]gyur te/_de btsas ma thag tu bdag ni chos spyod pa'i rigs su skyes kyis bdag gis chos spyad par bya'o zhes tshig de skad smras te/_de'i ming chos spyod ces btags so/_/shA ri'i bu de nas rgyal bu chos spyod dbang po yongs su smin pa'i rgyus skyes nas lo nyi shu lon pa dang 'dra ba de 
[\[140b.4\]]dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/_dgon pa nags tshal na gnas bas mtha'i gnas mal du gnas so/_/de gcig tu dben par song ste/_nang du yang dag par 'jog pa na lha zhig 'ongs nas/_dge slong khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[140b.5\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur gyis byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs la brtson par gyis shig_/ma thob par brtson 'grus nyams par ma byed cig ces don de bstan pa dang /_des lha de las tshig de thos nas dga' mgu yi rangs rab 
[\[140b.6\]]tu dga' ste dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang /_ljongs nas ljongs su byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kun tu tshol zhing rjes su spyod de/_de gang 
[\[140b.7\]]dang gang du dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra bar dge slong pha dang /_dge slong ma mthong ba dang /_de dag gi gan du song nas 'phags pa byang chub sems dpas gang la bslabs na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyis 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam 
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]grangs gang lags zhes dris pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_dge slong bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de ci 'dra bar mi shes te/_dge slong bdag cag gis ni byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam 
[\[141a.2\]]grangs kyi ming deng gdod rna bas thos su zad do zhes smras pa dang /_de 'di snyam du sems te/_lha ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]mi zer gyis ji srid du byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs ma thos pa de srid du brtson 'grus ma nyams par bya'o snyam nas/_des tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom 
[\[141a.3\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i bla ma de gang du zhu gsal bzhen ces dris pa dang /_de dag gis dge slong sa phyogs 'dir bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i bla ma de zhugs la bzhen to/_/zhes phyogs de bstan nas des phyogs de ga la ba 
[\[141a.4\]]der song ste phyin pa dang /_sa phyogs der bskor ba byas nas sa phyogs de nyid du phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i bla ma de mngon du byas nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_ji srid du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i 
[\[141a.5\]]bla ma de las byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs mngon du ma thos pa de srid du bdag sa phyogs 'di nas mi ldang zhing skyil mo krung mi gzhig go snyam mo/_/shA ri'i bu de ltar rgyal po drang srong brtson 'grus ma nyams pas de lta bur dam bcas pa brtan par byas nas 
[\[141a.6\]]sa phyogs de nyid du 'dug ste/_zhag bdun gyi bar du gnas so/_/de zhag bdun 'das pa dang /_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bcu pa nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po zhes bya ba byon nas chos kyi sgo'i 
[\[141a.7\]]tshig brgyad po 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs khong du chud par bya'o/_zhes chos kyi sgo'i tshig brgyad rnams yang dag par rab tu bstan pa dang /_de chos kyi sgo'i tshig brgyad po de dag gis mang du thos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa bla na med pa dang 
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]ldan par gyur nas sa phyogs de nyid nas langs te song ngo /_/brtson 'grus ma nyams pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams su lo drug cu'i bar du rgyu zhing 
[\[141b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid rab tu bstan to/_/des lo drug bcu'i bar du lha dang /_mi'i srog chags bye bar tshang ba snyed theg pa gsum dag la bkod nas 'chi khar sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nyid du mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar gyur cig ces 
[\[141b.3\]]smon lam btab nas de 'chi ba'i dus byas pa dang /_de 'dzam bu'i gling de nyid du tshong dpon gyi rigs shig tu slar skyes te/_de btsas ma thag tu chos spyad par bya'o/_/chos spyad par bya'o zhes tshig de skad smras nas de snga ma bzhin du ming chos spyod ces btags so/_/de btsas 
[\[141b.4\]]nas lo drug lon pa 'dra ba ste/_dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo /_/de ltar rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon par yang byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs mngon du gyur to/_/de byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs la gnas nas 
[\[141b.5\]]lo drug cu'i bar du grong nas grong du/_grong khyer nas grong khyer du/_ljongs nas ljongs su byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par rab tu ston cing rgyu'o/_/des lo drug cu'i bar du lha dang mi'i skye dgu'i srog chags gzhan bye ba 'di lta ste/_nyan thos 
[\[141b.6\]]kyi theg pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /_theg pa chen po bla na med pa dang /_theg pa gsum dag la yongs su smin par byas so/_/de yang 'chi kar mir skye bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa dang /_de smon lam gyi stobs kyis 'dzam bu'i gling de nyid du rgyal 
[\[141b.7\]]rigs shig tu slar skyes te/_de btsas ma thag tu lhas kye ma'o/_/'jig rten du sems can chos kyi bla ma 'di skyes so/_/kye ma'o 'jig rten du sems can chos kyi bla ma 'di skyes so zhes sgra phyung nas/_de'i ming chos kyi bla ma chos kyi bla ma zhes btags so/_/de yang dbang 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]po rnams yongs su smin pa'i rgyus skyes nas lo nyi shu lon pa 'dra ba de dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo /_/de ltar rab tu byung nas dge slong chos kyi bla ma de dran pa'i stobs bskyed pa dang /_shes rab kyi stobs bskyed pas slar byang chub sems dpa'i
