[\[239b.1\]]bzhin te/_'di ltar mer mer po'i lus gang yin pa de ni gzugs zhes bya'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni ming zhes bya ste/_ming dang gzugs kyi phung po lnga pos skad cig ma gcig la lus blangs nas sdug bsngal myong bar byed pa la yang ngas 
[\[239b.2\]]bsngags brjod par mi byed na yun ring por srid pa rnams su 'khor bar gyur pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_'di lta ste/_dper na mi gtsang ba ni nyung yang mnam na mang po lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_de lta bas na mer mer po'i lus nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag la su zhig sred cing chags par byed/_gzhan 
[\[239b.3\]]yang dga' bo 'di ltar lus de ma'i mngal na gnas pa yang zhag bdun phrag sum cu rtsa brgyad lon nas gdod 'byung bar 'gyur te/_zhag bdun phrag dang po la ma'i mngal na gnas pa gang yin pa de ni mer mer po zhes bya ste lus kyi mtshan ma dang por snang ba yin pas 'di lta ste/_dper na/_zho ma chags 
[\[239b.4\]]pa dang 'dra bas zhag bdun gyi bar du nang du btsos/_rab tu btsos nas 'byung ba chen po bzhi mthar gyis mngon par grub par byed do/_/zhag bdun phrag gnyis pa la ma'i mngal du gnas pa'i tshe las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni kun sdud ces bya ste/_rlung shin tu phra ma'i des ma'i rtsib 
[\[239b.5\]]logs g.yon pa dang /_g.yas pa bus te mer mer po'i lus kyi mtshan ma rim gyis snang bar byed pas de'i dbyibs zho ska ba'am/_mar 'khyags pa 'dra ste/_mngal gyi nang du btsos/_rab tu btsos pas nur nur po'i lus su gyur nas 'di ltar 'byung ba chen po bzhi po dag mthar gyis mngon 
[\[239b.6\]]par grub par byed do/_/zhag bdun phrag gsum pa la ma'i mngal du gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni mdzod ka zhes bya ste/_rlung de'i stobs kyis nur nur po gang yin pa de mthar gyis mkhregs shing ltar ltar por byed pas/_de'i dbyibs ni sman rdung ba'i gtun bu 'dra la 
[\[239b.7\]]thung zhing chung ste/_mngal gyi nang du btsos/_rab tu btsos pas 'di ltar 'byung ba chen po bzhi po 'di dag mthar gyis 'phel bar byed do/_/zhag bdun phrag bzhi pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni nang rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ste rlung de'i stobs 
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]kyis ltar ltar po gang yin pa de ni mkhrang bar byed pas/_de'i dbyibs ni mchi gu 'dra ba ste/_nang du btsos rab tu btsos pas 'byung ba chen po bzhi po mthar gyis 'phel bar byed do/_/zhag bdun phrag lnga pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa 
[\[240a.2\]]gang yin pa de ni yang dag par sdud pa zhes bya ste/_rlung de'i stobs kyi mkhrang 'gyur gang yin pa de rka lag 'gyur ba sgyur bar byed pas gor gor po gang yin pa de rnam par phye nas brla gnyis dang /_dpung pa gnyis dang /_mgo bo'i mtshan ma mngon du 'byung bar byed de/_'di lta ste/_dper na 
[\[240a.3\]]dbyar gyi dus su char 'bab pa'i tshe ljon shing rnams yal ga dang /_'dab ma skyed par byed pa de bzhin du las kyi rlung gi stobs kyis kyang lus kyi mtshan ma rnams snang bar byed do/_/zhag bdun phrag drug pa la ma'i mngal du gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni zas 
[\[240a.4\]]zhes bya ste/_rlung de'i stobs kyis mtshan me bzhi 'byung bar byed do/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lag ngar gnyis dang /_rje ngar gnyis gang yin pa de ni mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi zhes bya'o/_/zhag bdun phrag bdun pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa 
[\[240a.5\]]de ni 'khyil bar byed pa zhes bya ste rlung de'i stobs kyis mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi 'byung bar byed de/_'di lta ste/_lag mthil gnyis dang /_rkang mthil gnyis te/_de'i mtshan ma ni shin tu mnyen pas dbu ba 'dus pa dang 'dra'o/_/zhag bdun phrag brgyad pa la ma'i mngal du gnas pa'i tshe yang las 
[\[240a.6\]]kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni zlog cing sgyur bar byed pa zhes bya ste/_rlung de'i stobs kyis mtshan ma nyi shu 'byung bar byed de/_'di lta ste/_lag pa dang /_rkang pa'i sor mo'i mtshan ma nyi shu 'byung bar byed pa gang yin pa'o/_/de ni 'di lta ste dper na dbyar char 'bab pa'i tshe ljon shing rnams 
[\[240a.7\]]kyi yal ga dang /_'dab ma mthar gyis skye zhing 'phel bar byed pa de bzhin du las kyi rlung gi stobs kyis kyang mtshan ma rnams mngon du snang bar byed do/_/zhag bdun phrag dgu pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par 'byed pa zhes 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]bya ste rlung de'i stobs kyis mtshan ma rnam pa dgu 'byung bar byed do/_/dgu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mig gnyis dang /_rna ba gnyis dang /_sna gnyis dang /_kha dang /_bshang ba dang /_gci ba'i gnas gang yin pa de dag mtshan ma rnam pa dgu zhes bya'o/_/zhag bdun phrag bcu pa la ma'i mngal na gnas 
[\[240b.2\]]pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni sri bar byed pa zhes bya ste/_rlung de'i stobs kyis sra zhing brtan par byed do/_/gzhan yang de'i tshe kun nas sgo zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/_des mngal na gnas pa'i lus bus pas lus kun tu rgyas shing gang bar byed de/_'di lta ste dper na 
[\[240b.3\]]rkyal ba gang ba ji lta ba bzhin no/_/zhag bdun phrag bcu gcig pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni rdo rje zhes bya ste rlung de'i stobs kyis mngal na gnas pa de steng dang 'og gi phyogs su 'gro zhing lus kyi bu ga rnams 'byin par byed do/_/gzhan yang 
[\[240b.4\]]rlung de'i stobs kyis ma de res 'ga' dga' ba dang /_mi dga' bar yang byed/_'gro ba dang /_'greng ba dang /_'dug pa dang /_nyal ba na yang de'i rang bzhin 'gyur zhing rkang lag skyod par yang byed pas mngal na gnas pa'i bu ga rnams mthar gyis skye zhing 'phel bar yang byed la de'i kha nas khrag 
[\[240b.5\]]nag po yang 'byung bar 'gyur/_sna nas kyang chu mi gtsang ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/_rlung des dbang po rnams bzlog nas de nas zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun phrag bcu gnyis pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni yon po'i sgo zhes bya ste/_rlung 
[\[240b.6\]]de'i stobs kyis rtsib logs g.yas g.yon gyi nang grol gyi rgyu ma che chung rnams skyed par byed de/_de ni 'di lta ste/_dper na pad ma'i rtsa ba shad shad po 'am/_skud pa grims pas la bzhag pa lta bur lan [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad 'khor bar lus la brten te gnas so/_/de'i tshe gzhan yang spu brgyus pa 
[\[240b.7\]]zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/_rlung de'i dbang gis tshigs kyi yan lag sum brgya nyi shu dang /_gnad brgya rtsa gcig lus la gnas par 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun phrag bcu gsum pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni bkres shing skom par 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]byed pa zhes bya ste/_rlung de'i stobs kyis mngal gyi lus de nyam chung zhing bkres pa dang /_skom pa'i 'du shes skyed par byed pas de'i mas zos shing 'thungs pa'i ro ji snyed pa dag lus kyi gnad dang /_lte ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs su 'dzin cing phan 'dogs par byed do/_/de nas 
[\[241a.2\]]de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_bu ni ma mngal gnas pa na/_/mngal gnas de la phan 'dogs pas/_/des na lus srog rab gnas shing /_/rim gyis skye dang 'phel bar byed/_/mas ni zos shing 'thungs pa dag_/mngal na gnas na phan 'dogs pas/_/rim 
[\[241a.3\]]gyis skye tshad nga 'phel bar byed/_/zhag bdun phrag bcu bzhi pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni skud pa'i sgo zhes bya ste/_rlung de'i stobs kyis rtsa rgyud dgu brgya bskyed nas lus kyi mdun dang /_rgyab dang /_g.yas g.yon snol mar g.yogs par byed 
[\[241a.4\]]do/_/zhag bdun phrag bco lnga pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni pad ma zhes bya ste/_rlung de'i stobs kyis rtsar rgyu ba nyi shu bskyed nas bza' ba dang /_btung ba'i ro gang yin pa rtsa 'dir zhugs nas lus la phan 'dogs par byed do/_/nyi shu gang zhe 
[\[241a.5\]]na/_lus kyi mdun dang rgyab dang /_g.yas g.yon re re la yang rtsa lnga lnga yod de/_rtsa 'di dag re re la yang rtsa phra mo'i yan lag bzhi bcu bzhi bcu yod do/_/rtsa de dag re re la yang yan lag brgya brgya yod do/_/lus kyi mdun na yod pa nyi khri ni sa ga zhes bya'o/_/lus kyi rgyab na yod pa nyi khri ni 
[\[241a.6\]]stobs zhes bya'o/_/lus kyi g.yon phyogs na yod pa nyi khri ni brtan pa zhes bya'o/_/lus kyi g.yas phyogs na yod pa nyi khri ni mthu dang ldan pa zhes bya ste/_de ltar na rtsa'i yan lag che phra brgyad khri lus de la skye bar 'gyur ro/_/rtsa de dag kyang kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan te/_'di lta ste/_sngon 
[\[241a.7\]]po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_mar dang /_zho dang /_'bru mar gyi kha dog go_/rtsa brgyad khri bo de dag re re la yang rtsa ba re re yod de/_rtsa ba re re la yang bu ga sna tshogs yod de/_bu ga gcig dang /_bu ga gnyis nas bu ga bdun gyi bar dang ldan te/_re re yang spu'i 
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]bu ga dang phan tshun 'brel te de ni dper na/_pad ma'i rtsa ba la bu ga mang po yod pa ji lta ba bzhin no/_/zhag bdun phrag bcu drug pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni bdud rtsi zhes bya ste/_rlung de'i stobs kyis de'i mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_
[\[241b.2\]]kha'i sgo dang /_mid pa dang /_snying gi snying po'i kho ra khor yug gi bu ga dgu po de dag rnam par phye nas dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba steng dang 'og tu rgyu zhing thogs pa med pa dang /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba zos shing 'thungs pa gang yin pa de dag kyang /_lus la phan 'dogs shing bsags pa'i gnas 
[\[241b.3\]]yod pa dang /_legs par zhugs nas 'og gi phyogs su 'byung bar byed de/_'di lta ste/_dper na rdza mkhan nam/_de'i slob ma mkhas pas 'jim pa legs par sbyar te 'khor lo'i steng du bzhag nas 'og dang steng du bsgyur zhing snod kyi rnam pa mngon par 'dus byas nas mngon par grub pa de bzhin 
[\[241b.4\]]du 'di yang rlung gi stobs dang /_dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las kyis mig dang /_rna ba la sogs pa rim gyis yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/zhag bdun phrag bcu bdun pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni 'bri gdong zhes bya ste/_rlung de'i stobs 
[\[241b.5\]]kyis de'i mig gnyis kun tu dang ba dang /_rna ba dang /_sna'i dbang po la sogs pa yang rim gyis yongs su smin par byed de/_'di lta ste/_dper na me long gi dkyil 'khor rdul gyis yog pa sa'i phye ma dang /_'bru mar dang /_thal ba blangs te byi dor byas na yongs su gsal bar 'gyur ba 
[\[241b.6\]]de bzhin du las kyi rlung gi stobs kyis mig la sogs pa bus nas mig la sogs pa kun tu dang bar byed pa yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o/_/zhag bdun phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni brtan par 'gyur ba zhes bya ste/_
[\[241b.7\]]rlung de'i stobs kyis de'i dbang po rnams mthar gyis yongs su smin cing gsal ba dang /_yongs su dag par byed de/_'di lta ste dper na/_nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sprin dang /_khug rna rnams kyis bsgribs shing khebs par 'gyur ba glo bur du rlung drag po langs te bus nas 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]phyogs bzhir gtor bar gyur na nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor shin tu gsal bar gyur pa de bzhin du 'di ltar las kyi rlung gi dbang gis dbang po rnams bus pas ches shin tu gsal zhing yongs su dag par byed pa yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o/_/zhag bdun phrag bcu dgu pa la ma'i mngal na 
[\[242a.2\]]gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung gi stobs kyis mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce'i dbang po bzhi po dag yongs su smin par byed do/_/dang po mngal du 'jug pa'i tshe ni dbang po gsum dang ldan te/_lus kyi dbang po dang /_srog gi dbang po dang /_yid kyi dbang po ste/_de ltar dbang po rnams 
[\[242a.3\]]yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/zhag bdun phrag nyi shu pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni shin tu sra ba zhes bya ste/_rlung de'i stobs kyis de'i lus las rus pa sna tshogs skyed par byed de/_rkang pa g.yon pa la brten te rus pa nyi shu skyed do/_/
[\[242a.4\]]rkang pa g.yas pa la brten te rus pa nyi shu skyed do/_/gzhan yang rkang pa'i rting pa'i rus pa bzhi dang /_rje ngar gyi rus pa gnyis dang /_lha nga'i rus pa gnyis dang /_brla'i rus pa gnyis dang /_rked pa dang /_dpyi'i rus pa gsum gsum dang /_sgal tshigs kyi rus pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_rtsib ma'i 
[\[242a.5\]]rus pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang /_brang gi rus pa sum cu dang /_lag pa g.yas g.yon re re la rus pa nyi shu nyi shu tsha dang /_lag ngar gyi rus pa bzhi dang /_dpung pa'i rus pa gnyis dang /_'gram pa'i rus pa gnyis dang /_mgo bo'i rus pa bzhi dang /_so'i rtsa ba'i rus pa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang skyed par 
[\[242a.6\]]byed do/_/'di lta ste/_dper na gzugs mkhan nam/_gzugs mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pas sngar shing sra ba blangs te phyis srad bus bcings nas gzugs rnams byas pa la 'jim pa ma bskus mod kyi/_'on kyang de'i tshe rus pa'i mtshan nyid ces brjod pa de bzhin du las kyi rlung gi 
[\[242a.7\]]stobs kyis rus pa rnams bskyed pa'i dus kyi tshe yang de bzhin te/_de lta bas na zhag bdun po de dag tu rus pa phra mo ma gtogs pa rus pa chen po bskyed pa'i grangs ni nyis brgya yod par rig par bya'o/_/zhag bdun phrag nyi shu gcig pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]kyis rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag skyed pa zhes bya ste/_rlung de'i stobs kyis mngal na gnas pa de'i lus kyi sha skyed par byed de/_'di lta ste/_dper na zhal zhal mkhan nam/_zhal zhal mkhan gyi slob mas 'jim pa legs par sbyangs nas rtsig pa rnams la zhal 
[\[242b.2\]]zhal byed pa de bzhin du las kyi rlung gi dbang gis de'i lus kyi sha skyed pa yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o/_/zhag bdun phrag nyi shu gnyis pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni kun tu rgyal ba zhes bya ste/_rlung de'i stobs kyis de'i lus kyi khrag skyed par byed 
[\[242b.3\]]do/_/zhag bdun phrag nyi shu gsum pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni yongs su dag par 'dzin pa zhes bya ste/_rlung de'i stobs kyis lus kyi pags pa skyed par byed do/_/zhag bdun phrag nyi shu bzhi pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las 
[\[242b.4\]]kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni sprin 'dzin ces bya ste/_rlung de'i stobs kyis de'i lus kyi lag pa rkyong zhing mdog dang ldan par byed do/_/zhag bdun phrag nyi shu lnga pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni grong khyer 'dzin ces bya ste/_rlung de'i 
[\[242b.5\]]stobs kyis mngal na gnas pa de'i lus la sha dang khrag 'phel zhing rim gyis rab tu dang bar byed do/_/zhag bdun phrag nyi shu drug pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni skye ba mngon par grub ces bya ste/_rlung de'i stobs kyis de'i skra dang /_spu dang /_sen 
[\[242b.6\]]mo rnams bskyed nas thams cad rtsa rgyus rnams dang 'brel par byed do/_/zhag bdun phrag nyi shu bdun pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni sman yon chen po zhes bya ste/_rlung de'i stobs kyis de'i lus kyi mtshan ma rnams mthar gyis mngon par 
[\[242b.7\]]grub pa zhes bya ste/_gang tshe rabs snga ma la sdig pa mi dge ba'i las rnams mngon par 'dus byas shing yo byad rnams la ser snas phangs shing sbyin pa gtong bar mi byed pa dang /_pha ma dang /_mkhan po dang /_bla ma'i gnas rnams kyis rjes su bstan pa nyan par mi byed pa zhig yin na ni 
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]las de'i dbang gis yid du mi 'ong ba'i lus rnam pa sna tshogs 'thob par 'gyur bas gal te lus ring zhing sbom pa dang /_tsho zhing dkar ba dang /_mnyen pa gang yin pa des mdzes par gyur na ni lus thung zhing phra ba dang /_rid cing gnag pa dang /_rtsub pa dag 'thob par byed do/_/gal te lus 
[\[243a.2\]]thung zhing phra ba dang /_rid cing gnag pa dang /_rtsub pa gang yin pa des mdzes par gyur na ni lus ring zhing sbom pa dang /_tsho zhing dkar ba dang /_shin tu mnyen pa dag 'thob par byed do/_/gal te lus kyi yan lag mtho ba dang /_dma' ba dang /_mang ba dang /_nyung ba dang /_thags bzang ba dang /_
[\[243a.3\]]thags ngan pas mdzes par gyur na ni mtho ba dang /_dma' ba dang /_thags bzang ba dang /_thags ngan pa dang mi ldan pa'i lus yang dag par len par byed do/_/gzhan yang 'on pa dang /_long ba dang /_lkugs pa dang /_rkang lag 'phye zhing 'gro ba dang /_dbang po rnams ma tshang ba dang /_
[\[243a.4\]]tshig smras pa gzhan gyis mnyan par mi 'dod pa dang /_lus mi sdug cing [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang 'dra ba yang dag par len par 'gyur te/_sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi dbang gis yid du mi 'ong ba'i lus rnam pa sna tshogs len par 'gyur bas pha ma dang /_gnyen bshes rnams kyis kyang mthong bar mi 
[\[243a.5\]]'dod na gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/_gal te tshe rabs snga ma la dge ba bcu'i las mngon par 'dus byas shing sbyin pa legs par btang ba dang /_ser sna dang /_g.yo sgyu'i bsam pa med pa dang /_pha ma dang /_mkhan po dang /_bla ma'i gnas rnams kyis rjes su bstan pa dag la mngon par yid 
[\[243a.6\]]ches shing yang dag par blangs pa zhig yin na ni rgyu dang rkyen des gal te mi'i lus thob par gyur na yang gong du bstan pa lta bu'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i las las mngon par grub pa'i lus len par mi 'gyur zhing gya nom pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i lus thob par 'gyur bas byang bzhin mdzes pa dang /_
[\[243a.7\]]mtshan rnams dang ldan zhing tshig smras pa rnams mang po kun gyis mnyan par 'dod pa'i 'os su 'gyur te/_de lta bas na dge ba'i las kyi dbang gis khyad par du 'phags pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa de lta bu thob par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/_/dga' bo de lta bu'i lus de yang gal te pho 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]yin ni ma'i mngal na g.yas phyogs su tsog pur 'dug la/_lag pa gnyis kyis gdong g.yogs nas ma'i sgal tshigs logs su bltas te 'dug go_/gal te mo yin ni rtsib logs g.yon phyogs na tsog pur 'dug la lag pa gnyis kyis gdong g.yogs nas ma'i lto ba la kha bltas nas 
[\[243b.2\]]ma zhu ba'i gnas kyi ni 'og_/zhu ba'i gnas kyi ni steng na nang du btsos/_rab tu btsos shing gnas lnga kun tu bcings pas/_'di lta ste/_dper na rtswa'i rkyal ba'i nang na 'dug pa dang 'dra'o/_/gal te de'i mas shin tu mang du zos sam/_shin tu nyung ngu zos sam/_gal te zas shin tu mngar ba 
[\[243b.3\]]'am/_shin tu rtsub pa'am/_shin tu bska ba'am/_shin tu snum pa'am/_shin tu lan tshwa bro ba'am/_shin tu kha ba'am/_shin tu skyur ba'am/_shin tu grang ba'am/_shin tu tsha ba dag zos par gyur tam/_gzhan yang 'dod chags spyad par gyur tam/_drag tu song ba'am mchongs pa byas sam/_yun ring du 
[\[243b.4\]]nyal lam/_yun ring du 'dug par gyur na yang /_mngal na gnas pa de sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur te/_de lta bas na ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe sdug bsngal mang po de lta bu dag gis rab tu gzir bar rig par bya'o/_/ngas mir gyur pa'i sdug bsngal mdo tsam du bstan pa yang de 'dra na sems 
[\[243b.5\]]can dmyal ba rnams kyi sdug bsngal dper bya dka' blta smos kyang ci dgos te/_mkhas pa su zhig 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor lus 'di lta bu la rab tu mos par byed/_zhag bdun phrag nyi shu brgyad pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe phyin ci log gi 'du shes rnam pa brgyad 'byung bar 
[\[243b.6\]]'gyur te/_brgyad gang zhe na/_bzhon pa'i 'du shes dang /_khang bu brtsegs pa'i 'du shes dang /_khri stan gyi 'du shes dang /_chu mig gi 'du shes dang /_rdzing gi 'du shes dang /_chu bo'i 'du shes dang /_kun dga' ra ba'i 'du shes dang /_skyed mos tshal gyi 'du shes te/_
[\[243b.7\]]'di ni 'du shes rnam pa brgyad ces bya'o/_/zhag bdun phrag nyi shu dgu pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni me tog phreng ba zhes bya ste/_rlung de'i stobs kyis mngal na gnas pa de'i lus kyi pags pa'i mdog kun tu bzang zhing 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]mtshan ma rnams rab tu gsal bar byed de/_thams cad kyang 'das pa'i dus su las rnams mngon par 'dus byas pa'i bye brag mi mtshungs pas rnam pa ji lta ba bzhin du kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan par 'gyur bas kha cig ni kha dog dkar por 'gyur/_kha cig ni kha dog 
[\[244a.2\]]nag por 'gyur/_kha cig ni kha dog dkar ba yang ma yin/_gnag pa yang ma yin par 'gyur/_kha cig ni kha dog sngon por 'gyur/_kha cig ni kha dog rtsub cing skam par 'gyur/_kha cig ni kha dog snum par 'gyur te/_'di lta bu'i kha dog gi mtshan nyid dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/zhag 
[\[244a.3\]]bdun phrag sum cu pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni lcags kyi sgo zhes bya ste/_rlung de'i stobs kyis de'i skra dang /_spu dang /_sen mo rnams rab tu skyed pa dang /_kha dog dkar nag rnams rab tu gsal bar byed de las kyi rkyen gyis mtshan ma 
[\[244a.4\]]'di dang 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun phrag sum cu gcig pa nas zhag bdun phrag sum cu lnga pa'i bar du ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe ni lus kyi mtshan ma rnams cher skye bar 'gyur bas mthar gyis lus kyi yan lag phun sum tshogs shing yangs par 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun phrag sum 
[\[244a.5\]]cu drug pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe ni de 'byung ba'i bsam pa skye bas mngon par mi dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun phrag sum cu bdun pa la ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe ni phyin ci log tu ma gyur pa'i 'du shes rnam pa lnga 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/lnga gang zhe na/_mi gtsang ba'i 'du shes dang /_
[\[244a.6\]]dri mi zhim pa'i 'du shes dang /_btson ra'i 'du shes dang /_mun nag gi 'du shes dang /_yongs su skyo nas phyir 'byung ba'i 'du shes skye ba gang yin pa ste/_mngal na gnas pa de yongs su skyo ba'i bsam pa de lta bu dag skye bar 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun phrag sum cu brgyad pa la ma'i mngal na 
[\[244a.7\]]gnas pa'i tshe yang las kyi rlung mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de ni thogs pa'i rkyen ces bya ste/_rlung de'i stobs kyis de rab tu sgyur bar byed do/_/gzhan yang kha thur du lta ba zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/_de'i mgo thur du lta zhing lag pa gnyis brkyang ste/_mthar gyis 'byung bar 'dod par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]mngal na gnas pa de gal te tshe rabs snga ma la mngal du 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i las bsags pa zhig yin na ni de'i lag pa dang rkang pa snol mar gyur nas sgyur mi nus pas sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi rkyen gyis ma'i mngal nyid du 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te/_de'i ma yang de'i tshe sdug bsngal chen 
[\[244b.2\]]po myong ba'am/_yang na 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro/_/gal te tshe rabs snga ma la dge ba'i las rnams mngon par 'dus byas shing tshe ring por 'gyur ba'i rgyu bsags pa zhig yin na ni btsas su nye ba'i tshe ma dang /_bu gnyi ga rab tu bde zhing sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi sdug bsngal gong ma 
[\[244b.3\]]lta bu med do/_/zhag bdun phrag sum cu rtsa brgyad 'das nas mngal nas 'byung bar 'dod pa'i tshe/_sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong nas gdod 'byung bar 'gyur ba de'i phyir lus 'di lta bu len pa 'di ni yang dag par sdug bsngal chen po yin par rig par bya'o/_/dang po mngal nas 'byung ba'i 
[\[244b.4\]]tshe khye'u 'u 'am/_bu mo yang rung ste/_sa la lhung ma thag tu lag pas bzung ngam/_gos kyis blangs sam/_khri la bzhag gam/_khang pa'i nang du bzhag gam/_sa la bzhag gam/_bla gab med par bzhag gam/_nyi ma la bzhag gam/_dgun nam/_dbyar gyi dus su grang ba dang /_tsha ba'i 
[\[244b.5\]]rlung gis btsas ma thag pa'i lus de la reg par gyur na yang sdug bsngal chen po myong bar 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_dper na ba lang gson por bshus pa rtsig pa la reg gam/_bla gab med pa'i thang la lhung bar gyur na srog chags dag gis za bar 'gyur ba'am/_gzhan yang 'di lta ste/_dper 
[\[244b.6\]]na mi zhig la sbrang bu mchu [{]rings [,]ring [}]rnams kyis za ba la yang lcag gis gzhus pa de bzhin du dang po mngal nas byung ba'i tshe chu dron po dag gis lus bkrus pas reg pa'i sdug bsngal myong ba yang de dang 'dra'o/_/btsas nas mthar gyis cher 'gyur ba dang /_ma'i lus las khrag dang 'dres pa'i nu zho byung 
[\[244b.7\]]nas gso bar byed de/_ngas sngar mdo sde gzhan dag las rgya cher bstan pa yin no/_/de lta bas na lus 'di ni mi gtsang ba dang /_sdug bsngal mang po las mngon par grub pa yin pas mkhas pa su zhig 'khor ba na 'di 'dra ba'i lus la rjes su chags par byed/_gzhan yang dga' bo 
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]dang po mngal nas byung nas zhag bdun lon pa dang /_srog chags srin bu'i rigs stong phrag brgyad cu lus las skyes nas de las za bar byed do/_skra la za ba zhes bya ba'i srin bu'i rigs gnyis yod de skra la gnas nas skra la za bar byed do/_/srin bu'i rigs gnyis ni mig la gnas nas 
[\[245a.2\]]mig la za bar byed do/_/srin bu'i rigs ba ha na dang /_rkan ldan dang /_nad slong dang /_yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba bzhi yod de klad pa la gnas nas klad pa la za bar byed do/_/srin bu'i rigs sA lu nag po'i lo ma zhes bya ba gcig yod de rna ba la gnas nas rna ba la za bar byed do/_/srin bu'i rigs 
[\[245a.3\]]mdzod sgo zhes bya ba gcig yod de sna la gnas nas sna la za bar byed do/_/srin bu'i rigs 'phen pa dang /_kun tu 'phen pa zhes bya ba gnyis yod de mchu la gnas nas mchu la za bar byed do/_/srin bu'i rigs khab mchu zhes bya ba gcig yod de lce la gnas nas lce la za bar byed do/_/srin bu'i rigs kha 
[\[245a.4\]]rno zhes bya ba gcig yod de lce'i drung na gnas nas lce'i drung la za bar byed do/_/srin bu'i rigs lag rdzogs zhes bya ba gcig yod de rkan la gnas nas rkan la za bar byed do/_/srin bu'i rigs lag pa dra ba can dang /_phyed sgyur zhes bya ba gnyis yod de lag mthil la gnas nas lag mthil la za 
[\[245a.5\]]bar byed do/_/srin bu'i rigs dpung pa dang /_nye ba'i dpung pa zhes bya ba gnyis yod de dpung pa la gnas nas dpung pa la za bar byed do/_/srin bu'i rigs lcags can dang nye ba'i lcags can zhes bya ba gnyis yod de mid pa la gnas nas mid pa la za bar byed do/_/srin bu'i rigs rdo rje dang /_
[\[245a.6\]]rdo rje chen po zhes bya ba gnyis yod de snying la gnas nas snying la za bar byed do/_/srin bu'i rigs dman pa dang /_dman pa'i kha zhes bya ba gnyis yod de sha la gnas nas sha la za bar byed do/_/srin bu'i rigs kha dog ldan dang /_grags ldan zhes bya ba gnyis yod de khrag la gnas nas khrag la 'thung bar 
[\[245a.7\]]byed do/_/srin bu'i rigs dpa' bo dang /_dri gtong zhes bya ba gnyis yod de chu ba la gnas nas chu ba la za bar byed do/_/srin bu'i rigs mi mtho ba dang /_khas spub ces bya ba gnyis yod de rgyab kyi rgal tshigs la gnas nas rgyab kyi rgal tshigs la za bar byed do/_/srin bu'i rigs tshil gyi 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]kha dog ces bya ba gcig yod de tshil la gnas nas tshil la za bar byed do/_/srin bu'i rigs mkhris pa'i kha dog ces bya ba gcig yod de mkhris pa la gnas nas mkhris pa la za bar byed do/_/srin bu'i rigs mu tig ces bya ba gcig yod de mchin pa la gnas nas mchin pa la za bar byed do/_/
[\[245b.2\]]srin bu'i rigs 'dam bu zhes bya ba gcig yod de mtsher pa la gnas nas mtsher pa la za bar byed do/_/srin bu'i rigs lnga brgya yod de rigs brgya ni zla ba zhes bya'o/_/rigs brgya ni zla ba'i kha zhes bya'o/_/rigs brgya ni bsil byed ces bya'o/_/rigs brgya ni bsil byed gtong zhes bya'o/_/rigs brgya ni 
[\[245b.3\]]yangs pa zhes bya ste/_rtsib logs g.yon pa la gnas nas rtsib logs g.yon pa la za bar byed do/_/gzhan yang srin bu'i rigs lnga brgya yod pa yang ming gong ma dang 'thun te/_rtsib logs g.yas pa la gnas nas rtsib logs g.yas pa la za bar byed do/_/srin bu'i rigs cung zad 'bigs pa 
[\[245b.4\]]dang /_cher 'bigs pa dang /_rus pa 'bigs pa dang /_rus pa'i gdong zhes bya ba bzhi yod de rus pa la gnas nas rus pa la za bar byed do/_/srin bu'i rigs cher dkar ba dang /_cung zad dkar ba dang /_snum pa'i stobs dang /_stag la ma zhes bya ba bzhi yod de rtsa rgyus la gnas nas rtsa rgyus la za bar 
[\[245b.5\]]byed do/_/srin bu'i rigs mos pa'i yid dang /_seng ge'i stobs dang /_ri bong lto dang /_'dod pa la mngon par zhen pa zhes bya ba bzhi yod de ma zhu ba'i gnas la gnas nas ma zhu ba'i gnas la za bar byed do/_/srin bu'i rigs dpa' bo dang /_dpa' bo'i bdag po zhes bya ba gnyis yod de zhu ba'i 
[\[245b.6\]]gnas la gnas nas zhu ba'i gnas la za bar byed do/_/srin bu'i rigs mu kha dang /_dra ba kha dang /_phung po'i kha dang /_bye'u kha zhes bya ba bzhi yod de gci ba'i lam la gnas nas gci ba'i lam la za bar byed do/_/srin bu'i rigs byed pa dang /_byed pa chen po dang /_phyi ma dang /_po ta ra ka zhes bya ba bzhi 
[\[245b.7\]]yod de bshang ba'i lam la gnas nas bshang ba'i lam la za bar byed do/_/srin bu'i rigs gdong gnag dang /_'jigs su rung ba'i gdong zhes bya ba gnyis yod de brla la gnas nas brla la za bar byed do/_/srin bu'i rigs mdze can dang /_mdze can chung ngu zhes bya ba gnyis yod de pus mo 
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]la gnas nas pus mo la za bar byed do/_/srin bu'i rigs myos pa'i rtsa ba zhes bya ba gcig yod de byin pa la gnas nas byin pa la za bar byed do/_/srin bu'i rigs mgo nag ces bya ba gcig yod de rkang pa la gnas nas rkang pa la za bar byed do/_/dga' bo ngas deng khyod la srin bu'i 
[\[246a.2\]]rigs stong phrag brgyad cu lus 'di la gnas nas nyin mtshan du za bar byed pas nyams stobs chung zhing mdog ngan par byed pa dang /_nad kyi sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs lus 'di la 'dus nas gzhan yang de'i sems gdung ba dang /_rab tu gdung ba dang /_yongs su gdung bar byed pas sman pa/_
[\[246a.3\]]mkhas pa yod kyang /_de la rmongs nas sman gang gis nad 'di dag gso bar nus pa shes par mi 'gyur ba mdor bstan pa yin te/_mkhas pa su zhig 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'di 'dra ba'i lus la rjes su chags par byed/_gzhan yang dga' bo dang po btsas nas cher skye bar 'gyur ba'i bar du 
[\[246a.4\]]gos dang zas kyis gsos nas/_lus 'di mngon par grub par gyur kyang /_de'i tshe'i tshad lo brgya thub pa yang yod de de bas thung ba yang yod do/_/lo brgya po de yang dus sum brgyar 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste/_dpyid dang /_dbyar dang /_dgun gyi dus gang yin pa'o/_/de las dpyid gang yin 
[\[246a.5\]]pa de ni tshe ba'i dus so/_/dbyar gang yin pa de ni char 'bab pa'i dus so/_/dgun gang yin pa de ni grang ba'i dus so/_/dus gsum po de dag re re la yang zla ba bzhi bzhi yod pas lo gcig la ni zla ba bcu gnyis yod par 'gyur la lo brgya la ni zla ba stong nyis brgya yod par 'gyur bas zla ba yar 
[\[246a.6\]]gyi ngo dkar po dang /_zla ba mar gyi ngo nag pos phye na ni nyis stong bzhi brgyar 'gyur te/_de la nyin mtshan ni stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug yod do/_/nyin gcig la lan gnyis su za bas zas ni lan stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis za bar 'gyur te/_res 'ga' mi za ba yang grangs der 'dus so/_/de ni 
[\[246a.7\]]'di lta ste/_na ba dang /_ra ro ba dang /_ched du zas bcad pa dang /_gnyid log pa dang /_rtsed mo rtses pa dang /_las gzhan gyis brel ba dang /_ma'i nu zho 'thungs pa'i rgyu dang /_rkyen gyis ma zos pa gang yin pa de ni ma zos pa zhes bya'o/_/'di lta bu'i lus 'di lo brgya thub par gyur kyang mthar 
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]'jig par 'gyur bas mkhas pa su zhig 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'dir de la rjes su chags par byed/_gzhan yang dga' bo lus 'di yang dag pa blangs pa la sdug bsngal rnam pa gnyis yod de/_gnyis gang zhe na/_nad mang po rnams lus la 'dus pa gang yin pa de ni nang gi sdug bsngal zhes bya'o/_/
[\[246b.2\]]mi dang mi ma yin pas rnam par 'tshe ba gang yin pa de ni phyi rol gyi sdug bsngal zhes bya'o/_/de la nad mang po lus la 'dus pa zhes bya ba ji lta bu zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lkog ma dang /_so dang /_brang dang /_lto ba dang /_lag pa dang /_rkang pa rnams na bar 
[\[246b.3\]]gyur pa dang /_gzhan yang rlung na ba dang /_mchil sna bas dang /_smyos pa dang /_khong rde dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_glo ba na ba dang /_gci ba'i lam rtsub pa dang /_g.yan pa dang /_mdze dang /_'bras dang /_thor bu dang /_shu ba dang /_'brum bu dang /_rkang bam dang /_gzhan yang nad rnam pa 
[\[246b.4\]]sna tshogs lus la 'dus pa gang yin pa'o/_/gzhan yang mkhris pa'i nad brgya rtsa gcig dang /_rlung nad brgya rtsa gcig dang /_bad kan gyi nad brgya rtsa gcig dang /_rlung dang mkhris pa dang /_bad kan 'dus pa las byung ba'i nad brgya rtsa gcig ste/_de ltar nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi dag gis lus 
[\[246b.5\]]nyon mongs pa gang yin pa de ni nang gi sdug bsngal zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang phyi rol gyi sdug bsngal gyis lus 'di la gnod par byed pa 'di lta ste/_btson ra dam por bcug pa dang /_lcag gis gzhus pa dang /_btson rar bcug pa dang /_bcings pa'i sdug bsngal gang yin pa dang /_gzhan 
[\[246b.6\]]yang rna ba bcad pa dang /_sna bcad pa dang /_lag pa dang /_rkang pa gtubs pa dang /_mgo bcad pa dang /_lha rnams kyis ma bsrungs pas mi ma yin pa'i gdon ma rungs pa rnams dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po rnams kyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa dang /_gzhan 
[\[246b.7\]]yang sbrang bu mchu [{]rings [,]ring [}]dang /_sha sbrang la sogs pa'i srin bu gdug pa rnams kyis zos pa dang /_grang ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_bkres pa dang /_skom pa dang /_rlung dang /_char pa nye bar gnas par gyur pa'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis lus nyon mongs par byed de/_mir gyur pa 
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]rnams kyi sdug bsngal yang de dang 'dra na ngan 'gro rnams kyi sdug bsngal lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_de ni shin tu brjod par dka'o/_/de lta bas na 'di dag thams cad kyang 'das pa'i dus su sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'dus byas pa'i dbang gis 'di lta bu'i rnam par smin pa 
[\[247a.2\]]myong bar rig par bya'o/_/gang gis mtshon cha dag gis gnod pa byas pa yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir/_grong khyer brtsigs te 'obs kyis bskor nas lus 'di yongs su bsrungs kyang /_rlung dang /_char pa dang /_sbrang bu mchu [{]rings [,]ring [}]dang /_sha sbrang la sogs pa khang khyim dag tu 'ongs nas gnod pa 
[\[247a.3\]]byed par 'gyur la/_nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhes kyang nang dang /_phyi rol nyon mongs par byed do/_/bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_mal cha dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_zhing dang /_kun dga' ra ba dang /_khang khyim dang /_gser dang /_dngul la sogs pa rin po che sna bdun dang /_bran pho dang /_
[\[247a.4\]]bran mo dang /_shing rta dang bzhon pa dang /_'tsho ba'i yo byad rnams yongs su tshol ba na gal te yid dang 'thun par ma gyur na yang sdug bsngal skyed par byed la gal te longs spyod thob par gyur na yang ser snas phangs shing rtag tu srung ba dang /_gal te stor cing chud zos par gyur na yang sdug 
[\[247a.5\]]bsngal chen po skyed par byed do/_/dga' bo mdor na nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i lus 'di ni 'gro ba dang /_sdod pa dang /_'dug pa dang /_nyal ba'i spyod lam thams cad sdug bsngal ma yin pa gang yang med pas/_gal te yun ring du 'gro zhing skad cig tsam du yang ngal ba sor med par 
[\[247a.6\]]gyur na yang sdug bsngal 'byung bar 'gyur la/_sdod pa dang /_'dug pa dang /_nyal ba de dag so so nas yun ring du gyur na yang thams cad sdug bsngal bar 'gyur bas/_gal te yun ring du song song ba las skad cig tsam 'dug tu yod par gyur na/_bde ba'i 'du shes skyed par byed kyang 
[\[247a.7\]]de yang dag par bde bar byed pa ma yin no/_/gal te yun ring du 'greng ba las skad cig tsam 'dug pa dang /_gal te yun ring du 'dug pa las skad cig tsam nyal bar gyur pa la yang dag pa ma yin pas bde ba'i 'du shes skyed par byed kyang de yang dag par bde ba ma yin pas de'i phyir 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i lus 'di ni thams cad sdug bsngal yin par rig par bya'o/_/gang la la zhig gis bdag gi don dang /_gzhan gyi don dang /_bdag dang gzhan gyi don gyi phyir de lta bu'i sdug bsngal rnams la yongs su skyo bar byas nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/_
[\[247b.2\]]yang dag par slob par byed na mya ngan 'das pa'i rnam par grol ba'i chos las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur la/_gang la la zhig gos dang /_mal cha dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyis de la rim gro byed pa de dag kyang rnam par smin pa chen po'i mthu dang /_grags pa thob 
[\[247b.3\]]par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/_gzugs gang yin pa de ci rtag pa zhig yin nam/_'on te mi rtag pa zhig yin/_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gzugs de ni mi rtag pa lags 
[\[247b.4\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gal te mi rtag pa yin na de sdug bsngal ba zhig yin nam/_'on te sdug bsngal med pa zhig yin/_dga' bos gsol pa/_gzugs gang lags pa de ni sdug bsngal ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang mi 
[\[247b.5\]]rtag cing sdug bsngal ba de ni rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can 'phags pa nyan thos mang du thos pa dang ldan pa gang de lta bu'i bstan pa thos par gyur na yang lus 'di ni 'di lta bu'i gzugs can no zhes 'dzin cing de la bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin par byed dam/_bcom ldan 
[\[247b.6\]]'das de ni ma lags te/_gzugs la bdag ces bgyi ba yang ma mchis la bdag gi zhes bgyi ba yang ma mchis lags so/_/gzhan yang dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de dag ci rtag pa zhig yin nam/_'on 
[\[247b.7\]]te mi rtag pa zhig yin/_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad ni mi rtag pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gal te mi rtag pa yin na ci sdug bsngal ba zhig yin nam/_'on te sdug bsngal med pa zhig 
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]yin/_dga' bos gsol pa/_'di ltar phung po bzhi po de dag ni sdug bsngal ba zhes bgyi ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang mi rtag cing sdug bsngal ba de ni rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin na 'phags pa'i nyan thos mang du thos pa dang ldan pa 
[\[248a.2\]]gang de lta bu'i bstan pa thos par gyur na yang lus 'di phung po bzhi po dag la bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin par byed dam/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_phung po bzhi po dag la yang dag par bdag ces bgyi ba yang ma mchis la bdag gi zhes bgyi ba yang ma mchis lags so/_/
[\[248a.3\]]gzhan yang dga' bo 'di ltar bdag ces bya ba de ni 'das pa dang /_da ltar byung ba dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_nang dang /_phyi rol na yang yod pa ma yin la rags pa dang /_phra ba dang /_bzang po dang /_ngan pa dang /_nye ba dang /_ring ba yang ma yin pas chos de dag thams cad ni bdag dang /_bdag gi 
[\[248a.4\]]ma yin no/_/de lta bas na dga' bo 'di ltar yang dag par shes pas chos rnams la bdag med par so sor brtag par rig par bya'o/_/'phags pa'i nyan thos mang du thos pa dang ldan pa gang de ltar so sor brtags nas yongs su skyo ba skyed par byed na rnam par grol zhing mthar yongs su 
[\[248a.5\]]mya ngan las 'das pa thob par gyur te/_de ltar yang dag par bslabs nas chos 'di mngon du gyur pa'i tshe skye ba'i chu ni zad cing tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par spyad pas bya ba byas nas yang srid pa phyi ma len par mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' 
[\[248a.6\]]stsal pa na/_tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo ni rdul spangs shing dri ma dang bral bas chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa thob par gyur to/_/dge slong lnga brgya po de dag ni chos rnams la len pa med par zag pa zad nas sems rnam par grol bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' 
[\[248a.7\]]stsal nas/_'khor mang po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/_tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la mngal du 'jug pa bstan pa'i le'u ste/_le'u bcu bzhi pa rdzogs so//
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]{D59}]'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las le'u [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa ste/_'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bstan pa/_bam po dang po/_//rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya many+dzu shrI 
[\[248b.2\]]bud d+ha k+Shetragu Na byUhanAm ma hA yA na su tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig 
[\[248b.3\]]na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la/_dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byams pa dang /_'jam dpal dang /_ngan song sel dang /_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_mthu chen thob la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[248b.4\]]brgyad khri bzhi stong la 'di lta ste/_thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_lha bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang /_
[\[248b.5\]]lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i tshangs pa bzhi khri nyis stong dang yang thabs cig go_/'di lta ste/_lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag zangs ris dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po 
[\[248b.6\]]stobs can dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po phrag rtsub dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab dga' dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po bzhi thams cad kyang g.yog lha ma yin brgya stong phrag du ma yod pa dang thabs cig go_/klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /_nye dga' bo dang /_klu'i rgyal po chu lha dang /_
[\[248b.7\]]klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang /_klu'i rgyal po gzi can dang /_klu'i rgyal po gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang /_klu'i rgyal pos 'dzin dang /_klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang /_klu'i rgyal po bdud las rgyal ba dang /_klu'i rgyal po zla ba'i bla ma la sogs pa/_klu'i rgyal po 
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]stong phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis dang /_'di lta ste/_rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang /_rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang /_rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang dang /_rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi thams cad kyang g.yog brgya stong du ma dang bcas pa dag dang /_
[\[249a.2\]]gnod sbyin kum b+hi ra dang /_'brog gnas dang /_khab spu dang /_yid [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_blo gros bzang po dang /_dbyibs [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_kun nas kha dog dang /_gnod sbyin mi 'khrugs pa dang /_de dag dang gnod sbyin gzhan brgya stong dang yang thabs cig go_/yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i 
[\[249a.3\]]khab kyi grong khyer chen por nye bar gnas shing bzhugs te/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa dag dang /_'khor bzhi rnams kyis bsti stang du byas/_bla mar byas/_rim gror byas 
[\[249a.4\]]nas mchod cing gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dang /_myang ba dang /_na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun gyi gsos sman dang /_yo byad bzang po mang po brnyes so/_/yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe sham thabs dang chos gos gas gsol/_
[\[249a.5\]]lhung bzed bsnams te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 
[\[249a.6\]]'phrul chen pos me tog ud pa la dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po'i char chen po ni mngon par 'bebs/_sil snyan brgya stong ni dkrol nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i khyim du bsod snyoms kyi phyir gshegs te/_'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yang 
[\[249a.7\]]rab tu phyung ngo /_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par 'du mdzad pas zhabs gang dang gang du bzhag pa'i zhabs bzhag pa de dang der pad ma shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam 'dab ma ni gser/_chu ba ni dngul/_ze ba ni bai dUr+ya/_snying po ni nor bu 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]bzang po dang ldan pa rnams byung ste/_pad ma de dag gi dbus kyi snying po la byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug pa dag 'byung ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs de dag pad ma de dag dang bcas te 
[\[249b.2\]]rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po la lan bdun skor ba byed cing tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/skye bo rnams la phan mdzad ded dpon gang /_/yon gyi gnas gang dge ba rnams mdzad pa/_/shAkya khyu mchog blo zhi bdag nyid che/_/'jig rten mgon po de ni grong du gshegs/_/lha yi 
[\[249b.3\]]gnas su gang rnams rtsen pa dang /_/de bzhin dga' dang 'chi las thar 'dod dang /_/bdud kyi sde rnams pham par gang 'dod pa/_/des ni shAkya seng ge mchod par gyis/_/'gro ba rnams la phan zhing thugs brtse'i phyir/_/bskal pa bye bar spyad pa rnam spyod pa/_/thub pa rnams kyi sgra yang rnyed 
[\[249b.4\]]par dka'/_/thub pa de deng rgyal po'i khab gshegs bzhed/_/zas skom de bzhin gos dang bzhon pa dang /_/bu dang bu mo chung ma rnams dang ni/_/sbyin pa dpag med bsam yas gang btang ba/_/kun mkhyen de ni rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs/_/lag pa rkang pa mig dang rna ba dang /_/
[\[249b.5\]]sna dang yan lag dam pa mgo btang ste/_/kun btang yon tan ldan pa gtong phod pa/_/des ni kun mkhyen ye shes mchog brnyes so/_/sbyin dang dul dang sdom la gang bslabs shing /_/skyes bu dam pa tshul khrims ma nyams pa/_/bzod pa'i bdag nyid yon tan mchog ldan pa/_/zhi 
[\[249b.6\]]ba'i thugs de grong du deng gshegs so/_/sdug bsngal bying ba'i 'jig rten rab gzigs nas/_/brtson mchog bskal pa bye bar gang spyod cing /_/bsam gtan mtha' yas mnyam pa med dang ldan/_/tshangs dbyangs de ni de ring grong khyer gshegs/_/drang srong chen po de yi shes rab ni/_/
[\[249b.7\]]mtshungs med nam mkha'i mtha' ltar dpag tu med/_/bde gshegs de yi yon tan gzhan dag kyang /_/spyod pa dang ni rnam par smin pas sbyangs/_/blo ldan gang gis bdud kyi sde bcom zhing /_/mi g.yo go 'phang mya ngan med pa brnyes/_/chos kyi 'khor lo tshul bzhin rab bskor te/_/
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]chos kyi dbang phyug de ni grong khyer gshegs/_/mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis brgyan pa'i sku/_/bde gshegs 'gyur bar su dag 'dod pa ni/_/snying la rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems zhog ste/_/mchod pa'i phyir ni de yi thad du song /_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug spang ba dang /_/
[\[250a.2\]]de bzhin nyon mongs gzhan las rgyal 'dod pa/_/de ni ston pa'i thad du nyer song la/_/mchod pa rnam mang mtha' yas myur du gyis/_/tshangs pa dang ni lha yi dbang phyug dang /_/brgya byin nyid ni thob par su 'dod cing /_/lha yi bde bas rtag tu rtsen dga' ba/_/de ni thub pa mchod phyir 
[\[250a.3\]]nye bar song /_/gling bzhi'i bdag po rgyal por 'gyur bya zhing /_/rin chen mchog bdun rang gis 'thob pa dang /_/bu mchog stong rnams kyang ni gang 'dod pa/_/sems can mchog la des myur mchod pa gyis/_/khyim bdag tshong dpon khams kyi rgyal po dang /_/mdzes pa'i 
[\[250a.4\]]gzugs dang g.yog 'khor dam pa dang /_/longs spyod 'phel ba'i mchog rnams gang 'dod pa/_/de ni deng sang thub la mchod pa gyis/_/gang su rnam par grol dang grol ba kun/_/thub pa rnams kyi chos mchog thos nas te/_/'dren pa rnams kyi sgra yang 'dir dkon gyis/_/
[\[250a.5\]]de phyir chos nyan du ni der myur deng /_/de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis bskul nas skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo rnams me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_
[\[250a.6\]]byug pa dang /_phye ma'i phur ma thogs/_gser dang /_dngul gyi me tog gi phur ma thogs/_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan thogs/_rnga bo che dang /_dung dang rdza rnga dang /_'khar rnga dang /_pi bang rgyud gcig pa dang /_sgra snyan pa dang /_gling bu dang /_'khar dkrol dang /_kim 
[\[250a.7\]]pa la dang /_na gul dang /_pi bang thogs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa yid la byed cing de bzhin gshegs pa la sems te/_sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba thob cing 'khod par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong 
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]khyer chen por gshegs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs g.yas pa sgo'i them pa la bzhag ma thag tu de nas grong khyer thams cad rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos/_lha dang mi'i sil snyan brgya stong yang ma dkrol bar sgra byung /_lha'i me tog gi char yang rab tu bab ste/_sems can long ba rnams 
[\[250b.2\]]ni mig gis gzugs rnams mthong /_sems can 'on pa rnams ni rna bas sgra thos/_sems can smyon pa rnams ni dran pa thob/_sems can yid brel ba rnams ni rtse gcig pa thob/_sems can gcer bu rnams ni gos rnyed/_sems can bkres pa rnams ni zas rnyed/_sems 
[\[250b.3\]]can dbul po rnams ni nor rnyed do/_/de'i tshe na sems can gang yang 'dod chags kyis gzir ba med de/_zhe sdang gis ma yin/_gti mug gis ma yin/_phrag dog gis ma yin/_ser snas ma yin/_khro bas ma yin/_nga rgyal gyis ma yin no/_/de'i tshe na sems can thams cad 
[\[250b.4\]]kyang byams pa'i sems dang /_phan pa'i sems dang ldan zhing phan tshun du pha mar 'du shes par gyur to/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_sangs rgyas skyes bu'i seng ge che/_/stobs bcu grong khyer nam gshegs tshe/_/de yi mod la skye bo rnams/_/bde ba rgya chen dri med thob/_/long ba'i 
[\[250b.5\]]mig rnams mthong bar gyur/_/'on pa thos pa'i mthu yang skyes/_/smyos pa dag ni dran pa rnyed/_/yid brel rtse gcig de bzhin no/_/gcer bu dag ni gos rnyed de/_/bkres pa dag gis zas thob bo/_/skyes bu gang su dbul po yang /_/dga' bar nor rnams rnyed par gyur/_/lha rnams 
[\[250b.6\]]bye ba mang po yang /_/mkha' la gnas shing stobs rab mchod/_/smra ba'i seng ge mchod pa'i phyir/_/me tog char yang rab tu 'bebs/_/rnga dang rdza rnga sil snyan dung /_/nyams dga' byed pa dpag med pa/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni bsod nams kyis/_/grong khyer 'jug tshe sgra yang 
[\[250b.7\]]'byung /_/grong khyer kun tu rab g.yos te/_/de tshe nyams dga' mnyam par gnas/_/skye bos ngo mtshar 'di mthong nas/_/dga' ba shin tu rgya chen thob/_/'dod chags kyis ni mi gzir zhing /_/de tshe khro blun ser sna med/_/nga rgyal la sogs nyes pas kyang /_/gzir ba de tshe ma 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]lus med/_/dga' bas khyab cing dang ba ste/_/mi rnams pha mar 'du shes gyur/_/gang tshe sangs rgyas stobs bcu po/_/skye bo bde phyir grong gshegs tshe/_/mi yi ma yin sil snyan rnams/_/ma dkrol bar ni sgra yang 'byung /_/'jig rten lha min lha mir bcas/_/bde gshegs 
[\[251a.2\]]'od kyis rgyas par gang /_/de ltar gang tshe sangs rgyas ni/_/'gro la phan phyir grong gshegs pa/_/de tshe ngo mtshar rmad byung ba/_/rnam pa mang po rab tu gda'/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs pa dang /_tshong dpon shing sa la chen po lta bu'i bu sdig 
[\[251a.3\]]bcom zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' khyim par gyur pa grong bar zhig na 'dug ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sdig bcom gyis/_bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa/_dga' bar 'gyur ba/_dbang po zhi ba/_thugs zhi ba/_dul ba dang zhi gnas mchog brnyes pa/_dul ba dang zhi gnas mchog gi 
[\[251a.4\]]pha rol du byon pa/_bsdams pa/_glang po ltar dbang po thul ba/_mtsho ltar dang ste rnyog pa med cing gsal ba/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus sku legs par brgyan pa/_kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa rgyang ring po nas gshegs 
[\[251a.5\]]pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de bcom ldan 'das la sems shin tu dad par gyur to/_/de sems shin tu dad nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs 
[\[251a.6\]]gcig tu 'dug go_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sdig bcom gyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du dang ldan 
[\[251a.7\]]na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su sbyong /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'tshal ba de lta bu yang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]sems dpa' sdig bcom la thugs brtse ba dang /_skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir grong khyer gyi phyogs gcig tu bzhugs so/_/phyogs gcig tu bzhugs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das mthong nas srog chags brgya stong mang po dag kyang lhags par gyur to/_/bar snang las kyang lha 
[\[251b.2\]]bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag gus pa dang bcas/_zhe sa dang bcas par thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig bcom la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[251b.3\]]sems dpa' chen po chos gcig dang ldan na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su sbyong la/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yang yongs su 'dzin to/_/chos gcig po 
[\[251b.4\]]gang zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad la snying rje zhing lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'o/_/de la lhag pa'i bsam pa khong du chud par bya ba gang zhe na/_rigs kyi bu lhag pa'i 
[\[251b.5\]]bsam pa zhes bya ba ni gang byang chub kyi phyir sems bskyed nas mi dge ba'i las gang yang mi spyod pa'o/_/ci mi spyod ce na/_'dod chags mi spyod/_zhe sdang mi spyod/_gti mug mi spyod/_khyim pa'i rtags la sred pa mi spyod de rab tu byung nas kyang rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pa 
[\[251b.6\]]mi 'dod cing gang rab tu byung ba'i bsgrub pa de la gnas pa yin no/_/de la rab tu byung ba'i bsgrub pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs pa'o/_/chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs pa gang zhe na/_rigs kyi bu chos thams 
[\[251b.7\]]cad ces bya ba ni phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams so/_/phung po lnga rab tu rtogs pa ji ltar rab tu rtogs na phung po lnga rnams sgyu ma lta bu dang /_dben pa dang /_stong pa dang /_dmigs pa med pa dang /_ma skyes pa dang /_ma 'gags 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]par rab tu rtogs pa ste/_ji ltar rab tu rtogs pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de ltar rab tu rtogs pa'o/_/gang gi tshe yang dag par rjes su mi mthong mi shes rlom sems su mi byed mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa de'i tshe rtog pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba ni phung po rab tu rtogs pa 
[\[252a.2\]]zhes bya'o/_/gang phung po rab tu rtogs pa de chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pa ste/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni rab tu byung ba'i bsgrub pa zhes bya'o/_/de ltar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can rnams yongs su mi gtong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_des ji ltar bdag 
[\[252a.3\]]gis chos de dag yongs su shes par gyur pa de ltar sems can thams cad la ston kyang sems can dang /_chos kyang mi dmigs te/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gcig po 'di dang ldan na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 
[\[252a.4\]]rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yang yongs su 'dzin to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su bsgrub pa'i chos kyi sgo 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems 
[\[252a.5\]]dpa' sdig bcom mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur te de dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba des shing ta la bdun srid tsam du bar snang la mngon par 'phags so/_/'khor de'i nang na srog chags nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/
[\[252a.6\]]lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye dgu'i srog chags khri bzhi stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i 
[\[252a.7\]]chos nyid de/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas kha dog du ma kha dog sna tshogs kyi 'od 'phro ba 'di lta ste/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_le brgan dang /_shel dang /_dngul gyi kha dog lta bu rnams byung ste/_de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bas khyab par byas nas slar log ste/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_pus mo g.yas 
[\[252b.2\]]pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/chos rnams kun la mnga' dbang pha rol phyin/_/'dren pa khyod ni rgyal po'i stobs la mnga'/_/khyod ni thams cad mkhyen par 
[\[252b.3\]]'jig rten grags/_/ci yi slad du 'dzum pa 'di bstan gsungs/_/thub pa chen po 'das pa ma lus mkhyen/_/de bzhin ma 'ongs ma lus rnams kyang mkhyen/_/da ltar dag kyang mkhyen pa ma smad pa/_/ci slad khyod kyis 'dzum pa 'di mdzad gsungs/_/rab 'bring tha ma'i sems dang ldan pa 
[\[252b.4\]]yi/_/sems can thams cad kyi ni spyod pa mkhyen/_/chags grol srid pa'i 'du shes pha rol phyin/_/mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba lung bstan gsol/_/lha rnams bye ba khrag khrig kun lhags te/_/skyon ma mchis la thal sbyar phyag 'tshal zhing /_/skye bo chos spyod 'di dag kun sdod kyis/_/
[\[252b.5\]]thub pa chen po mtshungs med gsung dbyung gsol/_/khyod ni ye shes pha rol phyin/_/khyod la 'khrul pa yong mi mnga'/_/spyod pa'i bye brag kun mkhyen pa/_/ci zhig slad du 'dzum pa bstan/_/bye ba khrag khrig phrag stong lha 'di dag_/chos rnams 'tshal ba'i slad du 'dir lhags te/_/de 
[\[252b.6\]]bzhin dge slong tshogs kyang mang po dag_/dam pa'i chos rnams nyan par 'tshal ba mchis/_/khyod la mchod pa'i phyir ni sil snyan rnams/_/rab tu bzang zhing mang ba brdung bar bgyid/_/skye bo mang po the tshom 'tshal ba kun/_/thub pa deng 'dir the tshom myur bcad gsol/_/de skad 
[\[252b.7\]]ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig bcom 'di shing ta la bdun srid tsam du steng gi bar snang la 'dug pa mthong ngam/_kun dga' bos gsol pa/_
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig bcom 'di bskal pa grangs med pa brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis na bla na med pa 
[\[253a.2\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_bskal pa rims nad med pa la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu zhi zhing dul ba'i dbang phyug 
[\[253a.3\]]ces bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung ste/_kun dga' bo dper nad ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang /_nyan thos phun sum tshogs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa de 
[\[253a.4\]]'dra bar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu zhi zhing dul ba'i dbang phyug de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na yang de las mi lhag mi thu bar 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_bcom ldan 'das phyogs de nas gshegs 
[\[253a.5\]]te/_mthar gyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs nas byon pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/_/dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams kyang stan ci 'os pa dag la 'khod do/_/de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras bcom ldan 'das dang /_
[\[253a.6\]]dge slong gi dge 'dun bzhugs par rig nas bdag nyid lag bdar te/_bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dang /_myang ba bzang po mang pos de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la bstabs te tshim par byas so/_/bstabs te tshim par byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa bshos 
[\[253a.7\]]gsol ba dang /_lhung bzed bzhag cing phyag bcabs par rig nas bcom ldan 'das la ras bcos bu'i zung rin thang med pa sku la gsol to/_/sku la gsol nas kyang bcom ldan 'das dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal te/_stan ran pa zhig blangs te phyogs 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]gcig tu 'dug go_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gnod sems dang /_tha ba dang /_zhe sdang dang /_'chab pa gang nas 'byung ba lags/_mi shes pa ci las skye ba lags/_mi shes pa ji ltar 
[\[253b.2\]]'gag pa lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rgyal po chen po ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin pa yod pa las gnod sems dang /_tha ba dang /_zhe sdang dang /_'chab pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/ngar 
[\[253b.3\]]'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin pa la gnas pas yon tan dang /_nyes pa mi shes te/_de bas na mi shes pa zhes bya'o/_/gang ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin pa de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa de la ni shes pa'am mi shes pa zhes gdags par mi nus so/_/de 
[\[253b.4\]]bas na rgyal po chen po khyod kyis 'du byed thams cad la gar yang 'gro ba dang /_gang nas kyang 'ong bar mi gdags pa de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/rgyal po chen po gang gar yang mi 'gro/_gang nas kyang mi 'ong ba de la chos gang yang 'gro ba'am 'ong ba med do/_/gang la 'ong ba dang /_'gro 
[\[253b.5\]]ba med pa de la skye ba med/_'gag pa med do/_/gang mi skye mi 'gag pa de shes pa med do/_/shes pa de ji lta bar mi shes pa yang de bzhin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nges par 'byung ba'am nges par mi 'byung ba'i chos de gang yang mi shes pa'i phyir ro/_/gang gi tshe nges par 'byung ba'am/_
[\[253b.6\]]nges par mi 'byung ba'i chos gang yang mi shes pa de'i tshe ye shes can zhes bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis legs 
[\[253b.7\]]par gsungs pa ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag bar skabs 'di kho nar 'gum pa'i dus bgyis par gyur na ni bdag nying mtshams sbyor bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra la chos kyi gtam yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]'dzin tu bcug_/yang dag par gzengs stod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs nas phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe yang chos kyi sbyin pa la 'du bar 'gyur ba mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das zas phyis len pa spangs te/_lhung bzed dang /_
[\[254a.2\]]chos gos bzhag nas zhabs bkrus te/_nang du yang dag 'jog pa'i phyir gnas khang du gshegs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/_'di lta ste/_chos yang dag 
[\[254a.3\]]par rab tu bstan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_nyan thos chen po gzhan dag kyang de bzhin du nang du yang dag 'jog las langs nas ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste 
[\[254a.4\]]phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yang nang du yang dag 'jog las langs te/_lha'i bu bzhi khri nyis stong thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la yang dag par 
[\[254a.5\]]zhugs pa sha stag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa yang 
[\[254a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' stong tsam gyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng 
[\[254a.7\]]ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra yang byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya tsam gyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]do/_/rgyal po ma skyes dgra yang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs 
[\[254b.2\]]gcig tu 'khod do/_rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas kyang srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 
[\[254b.3\]]'khod do/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[254b.4\]]to/_/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i grong bar du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig bcom gyis gang 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa las brtsams te/_yongs su zhus pa 
[\[254b.5\]]de'i lan bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo tsam zhig bka' stsal na/_bcom ldan 'das nga yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su 'grub pa de las brtsams te/_ji ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[254b.6\]]chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang /_bdud kyi sde rnams pham par bgyid pa dang /_gzhan mu stegs can rnams tshar gcod par 'gyur ba dang /_nyon mongs pas zil gyis non par mi 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[254b.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba dang /_smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang /_shes rab yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sa la 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su spong bar 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]'gyur ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod par 'gyur ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob ste byang chub sems dpar gyur bzhin du chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor bar 'gyur ba dang /_sems can dpag tu ma mchis/_grangs ma mchis pa'i don bgyid par 'gyur ba de ltar 
[\[255a.2\]]chos legs par rab tu bstan du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'di na rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo byang chub don du gnyer ba 'dus shing mchis pa rnams bcom ldan 'das las chos mngon sum du thos nas dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po thob par 'gyur te/_de dag 
[\[255a.3\]]dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba thob nas ji ltar thos pa bzhin du nan tan gyis sgrub par 'gyur ba dag mchis so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_'di lta bu'i chos bstan par bya na 'khor 'di lta bu ni mi mdzes kyis ngas ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba 
[\[255a.4\]]mngon par 'du byas pas phyogs bcu kun tu phyogs re rer yang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po bkye la/_'od zer re res kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po snang bas khyab par byas te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu nyi ma dang /_zla ba'i 'od kyang mi snang 
[\[255a.5\]]zhing de dag 'od zer de dag gis zil gyis mnan nas phyir mig gis dbang po la snang bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_lha rnams kyi 'od kyang mi mngon/_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_nor bu dang /_glog dang /_me dang /_skar ma'i gzugs dang /_sems can gzhan gang gi 'od kyang mi mngon par 
[\[255a.6\]]'gyur ba dang /_gang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa'i khor yug dang /_khor yug chen po dang /_btang bzung dang /_btang bzung chen po dang /_ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang /_de ma yin pa gzhan ri'i rgyal po nag po dag dang /_de ma yin pa gzhan ri nag po 
[\[255a.7\]]dag dang /_rtsig pa dang /_shing dang /_nags tshal de dag thams cad 'od zer de dag gis thal byung du snang bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du bya'o snyam du dgongs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bu'i 'od zer bkye nas gsung bsal ba'i 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]sgra mdzad pa dang /_gsung bsal ba'i sgra des phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag sgras go bar gyur to/_/yang de'i tshe na shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi 
[\[255b.2\]]khams kun nas 'od ces bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal brtsegs rgyal po zhes bya ba da lta yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ming yang mi 
[\[255b.3\]]grag ste/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ba' zhig gis yongs su gang ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs re re la yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa bye ba phrag brgya brgya yod do/_/sangs 
[\[255b.4\]]rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/_ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' de chos 'phags zhes bya zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' de bcom ldan 'das dpal brtsegs rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa de byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[255b.5\]]dge 'dun gyis bskor cing chos ston pa'i spyan snga na shing ta la bdun srid tsam du bar snang la 'phags te/_lus mi snang bar gang 'di byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rdo rje'i tshig gi gzungs kyi chos ston to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'di snyam 
[\[255b.6\]]du sems te/_chos 'di dag thams cad ni sgra tsam mo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'di'i lus mi snang mod kyi/_bshad pa yang grag la sgra yang 'byin te/_gzugs yongs su grub pa yang mi snang ngo /_/sgra ji lta bar gzugs kyang de bzhin no/_/gzugs ji lta 
[\[255b.7\]]bar chos thams cad kyang de bzhin no snyam mo/_/de ltar rab tu shes pas byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa rnams bzod pa thob ste/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' de chos 'phags zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags des snang ba chen po de yang mthong /_gsung 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]bsal ba'i sgra yang thos te/_mthong zhing thos nas bcom ldan 'das dpal brtsegs rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go_/phyogs gcig tu 
[\[256a.2\]]'dug nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das snang ba chen po 'di 'jig rten du byung zhing gsung bsal ba'i sgra chen po yang gda' ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags rkyen 
[\[256a.3\]]gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das snang ba 'di lta bu ni sngon chad ma mthong ngo /_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal brtsegs rgyal pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[256a.4\]]chen po chos 'phags la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[256a.5\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho'o gzhes so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa des gang 'di phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa grangs med pa dag nas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[256a.6\]]bsdu ba dang /_'di lta ste/_chos bsgrag par bya ba'i phyir ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'od zer 'di dag btang ste gsung bsal ba'i sgra phyung ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal brtsegs rgyal po de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[256a.7\]]chos 'phags kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang /_phyag bgyi ba dang /_bsnyen bkur 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]bgyi ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun de dag la yang blta ba dang /_chos de yang nyan du mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod de'i dus la dbab par shes na song shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags byang chub sems 
[\[256b.2\]]dpa' stong phrag drug khri sum stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas 'di lta ste/_dper na skyes bu stobs po ches lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba dang /_brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyis skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas 'jig rten 
[\[256b.3\]]gyi khams mi mjed 'dir gnas so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag 
[\[256b.4\]]tu de nas skad cig de nyid la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di me tog gi tshogs chen po pus nub tsam du gang bar gyur to/_/sil snyan brgya stong gi sgra yang byung ngo /_'jig rten gyi khams 'di gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan bsgreng bas kyang legs par brgyan par 
[\[256b.5\]]gyur to/_/spos mchog gis kyang yang dag par bdugs te/_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i longs spyod dang khyad par med par gyur te/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa de lta bu bstan nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[256b.6\]]chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du byung ba'i pad ma dag la 'khor dang bcas te phyogs 
[\[256b.7\]]gcig tu 'khod do/_/yang de'i tshe lho phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig gang gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rdul med pa zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]rgyas seng ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa zhes bya ba da lta yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dpag tu med pas yongs su bskor cing chos ston to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas 
[\[257a.2\]]rnams med do/_/yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po che zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/_byang chub sems dpa' de ci'i phyir lag na rin po che zhes bya zhe na/_yang rigs kyi bu de nam sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan 
[\[257a.3\]]du sems can rnams la chos ston par 'dod pa de'i tshe lag pa g.yas pa brkyang nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed du 'dod pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing de snyed lag gis byugs nas lag pa de las sangs rgyas rin po che'i sgra 'byung ngo /_/chos rin po che'i sgra dang /_dge 
[\[257a.4\]]'dun rin po che'i sgra 'byung ngo /_/sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab rin po che'i sgra 'byung ngo /_/byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms rin po che'i sgra 
[\[257a.5\]]'byung ngo /_/de dag dang gzhan yang chos rin po che'i sgra sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'byung ste/_de'i phyir rigs kyi bu de lag na rin po che zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po ches snang ba chen po de yang mthong /_gsung bsal ba'i 
[\[257a.6\]]sgra de yang thos te/_mthong zhing thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go_/phyogs gcig tu 
[\[257a.7\]]'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge rtsal gyis bsgyings pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das snang ba chen po 'di 'jig rten du byung zhing gsung bsal 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]ba'i sgra chen po yang gda' ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags/_rkyen gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu byang phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig gang gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed 'das pa 
[\[257b.2\]]na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa des gang 'di 
[\[257b.3\]]phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag nas byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang /_'di lta ste/_dam pa'i chos bsgrag pa'i phyir ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'od 'di dag rab tu bkye zhing gsung bsal ba'i sgra phyung ngo /_/yang rigs kyi bu de 
[\[257b.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bzhed de/_der byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 
[\[257b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[257b.6\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang /_phyag bgyi ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de la yang blta ba dang /_chos bstan pa de yang nyan du mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_
[\[257b.7\]]rigs kyi bu khyod der song ste ci rung /_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gis khebs pa'i sems can rnams dang phrad pas na 'jig rten gyi khams de ni sdug bsngal ba'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[258a.2\]]rgyas shAkya thub pa des don gyi dbang ci zhig gzigs na/_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gzhan dag kyang mchis bzhin du de tsam du sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngan pa yongs su 'dzin/_bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 
[\[258a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des nga ci nas kyang sems can ngan pa rnams kyi nang du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_chos bstan par bya'o zhes yun ring po nas smon 
[\[258a.4\]]lam btab par gyur te/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ni de ltar thugs rje chen po dang ldan no//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po 
[\[258a.5\]]ches 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang /_phyag bgyi ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du mchi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar 
[\[258a.6\]]thugs rje chen po bskyed de de tsam du sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngan pa yongs su bzung ba ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de dka' ba mdzad pa ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di lta bu ni 'byung 
[\[258a.7\]]bar dka'o/_/de mthong ba yang rnyed par dka'o/_/bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod de'i dus la bab par shes na song la rigs kyi bu khyod sangs rgyas kyi zhing der rab tu bsgrim par gyis shig_/smas par gyur ta re/_de 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni bsnyen par dka'o/_/de na sems can gzhan de dag kyang gtum zhing khro bdag go_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches bcom 
[\[258b.2\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang rjes su chags pa dang /_khong khro bar 'gyur ba de ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing der smas par 'gyur gyi/_bcom ldan 'das bdag la ni rjes su chags pa yang ma 
[\[258b.3\]]mchis/_khong khro ba yang ma mchis na bdag ci'i slad du smas par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das bdag la sems can thams cad kyis phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par gshe zhing spyos te/_bsdigs shing btsogs nas bong ba dang /_mtshon gyis btab kyang bzod par spro ste/_sems can 
[\[258b.4\]]gang la yang gnod par bgyi ba'i sems mi skyed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa des rang gi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag khyed las gang byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po 
[\[258b.5\]]che ltar bzod pa 'di lta bu yang dag par 'dzin pa spro ba de rigs kyi bu 'di dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der deng shig_/bcom ldan 'das des tshig de skad gsungs ma thag tu de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri nyis 
[\[258b.6\]]stong gis dbyangs gcig tu bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che ltar bzod pa 'di lta bu yang dag par 'dzin par spro ste/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der mchi'o zhes gsol to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na
