[\[258b.7\]]rin po che byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri nyis stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_lhan cig tu sems bskyed pa gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gnas so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po che 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]'di snyam du sems te/_bdag rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ji lta bus bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de'i thad du 'gro zhing sems can tshad med pa la ji ltar bde bar bya snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches de'i tshe ji ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen 
[\[259a.2\]]po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lag pa g.yas pas bkab nas lag pa de las bza' ba 'dod pa rnams la bza' ba byung ba dang /_btung ba 'dod pa rnams la btung ba dang /_de bzhin du bzhon pa dang /_gos dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_mu tig dang /_dung dang /_man shel 
[\[259a.3\]]dang /_byi ru dang /_su dag ci 'dod par gyur pa thams cad de las byung bar gyur pa dang /_sems can gang chos don du gnyer zhing chos 'dod pa de dag gis kyang lag pa de las chos thos par gyur pa dang /_de na sems can dpag tu med pa dag gis kyang chos mngon par rtogs par gyur pa 
[\[259a.4\]]dang /_sems can gang nad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis btab cing sdug bsngal bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang mchog tu bde ba dang ldan par gyur pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches rdzu 
[\[259a.5\]]'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa de lta bu 'di bstan nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba 
[\[259a.6\]]byas nas smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du byung ba'i pad ma de dag la 'khor dang bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/yang de'i tshe nub phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gang gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[259a.7\]]nor bu'i snying po zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu brtsegs rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni bai dUr+ya bzang po 'ba' zhig las mngon par grub pa'o/_/
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnam par gzhag pa med de/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig gis yongs su gang ngo /_/yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' gang rnams 
[\[259b.2\]]'gro yang rung /_'ong yang rung /_'greng yang rung /_'dug kyang rung /_ldang yang rung /_'chag kyang rung ste/_de dag gis bai dUr+ya'i sa chen po de las bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu brtsegs rgyal po de mthong ngo /_/'di lta ste/_dper 
[\[259b.3\]]na shin tu phyis pa'i me long gi dkyil 'khor la bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bai dUr+ya'i sa chen po de las de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ngo /_/mthong nas chos kun 'dri ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa de 
[\[259b.4\]]yang de dag la lung ston to/_/de dag kyang chos thos nas bzod pa thob bo/_/'di lta ste/_bcom ldan 'das de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis bcom ldan 'das de'i smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu'i dbus su yang nor bu rin po che chen po mngon par grub ste/_nor bu rin po che de'i 
[\[259b.5\]]'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad snang bar byas nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na me tog kha zum pa dang /_me tog kha bye ba las nyin mtshan bgrang ba ma gtogs par nyi ma dang zla bar mngon pa yang med/_nyin mtshan du mngon pa yang med do/_/yang de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu 
[\[259b.6\]]brtsegs rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam khyad par blo gros zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam khyad par blo gros kyis snang ba chen po de yang mthong /_gsung bsal ba'i sgra de 
[\[259b.7\]]yang thos te/_mthong zhing thos nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu brtsegs rgyal po de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]sems dpa' chen po smon lam khyad par blo gros kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu brtsegs rgyal po de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das snang ba chen po 'di 'jig rten du byung zhing gsung bsal ba'i sgra chen po yang gda' ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags/_rkyen gang 
[\[260a.2\]]lags/_bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gang gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[260a.3\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa des gang 'di phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig tshad med grangs med pa dag nas/_byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang /_'di lta ste/_
[\[260a.4\]]chos bsgrag pa'i phyir ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'od 'di dag rab tu bkye zhing gsung bsal ba'i sgra phyung ngo /_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par blo gros kyis bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig 
[\[260a.5\]]rten gyi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang /_phyag bgyi ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de yang blta ba dang /_chos bstan pa de yang nyan 
[\[260a.6\]]du mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod de'i dus la dbab par shes na song shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par blo gros byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du 
[\[260a.7\]]bdar ste/_lhan cig tu sems bskyed pa gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der gnas so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par blo gros 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ji lta bus bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de'i thad du 'gro bar bya snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par blo gros kyis de'i tshe ji ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gang dag sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_
[\[260b.2\]]gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes par gyur pa'i sems can de dag thams cad mchog tu bde ba dang ldan par gyur pa dang /_sems can dmyal ba'i sems can rnams kyi sems can dmyal ba'i me yang rab tu zhi bar gyur pa dang /_sems can gang dag bkres pa dang /_skom pas nyen pa yi 
[\[260b.3\]]dgas dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can de dag dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa de dag thams cad bkres pa dang /_skom pa dang bral zhing bde ba mchog dang ldan par gyur pa 'di lta ste/_dper na dge slong bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms 
[\[260b.4\]]par zhugs pa'i bde ba bzhin te/_skad cig de nyid la sems can de dag bde ba rnam pa 'di lta bu skyes nas skad cig de nyid la sems can gang yang 'dod chags sam/_zhe sdang ngam/_gti mug gam/_khro ba'am/_nga rgyal lam/_'chab pa 'am/_'tshig pa 'am/_phrag dog gam/_ser 
[\[260b.5\]]sna 'am/_g.yo ba 'am/_tha ba'am/_gnod sems kyis gzir ba med pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad kyang skad cig de nyid la byams pa'i sems dang /_phan pa'i sems dang ldan zhing phan tshun pha mar 'du shes par gyur pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya 
[\[260b.6\]]ba mngon par 'du byas ste/_de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par blo gros kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di bstan nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[260b.7\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du byung ba'i pad ma de dag la 'khor dang bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//_//
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]bam po gnyis pa/_yang de'i tshe byang phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung drug cu rtsa gsum gyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[261a.2\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'byung ba zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na khyim pa gos dkar po gyon pa med de/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 
[\[261a.3\]]gos ngur smrig 'chang ba sha stag go_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bud med kyi ming yang med cing mngal gyi gnas kyang mi shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang gos ngur smrig gyon cing skyil mo krung bcas par rdzus te 'byung ngo /_bcom ldan 'das de yang 
[\[261a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' de dag la sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par rab tu ston to/_/de la sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba gang zhe na/_gang 'di byang chub tu sems dang po bskyed de/_de ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed nas 
[\[261a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa yongs su rdzogs pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la 'jug pa/_gzungs kyi rtsa ba'i gnas/_sems mi g.yeng ba/_gtong ba rjes su gtong ba/_stong pa nyid kyi rjes su 'jug pa/_mtshan ma med pa la yang dag par sgrub pa/_smon pa med pa tshol 
[\[261a.6\]]ba/_rang bzhin gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rab tu rtogs pa/_'dun pa'i bya ba rgyun chags pa/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'dod pa/_de la mngon par dad pa/_chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pa/_de dag la yongs su rtogs pa med pa/_
[\[261a.7\]]rtog pa yang dag par chad pa de yang mi mthong ba 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya zhes bya'o/_/yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/_rigs kyi bu de'i smon 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]lam gyi khyad par ni 'di lta bu ste/_sems can ji snyed kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mthong ba na/_de dag thams cad skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan par 'gyur ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal 
[\[261b.2\]]pos snang ba chen po de yang mthong /_gsung bsal ba'i sgra de yang thos te/_mthong zhing thos nas bcom ldan 'das sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_de bzhin 
[\[261b.3\]]gshegs pa de la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'byung 
[\[261b.4\]]ba de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das snang ba chen po 'di dang /_gsung bsal ba'i sgra chen po 'di 'jig rten du byung ba'i rgyu gang lags/_rkyen gang lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'byung 
[\[261b.5\]]ba des rigs kyi bu de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu lho phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung drug khri sum stong gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[261b.6\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa des gang 'di phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad 
[\[261b.7\]]med grangs med pa dag nas byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang /_'di lta ste/_chos bsgrag pa'i phyir spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'od zer 'di dag rab tu bkye zhing gsung gsal ba'i sgra phyung ngo /_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams de mi mjed ces bgyi/_bcom 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can 'dod chags la mi mjed/_zhe sdang la mi mi mjed/_gti mug la mi mjed/_sdug bsngal la mi mjed de/_de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de mi mjed ces bya'o/_/gsol pa/_
[\[262a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag las la la spyos pa dang /_mi snyan par brjod pa dang /_bsdigs pa dang /_brdegs pa bzod cing dang du len par bgyid pa ma mchis sam/_'dod chags kyi sems skyes pa sel tam/_de bzhin du zhe sdang gi sems dang /_gti mug gi sems sel 
[\[262a.3\]]ba mchis sam/_bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can de dag las gang yon tan 'di dag dang ldan pa ni nyung ngo /_/rigs kyi bu sems can de dag las phal cher ni gnod sems dang /_tha ba dang /_zhe sdang mang ste 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang 
[\[262a.4\]]dang /_gti mug gis kun tu dkris so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mi mjed ces bgyi ba'i ming 'di thog tu ma bo/_/gal te sems can de dag bzod par gyur na ni de yang rung na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar mi bzod pas na de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das mi mjed 
[\[262a.5\]]bgyi ba'i ming 'di thog tu ma bab bo/_/bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa/_sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa/_sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po la 
[\[262a.6\]]bsnyen bkur byas pa/_bzod pa dang /_dul ba dang /_des pa dang ldan pa dag yod de/_de dag ni sems can thams cad kyis spyos/_bsdigs/_mtshon gyis btab kyang ji snyam mi mjed de/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug rnams kyis mi 'phrogs so/_rigs 
[\[262a.7\]]kyi bu skyes bu dam pa de dag gi ming gi 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces brjod do/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de yang de na sems can kha cig sdig pa'i chos dang ldan pa mu cor smra ba/_khro ba/_gtum pa/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]su gzhol ba/_ngan 'gro'i spyod yul ba/_sangs rgyas dang chos dang /_dge 'dun la mi gus pa/_phrag dog la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can ngan pa de dag gis de tsam du spyos shing smad de/_gnod par byas shing skur kyang bcom ldan 'das de snying rje bas bzod cing dang du len te/_sa 
[\[262b.2\]]dang mnyam ba'i sems rjes su chags pa dang /_khong khro ba med pas de bsti stang du byas kyang khengs par mi byed/_bsti stang du ma byas kyang 'dud par mi byed de/_de spyos shing brgyad kyang mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog_/gnod par mi 'gyur/_mi 'phrogs/_mi chags/_mi skyo ste/_de'i 
[\[262b.3\]]phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de mi mjed ces bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'byung ba de la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[262b.4\]]'das 'di ltar bdag 'jig rten gyi khams der de tsam du dmad pa'i sems can rnams kyi nang du ma skyes pa ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/_/bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod de skad ma zer cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu byang dang shar gyi 
[\[262b.5\]]mtshams na 'jig rten gyi khams stong gis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang phyug chen po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes so/_/rigs kyi bu sangs 
[\[262b.6\]]rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can rnams rab tu bde ba dang ldan no/_/'di lta ste dper na 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i dge slong gi bde ba bzhin te/_sems can rnams kyang bde ba de lta bu dang ldan no/_/yang rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams stong gis brgyan pa der lo bye 
[\[262b.7\]]ba brgya stong du tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa bas ni gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du tha na se gol gtogs pa srid tsam du sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems bskyed na de bas 'di bsod nams ches mang du skyed na/_gang nyin mtshan du yongs su dag par gnas pa lta smos kyang 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]ci dgos/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'byung ba de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[263a.2\]]mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang /_phyag bgyi ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de yang blta ba dang /_chos bstan pa de yang nyan du mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[263a.3\]]'das des bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod de'i dus la dbab par shes na song shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcus yongs su bskor cing lhan cig tu sems bskyed pa gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[263a.4\]]zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir gnas so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal po 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ji lta bus bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa 
[\[263a.5\]]de'i thad du 'gro snyam nas/_de de'i tshe ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che'i gdugs gcig gis khebs par gyur pa dang /_rin po che'i gdugs de las kyang me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 
[\[263a.6\]]'bab/_sil snyan brgya stong yang 'khrol/_mu tig gi rgyan phreng brgya stong yang mngon par 'phyang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan brgya stong yang mngon par 'phyang ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'dus pa dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge 
[\[263a.7\]]bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis rang rang gi lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan par shes 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di bstan nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu/_bcom 
[\[263b.2\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du byung ba'i pad ma dag la 
[\[263b.3\]]'khor dang bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_phyogs bcu kun gyi bar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa dag tu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med pa rnams kyis snang ba chen po de yang mthong /_
[\[263b.4\]]gsung bsal ba'i sgra de yang thos nas rang rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhus te 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags nas de dag thams cad kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhabs la mgo 
[\[263b.5\]]bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/gang dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_
[\[263b.6\]]mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_rgyal po chen po 'jig rten skyong ba dang /_de ma yin pa'i lha'i bu gzi brjid che ba/_gzi brjid che ba de dag thams cad kyis 'od zer gyi snang ba chen po de yang mthong gsung bsal ba'i sgra de yang thos nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[263b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]pa mngon par mdzad pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa ji snyed pa de dag nas byang chub sems dpa' tshad med grangs med pa 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 
[\[264a.2\]]yon tan bkod pa de dag ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar lhag chad med cing khyad ma zhugs par mthong ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i kha dog dang /_chu zheng ci 'dra bar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku'i yongs su grub pa yang de dang 'dra bar byang chub sems dpa' de dag 
[\[264a.3\]]gis so so nas mthong ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang /_nyan thos chen po phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang /_longs spyod dang /_kun spyod pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar 'dir yang byang chub sems dpa' dag gis so so nas shes pa dang /_
[\[264a.4\]]bdag nyid kyang rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'dug pa snyam du sems pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rgya chen po de mthong nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa 
[\[264a.5\]]gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/phyogs bcu rnams su grags pa mtha' yas blo/_/'jig rten lhar bcas 'dir ni lam 
[\[264a.6\]]me ste/_/thub pa'i thugs ni sems can thams cad kyis/_/tshad gzung mi nus de phyir khyod bsam yas/_/phyogs bcu dag nas rgyal sras dpag med pa/_/chos tshol slad du de ring 'dir lhags nas/_/bcom ldan 'das la kun kyang gus bcas gnas/_/smra ba'i mchog gis chos 
[\[264a.7\]]rnams rab tu gsungs/_/phyogs rnams ma lus par ni brjod grags pa/_/tshul khrims brtson 'grus ting 'dzin blo rnams kyis/_/seng ge ltar ni 'jigs med khyod mdzes pa/_/nam mkha' dag la nyi ma bzhin du gsal/_/lha dang klu dang lha min gsang ba pa/_/dge bsnyen pho 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]mo dge slong dge slong ma/_/thams cad gus bcas thal mo sbyar gnas kyis/_bcom ldan phan bzhed chos ni bshad du gsol/_/khyod ni 'das mkhyen de bzhin ma 'ongs dang /_/da ltar yang ni shin tu nges par mkhyen/_/lus can mos pa ji bzhin khyod gzigs la/_/the tshom chen 
[\[264b.2\]]po sel ba'i chos bshad gsol/_/thub pa rgyal sras ji ltar spyad pas na/_/zhing rnams dag pa rdul med thob par 'gyur/_/ji ltar smon lam 'grub pa 'thob 'gyur ba/_/de ni 'dren pas bdag la myur bshad gsol/_/ji ltar ser sna'i dri mas mi gos shing /_/ji ltar tshul khrims 
[\[264b.3\]]ma nyams 'gyur ba dang /_/bsdigs pa dang ni de bzhin skur pa dang /_/brnyas pa dag kyang thub pa ji ltar bzod/_/sdug bsngal du mas rab tu gzir ba yi/_/'jig rten dag gi sdug bsngal bzlog slad du/_/bskal pa bye ba mang por rgyal sras rnams/_/ji ltar brtson 'grus rtsom zhing 
[\[264b.4\]]spyod par 'gyur/_/rtag tu sems ni rtse gcig mnyam gzhag cing /_/bsam gtan gnas pa spyod yul rnam dag ste/_/pad ma chu yi dri mas mi gos ltar/_/ji ltar 'dod pa dag gis gos mi 'gyur/_/thub pa ji ltar zab mo'i chos smra zhing /_/mkhas pa 'jig rten 'das pa'i blo ldan 
[\[264b.5\]]'gyur/_/brtan pa ji ltar bdud sde bcas bcom nas/_/byang chub rdul bral bla med reg par 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/byams pa khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan shoms shig 
[\[264b.6\]]dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa gdan de la bzhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'i spyod pa la yang dag par 'jug pa'i tshul la mkhas pa bsgrub pa dang por bsam zhing nan tan bya ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams 
[\[264b.7\]]pa 'di snyam du sems te/_de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang ci zhig gzigs na bdag gdan gding du bcug ste/_gnas brtan kun dga' bo dang /_maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' ma stsal/_de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams gdan gding du bcug pa las na gtam 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]'di ni byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig gi phyir brtsams nas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yongs su spangs pa'i gtam zhig 'byung ba ste/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams ni chos bstan pa 'di'i snod ma yin pa lta zhig snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems 
[\[265a.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas de'i tshe 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge'i khri 'phang du dpag tshad bzhi 'bum pa rin po che du mas spras pa/_lha'i ras bcos bu brgya stong du ma bting ba/_shing bal ltar 'jam zhing reg na bde 
[\[265a.3\]]ba bshams nas khri de'i 'od kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bar byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das khri snga ma las bzhengs te seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[265a.4\]]khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste byang 
[\[265a.5\]]chub kyi bsam pas yang dag par zhugs pa dang /_sems can la snying rje ba dang /_brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa ste/_shA ri'i bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[265a.6\]]shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos gcig dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa yang yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro/_/chos gcig po gang zhe na/_shA ri'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs 
[\[265a.7\]]pa mi 'khrugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la slob cing 'dod pa dang 'dun pa bskyed pa ste/_ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na tshig 'di skad ces/_gal te bdag skye ba thams cad du rab tu ma byung na sangs rgyas thams cad bslus par gyur cig 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]ces smras te/_shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rjes su bslab par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i de ltar slob pa ni skye ba thams cad du rab tu 'byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /_
[\[265b.2\]]ma byung yang rung /_gdon mi za bar khyim gyi gnas nas 'byung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/_khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par 'byung ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnyed pa'i mchog yin pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bu rab tu 'byung ba la mngon par dga' ba'i byang chub sems 
[\[265b.3\]]dpa' yon tan bcu yongs su 'dzin to/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'dod pa la chags par mi 'gyur ba dang /_dgon pa'i gnas la dga' ba rnyed pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul yang 'thob pa dang /_de chung ma dang /_bu pho dang /_bu mo la sred par mi 'gyur ba dang /_ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i chos 
[\[265b.4\]]rnam par spong ba dang /_bde 'gror 'gro ba'i chos la bsten pa dang /_sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba las yongs su mi nyams pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa 'thob pa dang /_de la lha rnams dga' ba dang /_de la mi ma yin pa rnams kyis bsrung bar 'gyur ba ste/_shA ri'i bu rab tu 'byung ba 
[\[265b.5\]]la mngon par dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' yon tan bcu po de dag yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dang /_sems can thams cad dgrol bar 'dod pas rgyun tu rab tu 'byung ba dang /_mngon 
[\[265b.6\]]par 'byung ba la shin tu dga' bar bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu chos gcig po de dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa yang yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos gnyis dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon 
[\[265b.7\]]lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te/_gnyis gang zhe na/_shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi theg pa mi 'dod/_nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gtam la mi dga'/_nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]dang mi sten/_nyan thos kyi bslab pa la mi slob/_nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i chos mi ston/_gzhan yang nyan thos kyi theg pa yang dag par 'dzin du mi 'jug cing rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang de bzhin pa dang /_gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsgrub pa'i 
[\[266a.2\]]phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu de la gzhan dag sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gnas bcu yongs su 'dzin to/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nyan thos dang /_rang 
[\[266a.3\]]sangs rgyas med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig gi dge 'dun rab tu rnyed pa dang /_de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dgongs pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams de'i tshul yongs su sgrogs shing chos ston pa dang /_'di 
[\[266a.4\]]lta ste/_de brgya byin nyid dam/_tshangs pa nyid kyi phyir sems dang sems las byung ba rgya chen po skyed pa dang /_mir gyur na yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas mthong ba dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_lha dang mi rnams dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /_g.yog 
[\[266a.5\]]'khor mi phyed par 'gyur ba dang /_bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med grangs med pa yongs su 'dzin pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba la bkod 
[\[266a.6\]]pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba la bkod pa bas gang rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gcig yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems la bzhag na de ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du skyed do/_/shA ri'i bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nyan thos dang rang sangs 
[\[266a.7\]]rgyas skyes pas ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi 'chad par mi 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas 'byung ba med na nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyi/_shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas 'byung ba yod na sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi 'chad cing nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas su gdags pa yang yod par 'gyur 
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]ro/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan dag byang chub kyi sems la rab tu 'god pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gnas bcu po de dag yongs su 'dzin to/_/shA ri'i bu chos gnyis po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu 
[\[266b.2\]]yongs su 'dzin to/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos gsum dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin te/_gsum gang zhe na/_shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa la gnas pa lhur 
[\[266b.3\]]len pa dang /_zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas par 'gyur ba'o/_/shA ri'i bu tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa bcu 'thob ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_gang 'di mi 'jigs par grong du 'jug pa dang /_mi 
[\[266b.4\]]'jigs par 'khor la chos ston pa dang /_mi 'jigs par kha zas za ba dang /_mi 'jigs par gtsug lag khang du 'jug pa dang /_mi 'jigs par dge 'dun gyi nang du 'jug pa dang /_mi 'jigs par lung 'bog pa dang /_mi 'jigs par slob dpon dang mkhan po'i drung du 'gro ba dang /_mi 'jigs 
[\[266b.5\]]par byams pa dang ldan pas 'khor la rjes su ston pa dang /_mi 'jigs par gos dang /_zas dang /_mal cha dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad la spyod pa dang /_des smras pa gzung bar 'gyur ba ste/_shA ri'i bu tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mi 'jigs pa bcu po 
[\[266b.6\]]de dag 'thob bo/_/shA ri'i bu zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yon tan gyi chos bcu yongs su 'dzin te/_bcu gang zhe na/_gang 'di de sdig pa mi 'dod pa yin/_de shes kyi khe mi 'dod pa yin de grags pa mi 'dod pa yin/_de khyim yongs su mi 
[\[266b.7\]]'dzin pa yin/_de khyim la ser sna med pa yin/_de gos dang /_zas dang /_mal cha dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad ngan ngon tsam gyis chog shes pa yin/_des smras pa gzung bar 'os pa yin/_lha dag kyang de'i drung du 'gro ba yin/_de tshul bzhin ma yin pa rnam par rtog pa yid la 
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]byed pa mi skyed pa yin/_de sangs rgyas kyi sems la sems bskyed pa yin te/_shA ri'i bu zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yon tan gyi chos bcu po de dag yongs su 'dzin to/_/shA ri'i bu dgon pa la gnas pa lhur len pa'i byang chub 
[\[267a.2\]]sems dpa' yon tan gyi phan yon bcu yongs su 'dzin to/_/bcu gang zhe na/_gang 'di 'du 'dzi rnam par spong ba dang /_rab tu dben pa la sten pa dang /_de bsam gtan la sems dmigs par 'gyur ba dang /_bya ba mang por mi 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas rnams 'dod pa dang /_de'i lus bde 
[\[267a.3\]]ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /_de'i tshangs par spyad pa bar chad du mi 'gyur ba dang /_tshegs chung ngus ting nge 'dzin thob pa dang /_des tshig dang yi ger bstan pa rnams chud mi za ba dang /_ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams kyi don rab tu shes pa ste/_shA ri'i bu dgon pa la gnas pa lhur len pa'i byang chub 
[\[267a.4\]]sems dpa' ni yon tan gyi phan yon bcu po de dag yongs su 'dzin to/_/shA ri'i bu chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin to/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 
[\[267a.5\]]chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin to/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bden par smra ba yin/_ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed cing nga rgyal bcom pa yin/_nga 
[\[267a.6\]]rgyal tshar bcad pa'i phyir zhugs shing phrag dog dang ser sna yongs su spangs pa yin/_pha rol 'byor pa la yang yid dga' ba yin no/_/shA ri'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni bden par smra ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_de'i kha nas ud pa la'i dri'i ngad 'byung ba 
[\[267a.7\]]dang /_lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi las kyi mtha' yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang /_lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi tshad mar gyur cing /_tshig 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi gsung phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa ste/_shA ri'i bu bzhi po de dag ni byang chub 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]sems dpa' bden par smra ba'i phan yon no/_/shA ri'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni nga rgyal bcom pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_gang 'di ngan 'gror skye ba rnam par spong ba ste/_'di lta ste/_rnga mo dang /_ba lang dang /_bong bu dang /_rta'i skye gnas dang /_de bzhin du gzhan smad 
[\[267b.2\]]par skye ba rnam par spong ba dang /_mi smad par 'gyur ba dang /_gzhan gyi phyir rgol ba dang /_mi mdza' ba rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ba dang /_lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya bar 'gyur ba ste/_sha ri'i bu bzhi po de dag ni nga rgyal bcom pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon no/_/
[\[267b.3\]]shA ri'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni phrag dog dang /_ser sna yongs su spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon to/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_de gtong ba'i sems la mi rmongs pa dang /_mu ge byung ba'i dus na sbyin bdag tu 'gyur ba dang /_de tshul khrims dang ldan pa 'ongs na khyim gyi sgo gcod 
[\[267b.4\]]par mi 'gyur ba dang /_de'i gtong ba dang /_len pa la su yang phrag dog mi byed pa ste/_shA ri'i bu bzhi po de dag ni phrag dog dang ser sna yongs su spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon no/_/shA ri'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni pha rol 'byor pa la dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon te/_bzhi 
[\[267b.5\]]gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag gis sems can 'di dag bzung ste/_bdag 'di dag gi ched du go cha bgos nas 'di dag la bde ba sbyar bar bya ba yin na sems can 'di dag rang gi mthus bsgrubs pa'i longs spyod kyis bde bar 'tsho'o zhes dga' ba rnyed pa dang /_de'i longs spyod rgyal po dang /_rkun po dang /_
[\[267b.6\]]me dang chu la sogs pa dang /_bgo skal la spyod pa mi mdza' ba rnams kyis mi phrogs par 'gyur ba dang /_gang gi tshe bu phun sum tshogs pa dang /_g.yog 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang /_longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa rnyed pa de'i tshe de la rgyal po yang dga' bar 'gyur na sems can gzhan 
[\[267b.7\]]lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de longs spyod dang /_kun tu spyod pa rgya chen po la sems 'jug pa ste/_shA ri'i bu bzhi po de dag ni pha rol 'byor pa la dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon no/_/shA ri'i bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas 
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin to/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos lnga dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin cing yongs su sbyong ste/_lnga gang zhe 
[\[268a.2\]]na/_shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rnams la phun sum tshogs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos kun tu tshol zhing de gang la chos nyan pa de la byang chub sems dpas ji ltar yon tan 'di dag yongs su bsgrubs pa de kun 'dri zhing des chos de thos 
[\[268a.3\]]nas de bzhin du nan tan byed pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar smon cing de tshul khrims yongs su dag par 'gyur ba ste/_de tshul khrims yongs su dag pas gang dang gang du smon pa de dang der skyes te/_de der skyes nas de 
[\[268a.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa la sems shing rtog ste/_nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa 'am/_byang chub sems dpa'i phun sum tshogs pa 'am/_longs spyod dang kun tu spyod pa phun sum tshogs pa mtshan mar 'dzin te/_des de dag mtshan mar bzung nas gus pa dang bcas/_rje 
[\[268a.5\]]sa dang bcas shing thal mo sbyar te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i thad du song nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas ji ltar spyad na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rgya chen po yongs su 'dzin ces kun tu zhus nas de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen 
[\[268a.6\]]te/_gang rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rgya chen po yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba'i gnas de dag ston cing /_yang dag par rab tu 'chad de/_des de thos nas de bzhin du nan tan byed pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dang ldan zhing bya ba dang 
[\[268a.7\]]ldan pa yin te/_de mi shes pa yongs su sbyong zhing bya ba ma yin pa yongs su spong ngo /_de la ye shes ni gang /_bya ba ni gang zhe na/_ye shes zhes bya ba ni gang dmigs pa la dmigs pa ni ye shes te/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang bral ba'o/_/bya ba zhes bya ba ni ji ltar 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]thos pa'i chos rnams la nan tan byed pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rgyu dang 'byung ba la mkhas pa yin te/_de la rgyu ni gang /_'byung ba ni gang zhe na/_rgyu zhes bya ba ni gang /_'di tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa ste/_gang las phyin ci log bzhi la 
[\[268b.2\]]sems can rnams gnas par 'gyur ba'o/_/de ni tshul bzhin la brtson pa yin te/_de la tshul bzhin sbyor ba gang zhe na/_gang 'di chos thams cad yid la mi byed pa ste/_'byung ba yang de nyid yin no/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyang rab tu shes/_zhing 
[\[268b.3\]]gi ngo bo nyid kyang rab tu shes so/_/de la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid ni gang /_zhing gi ngo bo nyid ni gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid ces bya ba de ni ming tsam mo/_/zhing gi ngo bo nyid ces bya ba de yang ming tsam mo/_/gang ming tsam de dben par shes shing ji ltar chos gang yang mi dmigs pa de ltar shes pa ste/_
[\[268b.4\]]shA ri'i bu chos lnga po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi g.yo zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin cing yongs su sbyong ngo /_/shAri'i bu gzhan yang chos drug dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' myur du bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[268b.5\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin te/_drug gang zhe na/_shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa po sbyin bdag tu 'gyur ba ste/_de dngos po gang phangs pa yid du 'ong ba/_mngon 
[\[268b.6\]]par 'dod par 'gyur ba de dag yongs su gtong yang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing yid dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang /_rangs pa dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas 'di ltar gang 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la mngon par smon pas bdag gis sbyin pa chen po dang /_theg pa chen po dang /_
[\[268b.7\]]bya ba chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/kun tu 'dzin pa'i sems kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsgrub par mi nus so snyam du rtog go_/des de ltar brtags nas bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bar 'gyur te/_des rang gi lus dang srog yongs su btang yang yid mi 
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]bde bar mi 'gyur na gzhan nor gyi rnam pa dang /_chung ma dang /_bu pho dang /_bu mo lta smos kyang ci dgos/_shA ri'i bu 'di la ji snyam du sems/_gang thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di'i bstan pa ji lta bu zhe na/_shA ri'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[269a.2\]]po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba yin te/_de'i phyir de byang chub thob pas na thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim par gyur pa yang rung /_rab tu byung ba yang rung ste/_tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang 
[\[269a.3\]]dag par 'dzin pa la rab tu gnas pa yin te/_de srog gi phyir yang bslab pa las mi 'da'o/_/gang tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par bzung ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/_bdag ni tshul khrims 
[\[269a.4\]]dang ldan pa'o/_/zhes dga' ba rnyed cing mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/_mngon par dga' bas tshangs par spyad pa spyod de de tshangs par spyod cing bde bar nyin mtshan 'da' bar byed do/_/de bde bar chos mngon sum du 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi tshul dang ldan par yang dag par so sor rtog par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[269a.5\]]yang dag par so sor rtog pa la gnas pa ni zab mo la bzod pa skye'o/_/zab mo la bzod pa skyes pa ni lta ba drang por 'gyur ro/_/lta ba drang ba ni yang dag par nan tan byed par 'gyur ro/_/yang dag pa'i nan tan la gnas pa ni khams gsum la mngon par mi dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/de khams 
[\[269a.6\]]gsum la mngon par mi dga' bas skrag par 'gyur ro/_/skrag pas 'byung ba tshol lo/_/'byung ba mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_ji ltar bdag sdug bsngal ba ltar sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin te/_bdag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad kyi khur khyer la nye bar zhi ba ma 
[\[269a.7\]]gtogs par 'di dag gi bde ba'i rgyu gzhan med do snyam mo/_/de de ltar so sor rtog pa ni snying rje chen po 'thob/_/de cher snying rje bas thams cad mkhyen pa ma thob kyi bar du mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du brtson 'grus mi 'dor ro/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]bzod pa'i go cha gyon cing bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa yin gyi/_nga rgyal gyi stobs dang ldan pa ma yin no/_/de spyos brgyad brdegs bsdigs kyang bzod pa sgrub ste/_pha rol la mi 'khrug gnod par mi sems so/_/de 'di ltar sems bskyed de/_gal te bdag la sems can de dag gis ri rab 
[\[269b.2\]]tsam gyi tho bas brdegs shing bskal pa bye ba'i bar du rgyun mi 'chad par gshe yang bdag gis gnod sems dang /_tha ba dang /_zhe sdang gi sems bskyed par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can de dag ni ma bslabs pa bdag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la slob par 'dod pa'o 
[\[269b.3\]]snyam nas de ji lta ji lta bur sems can rnams kyis spyos pa dang /_brgyad pa dang /_brdegs pa de lta de lta bur snying rje chen po skyed de/_bdag gis sems can 'di dag bskyab par bya'o/_/bdag sems can 'di dag gi don du go cha bgos nas bdag gis sems can 'di dag gzung ba yin 
[\[269b.4\]]te/_bdag gis 'di dag 'khor ba las yongs su thar par bya'i/_bdag gis 'di dag la gnod sems dang tha ba dang /_zhe sdang gi sems bskyed par ni mi bya'o snyam mo/_/de de ltar bzod pa'i go cha bgos pas phun sum tshogs pa bcu 'thob ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_gang 'di rigs phun 
[\[269b.5\]]sum tshogs pa dang /_longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang /_gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang /_g.yog 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang /_gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen phun sum tshogs pa dang /_chos nyan pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_chos la 
[\[269b.6\]]nan tan byed pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_shi 'phos nas kyang sangs rgyas mthong ba phun sum tshogs pa rnyed pa dang /_mthong nas kyang dad pa thob pa ste/_shA ri'i bu bzod pa'i go cha bgos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni phun sum tshogs pa bcu po de dag 'thob bo/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la 
[\[269b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i chos yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams shing yi dam la brtan pa yin no/_/de 'di ltar brtson 'grus rtsom ste/_gal te bdag gis sems can re re'i don gyi phyir yang phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa bye bar yang 'khor bar bya'o zhes tshul 'di dang /_brtson 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]'grus rtsom pa 'di dang /_spyod pa 'di dang /_sems zhi ba 'di dang /_yi dam 'di dang /_dge ba'i bsam pa 'di dang /_snying rje'i sems 'dis sems can thams cad kyi ched du bskal pa de snyed du 'khor bar bya ste/_de ltar bdag gis sems can 'di dag yongs su mi gtong ngo snyam nas 
[\[270a.2\]]brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang gis gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su gang bar byas te/_sems bskyed pa/_sems bskyed pa tsam la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[270a.3\]]sangs rgyas rnams la sbyin pa byin te/_tshul 'di dang /_stobs bskyed pa 'dis phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa bye bar sbyin pa byin pa bas byang chub sems dpa' gang lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa snying rje chen po la gnas pas 'di lta bu'i brtson 'grus kyi go cha'i sems bskyed na de de bas bsod nams 
[\[270a.4\]]ches mang du skyed do/_/sha ri'i bu brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i byang chub sems dpas yon tan gyi chos bcu 'thob ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_des byis pa'i spyod pa spangs pa yin/_des sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa yongs su bzung ba yin/_des 'khor ba la nyes par 'du shes bskyed pa yin/_
[\[270a.5\]]des snying rje chen po yongs su bzung ba yin/_sngon dam bcas pa las mi 'gyur ba yin/_nad nyung ba yin/_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bka' bzhin byas pa yin/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug chung ba yin/_ji ltar 
[\[270a.6\]]bstan pa'i tshig dang /_yi ge rnams kyi don rab tu shes pa yin/_nan tan gyis yang dag par sgrub pa yin te/_shA ri'i bu brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yon tan gyi chos bcu po de dag 'thob bo/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas 
[\[270a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams rjes su dran zhing de 'di snyam du sems te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni thugs rtse gcig pa/_rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa/_bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba dang ldan pa'o/_/snyam nas de yang 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag de bzhin gshegs pa bzhud pa'i rjes su 'gro bar bya na sems 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]g.yengs pa dang /_brjed ngas pas ni gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi gnas te/_gnas 'di thob par mi nus so snyam nas de chags pa thams cad dang /_yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad dang /_'thob pa dang /_bkur sti thams cad dang /_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal la chags pa thams 
[\[270b.2\]]cad dang /_grogs po dang /_gla mi dang /_khyim la sred pa thams cad yongs su btang ste/_sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir sems can thams cad ni bdag gis yongs su mi gtang ngo /_/snyam nas dgon pa rab tu dgon pa la mngon par dga' ba yin te/_bse ru ltar gcig pu 
[\[270b.3\]]spyod cing de dgon pa rab tu dgon pa dag tu gnas nas phyogs gcig tu sems can rnams la byams pas khyab par byed do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_phyogs bcu kun gyi bar du tshad med pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed do/_/byams pa la 
[\[270b.4\]]gnas nas bsam gtan la bsam gtan par 'gyur ro/_/yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa gang gis gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par bde bar sbyar ba thams 
[\[270b.5\]]cad kyis bsti stang du byas pa bas byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba na rab tu dben par 'dod cing dgon pa logs su phyogs te/_gom pa bdun bor na 'di ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du skyed do/_/ches myur du byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu bcu po 'di dag ni dben 
[\[270b.6\]]pa na gnas shing bsam gtan la bsam gtan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon te/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dran pa dang ldan pa yin/_blo gros dang ldan pa yin/_rtogs pa dang ldan pa yin/_mos pa dang ldan pa yin/_myur du spobs pa rab tu thob pa yin/_gzungs 
[\[270b.7\]]sgrub pa yin/_skye ba dang /_'jig pa la mkhas pa thob pa yin/_tshul khrims kyi phung po las mi nyams pa yin/_lha rnams kyang de la rim gror byed pa yin/_gzhan gyi 'byor pa la mi 'dod pa yin te/_shA ri'i bu bcu po de dag ni dben pa la gnas shing bsam gtan la bsam gtan 
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon no/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi rgyu 'thun pa la mkhas pa yin te/_de 'di ltar shes rab gang nas byung snyam du nye bar rtog cing de 'di snyam du sems te/_shes rab ni tshul khrims kyi sdom pa'i gnas las 
[\[271a.2\]]byung ste/_shes rab byung ba las chos dkar po thams cad rnam par 'phel lo snyam nas de shes rab la slob ste/_gang 'jig rten gyi bzo'i gnas dang /_las kyi gnas dang /_sngags kyi gnas dang /_sman gyi gnas dang /_gang bya dka' ba dang /_bsgrub dka' ba'i las de dag thams cad la slob 
[\[271a.3\]]bo/_/bslabs nas kyang de 'di ltar sems bskyed de/_gang 'jig rten pa'i shes rab 'di ni yid 'byung bar ma yin/_'dod chags dang bral bar ma yin/_'gog par ma yin/_zhi bar ma yin/_mngon par shes par ma yin/_mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par ma yin/_dge sbyong du ma yin/_
[\[271a.4\]]mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba ma yin gyis/_'di ltar bdag gis shes rab gang gis shin tu zhi bar 'gyur ba'i bzo rnam pa de lta bu dang /_sngags rnam pa de lta bu dang /_sman rnam pa de lta bu dang /_shes rab rnam pa de lta bu yongs su btsal lo snyam nas de chos thams cad kyi thog ma yongs su tshol lo/_/
[\[271a.5\]]de chos thams cad kyi thog ma yongs su tshol ba na chos gang yang chos gang la yang nye bar 'jog pa'i chos de gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bas rab tu zhi ba la gnas par 'gyur ro/_/rab tu zhi bar spyod pa la gnas nas yongs su yi mi 'chad do/_/yongs 
[\[271a.6\]]su yi mi 'chad pas de sems can rnams kyi don du 'di lta ste/_sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bsams bzhin du srid pa 'dzin te/_shA ri'i bu chos drug po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 
[\[271a.7\]]rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing smon lam las mi nyams la/_'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa yang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos bdun dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]nyams shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ngo /_/bdun gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing sbyin pa de yang mi dmigs pa dang /_tshul khrims kyang skyon med la/_tshul khrims de la rlom sems kyang med pa dang /_bzod cing des 
[\[271b.2\]]la/_sems de yang mi dmigs pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyang rtsom la/_lus dang /_ngag dang /_sems de yang mi dmigs pa dang /_bsam gtan yang yongs su sgrub la/_de yang mi gnas pa'i bsam gtan la bsam gtan pa dang /_shes rab kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed la/_de 
[\[271b.3\]]rtog pa yang med pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyang rjes su dran la de mtshan ma yang sel ba ste/_shA ri'i bu chos bdun po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa yang yongs su 'dzin to/_/shA ri'i bu chos brgyad 
[\[271b.4\]]dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su sbyong ste/_brgyad gang zhe na/_phrag dog med pa dang /_rgyan sbyin pa dang /_sems rgya che ba dang /_chos smra ba la bsti stang byed pa dang gus pa dang bcas pa dang /_'tsho ba rnam par dag pa dang /_
[\[271b.5\]]kun bged pa'i ngang tshul can dang /_bdag la mi stod cing gzhan la mi smod pa ste/_shA ri'i bu chos brgyad po de dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su sbyong ngo //_//bam po gsum pa/_shA ri'i bu chos dgu 
[\[271b.6\]]dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed de/_dgu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lus sdom pa dang /_ngag sdom pa dang /_yid sdom pa dang /_'dod chags bsal ba dang /_zhe sdang bsal ba dang /_gti mug bsal ba dang /_slu ba med 
[\[271b.7\]]pa dang /_mdza' ba brtan pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brnyas pa med pa ste/_shA ri'i bu chos dgu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do/_/shA ri'i bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal thos na mi 'jigs shing snying rje ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal thos na mi 'jigs shing snying rje ba dang /_gshin 
[\[272a.2\]]rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thos na mi 'jigs shing snying rje ba dang /_lha rgud pa thos na mi 'jigs shing snying rje ba dang /_mi rgud pa thos na mi 'jigs shing snying rje ba dang /_dbul ba dang /_mu ge dang /_rkun po dang /_rang rta dang dmag gi gnod pa thos na mi 'jigs shing snying rje ba ste/_de 'di 
[\[272a.3\]]snyam du ci nas kyang bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul med cing bsams pa tsam gyis bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_bgo ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /_sems can rnams kyang tshe dpag tu med par gyur te/_nga'i ba med 
[\[272a.4\]]cing yongs su 'dzin pa med pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du yongs su dag par ma byas kyi bar du brtson 'grus mi gtong ngo snyam du sems skyed pa ste/_shA ri'i bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las 
[\[272a.5\]]kyang mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' me tog khyer zhing de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du song nas 'di snyam du sems skyed de/_me tog 'di ji ltar dri zhim la kha dog bzang zhing 
[\[272a.6\]]blta na sdug ste/_yid du 'ong ba dang /_mdzes pa de bzhin du bdag byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang me tog sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang /_rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing ljon pas rab tu brgyan par gyur cig ces bya bar sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_phye ma dang /_
[\[272a.7\]]bdug spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_bzhon pa dang /_gos dang /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_mu tig dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru'i bar du gang ci 'bul yang rung ste/_de dag thams cad 
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bsgrub pa'i don du yongs su bsngo zhing tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas pas byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas pa de'i sems kyi smon pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni su la yang yid du mi 
[\[272b.2\]]'ong ba'i tshig mi rjod cing yid du 'ong ba'i tshig sha stag brjod de/_de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can gang gis kyang yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra mi thos te/_yid du 'ong ba'i sgra sha stag thos par 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bdag gi bde ba yongs 
[\[272b.3\]]su mi tshol zhing gzhan bde bas dga' bar 'dzin te/_de la byang chub thob pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sems can bde ba'i dam pas tshim par 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par yang dag par blangs shing 
[\[272b.4\]]sgrub ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo ste/_de byang chub thob pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan zhing 'byung ba'i shes rab can du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[272b.5\]]shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' yul gang na 'dug kyang rung ste/_yul der skyes pa'am/_bud med dam/_khye'u 'am/_bu mo 'am/_sems can gang ji snyed cig des mthong ba de thams cad byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing su la yang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs 
[\[272b.6\]]rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam mi rjod cing /_gzhan du na sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam sha stag brjod de/_de byang chub thob pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur te/_nyan thos dang /_rang 
[\[272b.7\]]sangs rgyas med cing byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thob par 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi rnyed pa mi 'phrog cing gzhan gyis thob na dga' bar 'dzin te/_de byang chub thob pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing der 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de thams cad mi 'phrogs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa dang /_chos kyi 'thob pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma 'am su yang rung ste/_nyes pa byung bas 
[\[273a.2\]]mi rgol la bdag nyid kyang dam pa'i chos la sbyor te/_de byang chub thob pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyes pa'i ming yang ye med par 'gyur te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can de dag ni nyes pa med pa'i chos can yongs su dag par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la 
[\[273a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' chos 'dod cing chos don du gnyer la yongs su yi 'chad pa med pa'i rang bzhin can yin te/_ji skad du thos pa'i chos la nan tan byed pas de byang chub thob pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag thams cad chos 'dod cing chos don du gnyer 
[\[273a.4\]]ba dang /_yongs su yi 'chad pa med pa'i rang bzhin can yin te/_ji skad du thos pa'i chos rnams la nan tan byed par 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnga bo che dang /_dung dang /_rdza rnga dang /_'khar rnga dang /_pi bang rgyud gcig pa dang /_sgra snyan dang /_
[\[273a.5\]]'khar dkrol dang /_gling bu dang /_pi bang dang /_bal la ki dang /_kim pa la la sogs pa rol mo sil snyan gyi yo byad yid du 'ong ba sna tshogs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mchod pa byed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bsgrub 
[\[273a.6\]]pa'i don du yongs su bsngo ste/_de byang chub thob pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sil snyan brgya stong ma dkrol ma brdungs par sgra 'byin par 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' brjed ngas pa'i sems can rnams la dran par 'gyur ba'i gdams ngag gis 
[\[273a.7\]]'dems te/_de byang chub thob pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sems can rnams bsam gtan gyi zas can du 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu ngas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa las brtsams te bskal pa 'am/_bskal pa las lhag par chos bstan kyang de bzhin gshegs 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]pa'i spobs pa la mtha' thug pa med mod kyi/_mos pa dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis gang thos na de yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ba mdor bstan to/_/shA ri'i bu chos gsum dang ldan na 
[\[273b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing ji ltar bsams pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te/_gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bag yod par gnas pa dang /_ji skad du thos pa'i chos la nan tan byed pa dang /_
[\[273b.3\]]smon lam gyi khyad par te/_shA ri'i bu chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing ji ltar bsams pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan 
[\[273b.4\]]pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas legs par gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar te/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad ni bag mchis pa la gnas pa'o/_/byang chub ni nan tan la gnas so/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 
[\[273b.5\]]yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa ni smon lam gyi khyad par gyis 'grub bo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad ni bag yod pa la gnas so/_/byang chub ni nan tan la gnas so/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 
[\[273b.6\]]yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa ni smon lam gyi khyad par gyis 'grub po/_/shA ri'i bu ngas sngon ji ltar smon lam btab pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su grub bo/_/shA ri'i bu nga bag yod pa la gnas pas smon lam yongs su rdzogs so/_/shA ri'i bu ngas nan tan byas pas byang 
[\[273b.7\]]chub thob bo/_/shA ri'i bu bag med par gnas shing tshig gi las lhur len pa dang /_nan tan med pas ni nyan thos kyis yang sgrub par mi nus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lta ci smos te/_shA ri'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa'i ming du gdags 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]par dam bca' bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ji ltar bcas pa 'di la bslab par bya'o/_/de nas 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong so so'i stan las langs te/_thal mo sbyar nas kun gyis kyang mgrin 
[\[274a.2\]]gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ji ltar bcas pa 'di la bslab par bgyi'o/_/nan tan gyis yongs su bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/bag mchis par gnas par bgyi'o/_/smon lam rnams 
[\[274a.3\]]yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/_/ji ltar bsams pa'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur gyi bar du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 
[\[274a.4\]]'dzum pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/_rkyen gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu khyod kyis 'di skad du 
[\[274a.5\]]seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa'i rigs kyi bu 'di dag mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'di dag thams cad bskal pa brgya phrag stong 'das nas bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[274a.6\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_shA ri'i bu dper na seng ge zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa sha stag sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan du 'byung ba ngas gzigs pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa de de dag kyang ming smon lam bkod pa 
[\[274a.7\]]zhes bya ba sha stag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan du 'byung bar 'gyur te/_shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na sangs 
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar lhag chad med par 'gyur te/_tshe'i tshad ni ma gtogs so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di dag gi tshe'i tshad ji tsam zhig tu 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs 
[\[274b.2\]]pa de dag re re zhing tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa bcu bcur 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/_'dug pa stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig 
[\[274b.3\]]la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 
[\[274b.4\]]bstod cing bsngags na/_bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di yun ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/_de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_
[\[274b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid la dris shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[274b.6\]]seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal khyod ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_rigs 
[\[274b.7\]]kyi bu khyod kyis kho bo la ci khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs sam/_'on te ma zhugs zhes je dris shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu gal te kho bo byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs na ni de'i phyir mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]yang rgya na/_kho bo yang dag par zhugs pa med pas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ji ltar 'gyur/_smras pa/_'jam dpal khyod sems can rnams kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par ma zhugs sam/_smras 
[\[275a.2\]]pa/_rigs kyi bu de ni ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir te/_rigs kyi bu gal te kho bos sems can zhig dmigs na ni de'i phyir kho bo yang de dag gi don du byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug na/_rigs kyi bu gang gi phyir 
[\[275a.3\]]sems can yang med/_srog kyang med/_gang zag kyang med pa de'i phyir kho bo 'jug pa med do/_/ldog pa med do/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal khyod sangs rgyas kyi chos la ma zhugs sam/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu de ni ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu chos 
[\[275a.4\]]thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la zhugs pa ste/_chos gang zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa med la mtshan ma med cing mtshan nyid med pa de ni sangs rgyas su zhugs pa yin te/_chos thams cad kyang sangs rgyas su zhugs pa de dang 'dra bas sangs rgyas su zhugs 
[\[275a.5\]]pa de dang mi 'dra ba med do/_/rigs kyi bu gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du khyod sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi don du ma zhugs sam zhes smras pa de khyod nyid la dris/_khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa bzhin du lung ston cig_/rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_gzugs byang chub tu 
[\[275a.6\]]smon tam/_'on te gzugs kyi rang bzhin nam/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dam/_gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid ma/_gzugs kyi stong pa nyid dam/_gzugs kyi dben pa nyid dam/_gzugs kyi chos nyid byang chub tu smon/_rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_gzugs 
[\[275a.7\]]byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/_'on te gzugs kyi rang bzhin nam/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dam/_gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dam/_gzugs kyi stong pa nyid dam/_gzugs kyi dben pa nyid dam/_gzugs kyi chos nyid byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]'tshang rgya/_smras pa/_'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/_gzugs byang chub tu smon pa med do/_/gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang /_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dang /_gzugs kyi stong pa nyid dang /_gzugs kyi dben pa nyid dang /_gzugs kyi chos nyid ni 
[\[275b.2\]]byang chub tu smon pa med do/_/gzugs ni byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste/_gzugs kyi chos nyid kyi bar du yang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/_/smras pa/_rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du 
[\[275b.3\]]byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa byang chub tu smon tam/_rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyi bar du yang byang chub tu smon tam/_rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_rnam par shes pa byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/_rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyi bar 
[\[275b.4\]]du yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/_smras pa/_'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni byang chub tu smon pa med do/_/rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyi bar du yang byang chub tu smon pa med do/_/rnam 
[\[275b.5\]]par shes pa ni byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/_/rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyi bar du yang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/_/smras pa/_rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_phung po lnga po dag las phyi rol du bdag gam bdag 
[\[275b.6\]]gi zhes bya bar gdags par nus sam/_smras pa/_'jam dpal de ni ma yin no/_/smras pa/_rigs kyi bu de lta yin na byang chub tu smon pa'i chos de gang zhig yod/_byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yang gang zhig yod/_smras pa/_'jam dpal khyod 
[\[275b.7\]]lta bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag gi dbang du gyur pa/_tshad mar gyur pas kho bo byang chub tu smon pa med do/_/kho bo mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o zhes bshad na/_bstan pa de thos pas byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa rnams 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]skrag par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni skrag pa med pa ste/_yang dag pa'i mtha' ni skrag pa med pa'o/_/skrag pa med par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa yang chos ston te/_gang skrag pa de ni skyo bar 'gyur ro/_/gang skyo bar 
[\[276a.2\]]gyur pa de ni 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/gang 'dod chags dang bral ba de ni rnam par grol lo/_/gang rnam par grol ba de ni bcings pa med par 'gyur ro/_/gang bcings pa med pa de ni chags par mi 'gyur ro/_/gang chags pa 
[\[276a.3\]]med pa de ni 'gro ba med do/_/gang 'gro ba med pa de ni 'ong ba med do/_/gang 'ong ba med pa de ni smon pa med do/_/gang smon pa med pa de ni smon lam 'debs pa med do/_/gang smon lam 'debs pa med pa de ni ldog pa med do/_/gang ldog pa med pa de ni phyir ldog pa ste/_ci las phyir 
[\[276a.4\]]ldog ce na/_bdag tu 'dzin pa las phyir ldog go_/sems can du 'dzin pa dang /_srog tu 'dzin pa dang /_gang zag tu 'dzin pa dang /_chad par 'dzin pa dang /_rtag par 'dzin pa dang /_mtshan mar 'dzin pa las phyir ldog go_/rnam par rtog pa las phyir ldog go_/nam phyir ldog 
[\[276a.5\]]pa de'i tshe 'gyur ba med pas phyir mi ldog ste/_gang las phyir mi ldog ce na/_stong pa nyid las phyir mi ldog go_/mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las phyir mi ldog go_/de la gang las phyir mi ldog pa'i 
[\[276a.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gang zhe na/_bral ba med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so/_/khongs su gtogs pa med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so/_/dmigs pa med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so/_/len pa med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so/_/dor 
[\[276a.7\]]ba med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so/_/rgyu ba med pa dang /_rnam par rig pa med pa dang /_ming tsam du zad pa dang /_stong pa dang /_ma skyes pa dang /_ma 'gags pa dang /_'ong ba med pa dang /_'gro ba med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang bral ba 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]dang /_rdul med pa dang /_rdul dang bral ba dang /_bdag gi ba med pa dang /_yid la bya ba med pa dang mi ldan pa med pa dang /_zag pa med pa dang /_blangs pa med pa dang /_mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so/_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[276b.2\]]chos gang yin pa de dag ni chos kyang ma yin/_chos ma yin pa yang ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de dag la gang las 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so zhes bya bar brjod pa'i gnas mi dmigs so/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa gang gis bstan pa 
[\[276b.3\]]'di thos nas 'jigs par gyur pa de dag ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/gang 'jigs par ma gyur pa de dag ni ci yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ci las 
[\[276b.4\]]bsams shing de skad du ston/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu gang 'jigs par gyur pa de dag ni rnam par rtog par 'gyur te/_gang rnam par rtog pa de dag ni 'di snyam du bdag cag gis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam nas de dag mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[276b.5\]]'tshang rgya ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa ji snyed du bskyed par gyur pa de snyed du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/gang dag de lta bu'i sems mi skyed pa de dag ni byang chub tu dmigs pa med cing sems kyis rlom sems su mi byed de byang chub kyi sems su dmigs pa med 
[\[276b.6\]]pas rnam par rtog pa med do/_/gang gi tshe rnam par mi rtog pa de'i tshe ci yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med do/_/ci'i phyir ci yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med ce na/_byang chub de mi dmigs pas de'i phyir mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med do/_/rigs 
[\[276b.7\]]kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_nam mkha'i khams byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/_smras pa/_'jam dpal de ni ma yin no/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu ci bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam par bstan mod/_smras 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]pa/_'jam dpal de de bzhin no/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu de lta bas na nam mkha' ji lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin/_byang chub ji lta bar nam mkha' yang de bzhin te/_nam mkha' dang byang chub de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med do/_/
[\[277a.2\]]gang gis de lta bu'i mnyam pa nyid shes pa de ni cung zad kyang shes pa med la des ma shes pa yang gang yang med do/_/bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe dge slong khri nyis stong nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/lha dang mi khri bzhi stong chos la chos kyi 
[\[277a.3\]]mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med par rnam par dag go_/srog chags dgu khri drug stong gis sngon ma bskyed pa las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' lnga khri nyis stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 
[\[277a.4\]]gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal khyod kyis yun ring po ji srid cig nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[277a.5\]]tu sems bskyed/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu kha rog chos rnams ma skyes pa la bdag rnam par rtog tu ma gzhug_/rigs kyi bu gang la la zhig 'di skad du bdag gis byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/bdag gis byang chub kyi phyir spyad par bya'o/_/zhes 
[\[277a.6\]]zer na de nyid de'i log par lta ba chen por 'gyur te/_rigs kyi bu bdag gis ni sems gang byang chub tu bskyed par bya ba de lta bu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/_de ltar bdag gis sems de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas byang chub tu yang sems ma bskyed do/_/
[\[277a.7\]]smras pa/_'jam dpal rjes su ma mthong zhes bya ba'i tshig de'i don gang yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu yang dag par rjes su mthong zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa nyid bstan pa'o/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ci'i phyir mnyam pa nyid ces bya/_smras pa/_rigs kyi 
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]bu mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba ni gang la tha dad pa med pa ste/_mnyam pa nyid des chos thams cad 'di lta ste/_dben pa'i tshul du tshul gcig tu bstan pas ro gcig tu brjod cing kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa dang /_chad pa med pa dang /_rtag 
[\[277b.2\]]pa med pa dang /_mi skye ba dang /_mi 'gag pa dang /_nga'i ba med pa dang /_yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang /_dor ba med pa'i phyir chos ston cing mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa ste/_rigs kyi bu chos de lta bu mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa'i ye shes ni mnyam pa nyid ces bya'o/_/
[\[277b.3\]]rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang gis chos nyid khong du chud pa de ni khams las tha dad par yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_gcig tu yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba 'di ni mnyam pa nyid do/_/mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mi mnyam pa med 
[\[277b.4\]]pa'o/_/mi mnyam pa med pa gang yin pa de ni gzod ma nas dag pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon 
[\[277b.5\]]nur gyur pa 'di ni 'di srid cig nas ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do zhes bgyi bar mi ston te/_'khor 'di dag ni nyan par 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ni zab 
[\[277b.6\]]mo'i bzod pa dang ldan pa ste/_de yang ji tsam du byang chub kyang mi dmigs/_sems kyang mi dmigs pa de tsam du zab mo'i bzod pa dang ldan te/_des byang chub kyi sems mi dmigs pas ngas 'di srid cig nas byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/zhes bya bar mi ston na/_
[\[277b.7\]]rigs kyi bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yun ring po ji srid cig nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa bstan par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa brgya stong gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed phrag bdun 
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]'das pa de pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol de'i tshe de'i dus na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_
[\[278a.2\]]skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 
[\[278a.3\]]'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba bzang po zhes bya ba byung ste/_de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba de chos ston to/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de'i nyan thos 'dus pa ni bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir gyur/_
[\[278a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa'i 'dus pa ni de'i nyis 'gyur du gyur te/_de'i tshe rgyal po nam mkha' zhes bya ba chos dang ldan pa/_chos kyi rgyal po 'khor los sgyur ba'i rin po che bdun dang ldan pa byung ste/_rigs kyi bu rgyal po nam mkha' zhes bya ba de bu dang chung ma dang /_gnyen 
[\[278a.5\]]'dab dang /_'khor du bcas pas las gzhan med cing skyo ba med pa'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun du bcas pa de la lo brgyad khri bzhi stong du zhal zas kyi rnam pa kha na 
[\[278a.6\]]ma tho ba med pa gzhan dang gzhan dag dang /_na bza' sar pa sar pa gzhan dang gzhan dag dang /_pho brang khang pa brtsegs pa sar pa sar pa gzhan dang gzhan dag dang /_rim gro ba kha na ma tho ba med pa gzhan dang gzhan dag dang /_bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis rim gror 
[\[278a.7\]]byas par gyur to/_/de ltar lo brgyad khri bzhi stong 'das pa'i 'og tu de gcig pu dben pa na gnyis su med par 'dug 'dug pa'i yid la rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sems skyes par gyur te/_bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po mngon par 'dus byas kyang de dag nges pa med pa'i sems kyis 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]'dus byas nad ni dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/snyam nas de 'di snyam du sems te dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di brgya byin du bsngo 'am/_tshangs par bsngo 'am 'khor los sgyur bar bsngo'am/_nyan thos su bsngo 'am/_rang sangs rgyas su bsngo 'am/_gang du bsngo
