[\[278b.2\]]snyam pa dang /_rigs kyi bu rgyal po de'i sems de ltar bskyed ma thag tu steng gi bar snang las lha mang pos sgra bsgrags pa/_rgyal po chen po de ltar dma' ba'i sems ma skyed cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_khyod kyis bsod nams kyi phung po yangs pa byas kyis rgyal po chen po 
[\[278b.3\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cig ces byas pa dang /_rigs kyi bu de'i tshe rgyal po chen po nam mkha' de dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba chen po skyes par gyur te/_des 'di snyam du bsams so/_/bdag ni byang chub las phyir 
[\[278b.4\]]mi ldog go_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha rnams kyis bdag gi sems yongs su shes te sgra bsgrags so snyam mo/_/rigs kyi bu de nas rgyal po nam mkha' de srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cus yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[278b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das de la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/rigs kyi bu de nas rgyal po nam 
[\[278b.6\]]mkha' zhes bya ba des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_khyod kyi spyan sngar dam chos zhu/_/skyes bu dam pa mchog skye bar/_/rnam pa gang gis 
[\[278b.7\]]'gyur ba de/_/rnam par 'dren pas bdag la gsungs/_/rnam 'dren khyod la mngon sum du/_/mchod pa yangs pa bgyid bgyid kyang /_/ma nges sems kyis bgyis gyur gyis/_/gar yang yongs su bsngo ma bgyis/_/bdag ni gcig pu dben gnas tshe/_/'di 'dra'i sems shig 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]skyes par gyur/_/bdag gis bsod nams che bas gsan/_/ji ltar yongs su de bsngo snyam/_/tshangs par bsngo 'am brgya byin nam/_/gling bzhi'i dbang phyug thob par ram/_/'on te nyan thos dngos por ram/_/rang rgyal 'thob pa'i phyir bsngo snyam/_/de ltar 
[\[279a.2\]]sems bskyed de ma thag_/lha rnams sgra 'byin brjod pa ni/_/dman pa'i sems kyis bsod nams 'di/_/rnam par chud gzon ma byed cig_/sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/smon lam rlabs chen gdab par gyis/_/byang chub sems rab bskyed byas shing /_/'jig 
[\[279a.3\]]rten rnams kyi don kyang gyis/_/de bas chos kyi dbang phyug gtso/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag zhu ste/_/thub pa ji ltar sems bskyed na/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub skye bar 'gyur/_/ye shes de ni gang gis 'thob/_/de don bdag la bstan du gsol/_/byang chub sems ni bskyed 
[\[279a.4\]]bgyis shing /_/thub pa khyod 'drar bdag kyang smon/_/de yi tshig de gsan gyur nas/_/de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa/_/rgyal po chen po shes par gyis/_/rim gyis khyod la bstan par bya/_/chos rnams thams cad rkyen bzhin te/_/'dun pa'i rtsa la rab tu gnas/_/
[\[279a.5\]]gang gis smon lam ci btab pa/_/de 'dra'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/_/rgyal po ngas kyang sngon chad ni/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed gyur/_/sems can kun la phan don du/_/ngas ni smon lam dam pa btab/_/smon lam ji ltar btab tshul du/_/ngas ni 'bras bu thob 
[\[279a.6\]]par gyur/_/byang chub dam pa ngas thob pas/_/nga yi bsam pa rdzogs par gyur/_/rgyal po chen po brtan gyis la/_/mi 'gyur sems ni bskyed par gyis/_/gal te spyod pa spyad byas na/_/khyod kyang yang dag sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/thub pa'i gsung de thos gyur nas/_/
[\[279a.7\]]rgyal po de ni dga' bar gyur/_/'jig rten kun gyi mngon sum du/_/seng ge'i nga ror tshig 'di brjod/_/'khor ba'i tha ma med pa yi/_/sngon gyi tha ma ji srid pa/_/de srid sems can phan don du/_/spyod pa dpag yas spyad par bya/_/'jig rten mgon po'i spyan snga 'dir/_/byang chub 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]mchog tu sems bskyed do/_/'gro ba thams cad 'gron gnyer te/_/dbul zhing phongs las dgrol bar bya/_/de ring phan chad gal te yang /_/bdag gis 'dod chags sems bskyed na/_/phyogs bcu dag na gang bzhugs pa'i/_/sangs rgyas thams cad bslus par gyur/_/
[\[279b.2\]]byang chub nam zhig thob bar du/_/tha ba'i sems dang gnod sems dang /_/phrag dog dang ni ser sna yang /_/de ring phan chad mi bya'o/_/tshangs pa'i spyod pa bdag gis spyad/_/sdig pa'i 'dod pa yongs su gtang /_/tshul khrims sdom dang nges pa la/_/sangs rgyas rjes su 
[\[279b.3\]]bslab par bya/_/bdag ni byang chub [{]rings [,]ring [}]tshul du/_/'tshang rgyar mos shing spro ba med/_/phyi mthar thug gi bar du yang /_/sems can gcig phyir spyad par bya/_/tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/_/sangs rgyas zhing ni sbyang bar bya/_/phyogs rnams bcu po thams cad 
[\[279b.4\]]du/_/bdag gi ming ni thos par bya/_/bdag gis bdag la lung bstan te/_/sangs rgyas 'gyur bar dogs pa med/_/bdag gi lhag bsam rnam par dag_/bdag dbang 'di na 'dren pa rnams/_/lus dang ngag gi las rnams kyang /_/rnam pa kun tu bdag gis sbyang /_/yid 
[\[279b.5\]]kyi las kyang sbyang bar bya/_/mi dge'i las ni spyad mi bya/_/ma 'ongs dus na sangs rgyas te/_/'jig rten mgon du 'gyur zhe na/_/bden pa des ni sa 'di yang /_/rnam pa drug tu g.yos gyur cig_/bdag gis bden tshig gang brjod pa/_/ma nor yang dag smras shes na/_/bden 
[\[279b.6\]]pa des ni mkha' dbyings las/_/sil snyan dag gi sgra grag shog_/bdag la gal te g.yo med cing /_/de bzhin tha ba med ce na/_/man dA ra ba'i me tog bzang /_/bden pa des ni char du phob/_/yang dag don du nges pa yi/_/tshig bden de skad brjod pa dang /_/phyogs bcu mtha' 
[\[279b.7\]]yas thams cad kyi/_/bye ba'i zhing rnams rab tu g.yos/_/de yi mod las mkha' dbyings nas/_/sil snyan bye ba'i sgra yang byung /_/me tog man dA ra ba dag_/mi 'greng bdun srid bab par gyur/_/rgyal po de yi rjes bslabs te/_/srog chags bye ba nyi shu yi/_/'dren par bdag cag 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]'gyur smon ces/_/yid du 'ong ba'i sgra yang bsgrags/_/de ltar srog chags bye ba phrag_/nyi shu po rnams thams cad kyang /_/rgyal po mchog gi rjes slob cing /_/byang chub mchog tu zhugs par gyur/_/rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i 
[\[280a.2\]]rgyal po nam mkha' zhes bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod sems na/_khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po nam mkha' zhes bya bar gyur pa ste/_'jam dpal 
[\[280a.3\]]gzhon nur gyur pa 'dis/_byang chub tu sems bskyed phyin chad bskal pa gang gA'i klung grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bdun gyi bye ma snyed 'das par gyur to/_/mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob nas kyang /_bskal pa gang gA'i klung drug cu rtsa bzhi'i bye ma snyed 'das par gyur te/_de nas 
[\[280a.4\]]nye bar bzung nas 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs so/_/'di byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu thams cad yongs su rdzogs so/_/'di sangs rgyas kyis yongs su rdzogs so/_/'di sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs te/_bar 
[\[280a.5\]]'ga' yang des bdag byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ram/_mi 'gyur snyam pa'i sems gcig kyang bskyed par ma gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po'i spyan sngar rgyal po de dang lhan cig tu/_
[\[280a.6\]]byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i srog chags bye ba phrag nyi shu po de dag thams cad kyang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/_sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i don du sangs rgyas 
[\[280a.7\]]kyi bya ba byas nas sangs rgyas kyi mya ngan las 'das pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/de dag thams cad kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dis sbyin pa la yang dag par btsud do/_/de bzhin du tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes 
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]rab la yang dag par btsud de/_thams cad la yang bsnyen bkur dang yongs su spyad par byas so/_/thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos bzung ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa gcig ma gtogs pa ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'og gi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung bzhi khri bzhi stong 
[\[280b.2\]]gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa sa'i lha zhes bya ba/_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun tshad med pa dang /_sku tshe'i tshad dpag tu med par bzhugs pa ste/_de da ltar yang bzhugs shing 'tsho'o gzhes so/_/
[\[280b.3\]]sngon byung ba'i le'u 'di bstan pa'i tshe/_srog chags brgya stong phrag bdun bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras/_'jam dpal gzhon nur 
[\[280b.4\]]gyur pa la/_'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal gal te de ltar khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang yongs su rdzogs/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yang yongs su rdzogs/_sangs rgyas kyi sa yang yongs su rdzogs/_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[280b.5\]]chos thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs na/_ci'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/_byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i 
[\[280b.6\]]sgra la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs na yang dang yang du byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyar med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_des byang chub thob par gyur pas thob zin pa ni gzod thob par mi bya'o/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal 
[\[280b.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs zhes bya ba ji lta bu/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'o/_/nam mkha' yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'o/_/
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]de ltar na nam mkha' dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /_de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med do/_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin zhe na/_de skad zer ba la gang gzugs yongs su rdzogs pa 
[\[281a.2\]]dang /_gang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_gang rnam par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'o/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal gzugs yongs su rdzogs pa ni ji lta bu/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du 
[\[281a.3\]]byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pa ni ji lta bu/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis gzugs kyi rtag pa'am/_mi rtag pa yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/_smras pa/_'jam dpal de ni ma mthong ngo /_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu chos gang 
[\[281a.4\]]rtag pa yang ma yin/_mi rtag pa yang ma yin pa de la yongs su rdzogs pa'am 'grib par 'gyur ba yod dam/_smras pa/_'jam dpal de ni med do/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu de ltar chos gang yongs su rdzogs pa yang med/_'grib pa med pa de ni yongs 
[\[281a.5\]]su rdzogs pa zhes bya'o/_/smras pa/_des chos cis yongs su rdzogs zhes bya/_smras pa/_des chos ji ltar shes pa de ltar ye shes 'jug par 'gyur te/_gang gi tshe ye shes 'jug par 'gyur ba de'i tshe mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog go_/gang gi tshe mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog pa 
[\[281a.6\]]de'i tshe yongs su rdzogs pa'am 'grib par byed pa med de/_gang yongs su rdzogs pa'am/_'grib pa med pa de ni mnyam pa nyid do/_/rigs kyi bu de lta bas na gzugs kyi mnyam pa nyid mthong ba gang yin pa de ni gzugs yongs su rdzogs pa'o/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du 
[\[281a.7\]]byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i mnyam pa nyid mthong ba gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis/_mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras 
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]so/_/'jam dpal de ltar khyod yun ring po nas bzod pa thob kyang bdag gis byang chub thob par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba'i sems bskyed pa gcig kyang skye ba med na/_'jam dpal khyod kyis da ji ltar sems can gzhan dag byang chub la yang dag par gzud par bya/_smras pa/_
[\[281b.2\]]rigs kyi bu kho bo ni sems can gang yang byang chub la yang dag par mi 'dzud do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can med pa dang /_sems can dben pa'i phyir te/_rigs kyi bu gang gis sems can dmigs pa des ni byang chub kyang dmigs/_gang gis byang chub dmigs 
[\[281b.3\]]pa de ni byang chub la/_sems can rnams yang dag par 'dzud par byed kyis/_rigs kyi bu bdag gis ni byang chub kyang ma dmigs/_sems can yang ma dmigs pas/_de ltar byang chub la sems can rnams 'dzud par mi byed do/_/mnyam pa nyid ni byang chub tu smon par 
[\[281b.4\]]byed pa yang med de/_de las ldog pa yang med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mnyam pa nyid la rnam par rtog pa med pas de ltar mnyam pa nyid la smon pa med do/_/ldog pa med do/_/de'i phyir na 'du byed rnams la gang nas kyang 'ong ba dang /_gang du yang 'gro ba med de/_de ni mnyam 
[\[281b.5\]]pa nyid do/_/rigs kyi bu mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba ni stong pa nyid kyi tshig ste/_stong pa nyid la smon pa gang yang med do/_/rigs kyi bu gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du de ltar yun ring po nas bzod pa thob na/_ci'i phyir bdag gis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o/_/
[\[281b.6\]]zhes bya bar sems mi skyed ces zer ba ni/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sems gang gis byang chub thob par bya ba de lta bu yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/_smras pa/_'jam dpal de ni ma mthong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems la gzugs med cing bstan du med pas byang chub 
[\[281b.7\]]kyang ming tsam ste/_yid las byung ba ma yin pas byang chub ces bya ba 'am/_sems zhes bya ba ni ming tsam ste/_ming tsam gang yin pa de ni dben zhing byed pa med pa'o/_/smras pa/_rigs kyi bu de la sa bsams nas bdag gis byang chub ji ltar thob par bya snyam du sems bskyed pa med 
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]do/_/zhes smras pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems de ni ma skyes pa ste/_ma skyes pa la skye ba med do/_/gang la skye ba med pa de la thob pa dang /_mngon par rtogs par bya ba yang gang zhig yod smras pa/_'jam dpal mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba ji lta bu smras pa/_
[\[282a.2\]]rigs kyi bu gang chos thams cad la rlom sems med cing mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa 'di ni mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o/_/ji ltar rdul tsam gyi 'du shes kyang mi skye mi 'gog pa/_de ltar rtogs pa de ni mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin nyid dang ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ni rnam 
[\[282a.3\]]par mi rtog ste/_de ni mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o/_/yang dag pa'i lta bas zhugs te/_mnyam pa nyid la/_chos gang yang mi dmigs shing ma dmigs pas gcig pa 'am tha dad par mi byed cing rlom sems su mi byed pa 'di ni mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o/_/chos 
[\[282a.4\]]thams cad gang 'di mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig tu lus kyis mngon sum du byas shing shes kyang lus la yang mngon par zhen pa med/_sems la yang mngon par zhen pa med pa 'di ni mngon par rtogs pa thob pa zhes bya'o/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal thob pa zhes bya ba de ji 
[\[282a.5\]]lta bu/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu de ni rgyu ba med pa'i tshig ste/_de'i phyir thob pa zhes bya'o/_/de'i rgyu ba khams gsum na tha snyad du 'di yin no zhes bstan du med de/_'phags pa rnams kyi thob pa gang yin pa de ni brjod par mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos de ni gnas 
[\[282a.6\]]med cing rgyu ba med pas de'i phyir brjod par mi nus so/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang de ni thob pa med pa las thob pa'i sgrar brjod pa ste/_de ni chos gang yang thob pa yang ma yin/_ma thob pa yang ma yin pas de'i phyir thob pa zhes bya'o//_//bam po bzhi pa ste tha 
[\[282a.7\]]ma/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur ba 
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pas legs par bstan du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid la dris shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras/_'jam 
[\[282b.2\]]dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu gang byang chub la mngon par dga' ba de la dris shig/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal khyod byang chub la mngon par dga' 
[\[282b.3\]]ba ma yin na nam/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu de ni ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang mngon par dga' ba de ni 'dod chags dang ma bral ba'o/_/gang 'dod chags dang ma bral ba de ni sred pa'o/_/sred pa gang la yod pa de ni skye bar 'gyur ro/_/skye ba gang la yod pa de la tshor ba yod do/_/gang la 
[\[282b.4\]]tshor ba yod pa de la 'byung ba med de/_rigs kyi bu de lta bas na kho bo byang chub la mngon par dga' ba med de/_byang chub tu dmigs pa med pas de'i phyir mngon par dga' ba med do/_/rigs kyi bu de lta mod kyi 'on kyang gang khyod kyis 'di skad du khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan 
[\[282b.5\]]bkod pa ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur zhes smras pa ni de la bdag gis bdag bstod par mi nus te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad thugs su chud pa mngon sum du bzhugs bzhin du bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bdag nyid kyis brjod pa na de ni 
[\[282b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag bstod tu 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal khyod kyis khyod nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'i smon lam ston cig_/de bzhin gshegs pas gnang ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_khyod las 
[\[282b.7\]]smon lam de dag thos na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag kyang spyod pa de lta bu yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' la slar mi zlog ste/_sangs rgyas kyi mthus bstan 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]par bgyi'o/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der logs su thal 
[\[283a.2\]]mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo byang chub don du gnyer ba dag bdag la nyan cing smon lam de dag thos nas kyang yongs su rdzogs par bgyid 
[\[283a.3\]]la/_de bzhin nyid du nan tan bgyid na bdag gis bstan par bgyi'o/_/de ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs ma thag tu/_de nas skad cig de la phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu g.yos par 
[\[283a.4\]]gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag grangs ma mchis pa nas nye bar bzung ste bdag gis smon lam btab pa ni/_nam bdag gis phyogs bcu mtha' yas 
[\[283a.5\]]mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgrib pa med pas bltas na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bdag gis byang chub la yang dag par btsud pa dang /_bdag gis byang chub kyi sems la bkod pa dang /_bdag gis sbyin pa la 
[\[283a.6\]]yang dag par btsud pa dang /_de bzhin du bdag gis tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_sa rab la yang dag par btsud pa dang /_bdag gis bskul ba dang /_bdag gis rjes su bstan par gyur par ma mthong ba de srid du bdag bla na 
[\[283a.7\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bya'i/_nam bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgrib pa med pas phyogs bcur rnam par bltas kyang bdag gis sangs rgyas nyid la ma bkod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de lta bu gang yang mthong bar ma 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]gyur pa de'i tshe bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o/_/zhes bgyi bar smon lam btab bo/_/de nas 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' la la 'di snyam du sems par 'gyur te/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dis 
[\[283b.2\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig mthong bar 'gyur snyam pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa thugs kyis thugs su chud nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i 
[\[283b.3\]]sgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na skyes bu gang la la zhig skyes par gyur te/_des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rdul phra rab tu brlags shing bshig ste thal bar byas na rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/_rdul phra rab kyi 
[\[283b.4\]]rdul de dag rtsi shes pa 'am/_rtsis la shin tu mkhas pa dag gis brgya phrag 'di snyed cig yod do zhe'am/_stong phrag 'di snyed cig yod do zhe'am/_'bum phrag 'di snyed cig yod do zhe'am/_bye ba phrag 'di snyed cig yod do zhe'am/_bye ba brgya phrag 'di snyed cig yod do zhe'am/_
[\[283b.5\]]bye ba stong phrag 'di snyed cig yod do zhe'am/_bye ba 'bum phrag 'di snyed cig yod do zhes shes pa'am/_bgrang ba'am/_gzhal ba'am/_tshad gzung bar nus sam/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[283b.6\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgrib pa med pas rnam par bltas na/_phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang de snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 
[\[283b.7\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig la gang gA'i klung du ma'i bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing tsam gyi tha gru yangs pa yongs su ma grub cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing de rin po che brgya stong du ma las grub pa dang /_rin po che brgya stong du 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]mas spras pa/_srid pa'i rtse mo'i tshad tsam du ma gyur gyi bar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi bar smon lam btab bo/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der stong gsum 
[\[284a.2\]]gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i tshad tsam gyi byang chub kyi shing skyes te/_byang chub kyi shing de'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad rgyas shing khyab par gyur cig ces bgyi bar smon lam de skad btab bo/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang bdag gis byang chub kyi shing 
[\[284a.3\]]de'i drung du bdag 'dug pa'i tshe/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du byang chub kyi shing drung de nas ma langs kyang /_bdag gi sprul pa phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing sangs rgyas 
[\[284a.4\]]kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag tu dong zhing sems can rnams la chos ston par gyur cig ces bgyi bar smon lam de skad btab bo/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang bdag gis bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi ming tsam 
[\[284a.5\]]yang ye med par gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang dang /_tha ba dang /_'chab pa med pa/_tshangs pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag par spyod pa sha stag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de gang la sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bud med kyi ming yang mi grag cing mngal du skye ba med pa dang /_byang chub 
[\[284a.6\]]sems dpa'i de dag thams cad kyang gos ngur smrig gyon cing skyil mo krung bcas bar rdzus te byung ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de shin tu dag par gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag grangs med par gshegs 
[\[284a.7\]]shing /_sems can rnams la chos ston pa de dag theg pa gsum las brtsams te mos pas tshul bzhin du sems can rnams la chos ston pa ma gtogs par sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas med cing byang chub sems dpas yongs su gang bar gyur cig ces 
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]bgyi bar smon lam de skad btab bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs 
[\[284b.2\]]rgyas pa na ming ji skad ces bgyi bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ci snyam du sems/_de bzhin gshegs pa de ci'i phyir kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya zhe na/_
[\[284b.3\]]rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa kun gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong bar 'gyur ba dang /_sems can gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong bar 
[\[284b.4\]]'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba dang /_rigs kyi bu da ltar byung ba'i dus sam/_nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus kyang rung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu 
[\[284b.5\]]gzigs pa de'i mtshan gang gis thos pa de dag ni mi 'gyur ba la zhugs pa dang /_mos pa chung ba'i gang zag rnams ma gtogs par thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bas/_de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de kun tu 
[\[284b.6\]]gzigs pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis smon lam ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyis dga' ba'i zas dang ldan par 'gyur bar smon lam mdzad pa lta bu 
[\[284b.7\]]yang ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa' gang dag skyes par gyur pa de dag kha zas kyi 'du shes shig skyes par gyur pa na/_de ma thag tu skad cig de la de dag gi lag pa g.yas par ro bro ba brgya phrag du ma dang 
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]ldan pa'i kha zas kyis gang ba'i snod mngon du byung bar gyur la/_snod de dag byung ma thag tu de dag 'di snyam du 'di ltar bdag cag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la ma phul/_sems can dbul zhing phongs pas sdug bsngal ba dang mgon med 
[\[285a.2\]]par gyur pa dag dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi 'jig rten du skyes pa gang dag lo stong phrag du mar yang mchil ma'i thal ba 'ga' yang mi rnyed pa de lta bu dag yongs su tshim par ma byas par bdag nyid kyis bza' ba ni tshul dang mi 'dra'o zhes bgyi ba dran pa thob par gyur cing de'i mod la de dag mngon par 
[\[285a.3\]]shes pa lnga yongs su grub par 'gyur te/_rdzu 'phrul dang ldan zhing nam mkha' las mchi ba dang /_rlung ltar chags pa ma mchis pa'i shugs kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs dang tshad ma mchis pa dag tu phyin nas kha zas de las de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos 
[\[285a.4\]]kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la yang phul/_sems can phongs shing ltogs pa dang /_mgon ma mchis pa rnams dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi 'jig rten du skyes pa rnams kyang yongs su tshim par bgyis nas de dag la chos bstan te/_skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der slar 
[\[285a.5\]]mchi bar gyur cig ces bgyi bar smon lam de skad btab bo/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang bdag gis ni bdag byang chub thob pa'i tshe bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag gos rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi longs spyod dang ldan par 
[\[285a.6\]]gyur te/_bsams pa tsam gyis ci la dga' ba'i gos rin po che dge sbyong gi tshul dang 'thun pa rung bdag 'byung bar gyur la gos rin po che de dag byung ma thag tu 'di snyam du 'di ltar bdag cag gis gos 'di lta bu phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la ma phul bar 
[\[285a.7\]]bdag cag nyid kyis yongs su spyad pa ni tshul dang mi 'dra'o snyam pa'i dran pa thob par gyur nas/_de dag gis sems de ltar skyes ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams tshad ma mchis/_grangs ma mchis pa dag tu mchis shing gos de dag thams cad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mngon 
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]par bkab ste/_slar sangs rgyas kyi zhing der mchis nas/_ci dga' ba'i gos rin po che la spyod par gyur cig ces bgyi bar smon lam de skad btab bo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi longs spyod dang /_
[\[285b.2\]]yongs su spyad pa gang ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dag la phul nas slad kyis bdag cag yongs su spyod par 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na mi khom pa brgyad ma mchis pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[285b.3\]]zhing de na mi dge ba'i sgra ma mchis pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sdug bsngal gyi sgra ma mchis pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na skyon du 'gyur ba'i sgra ma mchis pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya yid du mi 'ong ba ma mchis par 
[\[285b.4\]]gyur cig ces bgyi bar smon lam btab bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 
[\[285b.5\]]gzigs pa de 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'i ming ci zhes bgyi bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs shing dag la rdul med pa bsags pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gyur ro/_/
[\[285b.6\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams de phyogs gang logs shig tu 'byung bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams de ni lho phyogs logs su 'byung ste/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nyid kyang de'i nang 
[\[285b.7\]]du 'dus shing khongs su chud par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni smon lam 'di ltar btab ste/_bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de rin po che bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag 
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]du mas gang zhing nor bu rin po che du mas spras pas nor bu rin po che kun tu bstan pa dang 'dra la rin po che de dag kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na dkon la sngan chad ma mthong zhing mi srid pa sha stag ste/_de dag gi ming brjod na yang lo bye ba brgya stong thogs par 'gyur ba de lta 
[\[286a.2\]]bu'i nor bu rin po che dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yongs su gang bar gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de la byang chub sems dpa' la la zhig sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di gser las grub par mthong bar dga'o snyam na yang des gser las grub par mthong ba dang /_dngul las 
[\[286a.3\]]grub par mthong bar dga'o snyam na yang dngul las grub par mthong la/_gzhan gyis gser las grub par mthong ba ma mchis par mi 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du bai dUr+ya las grub pa dang /_shel las grub pa dang /_mu tig dmar po las grub pa dang /_rdo'i snying po las grub 
[\[286a.4\]]pa dang /_spug las grub pa'am/_de bzhin du rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las grub pa 'am/_tsan dan las grub pa 'am/_a ga ru las grub pa 'am/_ta ka ra las grub pa 'am/_tam la'i lo ma las grub pa 'am/_tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po las grub pa 'am/_tsan dan 
[\[286a.5\]]dmar po las grub pa 'am/_su rnam pa ji lta bur 'dod pa de dag gis de bzhin du mthong ste/_phan tshun nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad par mthong ba yang ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub kyi shing de las 'od byung ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rang rang 
[\[286a.6\]]las 'od byung bas snang zhing gsal ba ma gtogs par nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od kyang mi mngon/_skar ma dang /_rin po che dang /_zhugs dang /_glog gam/_sems can gzhan gang gi 'od kyang mi mngon pa dang /_gang dag ji tsam du 'od kyis khyab par gda' ba tha na sangs rgyas 
[\[286a.7\]]kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum de snyed du de dag gi 'od kyis gsal bar 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa'i khyad par gyis me tog kha bye ba dang /_kha zums par 'gyur ba dang /_gang dus dang /_tshod rnam pa ji lta bur yongs su 
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]spyad par 'tshal ba de bzhin du de'i grub pa ma gtogs par nyin mtshan gyi ming yang ma mchis pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na grang ba dang tsha ba yang ma mchis/_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba yang ma mchis te/_byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang 
[\[286b.2\]]rgya bar 'tshal ba de 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du mchis shing dga' ldan gyi gnas su tshe bas par bgyis nas byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i steng gi bar snang las sil snyan bltar mi gda' ba bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum rtag tu rgyun 
[\[286b.3\]]mi 'chad par sgra 'byin pa dang /_sil snyan de dag las kyang 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sgra mi 'byung gi gzhan du na pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /_chos kyi sgra dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgra dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi sgra 'byin par 'gyur te/_
[\[286b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' de dag ji lta bur mos pa'i sgra de lta bu thos par 'gyur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa de blta bar 'tshal lam/_'chag gam/_'gro'am/_'ong ngam/_sdod dam/_mchis kyang rung ste/_gang dag der sangs rgyas blta ba'i yid la 
[\[286b.5\]]bgyi ba skyes ma thag tu de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu gzigs pa byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs pa de de nyid na bzhugs par mthong bar gyur cing mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de mthong ma thag tu de dag gi the tshom mam/_
[\[286b.6\]]nem nur ram/_yid gnyis sam/_chos kyi som nyi gang ci mchis pa yongs su chad par gyur te/_bstan mi 'tshal bar chos kyi tshig de'i don yongs su 'tshal bar gyur cig ces bgyi bar smon lam btab bo/_/de nas 'khor de'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag du 
[\[286b.7\]]mas mgrin gcig tu smras pa/_gang 'di kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya ba mtshan de ni tshul dang 'dra ba ste/_sems can gang dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa de'i mtshan thos pa de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin na sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes par gyur 
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]pa lta ci smos te/_gang dag gis lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa dang /_gang dag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i ming thos pa de dag gis ni sangs rgyas mngon sum du mthong bar blta'o/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang 
[\[287a.2\]]chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu dag de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_rigs kyi bu dag gang gis sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi mtshan brjod pa bas ni gang gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i ming brjod na 'di 
[\[287a.3\]]nyid de bas bsod nams ches mang du skyed na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa de'i mtshan brjod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bskal pa re re zhing sems can gyi don ji snyed du byas pa'i sems 
[\[287a.4\]]can gyi don de ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyis kyang ma mdzad do/_/de nas 'khor de'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas 
[\[287a.5\]]mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de skad ces brjod pa dang /_/de'i mod la srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[287a.6\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes par gyur to/_/sems can tshad med pa dag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par gyur te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gzhan yang 
[\[287a.7\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni 'di ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag tshad med grangs med pa dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'i rgyan dang /_smon 
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]lam gyi rgyan dang /_mtshan nyid dang /_mtshan ma dang /_spyod pa dang /_gnas kyi rnam pa'i rgyan gang ji snyed cig mthong ba las nyan thos kyi bkod pa dang /_snyigs ma lnga'i sangs rgyas rnams ma gtogs par de dag thams cad bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig gi nang du 'dus pa 
[\[287b.2\]]dang /_khongs su chud par bya'o zhes bgyi bar smon lam btab ste/_bcom ldan 'das bdag 'tshal na bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa las brtsams te/_rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan du thogs pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis sug 
[\[287b.3\]]las gzhan ma mchis par bshad dam de bas kyang ring du bshad kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de dag mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi smon lam gyi rnam pa gang ci 'dra ba de la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[287b.4\]]pa'i sangs rgyas ma gtogs par dpang du gyur pa gzhan gang yang ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal de de bzhin te/_de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[287b.5\]]rgyas kyi ye shes la ni thogs pa med de dus gsum kun tu 'jug go_/de nas 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de brjod pa dang /_bcom 
[\[287b.6\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yod pa de gnyis 'dra 'am/_'on te mi 'dra snyam pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi 
[\[287b.7\]]sems kyi rtog pa thugs kyis thugs su chud nas byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na mi la la zhig gis skra'i rtse mo brgyar gshags pa'i chas rgya mtsho chen po las chu'i thigs pa 
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]gcig blangs na/_rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_chu blangs pa de de dang /_phyin las pa de gnyis gang mang bar 'gyur/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das blangs pa ni nyung slad na las pa ni tshad ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi 
[\[288a.2\]]bu mi des skra'i rtse mo brgyar gshags pa'i chas rgya mtsho chen po las chu'i thigs pa gcig blangs pa de tsam du ni 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par blta'o/_/rgya mtsho chen po na chu'i lhag ma ji snyed cig 
[\[288a.3\]]yod pa de tsam du ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par blta'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags 
[\[288a.4\]]pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan la la la mnga' bar gyur tam/_mnga' bar 'gyur ram/_da ltar la la na de lta bu mnga' ba lta yang 
[\[288a.5\]]bzhugs sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu yod de/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung bye ba phrag brgya'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams smon lam la rab tu gnas pas mngon par 'phags pa 
[\[288a.6\]]zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun nas 'od zer yon tan rtag tu mang ba rgya mtsho'i rgyal po zhes bya ba sku tshe'i tshad dpag tu med pa da ltar bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs tshad med 
[\[288a.7\]]pas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba gang yin pa dang /_da ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun nas 'od zer yon tan rtag tu mang ba rgya mtsho'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa gang yin pa de gnyis mtshungs te lhag chad med do/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go bgos pa/_'jug pa chen 
[\[288b.2\]]pos zhugs pa gang 'di 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyod pa 'di nyid la gnas pa bzhi yod de/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yang 'di dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi ming 
[\[288b.3\]]bstan tu gsol/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag gang na mchis pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas 'od zer yon tan rtag tu mang ba rgya mtsho'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang bstan du gsol/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag 
[\[288b.4\]]kyang bstan du gsol/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de'i phyir nyon cig dang bstan par bya'o/_/
[\[288b.5\]]rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gcig ni 'od kyi tog ces bya ste/_shar phyogs logs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'dug go_/gnyis pa ni ye shes bla ma zhes bya ste/_lho phyogs logs na bcom ldan 
[\[288b.6\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'dug go_/gsum pa ni zhi ba'i dbang po zhes bya ste/_nub phyogs logs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab brtsegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'dug go_/bzhi pa ni smon lam blo gros zhes bya 
[\[288b.7\]]ste/_byang phyogs logs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mthu bo che'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'dug go_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa 'di lta bu mngon par mdzad de/_rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de mngon par mdzad 
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas 'od zer yon tan rtag tu mang ba rgya mtsho'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang kun tu snang bar gyur/_bcom ldan 'das de yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyis kun nas bskor cing mdun gyis byas pa dang /_
[\[289a.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa sngan chad ma mthong ma thos shing bsam gyis mi khyab la rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa de dag kyang 'di lta ste/_dper na skyes bu mig dang ldan pa'i lag na skyu ru ra'i 'bru 'dug pa mthong ba de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing de sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[289a.3\]]zhing 'di nas kun nas snang bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas 'od zer yon tan rtag tu mang ba rgya mtsho'i rgyal po de yang sku tha mal pa dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong mnga' ba ste/_'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi ri bo ltar mdzes shing lam me lhan ne lhang 
[\[289a.4\]]nger bzhugs pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus dpag tshad bzhi khri nyis stong tsam du gyur pa sha stag gis bskor cing mdun gyis byas te/_byang chub kyi shing yon tan bkod pa du mas rab tu brgyan pa'i drung na seng ge'i khri la bzhugs shing sprul pa bye ba khrag 
[\[289a.5\]]khrig brgya stong mngon par sprul pa mdzad de/_sprul pa de dag kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por dong zhing sems can rnams la chos ston pa mthong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa/_
[\[289a.6\]]rigs kyi bu dag khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs phun sum tshogs pa mthong ngam/_de nas 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong stan las langs te/_thal mo sbyar nas kun 
[\[289a.7\]]gyis kyang mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyod pa ci 'dra ba'i spyod pa de la bslab par bgyi'o/_/bdag cag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de lta bu bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom 
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]ldan 'das kyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs pa/_kha dog du ma dang ldan pa 'di lta ste/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_le brgan dang /_shel dang /_dngul gyi kha dog lta bu mang po 'thon 
[\[289b.2\]]par gyur te/_de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bar byas nas slar log ste/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[289b.3\]]dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/_rkyen gang lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byams pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi 
[\[289b.4\]]stong 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir sems bskyed de/_byams pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag las skyes bu dam pa bcu drug gis ni lhag 
[\[289b.5\]]pa'i bsam pa dang ldan par bsam pa thag pas tshig brjod de/_de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ci 'dra ba de bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/lhag ma rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod 
[\[289b.6\]]pa ni de ltar mi 'gyur yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 
[\[289b.7\]]yon tan bkod pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar lhag chad med par 'gyur ro/_/byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa gces spras byed pa la ltos/_tshig tu brjod par 'dra yang gang gis lhag pa'i bsam pas bsam pa thag pa nas tshig tu brjod pa de 
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bzhin du gyur to/_/gang gis dman pa'i sems dang /_dad pa tsam gyis tshig tu brjod pa de dag kyang las dma' ba des bskal pa bye ba khrag 
[\[290a.2\]]khrig brgya stong phrag drug cur 'khor ba phyir bsnyil te/_pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' bzhi po 'od kyi tog dang /_ye shes bla ma dang /_zhi ba'i dbang po dang /_smon lam blo gros dag kyang /_phyogs bzhi nas khang pa brtsegs 
[\[290a.3\]]pa bai dUr+ya'i mdog tu 'dug pa mtshungs pa med par bzang ba dag gi nang du zhugs te/_lha bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar byed/_me tog gi char chen po ni rab tu 'bebs/_sil snyan 
[\[290a.4\]]bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum ni sgra 'byin cing rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul sna tshogs kyis 'ong bar snang bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'jig rten du dog sa cher 
[\[290a.5\]]g.yos par gyur pa dang /_phyogs bzhi nas khang pa brtsegs pa bzhi mchi bar gda' bar gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byams pa byang chub sems dpa' bzhi po de dag de bzhin gshegs pas bskul nas de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba'i phyir nye bar 'ong bar 
[\[290a.6\]]gyur to/_/de skad ces bka' stsal nas ring po ma lon par de'i mod la byang chub sems dpa' bzhi po de dag lhags te/_lhags nas kyang khang pa brtsegs pa de dag nas babs nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 
[\[290a.7\]]'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'khod ma thag tu thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor phyogs bzhi nas snang ba chen pos snang bar gyur to/_/de 
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag skyes bu dam pa 'ongs pa bzhi po 'di dag ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go gyon pa/_'jug pa chen pos yang dag par zhugs pa yin gyis/_rigs kyi bu dag khyod kyis skyes bu 
[\[290b.2\]]dam pa 'di dag la rim gro skyed la chos dris shig_/rigs kyi bu dag skyes bu dam pa 'di dag gi smon lam nyon cig_/rigs kyi bu dag skyes bu dam pa 'di dag gi smon lam ni rnam pa 'di lta bu ste/_rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang su dag 
[\[290b.3\]]gis bdag cag mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur te/_bskal pa bye ba phrag nyi shur 'khor ba phyir bsnyil bar gyur cig_/pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig_/bud med gang gis bdag 
[\[290b.4\]]cag gi ming thos na yang myur du bud med kyi lus las 'gyur bar shog shig ces bya ba de lta bu'i smon lam dang ldan pa dag go_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de bstan te/_rdzu 'phrul de dag phyir brtul ba mdzad pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang mi snang 
[\[290b.5\]]bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper na sgyu ma mkhan ni sgyu ma sprul pa yang bgyid/_sgyu ma ma mchis par yang 
[\[290b.6\]]bgyid de/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang skye yang skye/_'gag kyang 'gag ste/_gang la skye ba dang /_'gag pa ma mchis pa de ni mnyam pa nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das mnyam pa nyid la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur 
[\[290b.7\]]du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla mas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal byang chub ji lta bu zhig mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya/_
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_gang sus kyang ma thob ma bshig cing gang la yod pa 'am med par chags pa dmigs su med pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla mas smras pa/_'jam dpal byang chub de ji tsam du yod pas kyang mi 'thob/_med pas kyang mi 'thob 
[\[291a.2\]]bam/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad ni gzod ma nas ma skyes pa ste/_yod par ma gyur mi 'gyur bas de'i phyir 'thob par 'gyur ba med do/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal tshul gcig pa'i chos bstan pas de skad du ston tam/_'jam dpal 
[\[291a.3\]]gyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu tshul gcig pa'i chos bstan pa zhes bya ba gang yin/_smras pa/_'jam dpal gang phung po rnams kyang mi mthong /_khams dang skye mched rnams kyang mi mthong la dmus long yang ma yin/_sha'i mig can yang ma yin zhing chos gang la yang mi rtog_/rnam 
[\[291a.4\]]par mi rtog pa dang /_chos gang la yang 'phel ba dang /_'grib par mi mthong ba 'di ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras smras pa/_gang de bzhin nyid dang mi 'gal zhing chos nyid dang 'gal bar 
[\[291a.5\]]mi byed de/_'di dag ni so so'i skye bo'i chos so/_/'di dag ni nyan thos kyi chos so/_/'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi chos so/_/'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so zhes bya bar tha dad du mi 'byed cing gang 'di dben pa'i tshul du tshul gcig pa la 'jug pa 'di ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu 
[\[291a.6\]]bstan pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' mthong dgas smras pa/_gang de bzhin nyid la yang zhugs la de bzhin nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su mi byed cing 'di ni zab po zhes bya bar mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/_/byang chub 
[\[291a.7\]]sems dpa' spobs pa mi zad pas smras pa/_chos thams cad mi zad pa gang yin pa de ni shin tu zad pa ste/_gang chos thams cad mi zad par chos bstan pa de ni chos nyid las 'gal bar mi byed pa ste/_de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/_/byang 
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]chub sems dpa' bsam pa legs par sems pas smras pa/_gang bsam pas bsam du med pa la yang 'jug la bsam du med pa des kyang rlom sems su mi byed cing mi dmigs pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rdul dang 
[\[291b.2\]]bral bas smras pa/_gang 'dod chags dang shin tu bral ba de ni mtshan ma thams cad la 'dod chags pa yang med/_'dod chags dang bral ba yang med/_rjes su chags pa yang med/_khong khro ba yang med/_rmongs pa yang med/_gcig tu byed pa yang med/_gnyis su byed 
[\[291b.3\]]pa yang med/_byed pa yang med/_mi byed pa yang med/_len pa yang med/_'dor ba yang med de de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtshos smras pa/_gang rgya mtsho lta bur zab cing gting dpag dka' ba'i chos la 
[\[291b.4\]]zhugs pa de chos la yang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog la ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du chos ston cing /_bdag dang gzhan du rlom sems su mi byed pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/_/zla ba'i bla ma gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa/_gang sems can 
[\[291b.5\]]thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems kyis zla ba lta bur gyur kyang sems can de dag la yang rlom sems med pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan gyi mun pa thams cad rnam par sel bas smras pa/_gang 
[\[291b.6\]]mya ngan thams cad rgyun chad pa de ni mya ngan med cing zhum par 'gyur ba med do/_/sems can rnams ni mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan pa'o/_/de la mya ngan gyi rtsa ba gang zhe na/_gang 'di ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin pa ste/_gang ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin pa mnyam pa nyid la 
[\[291b.7\]]gnas shing chos ston pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa med pas smras pa/_gang 'dod pa'i khams la yang mi dmigs/_gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams dang /_nyan thos kyi chos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos la'ang mi 
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]dmigs pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun tu lta bas smras pa/_gang chos ston na gang 'di stong pa nyid kyis mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa nyid ston la/_stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su mi byed/_
[\[292a.2\]]mnyam pa nyid kyis kyang mi dmigs pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas smras pa/_gang chos ston pa'i tshe 'khor gsum dang 'gal bar mi byed de/_'khor gsum gang zhe na/_bdag 
[\[292a.3\]]mi dmigs pa dang /_chos nyan pa mi dmigs pa dang /_chos la yang mngon par zhen pa med pa'o/_/'di ni 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i chos bstan pa zhes bya ste/_de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba grub pas 
[\[292a.4\]]smras pa/_gang chos thams cad 'du ba med par yang shes shing ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du yang ston la 'di lta ste/_chos thams cad brjod du med pa'i phyir yi ge gcig kyang mi brjod pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan to/_/byang chub sems 
[\[292a.5\]]dpa' zab mor spyod pas smras pa/_gang chos thams cad kyi zab pa nyid kyang shes la chos de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_gang ston pa dang /_gang la ston pa dang /_gang bstan pa de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni/_chos kyi tshul 
[\[292a.6\]]gcig tu bstan pa'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid chen po gzi brjid chen po dag gis so nas rang rang gi spobs pa ston par gyur to/_/tshul gcig tu bstan pa'i chos kyi sgo 'di bstan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bdun 
[\[292a.7\]]cus mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/_/dge slong bdun stong ni nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]lha dang mi'i skye dgu las khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa drug ni chos la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa rnam par dag par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[292b.2\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni ji snyed cig tu 'gyur/_de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni ji tsam zhig tu 'gyur/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[292b.3\]]'tshang rgya/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid la dris shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces 
[\[292b.4\]]smras so/_/'jam dpal khyod ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe nam mkha'i khams gzugs can du gyur pa de'i tshe bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang 
[\[292b.5\]]rgya'o/_/gang gi tshe sgyu ma'i skyes bu byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/gang gi tshe dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[292b.6\]]'tshang rgya'o/_/gang gi tshe rmi lam gyi skyes bu dang /_brag ca dang /_mig yor dang /_chu zla dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/gang gi tshe nyi ma'i 'od kyis mtshan 
[\[292b.7\]]mor gyur la zla ba'i 'od kyis nyin mor gyur pa de'i tshe bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/rigs kyi bu de lta yin gyis/_su byang chub tu smon pa de la dris shig_/smras pa/_'jam dpal khyod byang chub tu mi smon tam/_/smras pa/_rigs kyi bu de ni ma yin 
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal nyid kyang byang chub la byang chub nyid kyang 'jam dpal lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu gang 'di byang chub ces bya ba 'am/_'jam dpal zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam mo/_/ming gang yin pa de ni dben zhing byed pa med pa ste stong pa'o/_/
[\[293a.2\]]stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni byang chub bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med 
[\[293a.3\]]kyi byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa dang /_nyan thos 'dus pa mthong ngam/_thos sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mthong ngo /_/thos so/_/bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/
[\[293a.4\]]bde bar gshegs pa de ni bgrang du ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na yul ma gad+ha'i til gyi dong nas til gyi 'bru gcig cig blangs na rigs kyi bu til gyi 'bru gcig po de ji lta ba de bzhin du ni de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[293a.5\]]'od dpag med kyi byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa dang /_nyan thos 'dus par blta'o/_/phyi na til gyi lhag ma lus pa ltar ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'dus par blta'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_
[\[293a.6\]]dper na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thal bar brlags te/_rdul phra rab tsam du byas pa la rigs kyi bu rdul phra rab ji snyed cig yod pa de snyed kyi bskal par de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa de bzhugs par byas kyang brgya'i char yang smos par mi 'gyur 
[\[293a.7\]]ro/_stong gi cha dang /_bye ba brgya phrag stong gi cha dang /_bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi cha dang /_grangs dang cha dang /_bgrang ba dang /_rgyur yang smos par mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i tshe'i tshad ni tshad med grangs med par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di skyes bu la la zhig gis rdul phra rab tu brlags te/_thal bar byas pa de las 
[\[293b.2\]]skyes bu la la zhig gis rdul phra rab kyi rdul gcig khyer te/_rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyed pa de snyed kyi stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas der rdul phra rab kyi rdul gcig bzhag ste/_skyes bu des tshul de bzhin du shar phyogs logs su rdul 
[\[293b.3\]]phra rab kyi rdul de dag thams cad zad zad du bkod par gyur la/_de bzhin du skyes bu gnyis pa zhig skyes te/_des kyang lho phyogs logs su de snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re nas/_tshul de bzhin du bor te/_de bzhin du phyogs bcur skyes bu de lta bu re res tshul de 
[\[293b.4\]]dang 'dra bar de snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul zad zad du re re nas bor na rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/_/stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/_/'bum phrag ni 'di snyed cig 
[\[293b.5\]]yod do/_/bye ba phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/_/bye ba brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/_/bye ba stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/_/bye ba 'bum phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/_/bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/_/gtams phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/_/
[\[293b.6\]]dkrigs phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/_/mi 'khrugs pa phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/_/zhes bya bar tshad gzung bar nus sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni mi nus so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de ni mi nus so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[293b.7\]]rigs kyi bu skyes bu bcu po de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed cig 'das pa dang gang dag tu phyin te/_rdul phra rab kyi rdul de dag bor ba dang /_gang dag las 'das te rdul phra rab ma bor ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad btags 
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]te rdul phra rab tu brlags na/_rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/_rdul phra rab de dag rtsis shes pa'am/_rtsis la mkhas pas brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/_/stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/_/'bum phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/_/bye ba 
[\[294a.2\]]phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/_/bye ba brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/_/bye ba stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/_/bye ba 'bum phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/_/bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/_/gtams phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/_/dkrigs 
[\[294a.3\]]phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/_/mi 'khrugs pa phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do zhes bya bar shes pa'am/_bgrang ba'am/_gzhal ba'am/_tshad gzung bar nus sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dpe de la ni sems can rnams myos par 'gyur gyi/_don 
[\[294a.4\]]'tshal ba'am/_gzhal ba'am/_bgrang ba'am/_tshad gzung bar mi nus so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas ni rdul phra rab de dag bgrang ba'i tshul gyis brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/_/stong phrag 
[\[294a.5\]]ni 'di snyed cig yod do/_/'bum phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/_/bye ba phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/_/bye ba brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/_/bye ba stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/_/bye ba 'bum phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/_/bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag 
[\[294a.6\]]ni 'di snyed cig yod do/_/gtams phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/_/dkrigs phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/_/mi 'khrugs pa phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/_/zhes bya ba de bas kyang lhag par gong du de bzhin gshegs pas rnam pa thams cad du thugs su chud do/_/de 
[\[294a.7\]]nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te ye shes chen po de lta bu'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par sems can dmyal ba chen 
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]por bsregs kyang bcom ldan 'das de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des bzod par bgyi'o/_/de lta bu'i ye shes chen po ni yongs su gtang bar mi bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byams pa de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_
[\[294b.2\]]sems can mos pa chung ngu dang /_le lo che ba dang /_brtson 'grus chung ba ma gtogs par su zhig de lta bu'i ye shes chen po la 'dod pa mi skyed/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'di bstan pa'i tshe srog chags khri byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[294b.3\]]'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar phyogs bcur skyes bu bcu po de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed cig 'das pa dang /_'jig rten 
[\[294b.4\]]gyi khams gang dag tu phyin te rdul phra rab kyi rdul bor ba dang /_gang dag las 'das te ma bor ba de thams cad rdul phra rab tu brlags pa de dag pas kyang mang ba'i bskal par da dung 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[294b.5\]]rigs kyi bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i smon lam ni bsam gyis mi khyab/_yang dag par 'jug pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pas de byang chub thob pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang bsam gyis mi khyab/_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gyur 
[\[294b.6\]]ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ltar bskal pa 'di snyed du yang skyo ba mi skyed pa'i 'jug pa 
[\[294b.7\]]chen po de ngo mtshar lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das spyod pa chen po de ngo mtshar lags so/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_nam mkha'i khams 'di snyam du zhag dang /_nyi ma dang /_zla ba phyed dang /_dus dang /_lo dang /_
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]bskal pa dang /_bskal pa brgya dang /_bskal pa stong dang /_bskal pa bye ba dang /_bskal pa khrag khrig dang /_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dang /_gtams dang /_dkrigs dang /_mi 'khrugs pa zhig 'das so snyam du sems 
[\[295a.2\]]sam/_smras pa/_'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nam mkha'i khams la rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/smras pa rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' gang gis chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bur khong du chud de ci nas kyang 
[\[295a.3\]]mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa de ltar khong du chud pa de ni 'di snyam du zhag gcig 'das par gyur to/_/nyi ma gcig 'das par gyur to zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du lo 'di snyed cig 'das par gyur to zhes rnam par mi rtog go_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos gang la 
[\[295a.4\]]yang de'i 'du shes gang yang 'jug pa med do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na nam mkha'i khams ni bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed pas lhag pa zhig 'das par gyur kyang skyo zhing yongs su yi 'chad pa med de/_nam mkha'i khams la skye ba 'am/_
[\[295a.5\]]'jig pa 'am/_'tshig pa 'am/_'gyes par 'gyur ba med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nam mkha'i khams la dngos po med pa'i phyir ro/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang gis chos thams cad dngos po med par shes pa de ni skyo ba dang /_
[\[295a.6\]]yongs su yi 'chad pa'i sems mi bskyed do/_/rigs kyi bu gang la nam mkha'i khams zhes bya ba de ni 'tshig pa med/_skyo ba med/_yi 'chad pa med/_g.yo ba med/_skye ba med/_rga ba med/_'chi ba med/_'pho ba med/_'byung ba med/_'ong ba med/_'gro ba 
[\[295a.7\]]med do/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du gang la 'jam dpal zhes bya ba'i ming 'di la yang 'tshig pa med/_skyo ba med/_yi chad pa med/_g.yo ba med/_skye ba med/_rga ba med/_'chi ba med/_'pho ba med/_'byung ba med/_'ong ba med/_'gro ba med do/_/de 
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_ming de ni shin tu dben pa'i phyir ro/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /_lha'i bu gzhan yang dbang che ba/_dbang che bar grags pa dag gis 
[\[295b.2\]]mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags na/_gang gis thos nas 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /_klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang gzhan la yang rgya 
[\[295b.3\]]cher ston pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag 'di skad du bdag cag gis gis gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya'o/_/bcang bar bya'o/_/bklag par bya'o/_/kun chub 
[\[295b.4\]]par bya'o/_/gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bya'o zhes tshig tu brjod pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i 
[\[295b.5\]]sgras 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas 'dzin tam/_'chang ngam/_klog gam/_kun chub par bgyid dam/_'jug par bgyid dam/_gzhan la yang rgya cher bstan pa dang /_
[\[295b.6\]]gang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rjes su bslab bo zhes sems bskyed pa des bsod nams ji tsam zhig skyed par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang la las phyogs bcur de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[295b.7\]]spyan sgrib pa med pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed cig gzigs pa de dag thams cad rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa re re la phul ba dang /_rnam grangs de bzhin du sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems kyis tshul khrims kyi sdom 
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]pa thams cad yang dag par blangs pa la gnas te/_phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug gi bar du sbyin pa byin pa bas/_byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas 'dzin tam/_'chang ngam/_klog gam/_kun chub par byed dam/_
[\[296a.2\]]'jug par byed dam/_gzhan la yang rgya cher ston par byed dam/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rjes su bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du sems skyed cing gom pa bdun 'dor na/_bsod nams kyi phung po de la bsod nams kyi phung po snga mas brgya'i 
[\[296a.3\]]char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/bye ba'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/bye ba brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/bye ba khrag khrig 
[\[296a.4\]]phrag 'bum gyi char yang nye bar mi 'gro ste/_grangs dang /_cha dang /_bgrang ba dang /_dpe dang /_rgyur yang mi bzod do/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin kun nas snang ba sgyu ma lta bur 'byung ba zhes bya ba la snyoms par 
[\[296a.5\]]zhugs so/_/de ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed cig 'dus par gyur pa de dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[296a.6\]]'das rnams mthong bar gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi spyan snga na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dug cing rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ston par mthong nas/_de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_'jam dpal gzhon 
[\[296a.7\]]nur gyur pa 'di de ltar 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang por cig car du snang bar gyur pa ni smon lam dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_ye shes kyi khyad par ngo mtshar che'o snyam du ngo mtshar gyi 'du shes skyes par gyur to/_/de nas bcom 
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kas+yi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byams 
[\[296b.2\]]pa de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa zhes bya bar zung shig_/smon lam bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung 
[\[296b.3\]]shig_/byang chub kyi sems yang dag par dga' bar byed pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/de nas de'i tshe 'khor der phyogs bcu dag nas byang chub sems dpa' tshad med grangs med pa 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[296b.4\]]dang /_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir me tog gi char chen po phab nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/_rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing 'di skad du kye ma sangs rgyas kye ma sangs rgyas deng ni bdag cag 
[\[296b.5\]]gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i seng ge'i sgra dang /_bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa thos so zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[296b.6\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/sems can tshad med pa yang dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su grub par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_byang chub 
[\[296b.7\]]sems dpa' byams pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra dang /_phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam 
[\[297a.2\]]grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/_'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/_le'u bco lnga pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len dra bo d+hi dang /_dzi na 
[\[297a.3\]]mi tra dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//_//
